96162872.name: Stone Age Child
96162872.desc: If you control no monster, or if all monster you control are Level 1 Warrior monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can add 1 Equip Spell from your Deck or GY to your hand. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Warrior monster from your hand or Deck, except "Stone Age Child".

96162873.name: Stone Age Warrior
96162873.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 Warrior monster with 1000 or lower ATK from your Deck to your hand. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Warrior monster from your hand to either player's field.

96162874.name: Stone Age Rage
96162874.desc: If a monster is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card destroys a monster by battle: It can make another attack in a row. If this card declares a attack: You can discard 1 Level 1 Warrior from your hand; equip this card with 1 Equip Spell or Union Monster from your hand or GY. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 other Level 1 monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

96162875.name: Ancient Age - Spear Holder K'inich
96162875.desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; all Level 1 Warrior monster you control gain 900 ATK until the end of this turn, also your opponent cannot activate card or effects in the Battle Phase this turn. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Warrior monster from your Deck or GY to your opponent's field in Defense Position, then it can make another attack in a row. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Age - Spear Holder K'inich" once per turn. If this card is destroyed by battle: draw 1 card.

96162876.name: Ancient Age - Spear Holder Balam
96162876.desc: During either player's Battle Phase, You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Special Summoned during your opponent's Battle Phase: end the Battle Phase. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can equip the destroyed monster to 1 Level 1 Warrior monster you control, that gives the equipped monster 1000 ATK. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can either: Target up to 3 Equip Spells in your GY add them to your hand, OR: Send up to 3 Equip Spells from your Deck to the GY.

96162877.name: Ancient Age - Spear Holder Tohil
96162877.desc: If you control a Level 1 Warrior monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's field in Defense Position, and if you do, all Level 1 Monster you control gain 700 ATK. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Warrior monster from your Deck or GY to your opponent's field, except "Ancient Age - Spear Holder Tohil", and if you do, all Level 1 Monster you control gain 700 ATK.

96162878.name: Dark Tuner Itzamná - King of Ancient Age
96162878.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Dark Tuner Itzamná - King of Ancient Age" If this card is Summoned: Change this card's Level to 2. Once per Chain, during the Battle Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Dark Synchro Summon using this card you control.

96162879.name: Dark Age Knight Marchosias
96162879.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target up to 3 Equip Spell Cards with different names in your Graveyard; equip those targets to this card. If this card desroys a monster by Battle: You can send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the GY. If this card is destroyed: You can draw 1 card for each Equip Card that was equipped to this card.

96162880.name: Tribal Age Leader
96162880.desc: If this card is Summoned, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 monster from your hand, except "Tribal Age Leader". During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 1 Warrior monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) If this card is destroyed by battle or used as material for a Synchro Summon: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Tribal Age Leader" once per turn.

69696967.name: Kaiserwaffe Hiketonkheires
69696967.desc:
Falls diese Karte beschworen wurde: Du kannst ein Monster der Stufe 6 oder niedriger von deiner Hand als Spezialbeschwörung beschwören. 
Dein Gegner erhält den Kampfschaden, den du aus Kämpfen erhalten hättest, an denen diese Karte beteiligt ist.

69696968.name: Kaiserwaffe Grand Shariot
69696968.desc: Einmal pro Spielzug: Falls du ein „Kaiserwaffe“-Monster kontrollierst: Du kannst diese Karte als Spezialbeschwörung von deiner Hand in die Verteidigungsposition beschwören. Diese Karte kann angreifen, solange sie sich in Verteidigungsposition befindet. Falls sie dies tut, verwende ihre DEF für die Schadensberechnung.

69696969.name: Kaiserwaffe Black Marlin
69696969.desc: Wenn diese Karte als Spezialbeschwörung beschworen wird: Du kannst deiner Hand 1 "Kaiserwaffe“-Monster von deinem Deck hinzufügen. Du kannst diese Karte als Tribut anbieten; setze 2 Zauber mit unterschiedlichen Namen, 1 von deinem Deck und 1 von deinem Friedhof, aber verbanne sie, wenn sie das Spielfeld verlassen. Du kannst diesen Effekt von „Kaiserwaffe Black Marlin“ nur einmal pro Spielzug verwenden.

69696970.name: Kaiserwaffe Cross Tail
69696970.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Kaiserwaffe" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Kaiserwaffe Cross Tail" once per turn.

69696971.name: Kaiserwaffe Pumpkin
69696971.desc: Falls diese Karte beschworen wird: Du kannst 1 Monster zerstören, das dein Gegner kontrolliert, und falls du dies tust, füge deinem Gegner Schaden in Höhe der Grund-ATK des Monsters zu.

69696972.name: Kaiserwaffe Murasame
69696972.desc:
Falls diese Karte deinem Gegner Kampfschaden zufügt: Du kannst eine  Karte auf dem Spielfeld verbannen.
Falls diese Karte durch Kampf zerstört wird und du keine "Kaiserwaffe Yatsufusa"  kontrollierst: Du erhälst 1000 Schaden.

69696973.name: Kaiserwaffe Yatsufusa
69696973.desc: Wähle ein Monster auf dem Spielfeld: übernehme bis zum Ende des Spielzugs die Kontrolle über das gewählte ziel. Du kannst diese Karte von deinem Friedhof verbannen; füge deiner Hand eine Zauber/Fallenkarte von deinem Deck hinzu, welches "Kaiserwaffe" im Kartentext aufführt.

69696974.name: Akame
69696974.desc:
Du kannst diese Karte mit „Demon's Extract“ als Ritualbeschwörung beschwören. Du kannst jeden der folgenden Effekte von „Akame“ nur einmal pro Spielzug verwenden.
●Während deiner Main Phase: Du kannst „Kaiserwaffe“-Karten in deiner Hand und/oder offen auf deiner Spielfeldseite zerstören, dann zerstöre dieselbe Anzahl Monster, die dein Gegner kontrolliert.
●Während deiner nächsten Standby Phase, nachdem diese Karte durch Kampf oder einen Karteneffekt zerstört und auf den Friedhof gelegt wurde: Du kannst diese Karte als Spezialbeschwörung vom Friedhof beschwören.

69696975.name: Kaiserwaffe Incursio (Schwert)
69696975.desc: "Kaiserwaffe"-Monster die du kontrollierst können in der Battle Phase einen zweiten angriff durführen, können jedoch deinen Gegner nicht direkt angreifen und Jedlicher Kampfschaden den dein Gegner aus dem zweiten Angriff erhält wird zu 0.

69696977.name: Kaiserwaffensaal
69696977.desc:
Du kannst nur einen der folgenden Effekte von "Kaiserwaffensaal" pro Spielzug aktivieren:
●Füge deiner Hand 1 "Kaiserwaffen"-Monster, mit einer Stufe kleiner oder gleich der Stufe des Monster mit der höchsten Stufe auf dem Spielfeld, von deinem Deck hinzu.
●Du kannst eine Karte von deinem Friedhof verbannen; mische eine verbannte Karte ins Deck zurück. 
Falls diese Karte zerstört oder verbannt wird: Du kannst sie stattdessen auf dein Deck legen.

69696978.name: Demon's Extract
69696978.desc:
Diese Karte kann verwendet werden um eine beliebiges "Akame"-Ritualmonster als Ritualbeschwörung zu beschwören. Du muss dafür beliebig viele "Kaiserwaffe"-Monster von deiner Hand oder Spielfeldseite als Tribut anbieten, deren gemeinsamme Stufe gleich der Stufe des "Akame"-Ritualmonsters entspricht, welches du als Ritualbeschwörung beschwörst.
Du kannst diese Karte vom Friedhof ins Deck mischen und dann 1 „Akame“-Ritualmonster in deinem Friedhof wählen; füge es deiner Hand hinzu.
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Kaiserwaffe“-Karte behandelt.)

69696979.name: Kaiserwaffe Spectator
69696979.desc: Das ausgerüstete Monster kann nicht angreifen und seine ATK und DEF werden zu 100. Das erste Mal in jedem Spielzug, dass das ausgerüstete Monster durch Kampf zerstört würde, wird es nicht zerstört.

69696980.name: Kaiserwaffe Incursio
69696980.desc: Aktiviere diese Karte nur, Falls ein Monster als Spezialbeschwörung vom Extradeck beschworen wird: Übernimm die Kontrolle über das beschworene Monster, aber lege es während deiner nächsten Draw Phase ins Extradeck zurück.

69696981.name: Kaiserwaffe Shikoatzer
69696981.desc:
4 Monster mit der selben Stufe die als Spezialbeschwörung vom Extra Deck beschworen wurden
Falls diese Karte als Xyz-Beschwörung beschworen wird: Verbanne alle Zauber/Fallenkarten deines Gegners von seiner Spielfeldseite, Friedhof und Hand. Jedes mal falls diese Karte ein Monster durch Kampf zerstört: hänge es als Material an diese Karte an. Einmal pro Spielzug: Hänge 2 Materialien von dieser Karte ab; Beschwöre ein Synchro-, Xyz-, Fusion-, Link- oder Trickmonster als Spezialbeschwörung von deinem Extra Deck oder Friedhof, zusätzlich kann das beschworene monster deinen Gegner in diesem Spielzug direkt angreifen.

69696982.name: Kaiserwaffe Susanoo
69696982.desc:
2 "Kaiserwaffe"-Monster der Stufe 6
Falls dieses Monster als Xyzbeschwörung beschworen wird: Hänge 1 Monster von deinem Deck als Material an diese Karte an. Diese Karte erhält für jedes seiner Materialien 500 ATK/DEF. Falls diese Karte einen Angriff deklariert: Du kannst deiner Hand 1 Karte von deinem Friedhof hinzufügen. Falls diese Karte in deinem Friedhof liegt und ein Linkmonster als Spezialbeschwörung beschworen wird: Beschwöre diese Karte als Spezialbeschwörung von deinem Friedhof, und falls du dies tust,  hänge bis zu 2 Monster von deiner Hand oder deinem Friedhof als Material an diese Karte an.

69696983.name: Kaiserwaffe Rubicante
69696983.desc:
1 Empfänger + 1+ "Kaiserwaffe"-Nicht-Empfänger-Monster
Falls diese Karte als Synchrobeschwörung beschworen wurde: Du kannst 1 Monster der Stufe 4 von deinem Deck als Spezialbeschwörung beschwören.
Einmal pro Spielzug: Du kannst eine Karte von deiner Hand abwerfen, beschwöre diese Karte von deinem Friedhof als Spezialbeschwörung.

69696984.name: Kaiserwaffe Extasy
69696984.desc:
2 Empfänger + 1+ “Kaiserwaffe”-Nicht-Empfänger-Monster
Diese Karte erhält 500 ATK für jedes Empfänger-Monster in allen Friedhöfen. Während des Battle Steps, falls diese Karte gegen ein Monster eines Gegners kämpft (Schnelleffekt): Du kannst jenes Monster des Gegners wählen; verbanne sowohl diese Karte vom Spielfeld als auch jenes gewählte Ziel. Lege jene verbannten Monster am Ende der Battle Phase aufs Spielfeld zurück und falls du ein Xyz-Monster verbannt hast, erhält diese Karte 500 ATK für jedes Material, das es hatte, als es verbannt wurde.

69696985.name: Göttliches Incursio
69696985.desc:
2 Monster der Stufe 6 + 1 "Incursio (Monster)"
Kann nicht als Fusionsmaterial verwendet werden. Muss entweder als Fusionsbeschwörung beschworen werden oder als Spezialbeschwörung beschworen werden, indem du die oben aufgeführten Karten von einer beliebigen Spielfeldseite auf den Friedhof legst. Einmal pro Spielzug, falls ein oder mehr Monster durch Kampf zerstört werden würden, werden sie nicht zerstört. Falls diese Karte ein Monster durch Kampf zerstört: Füge deinem Gegner Schaden in Höhe der Grund-ATK jenes Monsters zu.

69696986.name: Incursio (Monster)
69696986.desc:
2 "Kaiserwaffe"- Monster
Falls ein Monster deines Gegners einen Angriff deklariert: Ändere diese Karte in die Verteidigungsposition, und falls dies tust, ändere das Ziel des Angriffes auf diese Karte. Falls diese Karte angegriffen wird, wird der Kampfschaden verdoppelt, den dein Gegner aus dem Kampf erhält. Falls du "Göttliches Incursio" kontrollierst, während diese Karte in deinem Friedhof liegt: Du kannst dieses Monster als Spezialbeschwörung von deinem Friedhof beschwören.

69696987.name: Najanda
69696987.desc:
2 Effekt-Monster
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Akame“-Karte behandelt.)
Erhält 300 ATK für jedes FINSTERNIS-Monster in allen Friedhöfen. Einmal pro Spielzug: Du kannst 1 Cyberse-Linkmonster mit Link-3 oder niedriger in deinem Friedhof wählen, außer „Najanda“; beschwöre es als Spezialbeschwörung in deine Zone, auf die diese Karte zeigt.

69696988.name: Lionel
69696988.desc:
4 Effekt-Monster darunter 2 Link-Monster
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Akame“-Karte behandelt.)
Falls diese Karte als Linkbeschwörung beschworen wird: Du kansnst 1 Link-Monster von deinem Friedhof als Spezialbeschwörung in eine beliebige Monsterzone, auf das diese Karte zeigt beschwören.
Diese Karte erhält Effekte, basierend der Anzahl der Monster auf die sie zeigt:
●1+: Falls ein Monster, das mit dieser Karte kreuzgelinkt ist, als Ziel eines Angriffs deklariert wird: Ändere das Ziel auf diese Karte, springe zum Damage-Step und der in dieser Runde erlittene Kampfschaden wird verdoppelt.
●2+: Einmal pro Spielzug: Falls ein Monster zum Ziel eines Effektes deklariert wird: du kannst den Effekt ändern zu: Alle Spieler verlieren 500 Life-Points
●3+: Diese Karte kann in der Battle-Phase ein weiteres mal einen Angriff deklarieren, für jeden weiteren Angriff bis zum Damage-Step wird der Kampfschaden daraufhin verdoppelt.

69696989.name: Tatsumi
69696989.desc:
2 Effekt-Monster
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Akame“-Karte behandelt.)
Alle „Kaiserwaffe“-Monster, die du kontrollierst, erhalten 500 ATK. Falls diese Karte als Spezialbeschwörung beschworen wird: Du kannst 1 „Kaiserwaffe“-Monster als Spezialbeschwörung von deiner Hand oder deinem Friedhof beschwören.

69696990.name: Mine
69696990.desc:
2 Effekt-Monster darunter 1 “Kaiserwaffe Pumpkin”
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Akame“-Karte behandelt.)
Jedes kreuzgelinkte Monster erhält 500 ATK. Wenn dieses Monster auf kein Monster zeigt: Du kannst ein beliebiges Monster von deinem Friedhof in eine Monsterzone als Spezialbeschwörung beschwören, auf das diese zeigt.

69696991.name: Kaiserwaffe Incursio (Rüstung)

69696992.name: Kaiserwaffe Hiketonkheires Angriffsmodus

69696993.name: Bulat
69696993.desc:
3 FINSTERNIS-Monster
(Diese Karte wird immer als „Akame“-Karte behandelt.)
Wenn dieses Monster einen Angriff deklariert, an welchem ein Monster mit höherer ATK beteiligt ist: Dieses Monster kann durch den Kampf nicht zerstört werden und das gegnerische Monster wird in die verdeckte Verteidigungspostion gedreht. Falls das angegriffene Monster ein Link-Monster ist: Du kannst das gegnerische Monster zerstören, aber falls du dies tust, verbanne dieses Monster.

80000001.name: Ironius, Warrior of Alchemy
80000001.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck except for "Ironius, Warrior of Alchemy". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card, you can discard 1 "Alchemy" card to add 1 "Alchemy" card from your Deck to your hand.

80000002.name: Tintikus, Knight of Alchemy
80000002.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck except for "Tintikus, Knight of Alchemy". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card: Target 1 "Alchemy" card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

80000003.name: Silverio, Beast of Alchemy
80000003.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck except for "Silverio, Beast of Alchemy". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card: Target 1 face-up monster; destroy the chosen target.

80000004.name: Goldikus, Sorcerer of Alchemy
80000004.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck, except for "Goldikus, Sorcerer of Alchemy". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card: Target 1 Spell / Trap Card on the field; destroy the chosen target.

80000005.name: Coppernus, Apprentice of Alchemy
80000005.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck except for "Coppernus, Alchemy Apprentice". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card: You can Special Summon 1 "Alchemy" monster from your hand in face-up Defense Position. return it to the hand during the End Phase.

80000006.name: Brozonius, Alloy of Alchemy
80000006.desc: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card. Once per turn: You can Tribute a face-up monster: Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster from your deck except for "Brozonius, Alloy of Alchemy". but it cannot be Tributed during the turn it is Special Summoned by this effect. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Alchemy" card, it is unaffected by trap effects, and if it attacks an opponent's monster, it can attack again immediately.

80000007.name: Rubinius, Gem of Alchemy
80000007.desc: If you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Alchemy" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only activate 1 "Rubinius, Gem of Alchemy" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters during the turn you activate this card, except "Alchemy" monsters.

80000008.name: Topasius, Yellow Gem of Alchemy
80000008.desc: Activate only when you Special Summon an "Alchemy" monster. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Alchemy" monster from your hand or Deck.

80000009.name: Emeraldra, Green Gem of Alchemy
80000009.desc: Special Summon 1 "Alchemy" monster from your Graveyard in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Emeraldra, Green Gem of Alchemy" per turn.

80000010.name: Equivalent Exchange
80000010.desc: target  2 "Alchemy" cards in your graveyard; shuffle them both into the deck, then draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Equivalent Exchange" per turn.

80000011.name: Elektrus, Machine of Alchemy
80000011.desc:
"Goldikus, Sorcerer of Alchemy" + "Silverio, Beast of Alchemy"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling into the deck the cards you control listed above. (The Spell Card "Polymerization" is not required.) During any player's turn, when a Spell / Trap Card is activated: You can discard 1 card; negate the activation and destroy it. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and resolve this effect.

80000012.name: Britannia, Queen of Alchemy
80000012.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Alchemy" monster from your hand or Graveyard.
---------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
"Tintikus, Knight of Alchemy" + "Coppernus, Apprentice of Alchemy" + 1 "Alchemy" monster
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling into the deck the cards you control listed above. ("Polymerization" is not used.) Cannot be used as a fusion material. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Alchemy" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, except for "Britannia, Queen of Alchemy", regardless of its summoning conditions. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: Place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Britannia, Queen of Alchemy" once per turn.

80000013.name: Sterling, Silver General of Alchemy
80000013.desc:
"Silverio, Beast of Alchemy" + 1 "Alchemy" monster
This card can only be Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by returning the above cards you control to the Deck. (The Spell Card "Polymerization" is not required.) When this card is Special Summoned, you can destroy up to 2 cards on the field.

80000014.name: Darcot, King of Alchemy
80000014.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
While you control an "Alchemy" monster, any card sent to the Graveyard is instead banished, except for "Alchemy" cards. 
---------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
2 Level 4 "Alchemy" monsters
Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card and declare 1 Attribute; this turn, all face-up monsters on the field become that Attribute, also all monsters in your opponent's possession with that Attribute cannot activate their effects or attack. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: Place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Darcot, King of Alchemy" once per turn.

90000110.name: Alcdragon Günter the Beer
90000110.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Dragon monster from your hand. If you control another "Alcdragon" monster: you can Tribute this card, Special Summon 1 "Alcdragon" monster with a different name than the monsters you control from your Deck, except "Alcdragon Günter the Beer". You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Günter the Beer" once per turn.

90000111.name: Alcdragon Bernd the Dark Beer
90000111.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Alcdragon" monster from your hand. This card can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by direct attack; target 1 random card in your opponent's hand and send it to the Graveyard. You can only use each effect of "Alcdragon Bernd the Dark Beer" once per turn.

90000112.name: Alcdragon Vladimir the Vodka
90000112.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: you can target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; Destroy that target. If you control another "Alcdragon" monster: you can discard 1 card from your hand and target 1 Dragon monster in either GY; Special Summon it to your side of the field, but it cannot attack this turn. You can only use each effect of "Alcdragon Vladimir the Vodka" once per turn.

90000113.name: Alcdragon Bond the Martini
90000113.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell Card that specifically lists Dragon monster(s) in the card text from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Bond the Martini" once per turn.

90000114.name: Alcdragon Olaf the Mead
90000114.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 monster on the field. You must control another "Alcdragon" monster to activate and resolve this effect. You can banish this card from your Graveyard and target a Dragon monster you control; equip it with an "Alcdragon" monster from your hand: it gains ATK equal to the ATK of the monster equipped to it. You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Olaf the Mead" once per turn.

90000115.name: Alcdragon Ron the Scotch
90000115.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: All Dragon monsters you control become Level 6. You can banish this card from your GY and discard 1 card; draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Ron the Scotch" once per turn.

90000116.name: Alcdragon Saitama the Sake
90000116.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned from the Deck. Must be Special Summoned by an "Alcdragon" monster. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 3 Dragon monsters (Including a "Alcdragon" monster). If this card is Special Summoned this way; Destroy all cards your opponent controls. If this card was Special Summoned by another "Alcdragon" monster: Dragon monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn.

90000117.name: Alcdragon Jack the Rum
90000117.desc: If this card is Summoned: Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your GY, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of the turn, except WATER monsters. You can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck, then target 1 Banished Dragon monster; Special Summon it, but negate its effects.

90000118.name: Alcdragon of Bloody Marry's
90000118.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Dragon monsters
This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles: it gains 100 ATK. If a monster is destroyed by battle with an "Alcdragon" monster you control while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field.

90000119.name: Alcdragon John the Tonic
90000119.desc:
1 "Alcdragon" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Dragon monsters
Must first be Synchro Summoned. When this card is Synchro Summoned: You can banish up to 1 card each from your opponent's hand, field, and Graveyard (The card in hand is randomly chosen.), and if you do, draw the same number of cards you banished. You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon John the Tonic" once per turn.

90000120.name: Alcdragon King of Absinthe
90000120.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Dragon monsters
Must first be Synchro Summoned. Unaffected by other card effects, except "Alcdragon" cards you control. If this card is Synchro Summoned: Special Summon as many "Alcdragon" monsters as possible from your GY, but their effects are negated and you cannot attack your opponent directly this turn. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the effect and destroy the card. You can only Synchro Summon 1 "Alcdragon King of Absinthe" per turn.

90000121.name: Alcdragon Mektron the Old-Fashioned
90000121.desc:
2 Level 6 Dragon monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that monster, also it becomes a Dragon monster. You can Tribute 1 Dragon monster you control, except this card; Special Summon 1 "Alcdragon" monster from your Deck, but its effects are negated until the end of the turn. You can only activate 1 "Alcdragon Mektron the Old-Fashioned" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

90000122.name: Alcdragon Julita the Margarita
90000122.desc:
1 "Alkdrache" monster + 1 Level 5 or higher "Alkdrache" monster
Cannot be destroyed by battle. Your opponent can only attack with 1 monster per turn. If another "Alcdragon" monster is Summoned while you control this monster (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 "Alcdragon" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Julita the Margarita" once per turn. Once per turn, when a monster effect is activated (Quick Effect): you can negate the activation.

90000123.name: Alcdragon Tavern
90000123.desc: You can pay 800 LP, then target 1 "Alcdragon" monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then add 1 "Alcdragon" monster with a different name from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate this effect of "Alcdragon Tavern" once per turn. If this card is destroyed; Gain LP equal to your "Alcdragon" monsters in your GY x 300.

90000124.name: Mystical City of the Alcdragons
90000124.desc: All Dragon monsters gain 500 ATK and DEF. Once per turn: You can send 1 Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY, then target 1 "Alcdragon" monster you control; that monster cannot be destroyed by card effects this turn.

90000125.name: Holy Dragon Soul
90000125.desc: If you control "Mystical City of the Alcdragons": Special Summon 1 Dragon monster from your hand or GY. You can only activate 1 "Holy Dragon Soul" per turn.

90000126.name: Alcdragon Sib the Zombie
90000126.desc: Special Summon 2 "Alcdragon Skeleton Token" (Dragon/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). The tokens cannot be used as Link Material. Each time an "Alcdragon Skeleton Token" leaves the field: gain 300 LP.

90000127.name: Alcdragon Skeleton Token
90000127.desc: If this card leaves the field: gain 300 LP

90000128.name: Alcdragon Grenouille de Champagne
90000128.desc:
You can target 1 "Alcdragon" monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to that target. 
While equipped to a monster apply following effects:
● The equipped monster is unaffected by your opponent's effects.
● If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. 
● Treat the equipped monster as a Tuner.

90000129.name: Alcdragon Jonas the Jäger
90000129.desc:
If this card is summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Alcdragon" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, activate one of the following effects:
● Target 1 "Alcdragon" monster in your GY; return that target to the Deck.
● Send 1 "Alcdragon" monster from your Deck to the GY.
You can only use this effect of "Alcdragon Jonas the Jäger" once per turn.

957130001.name: Golden Luster Soldier
957130001.desc: A powerful warrior in a Blinding Golden Armor that strikes down eaven some of the Strongest Dragons. The Strongest Knight under the commandment of the Prestige Lord of all that is Golden.

957130002.name: Prestige Lord of all that is Golden
957130002.desc: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing up to 2 monsters. If this card is Summoned this way, its original ATK becomes 1500. If this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 non-Effect Monster from you hand or GY. You choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.

957130003.name: Commandment of the Representative of all that is Golden
957130003.desc: When a monster(s) would be Summoned, or a Spell/Trap Card is activated, while you control a Level 8 LIGHT Warrior monster with 2400 or more DEF: Negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck. You can shuffle 1 Level 8 LIGHT Warrior monster with 2400 or more DEF you control into the Deck; Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 "Commandment of the Representative of all that is Golden" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957130005.name: Chaos Gold Luster Soldier
957130005.desc:
Dark Magician + Golden Luster Soldier
(This card is also treated as "Dark Magician" while on the field or in the GY.)
Must be Special Summoned (From your Extra Deck) by Shuffling the above cards from your field or GY into the Deck, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If this card is destroyed: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Normal Spell in your GY; Set that target. You can only use this effect of "Chaos Gold Luster Soldier" once per turn.

70000100.name: Ancient Dragon Taurus
70000100.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Taurus" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 EARTH and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card. While you control an "Ancient Dragon" card in your other Pendulum Zone, cards cannot be added from either player's Main Deck to the hand, except by drawing them.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 EARTH High Dragon Monster + 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap Card
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Taurus" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your banished High Dragon monsters; shuffle it into the Deck, then you can Set 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap directly from your Deck or GY. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

{/}

70000101.name: Ancient Dragon Aquarius
70000101.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Aquarius" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 WATER and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card. While you control an "Ancient Dragon" card in your other Pendulum Zone, neither player can Tribute monsters, except "Ancient Dragon" monsters.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 WATER High Dragon Monster + 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap Card
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Aquarius" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 of your banished High Dragon monsters into your Deck; send 1 monster your opponent controls to the GY. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

{/}

70000102.name: Ancient Dragon Gemini
70000102.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Gemini" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 WIND and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card. Negate the effect of your opponent's first Spell Card or effect that resolves each turn while you control a High Dragon monster, and if you do, or if it did not have an effect, destroy that card. 
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 WIND High Dragon Monster + 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap Card
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Gemini" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 of your banished High Dragon monsters into your Deck;  change all monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

{/}

70000103.name: Ancient Dragon Leo
70000103.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Leo" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 FIRE and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card. Negate the effect of your opponent's first Trap Card or effect that resolves each turn while you control a High Dragon monster, and if you do, destroy that card.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 FIRE High Dragon Monster + 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap Card
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Leo" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 of your banished High Dragon monsters into your Deck; Inflict 2500 Damage to your opponent. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

{/}

70000104.name: Ancient Dragon Fire
70000104.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Fire" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 FIRE and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card. 
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
If this card is Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half its original ATK. If this card is Pendulum Summoned: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is banished: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Dragon Fire" once per turn.

70000105.name: Ancient Dragon Earth
70000105.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Earth" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 EARTH and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
If this card is Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone: You can Set 1 "Ancient Treasure" Trap directly from your Deck, except a Continuous Trap. If this card is Pendulum Summoned: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is banished: You can add 1 "Ancient Treasure" card from your GY to your Hand. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Dragon Earth" once per turn.

70000106.name: Ancient Dragon Water
70000106.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Water" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 WATER and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
If this card is Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. If this card is Pendulum Summoned: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is banished: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap card your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Dragon Water" once per turn.

70000107.name: Ancient Dragon Wind
70000107.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can only use the following effect of "Ancient Dragon Wind" once per turn. You can banish a total of 2 WIND and/or High Dragon monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card.
-----------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
If this card is Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 of your banished High Dragon monsters, except "Ancient Dragon Wind"; Special Summon it. If this card is Pendulum Summoned: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is banished: You can activate this effect; this turn, your opponent's cards and effects cannot be activated during the Battle Phase. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Dragon Wind" once per turn.

70000108.name: Ancient Treasure
70000108.desc: If this card is Activated, send it to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this face-down card is used as a material for the Trick Summon of a "Ancient Dragon" monster: You can place this card face-up in your Spell&Trap Zone. During your Standby Phase, if you control a monster, destroy this card. While this card is on the field, draw until you have 4 cards in your hand instead of 1 for your normal draw during your Draw Phase. If this face-up card is destroyed by the effect of an opponent's card: Your opponent draws 3 cards. You can only control 1 "Ancient Treasure" Continuous Trap.

70000109.name: Ancient Treasure Sword of Prophecy
70000109.desc: If this card is Activated, send it to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this face-down card is used as a material for the Trick Summon of a "Ancient Dragon" monster: You can place this card face-up in your Spell&Trap Zone. During your Standby Phase, if you control no monster, destroy this card. All High Dragon monsters you control gain 1000 ATK. You can only control 1 "Ancient Treasure" Continuous Trap.

70000110.name: Forgotten Ancient Treasure
70000110.desc: If this card is Activated, send it to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this face-down card is used as a material for the Trick Summon of a "Ancient Dragon" monster: You can place this card face-up in your Spell&Trap Zone. During your Standby Phase, if you control no monster, destroy this card. Once per turn: You can Shuffle 1 card on the field into the Deck. You can only control 1 "Ancient Treasure" Continuous Trap.

70000111.name: Hall of Eternal Treasure
70000111.desc: (This card is always treated as a "Ancient Treasure" card.) Place 1 "Ancient Dragon" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. The "Ancient Treasure" Trap effect, "There can only be 1 face-up "Ancient Treasure" Continuous Trap on the field" becomes "There can only be 1 face-up "Ancient Treasure" Continuous Trap on the field with the same name". If this card in your Field Zone is destroyed: Destroy all cards on the field.

70000112.name: Ancient Treasure Horn of Heaven
70000112.desc: When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s): Negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster(s). If this face-down card on the field is sent to the GY: You can place 1 "Ancient Dragon" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Treasure Horn of Heaven" once per turn.

70000113.name: Ancient Treasure Golden Hallway
70000113.desc: Immediately after this effect resolves, Pendulum Summon a High Dragon monster(s).  If this face-down card on the field is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Amcient Dragon" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck, and if you do, Set this card,but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Ancient Treasure Golden Hallway" once per turn.

70000114.name: Ancient Treasure Findings
70000114.desc: You can choose a number from 1 to 3, then excavate that many cards from the top of your Deck, send any excavated High Dragon monsters to the GY, also place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. if this face-down card is send to the GY: You can draw 1 card.

17120177.name: Aquaactress Horsera
17120177.desc: Once per turn: You can incease the ATK of all Aqua monsters you control by 1000.

64856485.name: The Aquarium
64856485.desc: (This card is treated as "Umi" while face-up on the field or in the GY). When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 level 3 or lower "Aquaactress" monster from your Deck, also for the rest of this turn you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except WATER monsters. Once per turn, if a "Aquarium" card, except "The Aqaurium" is destroyed: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Aquarium" card, except "The Aquarium" from your GY to your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 WATER monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters. You can only activate 1 "The Aquarium" per turn.

72674994.name: Aquaactress Fantail
72674994.desc:
1 non-Link "Aquaactress" monster
Once per turn: You can target 1 Aqua monster or 1 "Aquarium" card in your GY; either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Aquaactress Fantail" once per turn.

93869066.name: Aquaactress Mermaid
93869066.desc:
1 Aqua Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Gains 200 ATK for each "Aquarium" card you control. While you control 3 "Aquarium" cards with different names, this card is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap cards and effects. Once per turn: You can target up to 2 cards on the field; destroy them.

96987236.name: Aquaactress Dophy
96987236.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap you control; destroy it, and if you do, you can add 1 "Aquarium" card with a different name than the cards you control from your GY to your hand.

33848653.name: Arms Relic - Sword of Legend
33848653.desc: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Warrior/Tuner/LIGHT/Level 3/ATK 1500/DEF 1400). (This card is also still a Spell.) You can target 1 face-up non-Tuner monster your opponent controls that has a Level; Synchro Summon from your Extra Deck 1 "Arms Wielder" or "Noble Knight" Synchro Monster whose Level equals the total original Levels of those 2 monsters by using only those 2 monsters, also you cannot activate Spells for the rest of this turn, except "Arms Relic" Spells. You can only use this effect of "Arms Relic - Sword of Legend" once per turn.

95817665.name: Arms Wielder: Noble Knight Selene
95817665.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send 1 Equip Spell or Continuouse Spell from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Card you control that is equipped to this card to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; return it to the hand. If this card was Synchro Summoned by using a Spell Card as material it gains this effect.
●Once per turn: You can target 1 Equip Spell or Continuouse Spell in your GY; equip it to this card. If the card equipped to this card by this effect is a Continuouse Spell it gains this effect.
●The equipped monster gains 500 ATK.

80000650.name: Junk Warrior/Assault Mode
80000650.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate". If this card is Special Summoned: It gains ATK equal to the total ATK of all other monsters you currently control. If this card on the field is destroyed: You can target 1 Level 5 or lower Synchro Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

80000651.name: Mighty Warrior/Assault Mode
80000651.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate". If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the destroyed monster's ATK, and if you do, draw 1 card for every 1000 damage your opponent took. You can only use this effect of "Mighty Warrior/Assault Mode" once per turn. If this card on the field is destroyed: You can target 1 "Mighty Warrior" in your GY; Special Summon it.

80000652.name: Mist Wurm/Assault Mode
80000652.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Assault Mode Activate". If this card is Special Summoned: Return all monster your opponent controls to the hand. If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Mist Wurm" in your GY; Special Summon it.

31812497.name: Berserker of the Aztecs
31812497.desc: If you control no monsters or all monster you control are "the Aztec" monster: you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Double any battle damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Rock-type monster, except "Berserker of the Aztecs" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "berserker of the Aztecs" once per turn.

31812498.name: Warrior of the Aztecs
31812498.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can change it to Defense Position. Double any battle damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "the Aztec" Monster, except "Warrior of the Aztecs" from your Deck, and if you do, it gains 1000 DEF.

31812499.name: Golem of the Aztecs
31812499.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 Rock-Type monster, and if you do, it gains DEF equal to the Tributed monster's original DEF. Double any battle damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster. During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "the Aztec" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Golem of the Aztecs" once per turn.

31812500.name: Stone Sphinx of the Aztecs
31812500.desc: If you control a "the Aztec" card, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Double any battle damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster. Once per turm, during your opponent's Battle Phase: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; it must attack this turn, if able. If it has already attacked this turn, it must attack again, if able.

31812501.name: Stone Temple of the Aztecs
31812501.desc: While you control a "the Aztec" monster, your opponent's monsters that can attack must attack "the Aztec" monsters. Change all face-up monsters your opponent controls to Attack position. "the Aztec" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects.

31812502.name: Stone Shrine of the Aztecs
31812502.desc: All face-up "the Aztec" monsters you control gain 200 DEF for each "the Aztec" monster you control. While you control a "the Aztec" monster, Field Spells on the field cannot be destroyed. When an "the Aztec" monster is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "the Aztec" monster from your Deck with a Level less than or equal to that "the Aztec" monster in the GY. You can only use this effect of "Stone Shrine of the Aztecs" once per turn.

31812503.name: Deity of the Aztecs
31812503.desc:
1 Rock-Type Tuner +1+ non-Tuner Rock-Type Monsters
During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Rock-type monster in your GY, or, if your opponent controls a monster, you can target 1 Level 4 or higher Rock-type monster instead; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Deity of the Aztecs" once per turn. Triple any battle damage your opponent takes when they attack this monster.

52179896.name: Bone Sword of the Aztecs
52179896.desc: Equip only to Rock monster. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; when it is in Defense Position, Change it to Attack Position, regardless, the target must Attack the equipped monster if able.

43051881.name: Papillon the Emperror Butterfly
43051881.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 Insect monster in your GY; add it to your hand, and if you do, inflict damage to both players equal to the ATK of that monster. If this card is sent to the GY for a Synchro Summon: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your GY; Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the target. You can only use each effect of "Papillon the Emperror Butterfly" once per turn.

45697573.name: Battlewasp Trident the Impaler
45697573.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Insect monster from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY for the Synchro Summon of a Insect Synchro Monster: You can Special Summon 1 level 3 or lower WIND Insect monster from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Insect monsters. You can only use each effect of "Battlewasp Trident the Impaler" once per turn. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

90001120.name: BurnTRAP Keyblade
90001120.desc: You can reveal this card from your Hand and target 1 face-down Spell/Trap Card: Look at the target and if it is a Trap Card, You can Special Summon this card from your Hand. If this card is used for a Trick Summon: You can target 1 Trap Card in your GY; set it to your side of the field.

90001121.name: BurnTRAP Bladekid
90001121.desc: You can reveal this card in your hand and target 1 Trap Card in your GY; shuffle the target into your Deck and if you do, Special summon this card from your Hand. (this is a Quick Effect.) If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "BurnTRAP" card from your Deck to your Hand. You can use this effect of "BurnTRAP Bladekid" only once per turn.

90001122.name: BurnTRAP Plasmasword
90001122.desc: If you control a Trick Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand.) Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Trap Card and target 1 Monster you control; it gains 500 ATK & DEF. If this card is used for a Trick Summon: you can set 1 Trap Card from your Hand, also it can be activated this turn. You can use this effect of "BurnTRAP Plasmasword" only once per turn.

90001123.name: BurnTRAP Secruity
90001123.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can its battle position. Your Opponent cannot target  Spell/Trap card you control for card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: you can target 1 "BurnTRAP" Trap Card in your GY; set it to your Field and if you do, it can be activated this turn. You can use this effect of "BurnTRAP Security" only once per turn.

90001124.name: BurnTRAP Striker
90001124.desc: If a Spell/Trap Card on the Field is Destroyed: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand.) Once per turn, if you control a Trick Monster: You can add 1 "BurnTRAP" Trap Card from your GY to your Hand. If a Spell/Trap Card is destroyed or a Trick Monster is Special Summoned from Your Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this Card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can use this effect of "BurnTRAP Striker" only once per turn.

90001125.name: BurnTRAP White Knight

90001126.name: BurnTRAP Sharpshooter

90001127.name: BurnTRAP Cavalry

90001128.name: BurnTRAP Blaze Accelerator
90001128.desc: During either players Main Phase or Battle Phase: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; sent 1 FIRE monster from your hand to the GY, and if you do, destroy that target, and if you do that, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If this card is sent from your Hand to the GY or if this face-down card on the field is sent to the GY: You can add 1 FIRE monster or a "BurnTRAP" monster from your Deck to your Hand.

90001129.name: BurnTRAP Extinction
90001129.desc: When a monster effect is activated: You can negate the activation and if you do, destroy that monster, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to halve of the ATK of the destroyed monster. If you control a Trick monster you can activate this card from your hand. if this face-down card is sent to the GY: draw 1 card. you can use each effect of "BurnTRAP Extinction" only once per turn.

90001130.name: BurnTRAP Volcanic Acceleration
90001130.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can sent 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to the GY; Destroy all monster your opponent controls. If this card is sent from your Hand to the GY or if this face-down card on the field is sent to the GY: Inflict 1000 Damage to your opponent.

90001131.name: BurnTRAP Galaxy Coder

90001132.name: BurnTRAP The Moving Fortress

99890010.name: Fate Servant Summoning Ritual
99890010.desc: You can Tribute monsters from your hand or field, and/or banish "Fate" monsters from your Deck, then Ritual Summon 1 "Fate" Ritual Monster from your hand whose Level is equal or less than the total Levels of those monsters. During your Standby Phase, if you successfully Ritual Summoned a "Fate" Ritual Monster during your last turn using this card’s effect: Shuffle the banished materials used for that Ritual Summon back into the Deck. You can shuffle 1 "Fate Ascended" monster from your hand into your Deck; add 1 "Fate" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect  of "Servant Summoning Ritual" once per turn.

99890020.name: Fate Saber, Artoria Pendragon
99890020.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Servant Summoning Ritual". You can reveal this card in your hand, then send 1 "Fate" monster from your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Servant Summoning Ritual" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Saber, Artoria Pendragon" once per turn. While this card is in Attack Position, all other "Fate" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by Spell effects.
