99920040.name: Overlord Nazarick Guardian, Shalltear Bloodfallen
99920040.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by paying half your LP. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect, or by an "OL" card effect: It gains ATK and DEF equal to your LP. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "OL Pleiades" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Nazarick Guardian, Shalltear Bloodfallen" once per turn. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent, gain LP equal to half the damage inflicted. Each time your opponent Special Summons a monster in the same column as this card or as your "Ainz Ooal Gown, The Sorcerer King": Gain 1000 LP.

99920050.name: Overlord Nazarick Guardian, Cocytus
99920050.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by paying half your LP. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect, or by an "OL" card effect: It gains ATK and DEF equal to your LP. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "OL Pleiades" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Nazarick Guardian, Cocytus" once per turn. Each time a Spell/Trap is sent to your opponent's GY: This card gains 500 ATK. Monsters in your opponent's Main Monster Zone in the same column as this card or as "Ainz Ooal Gown, The Sorcerer King" lose 1000 ATK.

99920060.name: Overlord Nazarick Guardian, Demiurge
99920060.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by paying half your LP. If this card is Special Summoned by its own effect, or by an "OL" card effect: It gains ATK and DEF equal to your LP. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "OL Pleiades" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Nazarick Guardian, Demiurge" once per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase, if this card did not declared an attack this turn: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. Negate the effects of your opponent's Special Summoned monsters in the same column as this card or as your "Ainz Ooal Gown, The Sorcerer King" with an ATK lower than this card's.

99920070.name: Overlord Supreme One's Will
99920070.desc: If you control no monsters: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 "OL" monster from your hand or Deck. Except the turn this card was sent to the GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; Shuffle 1 "OL" monster from your GY into your Deck, and if you do, gain 1000 LP. You can only activate 1 "Supreme One's Will" per turn.

99920080.name: Overlord Making Strategies
99920080.desc: You can send 1 "OL" monster you control to the GY, except "Ainz Ooal Gown, The Sorcerer King"; gain LP equal to half the ATK it had on the field, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "OL" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Making Strategies" once per turn.

99920090.name: Overlord Death Determination War
99920090.desc: Target 1 “OL” monster you control; destroy all cards your opponent controls in the same column as that monster, and if you do, you can move the targeted monster to another of your Main Monster Zones. You can banish this card from your GY: Add 1 "Nazarick Guardian" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of “Death Determination War” once per turn.

99920100.name: Overlord Approaching Death's Premonition
99920100.desc: Send 1 Level 5 or higher "DARK" monster from your hand or field to the GY; draw cards equal to the number of "OL" monsters in your GY +1, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot add cards from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Approaching Death's Premonition" per turn.

99920110.name: Overlord Pleiades, Narberal Gamma
99920110.desc: She is a doppelganger battle maid and the creation of Nishikienrai, one of the original nine founders of Ainz Ooal Gown. Like many others in Nazarick, Narberal views humans as nothing more than low-class creatures. Though she does not particularly enjoy killing humans, she will not hesitate to do so if there's no reason to let them live.

99920120.name: Overlord Pleiades, Lupusregina Beta
99920120.desc: She is a werewolf battle maid. Lupusregina Beta has a very bright and outgoing personality, but she is also able to conduct herself like a perfect lady. She is sociable and friendly towards humans though it is only a mask to conceal her brutal and cunning personality.

99920130.name: Overlord Pleiades, Entoma Vasilissa Zeta
99920130.desc: Her true form is a spider-human (arachnoid), yet no one notices her identity as a monster until she removes the mask. Entoma likes to eat humans as food. Though Entoma doesn't mind what kind of person she eats if she is given an opportunity. If there are no humans to eat, she eats snacks called "green biscuits" instead.

99920140.name: Overlord Raid Slaughter
99920140.desc: Target 1 "Nazarick Guardian" monster you control: Destroy all monsters in your opponent’s Main Monster Zone in the same column as that target, and Main Monster Zones adjacent to that zone, with ATK less than or equal to that target, then you can Special Summon 1 "Einherjar Avatar Token". Its Type, Attribute, Level, ATK and DEF are always the same as the targeted monster, but it leaves the field if that monster is no longer face-up on the field. You can only activate 1 "Raid Slaughter" per turn.

99920145.name: Overlord Einherjar Avatar
99920145.desc: Special Summoned with the effect of an “OL” card effect. This Token always has the same Type, Attribute, Level, ATK, and DEF as the monster targeted by the card that Summons this Token.

99920150.name: Overlord Magic Tier Encyclopedia
99920150.desc: Add 1 "OL" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Magic Tier Encyclopedia", then excavate the top 5 cards from your Deck, and if you do, gain 1000 LP for each excavated card of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as the one you added to your hand, also place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order. You can only activate 1 "Magic Tier Encyclopedia" per turn.

99930010.name: OTNN Tail Red
99930010.desc:
2 or more Warrior-Type monsters with the same Level
During each Standby Phase, increase this card's Rank by 1. If this card declares an attack: It gains ATK equal to its Rank x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Attach it to this card as an Xyz Material. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when your opponent activates a monster effect: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate that activation, and if you do, this card gains half of that monster's original ATK until the End Phase. If this card destroys a monster by battle, it can make a second attack in a row.

99930020.name: OTNN Tail Blue
99930020.desc:
2 or more Warrior-Type monsters with the same Level
During each Standby Phase, increase this card's Rank by 1. If this card declares an attack: It gains ATK equal to its Rank x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Attach it to this card as an Xyz Material. Once per turn, when your opponent would Special Summon exactly 1 monster: You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; negate the Special Summon, and if you do, destroy that card, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to half of the destroyed monster’s ATK. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict triple piercing battle damage to your opponent.

99930030.name: OTNN Tail Yellow
99930030.desc:
2 or more Warrior-Type monsters with the same Level
During each Standby Phase, increase this card's Rank by 1. If this card declares an attack: It gains ATK equal to its Rank x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Attach it to this card as an Xyz Material. Once per turn, if an "OTNN" Xyz Monster(s) you control would be destroyed: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card instead, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the combined Ranks of all "OTNN" Xyz Monsters you currently control x 100. If this card declares an attack: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster your opponent controls.

99930040.name: OTNN Tail Red - Riser Chain
99930040.desc: Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by using an "OTNN" Xyz Monster you control with 5 or more Xyz Materials as the Xyz Material, except "Tail Red - Riser Chain", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon. Xyz Materials attached to that monster also become Xyz Materials on this card.) When this card is Xyz Summoned: Its Rank is increased by 1 for each Xyz Material attached to it. If this card has a "OTNN" monster as an Xyz Material, it cannot be destroyed by card effects. During each Standby Phase, increase this card's Rank by 1. This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. If this card declares an attack: It gains ATK equal to its Rank x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Attach it to this card as an Xyz Material. Up to twice per turn, when your opponent Special Summons a monster(s): You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; this card gains ATK equal to half the original ATK of the Special Summoned monster(s) until the End Phase. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent's controls; destroy it and inflict damage to your opponent equal to its current ATK, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to the damage inflicted until the End Phase.

99930050.name: OTNN Attribute Boost
99930050.desc: Target 1 face-up "OTNN" Xyz monster you control: Double its Rank, then, if possible, target 1 Warrior-Type monster in your Graveyard or Deck and attach it to the targeted card as an Xyz Material, and if you do, it gains ATK equal to half the ATK of the attached monster until the End Phase.

99930060.name: OTNN Eremerian Onslaught
99930060.desc: Activate only if all face-up monsters you control are "OTNN" monsters. Detach any number of Xyz Material from monsters you control. Target cards your opponent controls up to the number of Xyz Materials detached; destroy those targets, and if you do,  all face-up "OTNN" Xyz Monsters you control gain 1 Rank for each Xyz Material detached by this card's effect. During either player's turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; "OTNN" Xyz Monsters you currently control cannot be targeted or destroyed by your opponent's card effects, or be destroyed by battle until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Eremerian Onslaught" per turn.

99930070.name: OTNN Tails Emergency
99930070.desc: Special Summon 2 Warrior-Type monsters with the same Level from Graveyard and/or Deck; Special Summon both those targets. Immediately after this card resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster using those monsters only. The Xyz Summoned monster gains ATK equal to the combined Level of the monsters used as Xyz Materials x 100 until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Tails Emergency" per turn.

99930080.name: OTNN Twoearle
99930080.desc: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "OTNN" Spell Card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. Once per turn: You can Special Summon from you Extra Deck 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster by using this face-up card you control as the Xyz Material. An "OTNN" Xyz Monster with this card as Xyz Material gains this effect. ●This card gains 1 Rank for each monster on the field.

99930090.name: OTNN Tail Gear Change
99930090.desc: Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can target 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster with a different name than that target, by using it as the Xyz Material. (Xyz Materials attached to it also become Xyz Materials on the Summoned monster.) The monster Special Summoned by this effect gains 1 Rank for each Xyz Material attached to it. When this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Return all "OTNN" Xyz Monsters from your Graveyard to your Extra Deck, and if you do, draw cards equal to the number of cards returned. You can only control 1 "Tail Gear Change".

99930100.name: OTNN Break Burst
99930100.desc: When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s): Target 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster you control that has 2 or more Xyz Materials; detach all Xyz Materials from that Xyz Monster, and if you do, negate the Special Summon, and if you do that, destroy that monster(s), then inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the combined ATK of those destroyed monsters. You can only activate 1 "Break Burst" per turn.

99930110.name: OTNN Twintail Passion
99930110.desc: Target 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster in your GY: Special Summon it, and if you do. attach 1 Warrior monster from your Deck or GY to it as an Xyz material, and if you do that, it gains ATK equal to half the original ATK of the attached monster, until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Twintail Passion" per turn.

99930120.name: OTNN World Star Twintails
99930120.desc: "OTNN" monsters you control that have Xyz Material(s) gain ATK equal to their Rank x 100. Each time you Xyz Summon an "OTNN" Xyz Monster: You can target 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 Warrior monster from your hand or Deck to it as an Xyz Material, and if you do, that monster gains ATK equal to half that monster’s ATK until the end of this turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your Extra Monster Zone; move it to one of your unoccupied Main Monster Zones, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 "OTNN" Xyz Monster  from your Extra Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon.)

99930130.name: OTNN Tail Red - Faller Chain
99930130.desc: Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by using an "OTNN" Xyz Monster you control with 5 or more materials as the Xyz Material, except "Tail Red-Faller Chain". (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to this card.) When this card is Xyz Summoned: Its Rank is increased by 1 for each material attached to it. If this has an "OTNN" monster as a Material, it cannot be destroyed by card effects. During each Standby Phase, increase this card’s Rank by 1. Any battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent is doubled. If this card declares an attack: It gains ATK equal to its Rank x 100 until the end of the Damage Step. When this card destroys a monster by battle: Attach it to this card as a Material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; it gains ATK equal to the number of materials attached to it x 600, until the end of this turn. Once per turn, when an opponent’s monster effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, attach that monster to this card as a Material.

99940010.name: NGNL Sora
99940010.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Standby Phase, activate 1 of these effects.
●Roll a six-sided die: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
●Roll a six-sided die twice: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
Once per turn: You can add 1 "NGNL" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Sora". If your opponent draw's a card(s), except during their Draw Phase: You can draw 1 card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If your opponent would Special Summon exactly 1 monster (Quick Effect): You can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right: Negate the Special Summon, and if you do, return that monster to the hand. If you call it wrong: Target 1 face-up monster you control; return it to the hand. You can discard 1 card, and if you do, draw 1 card. If you have 1 "NGNL" card in each of your Pendulum Zones, you draw 2 cards instead. You can only use this effect of "Sora" once per turn. You take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

99940020.name: NGNL Shiro
99940020.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 5
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Standby Phase, activate 1 of these effects.
●Roll a six-sided die: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
●Roll a six-sided die twice: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
Once per turn, if you draw a "NGNL" monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can reveal it; Special Summon it, and if you do, send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck to the GY. If your opponent draw's a card(s), except during their Draw Phase: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this face-up card in your Monster Zone leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "NGNL" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Shiro", and if you do, your opponent draws 1 cards. Once per turn, if your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand, except by drawing them (Quick effect): You can send 1 "NGNL" Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, they must discard 1 of those cards. You take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

99940030.name: NGNL Stephanie Dola
99940030.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Standby Phase,  activate 1 of these effects.
●Roll a six-sided die: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
●Roll a six-sided die twice: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
You can shuffle this card into the Deck, and if you do, draw 2 cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Stephanie Dola" once per turn. If your opponent draw's a card(s), except during their Draw Phase: Send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the GY.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If you control a "NGNL" monster, except "Stephanie Dola": You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When your opponent's activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can shuffle this card into your Deck; negate the activation. You can only use this effect of "Stephanie Dola" once per turn. You take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

99940040.name: NGNL Jibril
99940040.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 10
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Standby Phase, activate 1 of these effects.
●Roll a six-sided die: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
●Roll a six-sided die twice: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
Once per turn, if your opponent activates a Spell/Trap (Quick Effect): You can send all cards with the same name as the activated card from your opponent's hand or Deck to the GY. If your opponent draw's a card(s), except during their Draw Phase: You can shuffle 1 card your opponent controls into the Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is in your hand: You can send 1 other "NGNL" card from your hand to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); discard 1 card, and if you do, your opponent must send all cards of the declared type from their hand to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Jibril" once per turn. You take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

99940050.name: NGNL Imanity Throne
99940050.desc:
Toss a coin:
●Heads: Send cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the GY equal to the difference between the Pendulum Scales of the "NGNL" cards in your Pendulum Zones (or the entire Deck if less than that number).
●Tails: Send cards from the top of your Deck to the GY equal to the difference between the Pendulum Scales of the "NGNL" cards in your Pendulum Zones (or the entire Deck if less than that number).
If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Imanity Throne" per turn.

99940060.name: NGNL Disboard World
99940060.desc: While you have 1 "NGNL" card in each of your Pendulum Zones, this card cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects, also, you take no damage. Each time you Special Summon a "NGNL" monster(s), both players draw 1 card. Once per turn: You can target 1 "NGNL" card in your Pendulum Zone; return it to the hand, and if you do, place 1 other "NGNL" card from your Monster Zone, hand or face-up from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. When you perform a coin toss or roll a six-sided die: You can send 1 "NGNL" card from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, destroy 1 card your opponent controls. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Your opponent draws cards equal to the number of "NGNL" Spells/Traps returned to your hand by their own effects (or their enire Deck, if less than that number).

99940070.name: NGNL Game Start
99940070.desc: Both players shuffle their entire hand into the Deck, then both players draw the same number of cards as shuffled, also, for the rest of this duel both players can discard 1 card during their respective Standby Phases, and if they do, they draw 1 card. If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand.

99940080.name: NGNL Checkmate Declaration
99940080.desc: Special Summon 1 "NGNL" monster from your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, place up to 2 "NGN" Pendulum Monsters from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Checkmate Declaration" once per turn. Except the turn this card was sent to the GY (Quick Effect): You can shuffle this card from your GY to the Deck, then target 1 "NGNL" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; return them to the hand(s), and if you do, both players discard 1 card. If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand.

99940090.name: NGNL The Lucky Draw
99940090.desc: Activate this card only if you have a "NGNL" card in your Pendulum Zone. Both players draw 1 card. If it's a Monster Card, you gain 1000 LP. If it's a Spell/Trap, discard that card. If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "The Lucky Draw" per turn.

99940100.name: NGNL Materialization Shiritori
99940100.desc: When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) or activates a Spell/Trap or monster effect that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s): Negate the Summon or activation and banish that card face-down, then Special Summon 1 "NGNL" monster from your Deck or face-up from your Extra Deck, and if you do, you can Set 1 "Materialization Shiritori" directly from your hand or Deck. If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand. If you have 1 "NGNL" card in each of your Pendulum Zones, you can activate this card from your hand.

99940110.name: NGNL Fake End
99940110.desc: Roll a six-sided die. Shuffle cards from your GY and/or face-up from your Extra Deck into the Deck equal or less to the result, then draw 1 card. If you rolled a 6, you can return this card to your Deck instead of sending it to the Graveyard after it resolves. If this card is sent to the GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Fake End" per turn.

99940120.name: NGNL Hatsuse Izuna
99940120.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 3
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During your Standby Phase,  activate 1 of these effects.
●Roll a six-sided die: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
●Roll a six-sided die twice: This card's Pendulum Scale becomes the result.
Your opponent cannot Set any cards on the field. If your opponent draws a card(s), except during their Draw Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "NGNL" monster from your hand or face-up from your Extra Deck.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can shuffle both this face-up card and 1 monster your opponent controls into the Deck. If you have 2 "NGNL" cards in your Pendulum Zones, you can shuffle up to 2 monsters your opponent controls instead. You take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

99940130.name: NGNL Seize The Moment
99940130.desc: If you have 2 "NGNL" cards in your Pendulum Zones: Play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. Make the losing player send their top 3 cards from their Deck to the GY. The winner can add 1 monster from their Deck or face-up from their Extra Deck to their hand. If this card is sent to GY from your hand or Deck by a card effect: You can add it to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Seize The Moment" per turn.

99950010.name: MSMM Let's Make A Contract
99950010.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "MSMM" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field, and/or send monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can shuffle this card from your Graveyard into the Deck, and if you do, banish monsters from your opponent's Graveyard, then Ritual Summon 1 "MSMM" Ritual Monster from your hand or Graveyard whose Level equal or exceed the total Levels of those monsters.

99950020.name: MSMM Kaname Madoka
99950020.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. This card gains 100 ATK for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. Once per turn: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each face-up monster your opponent controls, and if you do, all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK and DEF equal to the damage inflicted. During your Standby Phase, pay 300 LP or destroy this card. You can discard this card;  add 1 "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card from your  Deck to your hand.  If this face-up card in your Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card, each time an opponent monster(s) is banished, gain 500 LP. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it.

99950030.name: MSMM Akemi Homura
99950030.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. This card gains 100 ATK for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. Once per turn: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck; send any excavated monsters to the Graveyard,also shuffle the rest back into the Deck. Any monster sent to the Graveyard by this effect cannot activate its effects, until the end of this turn. During your Standby Phase, pay 300 LP or destroy this card. You can discard this card;  add 1 "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card from your  Deck to your hand.  If this face-up card in your Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card, during your End Phase, you can target 1 "MSMM" monster you control; it is unaffected by your opponent’s card effects, until the end of your opponent’s turn. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it.

99950040.name: MSMM Miki Sayaka
99950040.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. This card gains 100 ATK for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 "MSMM" monster you control; send 1 monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, the targeted monster gains ATK equal to half its current ATK, until the End Phase. During your Standby Phase, pay 300 LP or destroy this card. You can discard this card;  add 1 "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card from your  Deck to your hand.  If this face-up card in your Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card, all "MSMM" monsters you control gain 500 ATK. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it.

99950050.name: MSMM Tomoe Mami
99950050.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. This card gains 100 ATK for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. Once per turn: You can add 1 "MSMM" card from your Deck to your hand. During your Standby Phase, pay 300 LP or destroy this card. You can discard this card;  add 1 "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card from your  Deck to your hand.  If this face-up card in your Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card, during your Standby Phase, you can banish 1 random card from your opponent’s hand. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it.

99950060.name: MSMM Sakura Kyouko
99950060.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. This card gains 100 ATK for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 "MSMM" monster you control; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half that monster’s current ATK. During your Standby Phase, pay 300 LP or destroy this card. You can discard this card;  add 1 "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card from your  Deck to your hand.  If this face-up card in your Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard. While this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card, if a "MSMM"  monster you control battles an opponent’s monster, after damage calculation: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each of your opponent’s banished monsters. If this card is sent from your Deck to the Graveyard by a card effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; banish it.

99950070.name: MSMM Kaname Madokami
99950070.desc: Can only be Special Summoned by the effect of a "MSMM" card. You can Ritual Summon this card with any "MSMM" Ritual Spell Card. Must be Ritual Summoned from your hand by using 5 or more Level 5 "MSMM" Ritual Monsters from your Graveyard, and/or from your Spell & Trap Zone, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 500 ATK and DEF for each card used for its Ritual Summon. When this card is Special Summoned: Banish all face-up monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, gain 500 LP for each banished card. This card is unaffected by your opponent’s card effects. When another "MSMM" monster you control inflicts battle damage to your opponent, gain LP equal to half the damage inflicted. Once per turn, during either player’s turn, if your opponent activates a card or effect: You can negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. If this face-up card in your Monster Zone leaves the field, you can place it face-up in your  Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card instead. Once per turn, during either player’s turn, while this card is treated as a Continuous Spell Card: You can target 1 Level 5 "MSMM" Ritual Monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

99950080.name: MSMM Delusional Dreams
99950080.desc: Target 1 "MSMM" Ritual Monster in your Spell & Trap Zone: Special Summon it ignoring its Summoning conditions, and if you do, this card remains face-up on the field and it gains that monster's Continuous Spell Card effect. You can discard this card; place 1 "MSMM" Ritual Monster from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell Card.

99950090.name: MSMM Duelist's Sonata

You can only activate 1 "Duelist’s Sonata" per turn.

99950100.name: MSMM Witch Devastation

99950120.name: MSMM Witch Suppression

If this card is destroyed, add "MSMM" cards from your Deck to your hand up to the number of Level 5 "MSMM" Ritual Monsters in your Spell & Trap Zone, except "Clara Dolls".

99950150.name: MSMM Madness Regrets

99950170.name: MSMM Ending Pride

99950180.name: MSMM Kyubey

99960100.name: BRS Bird of Orange Smiles

99960110.name: BRS Bird of Pink Sneezes

99960140.name: BRS Bird of Red Anger

99960150.name: BRS The Little Bird Of Colors

Each time a "BRS" monster you control inflicts effect damage to your opponent, gain half that much LP. Each time you Special Summon a "BRS" Xyz Monster(s): You can place 1 "BRS Bird" Continuous Spell Card from your Deck or Graveyard face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. Your other monsters cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Chain Armament" per turn. If this card is detached from a "BRS" Xyz Monster and sent to the Graveyard to activate that monster’s effect: You can equip this card to a "BRS" Xyz Monster you control.

Otherwise, place it on the bottom of the Deck. You can only activate 1 "HN CPU Xmas" per turn.

99980290.name: HN Pudding Buddies
99980290.desc: If you control 3 or more "HN" monsters: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated card to your hand, also place the remaining cards on top of your Deck in any order.

99980300.name: HN Histoire, Planeptune's Oracle
99980300.desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 "HN CPU" monster from your hand or Deck. If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "HN CPU" monster you control that has a Level; Special Summon 1 Rank 4 or lower "HN HDD" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck by using that target as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use each effect of "HN Histoire, Planeptune's Oracle" once per turn.

99980310.name: HN HDD Arrival
99980310.desc: Send 2 "HN CPU" monsters from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 Rank 4 or lower "HN HDD" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, but it cannot attack this turn. You can only activate 1 "HN HDD Arrival" per turn.

99980320.name: HN CPU Memory
99980320.desc: Target 1 Level 3 or higher "HN" monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck 1 Rank 4 or lower "HN HDD" Xyz Monster by using that target card as the Xyz Material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; return 1 "HN HDD" monster from your GY to the Extra Deck.

99980330.name: HN Hard Drive Divinity
99980330.desc: Target up to 2 "HN CPU" monsters with different names you control and/or in your GY; Special Summon 1 Rank 4 or lower "HN HDD" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, attach the targeted monsters to it as materials. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only activate 1 "HN Hard Drive Divinity" per turn.

99980340.name: HN HDD Next Purple
99980340.desc:
3 Level 5 "HN" monsters
If this card was Xyz Summoned using a "HN HDD Purple Heart" as material, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of this card's effects. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; this card gains ATK equal to the original ATK of that monster until the end of the Damage Step, and if it does, draw 1 card for every 1500 ATK gained from this effect. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon 1 "HN HHD Purple Heart" from your GY, and if you do, attach this card to it as material. (Transfer its materials to that monster.) You can only use this effect of "HN HDD Next Purple" once per turn.

99980350.name: HN Oblivion Conflict
99980350.desc: If a "HN" Xyz Monster you control battled an opponent's monster, but the opponent's monster was not destroyed by battle: Your monster gains 1000 ATK until the end of the Battle Phase, also it can make a second attack in a row. When a "HN" Xyz Monster you control battles, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; that monster gains 1000 ATK until the end of the Damage Step.

99980360.name: HN Dimension Zero
99980360.desc: Once per turn, if you Special Summon a non-Xyz "HN" monster(s) during the Battle Phase, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "HN" Xyz Monster, using only "HN" monsters you control. Once per turn, if a Rank 4 "HN" Xyz Monster(s) is Special Summoned from your Extra Deck: You can send 1 "HN" Continuous Spell with "Nation" in its name you control to the GY, then target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon 1 Rank 5 "HN" Xyz Monster that lists that target in its text, by using it as a material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.)

99980370.name: HN Transcending Shares
99980370.desc: Target 1 "HN HDD" Xyz Monster you control or in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, draw cards equal to that monster's Rank +1, then shuffle cards from your hand into your Deck equal to that monster's Rank. You can only activate 1 "HN Transcending Shares" per turn.

99980380.name: HN Candidate's Training
99980380.desc: Send 1 "HN CPU" monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "HN CPU Candidate" monster from your Deck with a different name than the sent monster. You can only activate 1 "HN Candidate's Training" per turn.

99980390.name: HN Gust
99980390.desc: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY, then banish 1 "HN" Normal Spell from your GY; apply that banished card's effect. You can only use this effect of "HN Gust" once per turn.

99980400.name: HN Fragment Reaction
99980400.desc:
Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if you do, draw 1 card, then, apply the appropiate effect, depending on the number of "HN" monsters sent to the GY by this effect. 
●1: Gain 1000 LP.
●2: Draw 1 card.
●3: Add 1 "HN" card from your Deck to your hand.
You can only activate 1 "HN Fragment Reaction" per turn.

99980410.name: HN HDD Next Black
99980410.desc:
3 Level 5 "HN" monsters
If this card was Xyz Summoned using a "HN HDD Black Heart" as material, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of this card's effects. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; halve that monster's ATK, and if you do, make it unable to be destroyed by battle this turn, also any battle damage your opponent takes from this battle is doubled. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon 1 "HN HHD Black Heart" from your GY, and if you do, attach this card to it as material. (Transfer its materials to that monster.) You can only use this effect of "HN HDD Next Black" once per turn.

99980420.name: HN CPU Uzume
99980420.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "HN" Field Spell from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Special Summoned during the Battle Phase: You can activate 1 "HN" Field Spell from your Deck. You can only use the preceding effects of "HN CPU Uzume" once per turn. If this card is used for an Xyz Summon, you can treat it as a Level 4 monster.

99980430.name: HN HDD Orange Heart
99980430.desc:
2 Level 4 "HN" monsters
If this card declares an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "HN" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "HDD Purple Heart" once per turn. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "HN CPU" monster from your Deck, also both battling monsters cannot be destroyed by this battle.

99980440.name: HN Gamindustri
99980440.desc: When this card is activated: You can activate this effect; during your Main Phase this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "HN" monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) "HN" Continuous Spells you control with "Nation" in their name cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. You can add 1 "HN CPU" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "HN Gamindustri" once per turn.

99980450.name: HN Croire, Eden's Oracle
99980450.desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; this turn, all face-up monsters you currently control that have a Level are also treated as "HN CPU" monsters. If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "HN CPU" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "HN Croire, Eden's Oracle" once per turn.

99980460.name: HN HDD Next White
99980460.desc:
3 Level 5 "HN" monsters
If this card was Xyz Summoned using a "HN HDD White Heart" as material, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of this card's effects. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; destroy up to 2 other cards your opponent controls. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon 1 "HN HHD White Heart" from your GY, and if you do, attach this card to it as material. (Transfer its materials to that monster.) You can only use this effect of "HN HDD Next white" once per turn.

99980470.name: HN HDD Next Green
99980470.desc:
3 Level 5 "HN" monsters
If this card was Xyz Summoned using a "HN HDD Green Heart" as material, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of this card's effects. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the original ATK of that monster, and if you do, gain LP equal to half the damage inflicted. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked an opponent's monster: You can Special Summon 1 "HN HHD Green Heart" from your GY, and if you do, attach this card to it as material. (Transfer its materials to that monster.) You can only use this effect of "HN HDD Next Green" once per turn.

99980480.name: HN Game Reload
99980480.desc: You can target 1 Level 3 or higher "HN" monster you control; return it to the hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 3 or higher "HN" monster from your hand. You can reveal any number of "HN" cards in your hand and shuffle them into the Deck, then draw cards equal to the number of cards shuffled into the Deck by this effect. You can only use each effect of "HN Game Reload" once per turn.

99980490.name: HN UD Neptune
99980490.desc: If you control no Rank 4 "HN HDD" Xyz Monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is in your GY and you control no Rank 4 "HN HDD" Xyz Monsters: You can Special Summon 1 Rank 4 "HN HDD" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, attach this card to it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use the preceding effects of "HN UD Neptune" once per turn. A "HN" Xyz Monster with this card as material gains this effect. ●If this card declares an attack: It gains 500 ATK until the end of the Damage Step.

99980500.name: HN MAGES.
99980500.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 6
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If a "HN" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by an opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead. Once per turn, at the end of each Battle Phase: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each "HN" monster that you Special Summoned during the Battle Phase this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Unaffected by your opponent's Spells/Traps. During your Main Phase, if this card was Normal or Special Summoned this turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "HN" monster from your Deck or GY. You can only use this effect of "HN MAGES." once per turn.

99980510.name: HN CyberConnect2
99980510.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 2
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when you Xyz Summon a "HN" Xyz Monster: You can draw 1 card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card in the Pendulum Zone is destroyed: Your opponent discards 1 random card. You can return this card from your field to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 other Level 4 or lower "HN" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "HN CyberConnect2" per turn.

99980520.name: HN HDD Golden Faith Black Heart
99980520.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Each time you Xyz Summon a "HN" Xyz Monster: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. Once per turn, if you have no cards in your other Pendulum Zone: You can place 1 "HN" Pendulum Monster from your Deck or face-up from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by using a "HN HDD Black Heart" Xyz Monster you control as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to this card.) If this card declares an attack: You can Special Summon 1 "HN" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "HDD Golden Faith Black Heart" once per turn. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the effects of all face-up Attack Position monsters your opponent controls until the end of this turn. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone.

99980530.name: HN CFW Judge
99980530.desc:
2 Level 4 "HN" monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card gains DEF equal to half the original ATK of that monster, and if it does, that monster cannot attack. These changes last until the end of your opponent's turn. If this card is Xyz Summoned by using an "HN Arfoire" as material, it gains these effects. 
●Cannot be destroyed by card effects.
●If a "HN" Xyz Monster you control destroys a monster by battle: You can send 1 "HN CPU" monster from your hand or field to the GY; change this card's Battle Position, and if you do, switch its ATK and DEF.

99980540.name: HN Nisa
99980540.desc: When a "HN" monster you control is destroyed by battle or by an opponent’s card effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then if this effect is activated during your opponent’s Battle Phase, end the Battle Phase. You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your hand, and if you do, you can have this card's Level become 4. You can only use this effect of "HN Nisa" once per turn.

99980550.name: HN Goddess of Fate Purple Heart
99980550.desc:
2+ "HN" monsters, including a "HN" monster with "Neptune" in its name
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 non-Link "HN" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone a "HN" Link Monster points to. You can only use this effect of "HN Goddess of Fate Purple Heart" once per turn. If your "HN" Xyz or Link Monster this card points to battles an opponent's monster, your opponent cannot activate monster effects until the end of the Damage Step.

99980560.name: HN Goddess of Prosperity Black Heart
99980560.desc:
2+ "HN" monsters, including a "HN" monster with "Noire" in its name
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 non-Link "HN" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone a "HN" Link Monster points to. You can only use this effect of "HN Goddess of Prosperity Black Heart" once per turn. Your "HN" Xyz or Link Monsters(s) this card points to cannot be destroyed by battle, and your take no Battle Damage from battles involving them.

99980570.name: HN Goddess of Order White Heart
99980570.desc:
2+ "HN" monsters, including a "HN" monster with "Blanc" in its name
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 non-Link "HN" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone a "HN" Link Monster points to. You can only use this effect of "HN Goddess of Order White Heart" once per turn. Your "HN" Xyz or Link Monster(s) this card points to cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects.

99980580.name: HN Goddess of Fertility Green Heart
99980580.desc:
2+ "HN" monsters, including a "HN" monster with "Vert" in its name
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 non-Link "HN" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to your zone a "HN" Link Monster points to. You can only use this effect of "HN Goddess of Order White Heart" once per turn. Activated effects of your "HN" Xyz or Link Monster(s) this card points to cannot be negated.

99980590.name: HN Broccoli
99980590.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 5
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, during the End Phase: Gain 200 LP for each "HN" monster you currently control. If your opponent controls more monsters than "HN" monsters you control that have a Level: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Hn Broccoli" once per turn
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Gains 1 Level for each other "HN" monster you control that has a Level. If this card is detached from a "HN" Xyz Monster and sent to the GY to activate that monster's effect: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, all "HN" monsters you currently control gain 200 ATK/DEF.

99980600.name: HN Falcom
99980600.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, when you Xyz Summon exactly 1 "HN" Xyz Monster: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls with ATK less than the Summoned monster’s; destroy it.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other "HN" monster you control; add 1 "HN" monster from your Deck with a Level less than that monster’s original Level. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 "HN" card in your Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 face-up "HN" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, except "HN Falcom". You can only use each effect of "HN Falcom" once per turn.

99980610.name: HN Divine Pudding
99980610.desc: Excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to total Link Rating of "HN" Link Monstres you currently control, add 1 excavated card to your hand, also after that, shuffle the rest back into your Deck, then, if you excavated a "HN" card with "Pudding" in its name, you can add 1 "HN" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only activate 1 "HN Divine Pudding" per turn.

99980620.name: HN Bouquet
99980620.desc:
2 "HN" monsters
If this card is sent to the GY as Material for the Link Summon of a "HN" monster: You can target 1 "HN" monster in your GY, except "HN Bouquet"; shuffle that target into the Deck, and if you do, you can either Special Summon 1 "HN" monster from your hand, or draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "HN Bouquet" once per turn. Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while co-linked. If your "HN" Xyz or Link Monster battles, your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps until the end of the Damage Step.

99980630.name: HN Rank-Up-Magic Hyper Drive
99980630.desc: Target 1 "HN HDD" Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 "HN HDD" monster that is 1 Rank higher than that target, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) You can only activate 1 "HN Rank-Up-Magic Hyper Drive" per turn.

99980640.name: HN Sweet-Nep Holiday
99980640.desc: Shuffle 1 "HN" monster you control into the Deck; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck and Special Summon as many "HN" monsters among them as possible, also send the remaining cards to the GY. For the rest of this turn, after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except “HN” monsters. You can only activate 1 "HN Sweet-Nep Holiday" per turn.

99990010.name: SAO Kirito - SAO
99990010.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "SAO Kirito-SAO" once per turn this way. When this attacking card destroys a monster by battle: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; this card can make a second attack on an opponent's monster in a row.

99990020.name: SAO Asuna - SAO
99990020.desc: During the turn this card was Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "SAO Yui - SAO" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SAO Asuna-SAO" once per turn. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks an opponent's Attack Position monster: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; change that monster to Defense Position, and if you do, it loses 700 DEF.

99990030.name: SAO Aincrad
99990030.desc: Each time your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s) to their field, place 1 En - Counter on this card for each of those monsters. Your "SAO" monsters gain 100 ATK/DEF for each En - Counter on this card. Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by a card effect, you can remove 3 En - Counters from this card instead.

99990040.name: SAO Game Master Rule
99990040.desc: When this card is activated: For the rest of this turn, monsters in your opponent's GY cannot activate their effects. Once per Chain, if this card is already face-up: You can remove 3 En - Counters from your field, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.

99990050.name: SAO Yui
99990050.desc: If you control a "SAO" monster with "Kirito" or "Asuna" in its name, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only use this effect of "SAO Yui - SAO" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can treat it as a Tuner, Or make its Level become 4.

99990060.name: SAO Kirito - ALO B.
99990060.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can equip 1 "SAO Boss" monster from your hand or Deck to this card, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; Special Summon a "SAO" monster in Defense Position from your GY, that was equipped to this card. You can only use this effect of "SAO Kirito - ALO B." once per turn.

99990070.name: SAO Asuna - ALO, Titania
99990070.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
Each time you Special Summon a "SAO" Synchro Monster: You can place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can target 1 "SAO" monster you control; this turn, it is treated as a Tuner, also its Level becomes 2. You can only use this effect of "SAO Asuna - SAO, Titania" once per turn.

99990080.name: SAO Asuna - ALO
99990080.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
(Quick Effect): You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls; change it to Defense Position, and if you do, it cannot activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "SAO Asuna - ALO" once per turn. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Inflict double piercing battle damage to your opponent.

99990090.name: SAO Lisbeth - SAO
99990090.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can Set 1 "SAO" Spell/Trap directly from your Deck, except a Field Spell. You can only use this effect of "SAO Lisbeth - SAO" once per turn.

99990100.name: SAO Silica - SAO
99990100.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can equip 1 "SAO Pina" from your hand or Deck to this card. You can only use this effect of "SAO Silica - SAO" once per turn. Once per turn: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 Set card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. Your opponent cannot activate the targeted card in response to this effect's activation.

99990110.name: SAO Pina
99990110.desc: You can target 1 face-up "SAO" monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to that target. While this card is equipped to a monster, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can Special Summon this equipped card. You can only use this effect of "SAO Pina" once per turn. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can destroy this card instead.

99990120.name: SAO Leafa - ALO
99990120.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send 1 "SAO" monster from your Deck to the GY; draw 1 card. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 En - Counter from your field; Special Summon 1 "SAO" monster from your GY, except a "SAO Boss" monster, and if you do, gain LP equal to half the original ATK of that monster. You can only use each effect of "SAO Leafa - ALO" once per turn.

99990130.name: SAO Boss, Illfang The Kobold Lord
99990130.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 "SAO" monster from your GY, except a "SAO Boss" monster. You can only Special Summon "SAO Boss, Illfang the Kobold Lord" once per turn this way. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Ruin Kobold Sentinel Token" (Beast-Warrior/Dark/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), or up to 2 instead if your opponent controls more monsters than you do. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can only control 1 "SAO Boss" monster.

99990135.name: SAO Ruin Kobold Sentinel
99990135.desc: Special Summoned by the effect of "SAO Boss, Illfang the Kobold Lord".

99990140.name: SAO Boss, The Gleam Eyes
99990140.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 2 "SAO" monsters from your GY, except "SAO Boss" monsters. You can only Special Summon "SAO Boss, The Gleam Eyes" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "SAO" card: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can only control 1 “SAO Boss" monster.

99990150.name: SAO Confront Battle
99990150.desc: During damage calculation, if your "SAO" monster battles an opponent's monster: Until the end of the Damage Step, your battling monster gains ATK equal to half the current ATK of that monster, also it gains 100 ATK for each En - Counter on your field.

99990160.name: SAO Boss, The Skull Reaper
99990160.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 3 "SAO" monsters from your GY, except "SAO Boss" monsters. You can only Special Summon "SAO Boss, The Skull Reaper" once per turn this way. Your opponent's monsters cannot target other "SAO" monsters for attacks, also your opponent cannot target other "SAO" monsters you control with card effects. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: Place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can only control 1 "SAO Boss" monster.

99990170.name: SAO Klein - SAO
99990170.desc: Once per turn: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; for the rest of this turn, all "SAO" monsters you control will gain 300 ATK. If this card on the field is sent to the GY: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "SAO Klein - SAO" once per turn.

99990180.name: SAO Kirito - ALO
99990180.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
You can remove 2 En - Counters from your field: Special Summon 1 "SAO" Synchro monster from your Extra Deck, except "SAO Kirito - ALO", but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "SAO Kirito - ALO" once per turn. When this attacking card destroys a monster by battle: It gains 300 ATK for each other "SAO" monster you control until the end of the Battle Phase, also it can make a second attack in a row.

99990190.name: SAO Kirito - GGO
99990190.desc:
2 Level 4 "SAO" monsters
When a card or effect is activated that targets 1 other "SAO" monster you control (and no other cards) (Quick Effect): You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "SAO Kirito - GGO" once per turn. Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks an opponent's monster: You can detach 1 material from this card; return that monster to the hand.

99990200.name: SAO Sinon ALO
99990200.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
You can target 1 other "SAO" monster you control; shuffle it into the Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "SAO" monster from your hand, except a "SAO Boss" monster. When your opponent adds exactly 1 card from their Deck to their hand, except by drawing it during their normal draw: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; banish that card face-down until your opponent's next Standby Phase. You can only each effect of "SAO Sinon - ALO" once per turn.

99990210.name: SAO Sinon - GGO
99990210.desc:
2 Level 4 "SAO" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "SAO Sinon - GGO". Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; this turn, this card can attack your opponent directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved.

99990220.name: SAO Yuuki - ALO
99990220.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can make all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 300 ATK for each other "SAO" monster you control. You can only use this effect of "SAO Yuuki - ALO" once per turn. Once per turn, if this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can remove En - Counters from your field up to the number of monsters your opponent currently controls; this card gains 1 additional attack on an opponent's monster for each removed Counter during this Battle Phase.

99990230.name: SAO Silica - ALO
99990230.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
(Quick Effect): You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster you control; equip 1 "SAO Pina" from your Deck or GY to it. You can only use this effect of "SAO Silica - SAO" once per turn. If your "SAO" monster battles an opponent's monster, your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps  that are on the field until the end of the Damage Step.

99990240.name: SAO Klein - ALO
99990240.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
During the turn this card was Special Summoned: You can draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then, if it is a "SAO" monster, except a "SAO Boss" monster, you can Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "SAO Klein - ALO" once per turn. If you Special Summon "SAO" monster(s): You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 of those monsters; equip this card to it. It gains ATK equal to half the original ATK of this monster.

99990250.name: SAO Death Gun - GGO
99990250.desc:
2 Level 4 "SAO" monsters
During the turn this card was Xyz Summoned: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; destroy it, then send all cards with that name from your opponent's hand, Deck or Extra Deck to the GY. (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it, and if you do, add from your GY to your hand, 1 "SAO" card of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as the one banished by this effect. You can only use each effect of "SAO Death Gun - GGO" once per turn.

99990260.name: SAO Counteract
99990260.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you control a "SAO" monster: Negate that attack, then end the Battle Phase. Except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 EN - Counter from your field; halve all battle damage you take this turn. You can only use this effect of "SAO Counteract" once per turn. If you control 2 or more "SAO" monsters, you can activate this card from your hand.

99990270.name: SAO Guns And Swords
99990270.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if your "SAO" non-Xyz Monster battled an opponent's monster and was not destroyed by the battle: You can target that monster; Special Summon 1 "SAO" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck, by using that target as material. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" Xyz Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, add 1 Level 4 "SAO" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "SAO Guns and Swords" once per turn.

99990280.name: SAO Limitless Combat
99990280.desc: Remove any number of En - Counters from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster you control; this turn, that monster gains 1 additional attack for each removed En - Counters, but your opponent takes no battle damage from battles involving that monster. You can only activate 1 "SAO Limitless Combat" per turn.

99990290.name: SAO Phantom Bullet
99990290.desc: When your opponent activates a card or effect: You can send 1 "SAO" monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the GY, OR remove 2 En - Counters from your field; Negate the activation, then send all cards with the same name as that card from your opponent's hand and Deck to the GY. You can only activate 1 "SAO Phantom Bullet" per turn.

99990300.name: SAO Illusion Incantation
99990300.desc: Send 1 "SAO" monster you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck to the GY, then target 1 "SAO Boss" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but its ATK/DEF becomes equal to the original ATK/DEF of the sent monster. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO Boss" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "SAO Illusion Incantation" once per turn.

99990310.name: SAO Halloween Dungeon Party
99990310.desc: Reveal 3 "SAO" monsters with different names from your Deck, your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest into your Deck. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster in your GY, except a "SAO Boss" monster; add that target to your hand. You can only use each effect of "SAO Halloween Dungeon Party" once per turn.

99990320.name: SAO Bits Of Sorrow
99990320.desc: If a "SAO" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent’s card effect: Special Summon 1 "SAO" monster from your hand or Deck, except a "SAO Boss" monster, and if you do, until the end of this turn, it gains ATK/DEF equal to half the original ATK of the destroyed monster and it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 EN - Counter from your field, then target 3 "SAO" monsters in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "SAO Bits of Sorrow" once per turn.

99990330.name: SAO Journey's End
99990330.desc:
Send 1 "SAO" monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the GY, OR remove 2 En - Counters from your field to activate 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 "SAO" Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck, but destroy it during the End Phase.
● Draw 2 cards.
You can only activate 1 "SAO Journey's End" per turn.

99990340.name: SAO Swordland
99990340.desc: When this card is activated: You can place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can discard 1 "SAO" monster, OR remove 2 En - Counters from your field; add 1 "SAO" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SAO Swordland" once per turn. Once per turn, when your "SAO" monster destroys an opponent’s monster by battle: You can draw 1 card.

99990350.name: SAO Agil - SAO
99990350.desc: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it for your normal draw, while all monsters you control are "SAO" monsters (min. 1): You can reveal this card; Special Summon it from your hand. You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster in your GY, except "SAO Agil - SAO"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "SAO Agil-SAO" once per turn.

99990360.name: SAO Edge of The World
99990360.desc: When this card is activated: You can place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell. You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated "SAO" card to your hand, also shuffle the rest into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "SAO Edge of The World" once per turn.

99990370.name: SAO Argo - SAO
99990370.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "SAO" card from your Deck to your hand, except "SAO Argo - SAO". If this card is Special Summoned by a "SAO" card: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; draw 2 cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "SAO Argo - SAO" once per turn.

99990380.name: SAO Kobold Sentinels
99990380.desc: Special Summon 1 "Ruin Kobold Sentinel Token" (Beast-Warrior/Dark/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), then you can keep repeating this effect until you control the same number of monsters as your opponent. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "SAO" monsters. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY and remove 1 En - Counter from your field; Special Summon 1 "Ruin Kobold Sentinel Token". You can only activate 1 "SAO Kobold Sentinels" per turn.

99990385.name: SAO Ruin Kobold Sentinel
99990385.desc: Special Summoned by the effect of "SAO Kobold Sentinels".

99990390.name: SAO Hidden Potential Leafa - ALO
99990390.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 non-Tuner "SAO" monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 other "SAO" monster you control; gain LP equal to half its current ATK, and if you do, this card gains ATK equal to half that amount until the end of the next turn. During the turn this card was Special Summoned: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" Synchro Monster you control, except "SAO Hidden Potential Leafa - ALO"; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, if all Synchro Materials that were used for its Synchro Summon are in your GY, you can Special Summon all of them. You can only use this effect of "SAO Hidden Potential Leafa - ALO" once per turn.

99990400.name: SAO Kirito - OS
99990400.desc:
2 "SAO" monsters, except Tuners
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "SAO" monster from your Deck to your hand. If a "SAO" Link Monster is Special Summoned to a zone this card points to: You can remove 2 En - Counters from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "SAO" monsters.  You can only use each effect of "SAO Kirito - OS" once per name.

99990410.name: SAO Asuna - OS
99990410.desc:
2 "SAO" monsters, except Tuners 
During the turn this card was Linked Summoned: You can excavate cards from the top of your Deck, equal to the total Link Rating of your “SAO" Link Monsters; add any excavated Level 4 or lower “SAO" monsters to your hand, also banish the rest. You can only use this effect of “Asuna-OS" once per turn. If this card or the monster it points to destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can place 1 En - Counter on your "SAO" Field Spell.

99990420.name: SAO Tense Strategy
99990420.desc:
Remove all En - Counters from your field; apply these effects this turn, based on the number of En - Counters removed.
● 1+: All "SAO" monsters you control will gain 200 ATK for each removed En - Counter.
● 3+: "SAO" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects.
● 5+: If a "SAO" monster you control battles, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of Damage Step. 
You can only activate 1 "SAO Tense Strategy" per turn.

99990430.name: SAO Yuna - OS
99990430.desc:
2 "SAO" monsters, except Tuners 
Once per turn: You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field; Special Summon 1 "SAO" monster from your hand, except a "SAO Boss" monster. You can only use this effect of "SAO Yuna - OS" once per turn. "SAO" monsters this card points to cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects.

99990440.name: SAO LLENN - GGO
99990440.desc:
2 Level 4 "SAO" monsters
Once per turn, you can activate a "SAO" Quick-Play Spell or Trap from your hand during your opponent's turn by removing 2 En - Counters from your field at activation. If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can detach 1 material from this card; this card can attack again in row.

99990450.name: SAO Pitohui - GGO
99990450.desc:
2 Level 4 "SAO" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 "SAO" Spell/Trap in your GY; banish it, and if you do, add 1 card with the same name as that card from your Deck to your hand. You can remove 2 En - Counters from your field, then target 1 other "SAO" Xyz Monster you control; add its material(s) to your hand, and if you do, equip that monster to this card. This card gains ATK equal to half the ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. You can only use each effect of "SAO Pitohui - GGO" once per turn.

99990460.name: SAO The World Tree
99990460.desc: Each time you Special Summon a "SAO" monster(s) from your Extra Deck, place 1 En - Counter on this card for each of those monsters. You can remove 1 En - Counter from your field, then target 1 "SAO" monster you control; increase or reduce its Level by up to 2. You can only use this effect of "SAO The World Tree" up to twice per turn. Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed by a card effect, you can remove 3 En - Counters from this card instead.

60967478.name: Reaper of Spirit & Soul
60967478.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner-Monsters or 2 Zombie Monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can send Zombie monsters from your Deck to the GY up to the number of non-Tuners used for its Synchro Summon. Once per turn, if you control this Synchro Summoned card (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Zombie monster from your GY, then target 1 other card on the field; destroy it.
If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon up to 2 Zombie monsters from your GY, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Zombie monsters. Once per turn, if you control this Fusion Summoned card: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 other Zombie monster you control; the opponent's monster loses ATK/DEF equal to the ATK of your monster, until the end of this turn.

95783999.name: Dragon of Day and Night
95783999.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ none-Tuner-Monsters or 2 Level 4 Monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower "Synchron" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Tuner from your hand or GY, but you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro or Xyz monsters. Once per turn, When a card or effect is activated, while you control this Synchro Summoned Card (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, attach that card to this card as material.

45314780.name: Celtic guard troop
45314780.desc: Your opponent cannot Target Warrior-Type monster for an attack, except this one. When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your hand.

45314781.name: Celtic Guard of the Forest
45314781.desc: "Celtic Guard" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle.

45314782.name: Celtic Guardian Beast
45314782.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "Celtic Guard" monsters from your Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned in any other way. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster; destroy that target. This card cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect.

45314783.name: Legendary Celtic Guardian
45314783.desc: This card gains 300 ATK and DEF for each card in your Graveyard.

45314784.name: Celtic Guardian Formation - Two Men
45314784.desc: During your Main Phase, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set, you can Normal Summon 1 Warrior-Type monster. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK.

45314785.name: Celtic Guardian Formation - Tactical Support
45314785.desc: When you activate this card, you can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; discard 1 Warrior-Type or Beast-Type monster, and if you do, destroy the card. All Warrior-Type and Beast-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK.

45314786.name: Celtic Guardian Formation - Reinforcements
45314786.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior-Type or Beast-Type monster from your Deck to your hand. All Warrior-Type and Beast-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK. You can only activate 1 "Celtic Guardian Formation - Reinforcement" per turn.

45314787.name: Celtic Guardian - Leader of the Armed Forces
45314787.desc:
2 Level 4 Warrior-Type monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card and then target 1 "Celtic Guard" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can banish 1 "Celtic Guardian" from your hand or face-up from your Monster Zone; this card gains 1400 ATK until the end of this turn. If this card that belongs to you is sent to your Graveyard by your opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Warrior-Type Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

45314788.name: Celtic Guardian - leader of the Royal Guard
45314788.desc:
3 ERDE Monster vom Typ Krieger der Stufe 5
3 Level 5 EARTH Warrior-Type monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Celtic Guardian - Leader of the Royal Guard" by using "Celtic Guardian - Leader of the Armed Forces" that you control as the Xyz Material. (Xyz Material attached to the monster also becomes Xyz Material of this card.) This card gains 300 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to it. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up attack position monster on the field; attach it to this card as face-up xyz material. Once per turn, during any player's turn, when a card or effect is activated: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

45314789.name: Celtic Guardian - King of the Army
45314789.desc:
"Celtic Guardian" + 1 warrior monster
Your opponent cannot target spells/traps you control for card effects, and they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

45314790.name: Legendary Celtic Guardian - Ultimate Fighter
45314790.desc:
