1 "Celtic Guard" monster + 1 or more "Celtic Guard" monsters
This card gains 300 ATK for each Fusion Material used for its Fusion Summon. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this Fusion Summoned card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Celtic Guard" monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

45314791.name: Celtic Guardian Formation - Power Boost
45314791.desc: When this card is activated: Target 1 Warrior-Type monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase. (This ATK increase continues even if this card leaves the field.) All Beast-Type and Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

45314792.name: Celtic Guardian Formation - Breakthrough
45314792.desc: During the turn this card is activated, if a Beast-Type or Warrior-Type monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing damage to your opponent. (Even if this card leaves the field.) All Beast-Type and Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

80000600.name: Brave Celtic Guard
80000600.desc: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 "Celtic Guard of Noble Arms" from your Deck or GY. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Noble Arms" Spell Card from your Deck to your Hand. During the End Phase of the turn this effect was activated, send your entire hand to the GY.

80000601.name: Vigorous Celtic Guard
80000601.desc: Gains 500 ATK for each Equip Card equipped to this card. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Celtic Guard" monster you control, except "Vigorous Celtic Guard"; its ATK becomes double its original ATK until the end of this turn. If this card is sent from your hand to the GY: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Vigorous Celtic Guard" once per turn.

80000602.name: Celtic Guard of Royal Arts
80000602.desc: You can Tribute 3 monster to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all cards your opponent controls, also you can equip as many Equip Spell Cards from your GY as possible to a Warrior monster(s) you control.

80000603.name: Noble Arms - Aegisbane
80000603.desc: You can only control 1 "Noble Arms - Aegisbane". Equip only to a Warrior monster. If it battles a monster with a higer Level, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK x the difference in Levels, during damage calculation only. As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot attack other monsters other than the equipped monster. If this card is sent from your Hand to the GY: You can target 1 "Celtic Guard" or "Noble Knight" Warrior monster; equip this card to that target. You can only use this effect of "Noble Arms - Aegisbane" once per turn.

80000604.name: Noble Arms - Caerwyn
80000604.desc: You can only control 1 "Noble Arms - Caerwyn". Equip only to a Warrior monster. During damage calculation, if the equipped monster battles an opponent's Special Summoned monster: That opponent's monster loses ATK/DEF equal to the equipped monster's original ATK, during damage calculation only. If this card is sent from your Hand to the GY: You can target 1 "Celtic Guard" or "Noble Knight" Warrior monster; equip this card to that target. You can only use this effect of "Noble Arms - Caerwyn" once per turn.

957130018.name: Mystical Chaos Sphere
957130018.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can shuffle up to 3 LIGHT Fairy monsters or up to 3 DARK Fairy monsters from your GY into the Deck; send 1 LIGHT or DARK Fairy monster from your Deck to the GY with a different Attribute than those monsters. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can discard 1 LIGHT or 1 DARK Fairy monster, except "Mystical Chaos Sphere"; add 1 LIGHT or DARK Fairy monster with a different Attribute than that monster from your GY to your hand, except "Mystical Chaos Sphere". You can only use each effect of "Mystical Chaos Sphere" once per turn.

957130019.name: Mythical Chaos Angel - Belias Thode
957130019.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Chaos" Ritual Spell. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card did not battle this turn: You can banish 1 LIGHT or DARK Fairy monster from your GY, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; send it to the GY, or, if your opponent controls more cards than you do, you can banish it instead. You can only use each of effect the following effects of "Mythical Chaos Angel - Belias Thode" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can take 2 of your banished Level 4 or lower LIGHT or DARK Fairy monsters, Special Summon 1 of them to your opponent's field in Defense Position and add the other to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Chaos" Ritual Spell from your GY to your hand.

957130020.name: Mythical Chaos Angel - Lucias Arc
957130020.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Chaos" Ritual Spell. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card did not battle this turn: You can banish 1 LIGHT or DARK Fairy monster from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; send it to the GY, or, if your opponent controls more cards than you do, you can banish it instead. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Mythical Chaos Angel" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Mythical Chaos Angel - Lucias Arc".

957130021.name: Rite of the Fallen
957130021.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Chaos" card.)
This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Mythical Chaos Angel" Ritual Monster. You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon, then you can add 1 "Mythical Chaos Angel" Ritual Monster from your banished cards to your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can Tribute 1 "Mystical Shine Ball" or "Mystical Chaos Sphere" you control; Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Rite of the Fallen" once per turn.

957130022.name: Mythical Chaos Defense
957130022.desc: When an attack is declared involving your Fairy monster: Negate the attack, then you can add 1 "Mythical Chaos Angel" Ritual Monster or 1 "Rite of the Fallen" from your Deck to your hand, then you can target 1 card in your opponent's GY and banish it.

957130055.name: Accursed Chaos Hunter
957130055.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by returning 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your banishment to the GY. Once per turn (Quick effect): You can target 1 monster in your opponent's GY; banish it, and if you do, until the end of the next turn, its effects are negated, as well as the activated effects and effects on the field of monsters with the same original name. If this card is added from your Deck to your hand by a card effect: You can reveal this card; Banish 1 LIGHT or DARK monster from your Deck, except "Accursed Chaos Hunter".

957130056.name: Chaos Rider
957130056.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can banish 1 "Chaos" monster from your Deck. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can add 1 "Chaos" monster from your GY to your hand, except "Chaos Rider". You can banish this card from your GY; discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Chaos Rider" once per turn.

90002200.name: Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Manipulator
90002200.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Each time a "Chrono-Shifters" Monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Chrono Counter on this card. You can remove 2 Chrono Counters from this card; Special Summon both this card from your Pendulum Zone and 1 Level 4 or 5 Celestial Warrior monster from your Deck, and if you do, Place 1 Chrono Counter on each.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
If this card is Pendulum Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 Celestial Warrior monster you control, except "Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Manipulator"; that face-up monster is treated as a Tuner this turn, also place this card on the bottom of the Deck, when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Manipulator" once per turn.

90002201.name: Chrono-Shifters: Time Weaver
90002201.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per Chain, if a Celestial Warrior monster is destroyed: Place 2 Chrono Counters on this card. This card's Pendulum Scale is increased by the number of Chrono Counters on it.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can remove 3 Chrono Counters from your field; Special Summon this card from your hand, then return that opponent's Summoned monster(s) to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Time Weaver" once per turn.

90002202.name: Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Shifter
90002202.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If you have a "Chrono-Shifters" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy this card, and if you do, shuffle 1 face-up Celestial Warrior Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck into your Main Deck, except "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Shifter", then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Shifter" once per turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can return this card from your field to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 other Level 4 Celestial Warrior monster from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 face-up "Chrono-Shifters" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Shifter" once per turn.

90002203.name: Chrono-Shifters: Chronomaly Enforcer
90002203.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If you have a "Chrono-Shifters" card in your other Pendulum Zone: You can destroy this card, and if you do, add 1 Level 4 or lower Celestial Warrior Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Chronomaly Enforcer" once per turn. If a Monster is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone in Attack Position.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; banish both it and this card from the field until your next Standby Phase. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; remove 1 Chrono Counter from anywhere on the field, and if you do, return that target to the hand.

90002204.name: Chrono-Shifters: Paradox Seer
90002204.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
You can target 1 Celestial Warrior Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Link or Trick Monster in your GY; destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Paradox Seer" once per turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
You can Ritual Summon this card with any "Chrono-Shifters" Ritual Spell. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can return up to 2 monsters your opponent controls to the hand, then Special Summon 1 Level 4 Celestial Warrior monster from your hand. You can remove 3 Chrono Counters from your field; return 1 Celestial Warrior card from your Pendulum Zone or face-up from your Extra Deck to the hand. You can only use each effect of Chrono-Shifters: Paradox Seer" once per turn.

90002205.name: Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Reversal
90002205.desc: If you control a "Chrono-Shifters" monster: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; place it on top of the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Reversal" per turn. If this card is used as material for a Trick Summon: place 1 rando card from your opponent's hand on top of their Deck. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Chrono Reversal" once per turn.

90002206.name: Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Distortion
90002206.desc: Shuffle 1 "Chrono-Shifters" monster from your hand into the Deck; draw 2 cards. You can banish this card from your GY; place 1 Chrono Counter on every face-up card. You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Distortion" once per turn.

90002207.name: Chrono-Shifters: Time Rift
90002207.desc:
Each time a "Chrono-Shifters" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 Chrono Counters on this card. You can remove Chrono Counters from your field to activate these effects.
●2 Counters: Target 1 "Chrono-Shifters" Monster; that target gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.
●4 Counters: Add 1 "Chrono-Shifters" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand.
●8 Counters: Special Summon 1 "Chrono-Shifters" Monster from your Hand, Deck or GY.

90002208.name: Chrono-Shifters: Epoch Guardian
90002208.desc:
[ Monster Effect ]
2 Level 4 Celestial Warrior-Type monsters
If you can Pendulum Summon Level 4, you can Pendulum Summon this face-up card in your Extra Deck. If this card is Special Summoned: You can attach 1 face-up Celestial Warrior Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to this card as material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

90002209.name: Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Guardian
90002209.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
All Celestial Warrior monsters you control gain 200 ATK for each Chrono Counter on this card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
3 Celestial Warrior Monster
Must first be Special Summoned (from your face-down Extra Deck) by Tributing the above cards. If this card is Special Summoned: Place 3 Chrono Counters on it. While face-up on the field, this card is also LIGHT-Attribute. Monsters destroyed by battle with this card are placed on the bottom of the Deck instead of going to the GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It gains 200 ATK. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone, then place the same number of Chrono Counter on it that it had as a monster.

90002210.name: Chrono-Shifters: Time Guardian Seraph
90002210.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
If a Pendulum Monster you control attacks, for that battle, it cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage. At the end of the Damage Step, if a Pendulum Monster you control attacked: All monsters your opponent currently controls lose ATK equal to that attacking monster's ATK, until the end of this turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner LIGHT or DARK monsters
If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each of the following effects of "Chrono-Shifters: Time Guardian Seraph" once per turn. You can target 1 Pendulum Monster on the field or 1 card in the Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, shuffle 1 card on the field into the Deck. At the end of the Damage Step, when this card or your Pendulum Monster battles an opponent's monster, but the opponent's monster was not destroyed by the battle: You can destroy that opponent's monster.

90002211.name: Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Herald
90002211.desc:
1 LIGHT or DARK Monster + 1 Trap Card
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; change it to face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Herald
" once per turn. If a Celestial Warrior monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

{/}

90002212.name: Chrono-Shifters: Time Gate
90002212.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Chrono-Shifters" Ritual Monster from your Hand or GY. You must also send 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster (1 from your hand and 1 from your Deck) to the GY, whose total Level exactly equal 8. You can only activate 1 "Chrono-Shifters: Time Gate" per turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Place 1 Chrono Counter on 1 "Chrono-Shifters" monster you control.

90002213.name: Chrono-Shifters: Chronoscythe Assassin
90002213.desc:
2 LIGHT and/or DARK monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 face-up "Chrono-Shifters" monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card you control; destroy it, then you can apply 1 of these effects.
●Place 1 "Chrono-Shifters: Time Rift" from your Deck, face-up in your Spell/Trap Zone.
●Place 1 "Chrono-Shifters" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone.
You can only use each effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Chronoscythe Assasin" once per turn

90002214.name: Chrono-Shifters: Timebound Sentinel
90002214.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Each time a "Chrono-Shifters" Monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Chrono Counter on this card. You can remove 2 Chrono Counters from this card; Special Summon both this card from your Pendulum Zone and 1 face-up monster from your Extra Deck, and if you do, place 1 Chrono Counter on each. If another card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Chrono-Shifters" Spell/Trap card, except "Chrono-Shifters: Temporal Distortion" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Timebound Sentinel" Once per turn.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
While face-up on the field, this card is also LIGHT-Attribute. If this card is summoned: You can place 1 Chrono Counter on every face-up card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Timebound Sentinel" Twice per turn. If this card is destroyed: You can place 1 "Chrono-Shifters" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone, except "Chrono-Shifters: Timebound Sentinel". You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Timebound Sentinel" Once per turn.

90002215.name: Chrono-Shifters: Pendulum Reversal
90002215.desc: If you control no monsters: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or Lower Celestial Warrior Pendulum Monster. You can banish this card from your GY and Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 1 Pendulum monster from your Hand or Deck with the same Level as the Tributed monster. You can only use this effect of "Chrono-Shifters: Pendulum Reversal" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Chrono-Shifters: Pendulum Reversal" per turn.

67838410.name: Cloudian Striking Thunder
67838410.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 "Cloudian" monster. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is in face-up Defense Position, destroy it. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower "Cloudian" from your hand or Deck, and if you do, place Fog Counters on it equal to its Level. If a "Cloudian" monster is destroyed: You can place 1 Fog Counter on this card. You can only use each effect of "Cloudian Striking Thunder" once per turn.

38237189.name: Gift from the Fairy's
38237189.desc: Discard 1 Fairy monster; add up to 3 Counter Traps from your Deck to your hand, also you cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except Fairy monsters. You can only activate 1 "Gift from the Fairy's" per turn.

61363113.name: Shard of Hecatrice
61363113.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any Fairy Ritual Monster. You must also send Synchro Monsters from your Extra Deck to the GY whose total Level equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except Fairy monsters. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Fairy monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of " Shard of Hecatrice" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Shard of Hecatrice" per turn.

76175568.name: Fairy of the Forest

30000000.name: Ceiling-Nio
30000000.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
"Naturia Spiderfang" and "Jirai Gumo" you control have their effects negated during your Battle Phase. Once while this card is on the field: You can draw 1 card.
----------------------------------------
[ Flavor Text ]
This time, Nio is only here to watch. Don't mind him.

30000001.name: Lifeforce Radiation
30000001.desc: You can pay 1000 Life Points to inflict 400 points of damage to your opponent.

30000002.name: Wata Friendship
30000002.desc: Shuffle 5 "Watapon" from outside the duel into your deck, then draw 1 card.

30000003.name: Automatoi - Hoplit
30000003.desc: After this card attacked, flip a coin and if the result is heads, this card can attack again in a row.

30000004.name: Iceborn Legacy
30000004.desc: Pay 1000 Life Points to activate this card. Target a face-up monster you control on the field. For the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of monsters with the same name that you control by 900.

30000005.name: Wrath of the Fire Demon
30000005.desc: Pay 1000 Life Points to activate this card. Add 1 "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand. For the rest of this Duel, each time you activate "Sparks", "Hinotama" or "Ookazi", draw 1 card, also, deal 300 damage to your opponent for each "Sparks" in your graveyard.

30000006.name: Cosmic Inspiration
30000006.desc: For the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of monsters you control by 200.

30000007.name: Burning Soul (CSTM)
30000007.desc: Add 1 card from your Graveyard to your hand, except "Burning Soul".

30000008.name: Iron Chain Ring
30000008.desc: When this card is activated, you can add 1 "Iron Chain" monster from your Deck to your hand. Each time cards are sent from your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard, except by the effect of "Iron Chain Ring", send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

30000009.name: Bastion
30000009.desc: If cards in your possession would be destroyed, you can destroy this face-up card instead (you cannot prevent cards from being destroyed by an effect that would also destroy this card).

30000010.name: Charubin the Fire Knight (CSTM)
30000010.desc:
"Monster Egg" + "Hinotama Soul"
When this card is Fusion Summoned, add 1 "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand. This card gains 400 ATK for each "Sparks" in your Graveyard. This card is unaffected by Trap effects.

30000011.name: Darkfire Dragon (CSTM)
30000011.desc:
"Firegrass" + "Petit Dragon"
When this card is Fusion Summoned, add 1 "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Sparks" in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

30000012.name: Single-Targeted Wrath
30000012.desc: Declare 1 card name. The equipped monster and cards equipped to it are unaffected by cards with the declared name, also the equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle with monsters with the declared name. At the start of the damage step, if the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster with the declared name, destroy that opponent's monster.

30000013.name: Sanwitch (CSTM)
30000013.desc:
"Sangan" + "Witch of the Black Forest"
If this Fusion Summoned card leaves the field: Add 1 monster from your Deck to your Hand.

30000014.name: Karbonala Warrior (CSTM)
30000014.desc:
"M-Warrior #1" + "M-Warrior #2"
When this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon any number of "Karbonala Warrior" from your Extra Deck.

30000015.name: Bickuribox (CSTM)
30000015.desc:
"Crass Clown" + "Dream Clown"
Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, return all other cards on the field to the Hand.

30000016.name: Skull Knight (CSTM)
30000016.desc:
"Tainted Wisdom" + "Ancient Brain"
You take no damage. You may look at the top card of your Deck at any time. Once per turn, you can shuffle your Deck.

30000017.name: Punished Eagle (CSTM)
30000017.desc:
"Blue-Winged Crown" + "Niwatori"
When this card is Fusion Summoned, add 1 "Harpie's Feather Duster" from outside the Duel to your hand. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to your normal spell cards.

30000018.name: Kaminari Attack (CSTM)
30000018.desc:
"Ocubeam" + "Mega Thunderball"
When this card is Fusion Summoned, add 1 "Lightning Vortex" from outside the Duel to your hand. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to your normal spell cards.

30000019.name: Empress Judge (CSTM)
30000019.desc:
"Queen's Double" + "Hibikime"
This card can attack directly. If an opponent's card effect activates, before resolving that effect, toss a coin, and if the result is Head, negate that effect.

30000020.name: Humanoid Worm Drake (CSTM)
30000020.desc:
"Worm Drake" + "Humanoid Slime"
If one or more of your cards are banished: Shuffle as many cards from outside the Duel with the same original name as the banished cards into your deck, also reduce your opponent's Life Points by 100 for each.

30000021.name: Fusionist (CSTM)
30000021.desc:
"Petit Angel" + "Mystical Sheep #2"
When this card is Fusion Summoned, add 1 "Polymerization" from outside the Duel to your hand. If a monster is Fusion Summoned: Draw 1 card. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

30000022.name: Cyber Saurus (CSTM)
30000022.desc:
"Blast Juggler" + "Two-Headed King Rex"
Each time your opponent takes effect damage, place 1 counter on this card. Gains 100 ATK for each counter on it. Once per turn, you can inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each counter on this card.

(This card is not treated as a "Cyber" card.)

30000023.name: Painful Choice (CSTM)
30000023.desc: Select 3 cards with different names from your Deck and show them to your opponent. Your opponent selects 1 card among them. Add that card to your hand and shuffle the remaining cards back into the Deck.

30000024.name: Forbidden Tablet
30000024.desc: Shuffle 1 of each "Exodia the Forbidden One", "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" from outside the Duel into your Deck, then remove this card from the Duel and draw 1 card.

30000025.name: Fusion
30000025.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using face-up monsters you control as Fusion Material.

30000026.name: Exodius the Ultimate Forbidden Lord (CSTM)
30000026.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by shuffling 2 "Forbidden One" monsters from your GY or banishment into the Deck, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card declares an attack: Send 1 monster from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard. Unaffected by card effects that prevent this card from attacking, also its attacks cannot be negated. This card gains 1000 ATK for each "Forbidden One" card in your GY. If there are 5 different "Forbidden One" cards in your Graveyard, you win the Duel.

30000027.name: Hard Armor (CSTM)
30000027.desc: Monsters you control gain 200 DEF as long as this card is in the Graveyard.

30000028.name: Masaki the Legendary Swordsman (CSTM)
30000028.desc: When this card declares an attack, roll a six-sided die, and this card gains ATK equal to the result x 100.

30000029.name: Steam Gyroid (CSTM)
30000029.desc:
"Gyroid" + "Steamroid"
Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed, it is not destroyed. If this card attacks, it gains 500 ATK during the Damage Step only. If a monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" you control attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.

30000030.name: Brionac, Dragon of the Ice Barrier (CSTM)
30000030.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner WATER monsters
You can discard any number of cards to the GY, then target the same number of cards on the field; return those cards to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Brionac, Dragon of the Ice Barrier" once per turn.

30000031.name: Dark Spider (CSTM)
30000031.desc:
Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". You can only use each of the following effects of "Dark Spider" once per turn.
●You can increase the Level of 1 face-up Insect-Type monster you control by 2.
●If you control "Spider Web" and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card.

30000032.name: Spyder Spider (CSTM)
30000032.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". Unaffected by Trap effects while you control "Spider Web". When this card destroys an opponent's Defense Position monster by battle, you can select and Special Summon 1 monster that mentions "Spider Web" from your Graveyard.

30000033.name: Relinquished Spider (CSTM)
30000033.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". If you have 4 or more cards in your Graveyard that are "Spider Web" or mention it, you can Tribute this card to destroy all face-up Defense Position monsters your opponent controls. This is a Quick Effect if you control "Spider Web". While this card is in your Graveyard, monsters you control that mention Spider Web" in their text gain 100 ATK and DEF.

30000034.name: Informer Spider (CSTM)
30000034.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard by a card effect, take control of 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls. Once per turn, if you control "Spider Web": You can look at any card on your opponent's field or in their hand.

30000035.name: Mother Spider (CSTM)
30000035.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". If you control "Spider Web", you can send 2 face-up Defense Position monsters your opponent controls to the Graveyard and Special Summon this card from your hand. Your opponent cannot target "Spider Web" you control with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by card effects.

30000036.name: Earthbound Immortal Uru (CSTM)
30000036.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". There can only be 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster on the field. If there is no face-up Field Spell on the field, destroy this card. Your opponent's monsters cannot target this card for attacks. This card can attack your opponent directly. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of that target, until the End Phase.

30000037.name: T.A.D.P.O.L.E. (CSTM)
30000037.desc: When this card you control is destroyed by battle and sent to your Graveyard, you can add any "T.A.D.P.O.L.E."(s) from your Deck to your hand.

30000038.name: Ground Spider (CSTM)
30000038.desc: Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web". While you control "Spider Web", this card cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn, if you control this face-up Defense Position monster when your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s), you can change that monster(s) to Defense Position, also that monster(s) effects cannot be activated this turn.

30000039.name: Spiders' Lair (CSTM)
30000039.desc: When this card is activated, you can add 1 card that is "Spider Web" or mentions it from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, you can select 1 face-up monster you control that mentions "Spider Web". While this card remains on the field, any opponent's monster that battles with one of those monsters is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase, and cannot change its battle position while this card is on the field, nor can it activate its effects.

30000040.name: Spider Egg (CSTM)
30000040.desc:
When your opponent declares an attack, while you have 3 or more cards that either are "Spider Web" or mention it in your GY: Negate the attack, and if you do, Special Summon 3 "Spider Tokens" (Insect/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 100) in Attack Position. These Tokens are Effect Monsters with this effect:
● Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web".

30000041.name: Lair Wire (CSTM)
30000041.desc: Banish 1 card that is "Spider Web" or mentions it from your GY and target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

30000042.name: Spider Token (CSTM)
30000042.desc: Special Summoned with the effect of "Spider Egg". Unaffected by the effects of "Spider Web".

30000043.name: House of Adhesive Tape (CSTM)
30000043.desc: If the DEF of a monster summoned by your opponent (excluding Special Summon) is 500 points or less, the monster is destroyed.

30000044.name: Pyro Clock of Destiny (CSTM)
30000044.desc: Increase the turn counters of all your card effects that count turns by 1.

30000045.name: Final Countdown (CSTM)
30000045.desc: Pay 2000 Life Points. After 20 turns have passed after you activate this card (counting the turn you activate this card as the 1st turn), you win the Duel.

30000046.name: Postponed Apocalypse
30000046.desc: Set all turn counters of card effects that count turns to 0 and gain Life Points equal to the turn counters removed by this effect x1000.

30000047.name: Candle of Fate (CSTM)
30000047.desc: Gains 200 ATK/DEF for each turn counter on your card effects that count turns. When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: Add 1 "Pyro Clock of Destiny" from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000048.name: Crimson Sentry (CSTM)
30000048.desc: Your opponent cannot target this card with trap effects. All monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF. Once per turn, during your End Phase: All monsters you currently control gain 100 ATK and DEF.

30000049.name: Lady Panther (CSTM)
30000049.desc: Your opponent cannot target this card with monster effects. All monsters your opponent controls must attack, if able. Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can change all monsters you control to face-up Defense Position.

30000050.name: Niwatori (CSTM)
30000050.desc: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can attach that monster to this card as material. While this card is face-up on the field, it gainst the effects of all monsters attached to it as material.

30000051.name: Earthbound Spirit (CSTM)
30000051.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Add 1 "Destiny Board" or 1 "Spirit Message" card from outside the Duel to your hand. Once per turn, if you control a "Spirit Message "I"": You can inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

30000052.name: Headless Knight (CSTM)
30000052.desc: Gains 300 DEF for each "Destiny Board" and "Spirit Message" card you control and 300 ATK for each "Destiny Board" and "Spirit Message" card in your GY. If you control a "Spirit Message "A"" and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Headless Knight" once per turn.

30000053.name: The Gross Ghost of Fled Dreams (CSTM)
30000053.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished Fiend monsters; add that target to your hand. Once per turn, if you control a "Spirit Message "L"": You can gain 2000 LP.

30000054.name: The Portrait's Secret (CSTM)
30000054.desc: During your Main Phase: You can place 1 "Spirit Message" card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone. (This is treated as being placed by the effect of "Destiny Board".) Once per turn, if you control a "Spirit Message "N"": You can draw 1 card.

30000055.name: Fairy Guardian (CSTM)
30000055.desc: Your opponent cannot target this card with spell effects. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can change the position of a monster you control.

30000056.name: Trial of the Princesses (CSTM)

During a turn that the equipped monster destroyed a Level 5 or higher monster by battle, you can Tribute the equipped monster and this card to Special Summon a Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that lists that monster as Fusion Material (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon). If "Princess Pikeru" or "Princess Curran" you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

30000057.name: Princess Pikeru (CSTM)
30000057.desc:
"White Magician Pikeru" + "Trial of the Princesses"
You cannot lose the Duel. Each time you would take damage, gain that amount of LP instead. During your Standby Phase: Gain 800 Life Points for each monster you control.

30000058.name: Princess Curran (CSTM)
30000058.desc:
"Ebon Magician Curran" + "Trial of the Princesses"
Effect damage inflicted to your opponent is doubled. During your Standby Phase: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

30000059.name: Ally of Justice Searcher (CSTM)
30000059.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Ally of Justice" monster from your Deck to your hand.

30000060.name: Ally of Justice Cycle Reader (CSTM)
30000060.desc: (Quick Effect): You can discard this card to the GY, then target up to 2 LIGHT monsters in your opponent's GY; banish those targets. When you Synchro Summon an "Ally of Justice" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your GY in Attack Position.

30000061.name: Next to be Lost (CSTM)
30000061.desc: Select 1 face-up monster you control. Send 1 card from outside the Duel to the Graveyard with the same original name as the selected card.

30000062.name: Generation Shift (CSTM)
30000062.desc: Target 1 face-up monster you control; destroy that target, then add 1 card with the same original name as the destroyed card from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000063.name: Grass Phantom (CSTM)
30000063.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Send 1 "Grass Phantom" from outside the Duel to your Graveyard. This card gains 500 ATK for each "Grass Phantom" in your Graveyard.

30000064.name: Malice Ascendant (CSTM)
30000064.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Send 1 "Malice Ascendant" from outside the Duel to your Graveyard. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase: Banish 1 card from the top of their Deck face-down for each "Malice Ascendant" in your Graveyard. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect.

30000065.name: Chain Thrasher (CSTM)
30000065.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Chain Thrasher" from outside the Duel to your Graveyard. This card can attack 1 additional time during the same Battle Phase for each "Chain Thrasher" in your Graveyard. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can remove from the Duel 1 "Chain Thrasher" from your Graveyard and if you do, this card can attack directly this turn.

30000066.name: Offerings to the Phoenix
30000066.desc: When this card is activated: Place 1 "Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys" from outside the Duel on the bottom of your Deck. If this card would be destroyed by a card effect, gain 1000 LP instead.

30000067.name: Ally of Justice Garadholg (CSTM)
30000067.desc: "Ally of Justice" monsters you control gain 200 ATK. If this card battles a LIGHT monster, it gains 200 ATK during the Damage Step only.

30000068.name: Senri Eye (CSTM)
30000068.desc: You may look at the top card of your opponent's Deck and at cards that are in the same column as this card at any time.

30000069.name: Genex Blastfan (CSTM)
30000069.desc: If you control "Genex Controller", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 DARK "Genex" monster from your Deck to your hand.

30000070.name: Darkbishop Archfiend (CSTM)
30000070.desc: Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, you must pay 500 LP (this is not optional), or this card is destroyed. Archfiend monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's activated effects, unless they target them. When an Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, 3, or 6, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card.

30000071.name: Genex Furnace (CSTM)
30000071.desc: If you control a face-up "Genex Controller", you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, send any monsters among them to the Graveyard, also shuffle the rest into your Deck.

30000072.name: Genex Gaia (CSTM)
30000072.desc: While you control "Genex Controller", this card cannot be destroyed. If exactly 1 "Genex" monster you control (and no other cards) would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

30000073.name: Genex Undine (CSTM)
30000073.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 WATER monster from your Deck to the GY; add 1 "Genex Controller" from your Deck to your hand. You can shuffle this card from your GY into your Deck, then target 1 "Genex Undine" in your GY; Special Summon that target.

30000074.name: Battle-Scarred (CSTM)
30000074.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 "Archfiend" monster you control. Whenever you pay LP for that monster during your Standby Phase, gain an equal amount of LP, also inflict an equal amount of damage to your opponent. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. If that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

30000075.name: Pandemonium (CSTM)
30000075.desc:
When this card is activated: Roll a six-sided die, then add one of the following cards from outside the Duel to your hand, based on the rolled result.
1: "Vilepawn Archfiend"
2: "Desrook Archfiend"
3: "Shadowknight Archfiend"
4: "Darkbishop Archfiend"
5: "Infernalqueen Archfiend"
6: "Terrorking Archfiend"
Each time you pay LP for "Archfiend" monsters during your Standby Phase, gain LP equal to the paid amount +200.

30000076.name: Ally of Justice Thousand Arms (CSTM)
30000076.desc: This card can attack all face-down monsters and all face-up LIGHT monsters your opponent controls once each. The effects of LIGHT Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card are negated.

30000077.name: Windmill Genex (CSTM)
30000077.desc:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more non-Tuner WIND monsters
This card gains 300 ATK for each Spell and Trap Card Set on the field. You can banish 1 "Genex" monster from your GY, then target 1 face-down Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target. You can banish 1 WIND monster from your GY, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

30000078.name: Thermal Genex (CSTM)
30000078.desc:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more non-Tuner FIRE monsters
This card gains 200 ATK for each FIRE monster in your Graveyard. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each "Genex" monster in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

30000079.name: Geo Genex (CSTM)
30000079.desc:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more non-Tuner EARTH monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; switch its current ATK and DEF until the end of this turn.

30000080.name: Hydro Genex (CSTM)
30000080.desc:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more non-Tuner WATER monsters
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, gain Life Points equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster. If a card(s) is returned to the Deck or Extra Deck from your GY: Gain 500 LP for each. Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Genex" monsters; return it to the GY, then draw 1 card.

30000081.name: Genex Doctor (CSTM)
30000081.desc: Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of a "Genex" monster effect. You can Tribute 1 face-up "Genex Controller" to select and destroy 1 card on the field.

30000083.name: Humanoid Slime (CSTM)
30000083.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 card on your side of the field or in your banishment: Add a card with the same original name from outside the Duel to your Deck.

30000084.name: Jar Robber (CSTM)
30000084.desc: You can only activate this card when "Pot of Greed" is activated. Negate the effect of the "Pot of Greed" and draw 2 cards from your Deck. If it is the first turn of the Duel, you can activate this card from your hand during your opponent's turn.

30000085.name: Level Conversion Lab (CSTM)

30000086.name: Kozaky's Self-Destruct Button (CSTM)
30000086.desc: If you control "Kozaky": Destroy any number of cards you control that either are "Kozaky" or mention that card and an equal number of cards your opponent controls. If this card is destroyed: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

30000087.name: Fruits of Kozaky's Studies (CSTM)
30000087.desc: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, plus an additional 3 cards for each face-up "Kozaky" you control: Add all cards among them that either are "Kozaky" or mention that card to your hand, then return the rest to the top of your Deck in any order (if the number of cards in your Deck is less than the required amount of cards, you can instead look at any number of cards at the top of your Deck).

30000088.name: Giant Kozaky (CSTM)
30000088.desc: This card cannot declare an attack. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Destroy this face-up card. Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "Kozaky" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. The equipped monster's original ATK/DEF become 2500. If this card is destroyed: Inflict 1000 damage to both players.

30000089.name: Grave Lure (CSTM)
30000089.desc: During each End Phase, shuffle a "Lure Token" from outside the Duel into your opponent's Deck face-up (if that token is sent to the hand, GY, or banishment, immediately shuffle it into the Deck face-up).

30000091.name: Overdrive (CSTM)
30000091.desc: If this card declares an attack: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent four times.

30000092.name: Oni Tank T-34 (CSTM)
30000092.desc: Increase all damage your opponent takes by 300.

30000093.name: Mine Golem (CSTM)
30000093.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, then, if it was sent there by the effect of a trap card, add 1 "Rubble King" from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000094.name: Senet Switch (CSTM)
30000094.desc: Your monsters in the same column as this card gain 200 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your Main Monster Zone and choose 1 of its unused adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zones; move that target to the chosen adjacent zone.

30000095.name: Arcana Call (CSTM)
30000095.desc: Select 1 "Arcana Force" monster you control and 1 Arcana Force" monster in your GY; banish the second target, and if you do, the first target gains the coin toss effect with the same coin toss result as the banished monster.

30000096.name: Ancient Brain (CSTM)
30000096.desc: You can banish this card from your GY, then declare 1 card name; excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is the declared card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, send it to the GY.

30000097.name: Oscillo Hero (CSTM)
30000097.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 "Polymerization". Once per turn: You can target 1 "Polymerization" in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, then draw 2 cards.

30000098.name: Checkmate (CSTM)
30000098.desc: Target 1 "Terrorking Archfiend" you control; it attacks your opponent directly. If a "Terrorking Archfiend" you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

30000099.name: Vilepawn Archfiend (CSTM)
30000099.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Archfiend" monster from your hand. The controller of this card pays 500 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phases (this is not optional). When this card is targeted by the effect of a card controlled by your opponent, when resolving the effect, roll a six-sided die. If the result is 3, negate the effect and destroy the opponent's card. As long as this card remains on the field, your opponent cannot attack any Archfiend Monster Card on your side of the field except "Vilepawn Archfiend".

30000100.name: Depressed Spider
30000100.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: Place it on top of your opponent's Deck.

30000101.name: The Forgiving Maiden (CSTM)
30000101.desc: Once per turn, if you gain LP: You can add 1 Fairy monster from your GY to your hand.

30000102.name: Darklord Marie (CSTM)
30000102.desc: Each time you gain Life Points, this card gains 500 ATK. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You gain 200 LP. This card must be in the Graveyard to activate and to resolve this effect.

30000103.name: St. Joan (CSTM)
30000103.desc:
"The Forgiving Maiden" + "Darklord Marie"
If this card Fusion Summoned: Gain 2000 LP. After you gain LP, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards for the rest of this turn.

30000104.name: Cyber Barrier Dragon (CSTM)
30000104.desc:
"Cyber Dragon" + "Attack Reflector Unit"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above Fusion Materials. Once per turn, your opponent's next attack is negated. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; cards you control cannot be destroyed by that effect.

30000105.name: Attack Reflector Unit (CSTM)
30000105.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using cards from your side of the field as Fusion Material, including this card.

30000106.name: Inaba White Rabbit (CSTM)
30000106.desc: This card returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase. This card attacks your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: For the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of Spirit monsters you control by 200.

30000107.name: Wingweaver (CSTM)
30000107.desc: If this card is in your GY: You can pay 4000 LP; Special Summon this card in Defense Position. You take no effect damage.

30000108.name: Altar for Tribute (CSTM)
30000108.desc: Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 monster; gain LP equal to its original ATK.

30000109.name: Stealthroid (CSTM)
30000109.desc:
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with the following effects.
● Once per turn: You can flip 1 face-down monster face-up (Flip monsters' effects are not activated at this time).
● At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battles: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.
● Once per turn, when a face-up monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" you control is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack.

30000110.name: Caravan of the Ice Barrier (CSTM)
30000110.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Ice Barrier" monster from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn: You can target 2 "Ice Barrier" monsters in your GY; shuffle both into the Deck, then draw 1 card.

30000111.name: Elemental HERO Avian (CSTM)
30000111.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. Your opponent cannot tribute this face-up card on the field, and cannot target it with card effects. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000112.name: Elemental HERO Burstinatrix (CSTM)
30000112.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. "Elemental HERO" monsters you control gain 400 ATK/DEF and control of them cannot switch. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000113.name: Elemental HERO Clayman (CSTM)
30000113.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. This face-up card on the field cannot be returned to the hand or Deck. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000114.name: Elemental HERO Sparkman (CSTM)
30000114.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. If this card attacks or is attacked, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000115.name: Elemental HERO Bubbleman (CSTM)
30000115.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. If this is the only card in your hand, you can Special Summon it. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned, if you control no other cards: Draw 2 cards. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000116.name: Elemental HERO Wildheart (CSTM)
30000116.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. Unaffected by Trap effects. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000117.name: Elemental HERO Bladedge (CSTM)
30000117.desc: This card cannot be Set, but can be Normal Summoned in face-up Defense Position. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. A Fusion Monster that was Summoned using this card as material gains the previous effects of this card.

30000118.name: Worm Drake (CSTM)
30000118.desc: (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Fusion Monster you control; this turn, that face-up monster is unaffected by your opponent's card effects.

30000119.name: Tainted Wisdom (CSTM)
30000119.desc: If this Attack Position card is changed to face-up Defense Position: Shuffle your Deck. Once per turn: You can make your opponent declare 1 card name; excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, and if no card with the declared name is among them, add 1 of them to your hand, otherwise banish all cards with the declared name face-down. Return any remaining cards to the top of the Deck in the same order.

30000120.name: Koa'ki Meiru Speeder (CSTM)
30000120.desc: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the GY. If "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" is added to your hand: You can reveal it to your opponent to draw 1 card.

30000121.name: Ancient Gear Soldier (CSTM)
30000121.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Ancient Gear" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.

30000122.name: O - Oversoul (CSTM)
30000122.desc: Target 1 "Elemental HERO" non-Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

30000123.name: Dark Scorpion - Cliff the Trap Remover (CSTM)
30000123.desc:
Your opponent cannot activate face-down Spell or Trap Cards in the same column as one of your "Don Zaloog" or "Dark Scorpion" monsters. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
●Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.
●Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard.

30000124.name: Wattkid (CSTM)
30000124.desc: You take no battle damage from battles involving your Thunder monsters. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Thunder monster you control; that target gains 400 ATK.

30000125.name: Prevent Rat (CSTM)
30000125.desc: You take no battle damage from battles involving this card. When a card or effect is activated that would destroy this face-down card (Quick Effect): Change this card to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, negate the activation, then destroy it.

30000126.name: Petit Dragon (CSTM)
30000126.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up: Add 1 "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand. Each time you activate "Sparks", while this card is on the field or in the GY, deal 200 damage to your opponent, also increase the ATK of all face-up monsters you currently control by 200.

30000127.name: Darkworld Thorns (CSTM)
30000127.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle while you control another Plant monster. All Battle Damage you take from battles involving your Plant monsters is also inflicted to your opponent.

30000128.name: Takriminos (CSTM)
30000128.desc: If "Umi" is on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Takriminos" once per turn this way.

30000129.name: Guard Penalty (CSTM)
30000129.desc: Select 1 monster on the field. Each time it is changed to Defense Position this turn, draw 1 card.

30000130.name: Samurai of the Ice Barrier (CSTM)
30000130.desc: If this face-up Attack Position card is changed to face-up Defense Position: Draw 1 card. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy another "Ice Barrier" monster you control instead.

30000131.name: Infinite Cards (CSTM)
30000131.desc: There is no limit to your hand size. Each time cards are removed from your Deck, create cards with the same original name. During the End Phase, add those created cards to the bottom of your Deck.

30000132.name: Yado Karu (CSTM)
30000132.desc: Gains 200 ATK for each card in your hand. When this card is changed from Attack Position to Defense Position, you can place any number of cards from your hand at the bottom of your Deck in any order you desire, then draw that number of cards +1.

30000133.name: Dungeon Worm (CSTM)
30000133.desc: If there is a face-up Field Spell Card or "Labyrinth Wall" on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand).

30000134.name: Yamadron (CSTM)
30000134.desc: Unaffected by other monsters' effects. This card can attack 3 times during each Battle Phase.

30000135.name: Firegrass (CSTM)
30000135.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: Add 1 "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand. Each time you activate "Sparks", while this card is on the field or in the GY, you gain 800 LP.

30000136.name: Root Water (CSTM)
30000136.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 "Umi" from your hand or side of the field to the GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Umi" or "Forgotten Temple of the Deep" in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, then draw 2 cards.

30000137.name: Level Up! (CSTM)
30000137.desc: Send 1 face-up "LV" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck that is listed in the sent monster's text, ignoring its Summoning conditions. (This is treated as a Special Summon by the sent monster's effect.)

30000138.name: Remove Trap (CSTM)
30000138.desc:
Activate 1 of these effects:
● Select 1 face-up Trap Card on the field and banish it.
● Declare 1 Trap Card name; your opponent looks at the cards in their hand and Deck and banishes any card with the declared name among them.

30000139.name: Goblin Pothole Squad (CSTM)
30000139.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, Trap Cards cannot be activated, also, shuffle all "Mole" monsters from your opponent's hand and side of the field into the Deck. "Trap Hole" Trap Cards cannot be activated when a monster is Summoned, except "Dark Trap Hole".

30000140.name: Hero Flash!! (CSTM)
30000140.desc: Banish "H - Heated Heart", "E - Emergency Call", "R - Righteous Justice" and "O - Oversoul" from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Elemental HERO" monster from your Deck. All "Elemental HERO" monsters you currently control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects and can attack  directly this turn.

30000141.name: Arcana Force VI - The Lovers (CSTM)
30000141.desc: When this card is Summoned, toss a coin: ● Heads: Unaffected by your opponent's trap effects. This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of an "Arcana Force" monster. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Arcana Force" monster in addition to your Normal Summon or Set. This effect can only be used once per turn. ● Tails: You cannot Tribute Summon "Arcana Force" monsters.

30000142.name: Arcana Force VII - The Chariot (CSTM)
30000142.desc:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
● Heads: Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you can Special Summon that monster to your side of the field.
● Tails: Your opponent gains control of this card.

30000143.name: Arcana Force I - The Magician (CSTM)
30000143.desc:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
● Heads: Unaffected by your opponent's spell effects. Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. Gains 500 ATK for each Spell Counter on it.
● Tails: When a Spell Card is activated, your opponent gains 500 Life Points.

30000144.name: Archfiend's Roar (CSTM)
30000144.desc: Pay 500 Life Points, then target 1 "Archfiend" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

30000145.name: Light Barrier (CSTM)
30000145.desc:
"Arcana Force" monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. During your Standby Phase, toss a coin. If the result is Tails, the following effects are negated until your next Standby Phase:
● When you Summon an "Arcana Force" monster, choose which effect to apply without tossing a coin. If an "Arcana Force" monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle, you gain Life Points equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK.

30000146.name: Island Turtle (CSTM)
30000146.desc: FLIP: During the End Phase of this turn, if you control this face-up card, add 1 "Treasure of Turtle Island" from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000147.name: Treasure of Turtle Island
30000147.desc: Shuffle "Pot of Greed", "Monster Reborn", "Burning Soul", "Cosmic Inspiration" and "Treasure of Turtle Island" from outside the Duel into your Deck, then remove this card from the Duel and draw 1 card.

30000148.name: Mega Thunderball (CSTM)
30000148.desc: You can banish this card from your GY; for the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of Thunder monsters you control by 100.

30000149.name: Ocubeam (CSTM)
30000149.desc: Once per turn: You can flip all face-down monsters your opponent controls face-up (Flip Effects are not activated). You can banish this card from your GY; flip all face-down monsters your opponent controls face-up (Flip Effects are not activated).

30000150.name: An Owl of Luck (CSTM)
30000150.desc: FLIP: Select 1 Spell Card from your Deck and place it on top of your Deck. If "Necrovalley" is on the field, you can add the selected Spell Card to your hand instead.

30000151.name: Tripwire Beast (CSTM)
30000151.desc: Thunder monsters you control gain 300 DEF, also they cannot be destroyed by battle with or by the effects of cards in this card's column. If this card is flipped face-up: Target 1 opponent's monster in this card's column; destroy that target.

30000152.name: Sealmaster Meisei (CSTM)
30000152.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 card in your GY that mentions "Sealmaster Meisei"; add that target to your hand.

30000153.name: Talisman of Spell Sealing (CSTM)
30000153.desc: While you control "Sealmaster Meisei", negate the effects of your opponent's Spell Cards.

30000154.name: Talisman of Trap Sealing (CSTM)
30000154.desc: While you control "Sealmaster Meisei", negate the effects of your opponent's Trap Cards.

30000155.name: Sand Stone (CSTM)
30000155.desc: (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; move that card to the (horizontal) adjacent zone closer to this card. (Quick Effect): You can destroy all opponent's cards  in this card's column. You can only use 1 "Sand Stone" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

30000156.name: Neo Space (CSTM)
30000156.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Neo Spacian" monster, "Chrysalis" monster or "Elemental HERO Neos" from your Deck to your hand. "Neo Spacian" monsters, "Elemental HERO Neos" and all Fusion Monsters that list "Elemental HERO Neos" as a Fusion Material you control gain 500 ATK. Neither player can return Fusion Monsters you control that list "Elemental HERO Neos" as a Fusion Material to the Extra Deck.

30000157.name: Chrysalis Chicky (CSTM)
30000157.desc: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Air Hummingbird" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck; gain 500 Life Points for each "Neo Spacian" card you control.

30000158.name: Chrysalis Larva (CSTM)
30000158.desc: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Flare Scarab" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck; for the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of "Neo Spacian" monsters, "Elemental HERO Neos" and all Fusion Monsters that list "Elemental HERO Neos" as a Fusion Material you control by 200.

30000159.name: Chrysalis Mole (CSTM)
30000159.desc: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Grand Mole" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck; excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, add any "Elemental HERO Neos", "Neo-Spacian" monsters and "Chrysalis" monsters among them to your hand, also shuffle the rest into your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Chrysalis Mole" once per turn.

30000160.name: Chrysalis Pinny (CSTM)
30000160.desc: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Glow Moss" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck; shuffle up to 3 cards (up to 1 each of Monster, Spell, and Trap) from your GY or banishment into the Deck.

30000161.name: Chrysalis Pantail (CSTM)
30000161.desc: You can Tribute this card while "Neo Space" is on the field to Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Dark Panther" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck, then target 1 card you control; return that target to the hand, then you can Normal Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster or 1 "Chrysalis" monster.

30000162.name: Chrysalis Dolphin (CSTM)
30000162.desc: By Tributing this card while "Neo Space" is on the field, Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin" from your hand or Deck. You can shuffle this card from the GY into the Deck, then target 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster in your GY; place it face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell.

30000163.name: Neo-Spacian Dark Panther (CSTM)
30000163.desc: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls or 1 "Neo-Spacian" card on the field; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that target's original name, also replace this effect with that target's original effects (if any).

30000164.name: Single Purchase (CSTM)
30000164.desc: Discard 2 cards; add 1 card from your Deck to your hand.

30000165.name: Megasonic Eye (CSTM)
30000165.desc: Each time your opponent draws a card(s), reveal any, also your opponent cannot use cards with the same name until the end of the turn.

30000166.name: Cross Porter (CSTM)
30000166.desc: You can target 1 monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster or 1 "Elemental HERO Neos" from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Neo-Spacian" monster or 1 "Elemental HERO Neos" from your Deck to your hand.

30000167.name: Volcanic Blaster (CSTM)
30000167.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 "Blaze Accelerator"  card from your hand or side of the field to the GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Blaze Accelerator" card in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, then draw 2 cards.

30000168.name: Volcanic Recharge (CSTM)
30000168.desc: Target 3 "Volcanic" monsters in your GY or banishment; shuffle them into the Deck, then draw 2 cards.

30000169.name: Divine Dragon - Excelion (CSTM)
30000169.desc:
When this card is Normal Summoned, it gets 1 of the following effects for each "Divine Dragon - Excelion" in your Graveyard when this effect resolves (your choice).
●This card gains 1000 ATK.
●If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.
●When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.
●Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects.
●Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects.
●Unaffected by your opponent's Trap effects.
●You take no effect damage.

30000170.name: Amphibious Bugroth (CSTM)
30000170.desc:
"Ground Attacker Bugroth" + "Sentinel of the Seas"
Must first be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by Tributing 1 "Ground Attacker Bugroth". Once per turn: You can look at the bottom card of your Deck and place it on the top or bottom of the Deck.

30000171.name: Pragtical (CSTM)
30000171.desc:
"Trakodon" + "Flame Viper"
All Dinosaur-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower monster  in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

30000172.name: Uraby (CSTM)
30000172.desc: All Dinosaur-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK. When your opponent Sets exactly 1 monster (and no other cards): Target that monster; this card attacks it.

30000173.name: Trakodon (CSTM)
30000173.desc: All Dinosaur-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK. If this card is Normal Summoned and it is the first turn of the Duel: Your monsters can attack during the first turn.

30000174.name: Flame Viper (CSTM)
30000174.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if your monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.

30000175.name: Mammoth Graveyard (CSTM)
30000175.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Target 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your GY; toss a coin and if the result is heads, Special Summon it in Attack Position, but negate its effects, or if the result is tails, Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot change its battle position.

30000176.name: Venom Swamp (CSTM)
30000176.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Venom" monster from your Deck to your hand. While this card is face-up on the field, destroy all opponent's monsters with 0 ATK and a Venom Counter on them. Monsters your opponent controls lose 500 ATK for each Venom Counter on them. During each player's End Phase, place 1 Venom Counter on each face-up monster your opponent controls with a Venom Counter on it.

30000177.name: Venom Cobra (CSTM)
30000177.desc: After damage calculation, if this card battled an opponent's monster: Place 1 Venom Counter on the monster it battled. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Add 1 "Venom" card from your Deck to your hand.

30000178.name: Venom Snake (CSTM)
30000178.desc: Once per turn, you can place 1 Venom Counter on 1 monster your opponent controls. (If the target is Set, change it to face-up Defense Position. Flip monsters' effects are not activated.)

30000179.name: Venom Serpent (CSTM)
30000179.desc: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can place 1 Venom Counter on 1 monster your opponent controls.

30000180.name: Venom Burn (CSTM)
30000180.desc: The effects of your opponent's Effect Monsters with Venom Counters are negated. Inflict 500 damage to your opponent each time a monster controlled by your opponent with a Venom Counter(s) on it is destroyed, also negate their effects in the GY.

30000181.name: Gradius (CSTM)
30000181.desc:
Once per turn: You can move this card to an adjacent (horizontal) unoccupied Monster Card Zone, or, if there is a "Gradius' Option" in an adjacent zone that targets this card with its effect, you can move that "Gradius' Option" to an unoccupied Monster Card Zone adjacent to it, then move this card to the zone it occupied before being moved, then, if there was another "Gradius' Option" that targeted this card, move it to the zone this card occupied before being moved. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card to apply the following effect to this card and all "Gradius' Option" that target this card with their effects:
● Destroy the opponent's monster in the Extra Monster Zone in this card's column. If there is none, destroy the opponent's monster in this card's column instead. If there is none, destroy the opponent's Spell/Trap in this card's column instead. If there is none, inflict damage to your opponent equal to half the attack of "Gradius".

30000182.name: Rise of the Snake Deity (CSTM)
30000182.desc: If a face-up "Vennominon the King of Poisonous Snakes" you control is destroyed, except by battle: Special Summon 1 "Vennominaga the Deity of Poisonous Snakes" from your hand or Deck.

30000183.name: Snake Whistle (CSTM)
30000183.desc: If a Reptile-Type monster you control is destroyed. Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Reptile-Type monster from your Deck.

30000184.name: Venom Boa (CSTM)
30000184.desc: Once per turn: You can place 2 Venom Counters on 1 monster your opponent controls. Place 1 Venom Counter on each monster that gets Summoned to your opponent's field.

30000185.name: Dark Scorpion - Gorg the Strong (CSTM)
30000185.desc:
"Don Zaloog" and "Dark Scorpion" monsters you control gain 300 ATK. Your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "Don Zaloog" or "Dark Scorpion" monsters cannot change their battle positions. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the top of the Deck.
● Send the top card of their Deck to the GY.

30000186.name: Solomon's Lawbook (CSTM)
30000186.desc:
Choose 1 of these effects; this card gains that effect while it is face-up on the field.
● Skip your Standby Phase
● During each of your Standby Phases, draw 1 card and skip your next Draw Phase.

30000187.name: Woodland Sprite (CSTM)
30000187.desc: You can banish this card from your GY; for the rest of this Duel, increase the original ATK/DEF of Plant monsters you control by 100.

30000188.name: Dark Scorpion - Chick the Yellow (CSTM)
30000188.desc:
You take no battle damage from battles involving your "Don Zaloog" or "Dark Scorpion" monsters, also they cannot be destroyed by battle with monsters in the same column as one of your "Don Zaloog" or "Dark Scorpion" monsters. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
●Target 1 card on the field; return that target to the hand.
●Look at the top card of their Deck, then return it to the top or bottom of the Deck.

30000189.name: Dark Scorpion - Meanae the Thorn (CSTM)
30000189.desc:
"Don Zaloog" and "Dark Scorpion" monsters you control gain 300 DEF. Your opponent's monsters in the same column as one of your "Don Zaloog" or "Dark Scorpion" monsters must attack, if able. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Add 1 "Don Zaloog" or 1 "Dark Scorpion" card from your Deck to your hand.
● Target 1 "Don Zaloog" or 1 "Dark Scorpion" card in your GY; add that target to your hand.

30000190.name: Don Zaloog (CSTM)

30000191.name: Guardian Grarl (CSTM)
30000191.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Gravity Axe - Grarl", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Gravity Axe - Grarl" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; change its battle position.

30000192.name: Guardian Tryce (CSTM)
30000192.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Twin Swords of Flashing Light - Tryce" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this card is Special Summoned: Your opponent cannot activate face-down Spell or Trap Cards for the rest of this turn.

30000193.name: Guardian Baou (CSTM)
30000193.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Wicked-Breaking Flamberge - Baou" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: It gains 1000 ATK. Negate the effects (including in the GY) of monsters destroyed by battle with "Guardian" monsters you control.

30000194.name: Guardian Elma (CSTM)
30000194.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Butterfly Dagger - Elma", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Butterfly Dagger - Elma" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 appropriate Equip Spell Card in your GY; equip that target to this card. Once per turn: You can target 1 Equip Spell Card or 1 "Guardian" card in your GY; add that target to your hand.

30000195.name: Guardian Ceal (CSTM)
30000195.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Shooting Star Bow - Ceal", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Shooting Star Bow - Ceal" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Equip Spell Card you control that is equipped to this card to the GY to target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target. This card can attack your opponent directly.

30000196.name: Guardian Kay'est (CSTM)
30000196.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. If you control "Rod of Silence - Kay'est", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can reveal 1 "Rod of Silence - Kay'est" in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. "Guardian" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. If an opponent's monster attacks a monster you control: You can make the attack a direct attack instead. This card can attack while it is in Defense Position.

30000197.name: Fusion Gate (CSTM)
30000197.desc: During the Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials mentioned on it from your hand or field. Once per turn: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, then you can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using excavated cards as Fusion Material, also shuffle the rest into your Deck.

30000198.name: Spirit of the Breeze (CSTM)
30000198.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You gain 1000 LP. Once per turn, if you gain LP: Draw 1 card.

30000199.name: Launcher Spider (CSTM)
30000199.desc: When you draw this card: You can reveal it; Inflict 400 damage to your opponent twice. Once per turn: You can inflict 400 damage to your opponent twice.

30000200.name: Amazing Spidermaid
30000200.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can shuffle all cards from your hand into the Deck, then draw that same number of cards. If a card(s) is returned from your hand to your Main Deck: Draw 1 card. Each time you draw a card(s), this card gains 200 ATK/DEF for each.

30000201.name: Destiny HERO - Departed (CSTM)
30000201.desc: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can remove this card from the Duel, then target up to 2 of your banished monsters; return them to the GY.

30000202.name: Destiny HERO - Dunker (CSTM)
30000202.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Destiny HERO" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can send 1 "Destiny HERO" card from your hand to the Graveyard; inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

30000203.name: Cyclon Laser (CSTM)
30000203.desc: You can only equip this card to "Gradius". The equipped monster gains 600 ATK. If the equipped monster attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. You can activate the equipped monster's "once per turn" effects any number of times per turn.
