Once per turn: You can add a number of "Sparks" from outside the Duel to your hand, equal to the number of monsters on your side of the field that are either the equipped monster or "Gradius' Option" targetting the equipped monster with its effect.

30000204.name: Destiny HERO - Dread Servant (CSTM)
30000204.desc: If this card is Summoned: Place 1 Clock Counter on each "Clock Tower Prison" you control. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

30000205.name: D - Formation (CSTM)
30000205.desc: Each time a face-up "Destiny HERO" monster(s) you control is destroyed, place 1 D Counter on this card for each of those monsters. When you Normal or Special Summon a monster during your Main Phase: You can send this card with 1 or more D Counters to the Graveyard; add any number of cards, up to the number of D Counters that were on this card, from your Deck and/or Graveyard to your hand, with the same name as that monster.

30000206.name: Clock Tower Prison (CSTM)
30000206.desc: Place 1 Clock Counter on this card during each of your opponent's Standby Phases. "Destiny HERO" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Clock Counter on this card. While there are 4 or more Clock Counters on this card, you do not take any battle damage. If this card with 4 or more Clock Counters leaves the field: Special Summon 1 "Destiny HERO - Dreadmaster" from your hand or Deck.

30000207.name: Destiny HERO - Double Dude (CSTM)
30000207.desc: This card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 2 "Double Dude Tokens" (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000).

30000208.name: Destiny HERO - Doom Lord (CSTM)
30000208.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish that target. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activate this effect, except with "Destiny HERO" monsters. The banished monster returns to the opponent's side of the field, in the same battle position, during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.

30000209.name: Destiny HERO - Fear Monger (CSTM)
30000209.desc: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster in your GY or banishment, except "Destiny HERO - Fear Monger"; Special Summon that target.

30000210.name: Destiny HERO - Dasher (CSTM)
30000210.desc: If a "Destiny HERO" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 other monster; this card gains 1000 ATK until the End Phase. If this card attacks, change it to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. When you draw a Monster Card during your Draw Phase while this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish this card and reveal the drawn monster; Special Summon it.

30000211.name: Destiny HERO - Blade Master (CSTM)
30000211.desc: During either player's Damage Step, when a "Destiny HERO" monster you control is attacking or being attacked: You can discard this card; all face-up "Destiny HERO" monsters you control gain 300 ATK as long as they remain face-up and 600 ATK until the End Phase.

30000212.name: Destiny HERO - Captain Tenacious (CSTM)
30000212.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can target 1 "Destiny HERO" monster in your GY or banishment, except "Destiny HERO - Captain Tenacious"; Special Summon that target.

30000213.name: Alien Hunter (CSTM)
30000213.desc: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field; place 1 A-Counter on it. (If a monster with an A-Counter battles an "Alien" monster, it loses 300 ATK and DEF for each A-Counter during damage calculation only.) If this card destroys a monster with an A-Counter by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

30000214.name: Volcanic Slicer (CSTM)
30000214.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Pyro monster with 500 or less ATK in your GY; add it to your hand. Each time a card(s) your opponent controls is destroyed by a card effect, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

30000215.name: Volcanic Hammerer (CSTM)
30000215.desc: If you control a face-up "Blaze Accelerator" card, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; send 1 Pyro-Type monster with 500 or less ATK from your hand to the Graveyard, and if you do, destroy that target.

30000216.name: Cycroid (CSTM)
30000216.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 card that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Deck to your hand.

30000217.name: Pair Cycroid (CSTM)
30000217.desc:
"Cycroid" + "Cycroid"
This card can attack your opponent directly. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Add 1 card that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Deck to your hand.

30000218.name: Worm Ugly (CSTM)
30000218.desc: You can target 1 face-up Reptile "Worm" monster you control; change it to face-down Defense Position, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand. When you Tribute Summon a Reptile "Worm" monster by Tributing this card, return this card to your hand.

30000219.name: Photon Generator Unit (CSTM)
30000219.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using cards from your side of the field as Fusion Material, including this card.

30000220.name: Cyber Laser Dragon (CSTM)
30000220.desc:
"Cyber Dragon" + "Photon Generator Unit"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above Fusion Materials. Once per turn: You can destroy 1 card on the field.

30000221.name: Drillroid (CSTM)
30000221.desc: Before damage calculation, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die, excavate that many cards from the top of your Deck, add 1 excavated card that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" to your hand, also shuffle the rest back into the Deck.

30000222.name: Steamroid (CSTM)
30000222.desc: If this card attacks an opponent's monster, this card gains 500 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is attacked by an opponent's monster, this card loses 500 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is sent to the GY by the effect of "Vehicroid Connection Zone": You can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.

30000223.name: Gyroid (CSTM)
30000223.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 "Vehicroid Connection Zone". Once per turn: You can target 1 "Vehicroid Connection Zone" in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, then draw 2 cards. Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

30000224.name: Submarineroid (CSTM)
30000224.desc: This card can attack your opponent directly. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked or was attacked: You can change this card to Defense Position. Once per turn: You can target 1 Spell/Trap that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" in your GY; Set it.

30000225.name: Vehicroid Connection Zone (CSTM)
30000225.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Materials, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by card effects, and its effects cannot be negated.

30000226.name: Super Vehicroid Jumbo Drill (CSTM)
30000226.desc:
"Steamroid" + "Drillroid" + "Submarineroid"
A Fusion Summon of this card can only be conducted with the above Fusion Material Monsters. During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. After damage calculation, if your monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" attacked an opponent's monster: Negate the effects of that monster (including in the Graveyard).

30000227.name: Expressroid (CSTM)
30000227.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can target 2 monsters that mention "Vehicroid Connection Zone" in your GY, except "Expressroid"; add those targets to your hand.

30000228.name: Supercharge (CSTM)
30000228.desc: If all monsters you control are face-up monsters that mention "Vehicroid Connection Zone": Draw 2 cards.

30000229.name: Wonder Garage (CSTM)
30000229.desc: If this face-down card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Deck.

30000230.name: Ambulanceroid (CSTM)
30000230.desc: When a monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" is added from your Graveyard to your hand, you can Special Summon that monster. If this card is sent to the GY: Gain 1000 LP.

30000231.name: Rescueroid (CSTM)
30000231.desc: When a monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can return that monster to its owner's hand. If this card or another monster(s) that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: Gain 500 LP.

30000232.name: Ambulance Rescueroid (CSTM)
30000232.desc:
"Rescueroid" + "Ambulanceroid"
Cannot be Special Summoned except by Fusion Summon. Once per turn, when a monster on your side of the field is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon that monster in Defense Position. If a card(s) that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" is sent to your GY: Gain 500 LP.

30000233.name: Decoyroid (CSTM)
30000233.desc: While this card is face-up on your side of the field, your opponent cannot select a face-up monster as an attack target except "Decoyroid". When a monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" is Normal Summoned to your side of the field: You can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard in Defense Position.

30000234.name: Truckroid (CSTM)
30000234.desc: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Equip the destroyed monster to this card. This card gains ATK equal to the combined ATK of the monsters equipped to it by this effect. When this card is flipped face-up: Add 1 card that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Deck to your hand.

30000235.name: Super Vehicroid - Stealth Union (CSTM)
30000235.desc:
"Truckroid" + "Expressroid" + "Drillroid" + "Stealthroid"
Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up non-Machine monster on the field; equip that target to this card. While equipped with a monster by this effect, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. Your opponent cannot target monsters that mention "Vehicroid Connection Zone" you control with card effects.

30000236.name: Regulus (CSTM)
30000236.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Field Spell Card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Field Spell in your GY; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Regulus" once per turn.

30000237.name: Dancing Fairy (CSTM)
30000237.desc: When you draw this card: You can reveal it; Gain 1000 LP. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You gain 1000 LP.

30000238.name: Sword of Kusanagi (CSTM)
30000238.desc: Equip only to a Spirit monster. During battle, when it attacks a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of the equipped monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. Negate the effects of opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with the equipped monster. When the equipped monster you control is returned to the hand and this card is sent to the Graveyard, return this card to your hand.

30000239.name: Maharaghi (CSTM)
30000239.desc: This card returns to its owner's hand during the End Phase. When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: Look at the top card of your Deck, then return that card to either the top or the bottom of the Deck.

30000240.name: Pikeru's Second Sight (CSTM)
30000240.desc: Your face-up cards can activate their "once per turn" effects that are activated during the Standby Phase up to twice per turn.

30000241.name: Flying Saucer Muusik'i (CSTM)
30000241.desc: If this card is Summoned: Change it to Defense Position. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Alien" card from your Deck to your hand.

30000242.name: UFOroid (CSTM)
30000242.desc: You can return 1 face-up card you control that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" to the hand; Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use this effect of "UFOroid" once per turn. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" from your Deck in face-up Attack Position.

30000243.name: Mystical Elf (CSTM)
30000243.desc: Face-up monsters you control gain 300 ATK.

30000244.name: Elemental HERO Shining Flare Wingman (CSTM)
30000244.desc:
"Elemental HERO Flame Wingman" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman"
Must be Fusion Summoned. Gains 300 ATK for each "Elemental HERO" card in your GY. If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK in the GY. If "Elemental HERO Flame Wingman" was used to Fusion Summon this card, it gains the following effects.
●Your opponent cannot tribute this face-up card on the field, and cannot target it with card effects.
●"Elemental HERO" monsters you control gain 400 ATK/DEF and control of them cannot switch.

30000245.name: Elemental HERO Shining Phoenix Enforcer (CSTM)
30000245.desc:
"Elemental HERO Phoenix Enforcer" + "Elemental HERO Sparkman"
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 300 ATK for each "Elemental HERO" card in your Graveyard. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. If "Elemental HERO Phoenix Enforcer" was used to Fusion Summon this card, it gains the following effects.
●Your opponent cannot tribute this face-up card on the field, and cannot target it with card effects.
●"Elemental HERO" monsters you control gain 400 ATK/DEF and control of them cannot switch.

30000246.name: Iron Chain Blaster (CSTM)
30000246.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Iron Chain" monster you control to the GY; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Level it had on the field x 300, then send 1 card from the top of your opponent's Deck to the GY for every 300 points of damage inflicted.

30000247.name: Cyber Ouroboros (CSTM)
30000247.desc: If this card is banished from your GY: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY; draw 1 card.

30000248.name: Dark Desertapir (CSTM)
30000248.desc: If this card is banished: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Beast-Type monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

30000249.name: Bicorn Re'em (CSTM)
30000249.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Target 1 of your banished Beast-Type Tuner monsters; Special Summon it. A Beast-Type Synchro Monster that was Synchro Summoned using this card as material is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects, unless they target it.

30000250.name: Uni-horned Familiar (CSTM)
30000250.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 Beast monster from your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as a Synchro Material: Target up to 2 cards in either GY; banish them.

30000251.name: Slot Machine (CSTM)
30000251.desc:
Once per turn: You can roll 3 six-sided dice and apply the appropriate effect for each rolled result. If all 3 were the same, this card cannot be destroyed by battle and is unaffected by your opponent's card effects until your next Standby Phase.
●1: Gain 700 LP.
●2: Inflict 700 damage to your opponent.
●3: This card gains 300 ATK/DEF.
●4: You can Special Summon 1 "Robot Token" (Machine-Type/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position, but it cannot declare an attack.
●5: You can select and destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.
●6: Treat the result as 7.
●7: Add 1 "7" from outside the Duel to your hand.
While you control a "Robot Token", your opponent cannot target monsters you control for an attack, except "Robot Tokens".

30000252.name: 7 Completed (CSTM)
30000252.desc: If the equipped monster is a Machine monster, it gains 700 ATK/DEF. Each time a player rolls a die (or dice) because of an effect of the equipped monster, you can choose 1 die result and treat it as 7. When this card in your possession is sent to your GY by an opponent's card effect, or because the equipped monster was sent to your GY by an opponent's card effect: Add 1 "Jackpot 7" from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000253.name: Monster Egg (CSTM)
30000253.desc: Once per turn: You can discard 1 "Polymerization"; roll a six-sided die, then add 1 monster whose Level is lower than or equal to the result from your Deck to your hand.

30000254.name: Dice Re-Roll (CSTM)
30000254.desc: If either player(s) rolls a die (or dice), you can have the player(s) re-roll. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

30000255.name: The Judgement Hand (CSTM)
30000255.desc: When your opponent activates a card or effect while this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; toss a coin and if the result is Heads, negate that effect.

30000256.name: Big Jaws (CSTM)
30000256.desc: During your Main Phase 2 (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; banish it. You can only use this effect of "Big Jaws" once per turn. If this face-up card leaves the field: Special Summon as many monsters banished by this card's effect as possible to their owner's field(s).

30000257.name: Outstanding Dog Marron (CSTM)
30000257.desc: If this card is sent to the GY: Shuffle it into your Deck. If this card is Summoned and there are more than 40 cards in your Deck: Draw a number of cards equal to the difference divided by 10 (rounded down).

30000258.name: Mecha-Dog Marron (CSTM)
30000258.desc: If this card is sent to the GY and there are more than 40 cards in your Deck: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the difference x 100.

30000259.name: Skull Dog Marron (CSTM)
30000259.desc: If there are more than 40 cards in your Deck, this card gains ATK equal to the difference x 100.

30000260.name: Summoner's Art (CSTM)
30000260.desc: Add any number of Normal Monsters with the same name from your Deck to your hand.

30000261.name: Jade Insect Whistle (CSTM)
30000261.desc: Add 1 Level 6 or lower Insect monster from your Deck to your hand.

30000262.name: Snake Rain (CSTM)
30000262.desc: Send up to 4 Reptile monsters from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, add 1 Reptile monster from your GY to your hand, whose Level equals the number of cards sent to the GY this way.

30000263.name: Hydra Viper (CSTM)
30000263.desc: You can discard this card to the GY; add 1 "Venom Swamp" from your Deck to your hand. Cannot declare an attack unless "Venom Swamp" is on the field. This card can attack 3 times during each Battle Phase.

30000264.name: Cyber Summon Blaster (CSTM)
30000264.desc: Each time a Machine monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your side of the field, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each. If you Fusion Summon a Machine Fusion Monster: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy that target.

30000265.name: Counter Counter (CSTM)
30000265.desc: You can activate this card from your hand during your turn. Negate the activation of a Counter Trap Card, and destroy it.

30000266.name: Koa'ki Meiru Tornado (CSTM)
30000266.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru". Once per turn: You can target 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your GY; shuffle it into your Deck, then draw 2 cards.

30000267.name: Field Barrier (CSTM)
30000267.desc:
Choose 1 of these effects; this card gains that effect while it is face-up on the field.
● Monsters you control are unaffected by the effects of your Field Spells
● Monsters your opponent controls are unaffected by the effects of your Field Spells
Field Spells you control are unaffected by other cards' effects.

30000268.name: Natural Disaster (CSTM)
30000268.desc: The effects of your opponent's Effect Monsters with Fog Counters are negated. Inflict 500 damage to your opponent each time a monster controlled by your opponent with a Fog Counter(s) on it is destroyed, also negate their effects in the GY.

30000269.name: Fog Control (CSTM)
30000269.desc: Target 1 face-up monster on the field; send 1 "Cloudian" monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, place Fog Counters on that monster equal to the Level of the sent monster. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Cloudian" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Fog Control" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

30000270.name: Tyr of the Nordic Champions (CSTM)
30000270.desc: Cannot declare an attack unless you control another "Nordic" monster. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 "Nordic" monster from your hand or GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Nordic" monster you control; it is treated as a Tuner.

30000271.name: Flamvell Guard (CSTM)
30000271.desc: All face-up "Flamvell" monsters you control gain 1800 DEF.

30000272.name: Royal Magical Library (CSTM)
30000272.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned. Change this face-down Defense Position card to face-up Defense Position. Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card; draw 1 card.

30000273.name: Skull Knight #2 (CSTM)
30000273.desc: If you control a Level 3 Fiend monster other than "Skull Knight #2", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in Defense Position. You can only Special Summon "Skull Knight #2" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Declare 1 card name; excavate the top card of your deck, and if it is the declared card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, send it to the GY. You can banish this card from your GY; look at the top card of your Deck, then place it on the top or bottom of the Deck.

30000274.name: Mega Ton Magical Cannon (CSTM)
30000274.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves. You can remove 10 Spell Counters on your side of the field; destroy all cards on your opponent's side of the field.

30000275.name: Pitch-Black Power Stone (CSTM)
30000275.desc: Place 1 Spell Counter on this card during each of your Standby Phases. During your turn: You can target 1 other face-up card you control that you can place a Spell Counter on; remove 1 Spell Counter from this card, and if you do, place 1 Spell Counter on that target. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up card you control that you can place Spell Counters on; place 3 Spell Counters on that target.

30000276.name: Neo-Spacian Grand Mole (CSTM)
30000276.desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can return both the opponent's monster and this card to the hand. Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die, excavate that many cards from the top of your Deck, add 1 excavated "Elemental HERO Neos", "Neo-Spacian" monster or "Chrysalis" monster to your hand, also shuffle the rest back into the Deck.

30000277.name: Space Gift (CSTM)
30000277.desc: Draw 1 card for each different "Neo-Spacian" name on the cards you control.

30000278.name: Change Slime (CSTM)
30000278.desc: During your Main Phase: You can declare 1 card name, this card's name becomes the declared name while it is face-up on the field. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

30000279.name: Neo-Spacian Glow Moss (CSTM)
30000279.desc:
If a "Neo-Spacian" monster you control attacks or is attacked: You can make your opponent draw 1 card and show it, then, based on its type apply this effect.
●Monster: End the Battle Phase of this turn.
●Spell: You can change the attack to a direct attack instead.
●Trap: Change the attacking monster to Defense Position.

30000280.name: Dark King of the Abyss (CSTM)
30000280.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished cards; toss a coin and if the result is heads, add that that target to your hand, or, if the result is tails, return it to the GY. You can banish this card from your GY; look at the bottom card of your Deck, then place it on the top or bottom of the Deck.

30000281.name: Black Stego (CSTM)
30000281.desc: During the turn this card is flipped face-up it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects and you take no damage from battles involving it. If this Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: Change this card to face-down Defense Position. If this card is flipped face-up: Gain 200 LP for each "Black" Dinosaur monster in your GY. During the Battle Phase, if this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-up Attack Position. You can only use this effect of "Black Stego" once per turn.

30000282.name: Black Brachios (CSTM)
30000282.desc:
During the turn this card is flipped face-up it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects and you take no damage from battles involving it. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can target 1 Attack Position monster on the field; change that target to face-up or face-down Defense Position. You can only use each of the following effects of "Black Brachios" once per turn.
●During the Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down in the same position, then you can target 1 monster on the field; change it to face-up attack position.
●During the Battle Phase, if this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-up Attack Position.

30000283.name: Black Ptera (CSTM)
30000283.desc:
During the turn this card is flipped face-up it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects and you take no damage from battles involving it. If this card is sent from the field to the GY, except by being destroyed by battle: Return it to the hand. If this card is flipped face-up: You can add 1 "Black" Dinosaur monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Black Ptera" once per turn.
●During the Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down in the same position.
●During the Battle Phase, if this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-up Attack Position.

30000284.name: Black Veloci (CSTM)
30000284.desc:
During the turn this card is flipped face-up it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects and you take no damage from battles involving it. If this card attacks an opponent's monster, this card gains 400 ATK during the Damage Step only. If this card is attacked by an opponent's monster, this card loses 400 ATK during the Damage Step only. You can only use each of the following effects of "Black Veloci" once per turn.
●During the Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down in the same position, then you can change all other monsters you control to the same position and rearrange the face-down monsters in your Main Monster Zones.
●During the Battle Phase, if this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-up Attack Position.

30000285.name: Black Tyranno (CSTM)
30000285.desc:
During the turn this card is flipped face-up it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects and you take no damage from battles involving it. If the only cards your opponent controls are Defense Position monsters, this card can attack directly. You can only use each of the following effects of "Black Tyranno" once per turn.
●(Quick Effect): You can change this card to face-down in the same position, and if you do, for the rest of this turn, your face-down cards are unaffected by your opponent's card effects.
●During the Battle Phase, if this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change it to face-up Attack Position.

30000286.name: Neo-Spacian Aqua Dolphin (CSTM)
30000286.desc: Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 monster. If you control a monster with ATK greater than or equal to the ATK of the chosen card, destroy the chosen card, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. Otherwise, take 500 damage. Once per turn: You can send 1 other "Neo-Spacian" card from your hand or field to the Deck; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

30000287.name: Trap Eater (CSTM)
30000287.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 face-up Trap Card from the field to the GY.

30000288.name: Mei-Kou, Master of Barriers (CSTM)
30000288.desc: Unaffected by your opponent's Continuous Spell/Trap effects. The activations, effect activations and effects of your cards that mention "Sealmaster Meisei" and your Continuous Spell/Trap Cards cannot be negated. You can Tribute this card and 1 face-up Continuous Spell/Trap on the field; gain 1000 LP.

30000289.name: Chain Whirlwind (CSTM)
30000289.desc: If a card(s) on the field is destroyed by a card effect (except during the Damage Step): Target 2 Spell/Trap Cards on the field; destroy those targets.

30000290.name: Constellar Belt (CSTM)
30000290.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Constellar" monster from your Deck to your hand. The activation of your LIGHT monsters' effects cannot be negated.

30000291.name: White Magician Pikeru (CSTM)
30000291.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Gain 400 LP for each monster you control. Cannot be destroyed by battle during your turn. If you would take damage from a battle involving this card, gain that much LP instead.

30000292.name: Ebon Magician Curran (CSTM)
30000292.desc: Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster they control. While you control a monster with higher ATK than this card, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects or for attacks. If your opponent targets a card(s) you control with a card effect or for an attack: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

30000293.name: Jetroid (CSTM)
30000293.desc: At the time this card is selected as an attack target by an opponent's monster, you can activate Trap Card(s) from your hand. If this card attacks or is attacked, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can shuffle all cards in your GY and banishment that mention "Vehicroid Connection Zone" into the Deck. This card gains 100 ATK for each card shuffled into the Main Deck by this effect.

30000294.name: Patroid (CSTM)
30000294.desc: Once per turn: You can look at 1 face-down card your opponent controls. If your monster that mentions "Vehicroid Connection Zone" is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned from your hand: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; shuffle it into the Deck.

30000295.name: Battle Mania (CSTM)
30000295.desc: Activate only during your opponent's Standby Phase. For the rest of this turn, all monsters your opponent controls are changed to Attack Position (Flip Effects are not activated.) , cannot change their battle positions and must attack, if able.

30000296.name: Mad Dog of Darkness (CSTM)
30000296.desc: If this card is sent to the GY and there are more than 40 cards in your Deck: Gain LP equal to the difference x 100.

30000297.name: Final Ritual of the Ancients (CSTM)
30000297.desc: Shuffle 1 of each "Slifer the Sky Dragon", "Obelisk the Tormentor", and "The Winged Dragon of Ra" from outside the Duel into your Deck, also, after that, you can place 1 "Reshef the Dark Being" from your hand or GY face-up in its owner's Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell.

30000298.name: Reshef the Dark Being (CSTM)
30000298.desc:
Unaffected by card effects while face-up in the Spell & Trap Zone. While this card is (anywhere) face-up on the field, negate the effects of face-up Level 4 or lower DARK monsters you control with an original ATK of 2000 or more. During your Main Phase, while this card is (anywhere) on the field: You can attach 1 Divine-Beast monster from your hand or GY to this card. During your Main Phase, if this card is in the Spell & Trap Zone: You can Special Summon this card (This is treated as a Ritual Summon). When Ritual Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Once per turn, by discarding 1 Spell Card from your hand, take control of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of this turn. This Ritual Summoned card gains 500 ATK/DEF for each material attached to it and gains the following effects based on the original names of the cards attached to it:
●"Slifer the Sky Dragon": Unaffected by your opponent's trap effects. If this card battles an opponent's monster, negate the effects of that monster that would prevent monsters from being destroyed by battle.
●"Obelisk the Tormentor": Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each, also, after that, it can make a direct attack if able.
●"The Winged Dragon of Ra": Unaffected by your opponent's spell effects. Once per turn: You can pay all your LP; this card gains original ATK/DEF equal to the amount of LP paid.
You cannot lose the Duel.

30000299.name: Magical Conveyor Belt
30000299.desc: Once per turn, during your End Phase: Send all cards in your hand to the bottom of the Deck, then draw the same number of cards.

30000300.name: Hisuian Lilligant
30000300.desc:
This card is treated as a Normal monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is face-up on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
● Once per turn: You can add 1 monster with the same Level as this card from your Deck to your hand, also, after that, this card gains 500 ATK/DEF and increase this card's Level by 1.

30000301.name: Exodia the Forbidden One (CSTM)
30000301.desc: While this card is in your hand, keep it revealed to your opponent. Once per turn, during your End Phase, if this card is in your hand: Excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a "Forbidden One" card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, place it on the bottom of your Deck. If you have "Right Leg of the Forbidden One", "Left Leg of the Forbidden One", "Right Arm of the Forbidden One" and "Left Arm of the Forbidden One" in addition to this card in your hand, you win the Duel.

30000302.name: Left Arm of the Forbidden One (CSTM)
30000302.desc: While this card is in your hand, keep it revealed to your opponent. During each of your End Phases, while this card is in your hand, gain 200 LP for each "Forbidden One" card in your hand.

30000303.name: Right Arm of the Forbidden One (CSTM)
30000303.desc: While this card is in your hand, keep it revealed to your opponent. During each of your End Phases, while this card is in your hand, inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each "Forbidden One" card in your hand.

30000304.name: Left Leg of the Forbidden One (CSTM)
30000304.desc: While this card is in your hand, keep it revealed to your opponent. Monsters you control gain 200 DEF for each "Forbidden One" card in your hand, as long as this card is in your hand.

30000305.name: Right Leg of the Forbidden One (CSTM)
30000305.desc: While this card is in your hand, keep it revealed to your opponent. Monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each "Forbidden One" card in your hand, as long as this card is in your hand.

30000306.name: The Legendary Exodia Incarnate (CSTM)
30000306.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Forbidden One" monster, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 1000 ATK for each "Forbidden One" monster in your Graveyard. Unaffected by other cards' effects. Negate all card effects activated by your opponent that target 1 or more "Forbidden One" monster(s) in your possession and destroy those cards. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Add 1 "Forbidden One" monster from your Graveyard to your hand. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card for each "Forbidden One" monster in your hand.

30000307.name: Minefield Eruption (CSTM)
30000307.desc: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each face-up "Mine Golem" on your side of the field. After that, destroy all face-up "Mine Golem"(s) on your side of the field, then destroy as many cards your opponent controls as possible, up to twice the number of "Mine Golem" destroyed by this effect.

30000308.name: Petit Moth (CSTM)
30000308.desc: During your Main Phase: You can add 1 card that mentions "Petit Moth" from your Deck to your hand, also, after that, if this card is in Attack Position, change it to Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Petit Moth" once per turn.

30000309.name: Enervating Mist (CSTM)
30000309.desc: Each time a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand and your opponent now has 6 or more cards in their hand, they must discard cards until they have 5 cards in their hand.

30000310.name: Hysteric Fairy (CSTM)
30000310.desc: You can Tribute 1 monster; gain 1000 LP. Each time you gain LP, send the top card of your Deck to the GY.

30000311.name: T.G. Jet Falcon (CSTM)
30000311.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent, also, if it was sent there for the Synchro Summon of a "T.G." monster, add 1 "T.G." monster from your Deck to your hand.

30000312.name: Assault Teleport (CSTM)
30000312.desc: Place 1 "/Assault Mode" monster from your hand on the bottom of your Deck; draw 3 cards.

30000313.name: Night Wing Sorceress (CSTM)
30000313.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Assault Mode Activate" or 1 card that mentions it from your Deck to your hand. You can activate "Assault Mode Activate" the turn it is Set.

30000314.name: A-Team: Trap Disposal Unit (CSTM)
30000314.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: Look at all cards in your opponent's Spell & Trap Card Zones, then you can choose and destroy 1 Trap Card among those. Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's effect.

30000315.name: Ancient Gear Cannon (CSTM)
30000315.desc: Gains 100 ATK/DEF for each Gear Counter on your "Ancient Gear Castle". You can discard this card to the GY; add 1 "Ancient Gear Castle" from your Deck to your hand. If you control "Ancient Gear Castle" (Quick Effect): You can tribute this card; inflict damage to your opponent equal to this card's attack, also, for the rest of this turn, negate the effects of your opponent's Trap Cards.

30000316.name: Ancient Gear Castle (CSTM)
30000316.desc: Each time a monster is Normal Summoned/Set, place 1 Gear Counter on this card. "Ancient Gear" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Gear Counter on this card. You can remove 5 Gear Counter from this card; add 1 "Ancient Gear" from outside the Duel to your hand.

30000317.name: Emergency Assistance (CSTM)
30000317.desc: Special Summon 1 monster from your GY that was destroyed and sent there this turn.

30000318.name: Darksea Float (CSTM)
30000318.desc: If a monster(s) you control is destroyed by a card effect and sent to your GY (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 of those destroyed monsters; add it to your hand.

30000319.name: Darksea Rescue (CSTM)
30000319.desc: If this card is used for a Synchro Summon and sent to the GY: Add all of the monsters that were used for the Synchro Summon from your GY to your hand, except "Darksea Rescue".

30000320.name: Grand Tiki Elder (CSTM)
30000320.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: Add 1 "Mask of" card or 1 "Masked Beast" card from your Deck to your hand.

30000321.name: Ancient Gear (CSTM)
30000321.desc: If you control an "Ancient Gear" card, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in Attack Position. When this card is Special Summoned, you cannot Summon other monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Ancient Gear" monsters.

30000322.name: Pilgrim of the Ice Barrier (CSTM)
30000322.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, you can reveal 1 "Ice Barrier" card among them and add it to your hand, also after that, place any remaining cards on the top of your Deck in any order. "Ice Barrier" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 1900 or more ATK.

30000323.name: Geomancer of the Ice Barrier (CSTM)
30000323.desc: You can discard 1 card and declare 1 Attribute; monsters with that declared Attribute cannot target your "Ice Barrier" monsters for attacks.

30000324.name: Advance Force (CSTM)
30000324.desc: You can Tribute 1 Level 5 or higher monster to Tribute Summon a Level 7 or higher monster. When you Tribute Summon by Tributing exactly 1 monster, the Summoned monster gains the Tributed monster's effects.

30000325.name: Agido (CSTM)
30000325.desc: Oncer per turn: You can roll a six-sided die. Special Summon 1 monster from your GY whose Level is equal to the number rolled. (If the result is 6, you can Special Summon any monster.)

30000326.name: Iron Core Specimen Lab (CSTM)
30000326.desc: "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters you control gain 200 ATK/DEF for each "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your GY and are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's LIGHT and DARK monsters. Once per turn: You can shuffle 2 "Koa'ki Meiru" cards from your GY into your Deck; add 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" card from your Deck to your hand.

30000327.name: Iron Core Immediate Disposal (CSTM)
30000327.desc: Send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from outside the Duel to your GY. If exactly 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster you control (and no other cards) would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

30000328.name: Iron Core Armor (CSTM)
30000328.desc: Equip only to a "Koa'ki Meiru" monster. The equipped monster gains ATK/DEF equal to its Level x 100 and cannot be destroyed during your turn. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, you can send this card to the GY instead. This card's name becomes "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" while in the GY.

30000329.name: Corruption Cell "A" (CSTM)
30000329.desc:
Place 1 A-Counter on 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field. During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Alien" monster.
You can only use each effect of "Corruption Cell "A"" once per turn.

30000330.name: Dust Barrier (CSTM)
30000330.desc: Face-up Normal Monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Trap Cards. The first time each Level 2 or lower monster you control would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed.

30000331.name: Blizzard Warrior (CSTM)
30000331.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster with Ice Counters. When this card attacks a monster, place an Ice Counter on the attack target. If this card destroys a monster by battle: Place an Ice Counter on all monsters your opponent controls. Monsters your opponent controls lose 300 ATK/DEF for each Ice Counter on them.

30000332.name: Gravekeeper's Vassal (CSTM)
30000332.desc: While you control "Necrovalley", this card can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: For the rest of the Duel, increase all damage your opponent takes by your "Dark Room of Nightmare" or your "Gravekeeper" cards by 100.

30000333.name: Gravekeeper's Curse (CSTM)
30000333.desc: If this card is Summoned: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent. If this card declares an attack: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent. If this card is sent to the GY: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent. Once per turn, during the End Phase, while this card is in the GY: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent, also, after that, if you control "Necrovalley": Inflict 100 damage to your opponent.

30000334.name: Koa'ki Meiru Ice (CSTM)
30000334.desc: During each of your End Phases, destroy this card unless you send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the GY. During the turn this card is Normal Summoned, "Koa'ki Meiru" monsters you control cannot be destroyed. Once per turn: You can reveal 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" in your hand; destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field.

30000335.name: Koa'ki Meiru Valafar (CSTM)
30000335.desc: You can Tribute Summon this monster by Tributing 1 "Koa'ki Meiru" monster. If this card would be destroyed, you can send 1 "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" from your hand to the GY instead. Each time "Iron Core of Koa'ki Meiru" is sent to your GY, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each.

30000336.name: Pumprincess the Princess of Ghosts (CSTM)
30000336.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During each Standby Phase, place 1 Pumpkin Counter on this card. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each Pumpkin Counter on this card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
Your opponent cannot target your "Pumpking the King of Ghosts" with card effects. Level 6 or higher Zombie monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's activated effects, unless they target them.

30000337.name: Pumpking the King of Ghosts (CSTM)
30000337.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ]
During each Standby Phase, place 1 Pumpkin Counter on this card. All Zombie monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF for each Pumpkin Counter on this card.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
During each Standby Phase, increase this card's ATK by 10%. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

30000338.name: Throwstone Unit (CSTM)
30000338.desc: While you control a face-up Rock monster, this card cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. You can tribute 1 Rock monster you control, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

30000339.name: Tyhone #2 (CSTM)
30000339.desc:
When you activate "Sparks": Activate 1 of these effects:
● Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.
● Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

30000340.name: Cybernetic Zone (CSTM)
30000340.desc: Target 1 face-up Machine monster you control; banish that target until the End Phase. When that monster is returned to the field, double its ATK. During the End Phase of your next turn, destroy it.

30000341.name: Vylon Matter (CSTM)
30000341.desc: Select 3 Equip Spell Cards in your Graveyard. Return them to the Deck and draw 1 card, then you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

30000342.name: Arsenal Robber (CSTM)
30000342.desc: Excavate the top 6 cards of your Deck. Add any Equip Spells among them to your hand, also shuffle the rest into your Deck.

30000343.name: Fairy of the Spring (CSTM)
30000343.desc: Target 1 Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

30000344.name: Morale Boost (CSTM)
30000344.desc: Each time you equip an Equip Spell Card, gain 1000 LP. Monsters you control gain 200 ATK for each card equipped to them.

30000345.name: Dragunity Partisan (CSTM)
30000345.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Winged Beast "Dragunity" monster from your hand, then equip it with this card. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

30000346.name: Double Snare (CSTM)
30000346.desc: Target 1 Trap Card in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand.

30000347.name: Chain Healing (CSTM)
30000347.desc: Gain 500 LP. If a card is activated as Chain Link 4 or higher while this card is in the GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Chain Healing" once per turn.

30000348.name: Chain Detonation (CSTM)
30000348.desc: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If a card is activated as Chain Link 4 or higher while this card is in the GY: You can add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Chain Detonation" once per turn.

30000349.name: Tornado (CSTM)
30000349.desc: Target 2 Spell/Trap Cards on the field; toss a coin for each and destroy them if their respective result is Heads.

30000350.name: Vanity's Call (CSTM)
30000350.desc: Activate only as Chain Link 4 or higher. Negate the activation and effects of your opponent's cards in the same Chain, and destroy them.

30000351.name: Spirit Caller (CSTM)
30000351.desc: If a Chain of Link 4 or higher resolves: You can Special Summon 1 "Skull Servant" from outside the Duel.

30000352.name: Disk Magician (CSTM)
30000352.desc: This card can attack your opponent directly. While your opponent controls a monster, any Battle Damage they take from battles involving this card is halved. Once per turn, at the start of your Battle Phase: Special Summon this card from your Spell & Trap Zone to your Main Monster Zone in its same column. Once per turn, at the end of your Battle Phase: Move this card to your Spell & Trap Zone in its same column. (It is treated as a Continuous Spell. If the zone is occupied, destroy the occupying card.)

30000353.name: Thousand-Eyes Idol (CSTM)
30000353.desc: If this face-up card on the field is used for a Ritual or Fusion Summon: Draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Thousand-Eyes Idol" once per turn.

30000354.name: Vampire Lady (CSTM)
30000354.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 Zombie monster with less DEF than this card from your Deck to your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Look at their Deck and send 1 card from it to the GY.

30000355.name: Vampire Lord (CSTM)
30000355.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 Zombie monster with less DEF than this card from your Deck to your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Look at their Deck and send 1 card from it to the GY. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase after this card in your possession was destroyed and sent to your GY by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card from the GY.

53790608.name: Quantum Cube
53790608.desc: Add 1 "Cubic" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

53790609.name: Crimson Nova the Dark Cubic King
53790609.desc:
3 "Cubic" monster
Once per turn: You can target 1 "Cubic" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target, ignoring its Summoning conditions. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Fiend-Type monster from your hand.

53790610.name: Eternal Cubic Spell
53790610.desc: Send 1 "Cubic" Spell/Trap Card from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; reveal 3 "Cubic" Spell/Trap Cards from your Deck, your opponent chooses 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest back into your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Eternal Cubic Spell" Twice per turn.

80000016.name: Cyber Soldier
80000016.desc: This card's name becomes "Cyber Ogre" while it is in your hand, GY or on the field.  If you control no monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can Special Summon 1 EARTH "Cyber" monster from your Deck, but negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Cyber Soldier" once per turn. If this card's attack is negated: It gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn.

80000017.name: Cyber Ogre Version 1.0
80000017.desc: This card's name becomes "Cyber Ogre" while it is in your hand or on the field and to "Cyber Dragon" while in the GY. If you control 2 or more EARTH "Cyber" monster you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Cyber Ogre Version 1.0" once per turn this way. If this card is Special Summoned: Add 1 EARTH "Cyber" monster from your Deck to your hand.

80000018.name: Cyber Fortress Ogre
80000018.desc: This card's name becomes "Cyber Ogre" while it is on the field. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 EARTH "Cyber" monster from your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as a Fusion Material for a Fusion Summon: You can target 1 "Cyber Ogre" in your GY; add that target to your hand. If this card's attack is negated: Draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Cyber Fortress Ogre" once per turn.

80000019.name: Cyber Ogre 3
80000019.desc:
"Cyber Ogre" + "Cyber Ogre 2"
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials. When this card attacks, it gains ATK equal to half the ATK of the attack target, during damage calculation only. If your opponent declares an attack or targets a card on your side of the field with a card effect: You can Tribute 1 "Cyber Ogre"; destroy up to 3 cards on the field.

80000020.name: Terramerization
80000020.desc: Banish the Fusion Material Monsters listed on an EARTH Fusion Monster Card from your side of the field or your Graveyard, and then Special Summon the Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. (This Special Summon is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

80000021.name: Invocation of the Cyber Ogre
80000021.desc: Special Summon 1 "Cyber Ogre" from your Deck or add 1 EARTH "Cyber" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, except the turn it was sent there; set 1 "Byroad Sacrifice" from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Invocation of the Cyber Ogre" per turn.

80000022.name: Underground Cave of the Cyber Ogre
80000022.desc: If an EARTH monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can send 1 EARTH "Cyber" monster from your Deck to the GY instead. "Cyber Ogre", "Cyber Ogre 2", and "Cyber Ogre 3" you control are unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 Machine-Type monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Machine-Type monsters.

90000220.name: D.D. Spell Eater
90000220.desc: When your Opponent Activates a Spell Card or Effect (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card (from your Hand), and if you do, negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card and inflict 200 LP Damage to both Players. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Spell Eater" once per turn. You cannot activate cards or effects during the turn you activate this effect, except of "D.D." cards and effects.

90000221.name: D.D. Trap Eater
90000221.desc: When your Opponent Activates a Trap Card or Effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card and inflict 200 LP Damage to both Players. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Trap Eater" once per turn. You cannot activate cards or effects during the turn you activate this effect, except of "D.D." cards and effects.

90000222.name: D.D. Beast Eater
90000222.desc: When your Opponent Activates a Monster Effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card and inflict 200 LP Damage to both Players. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Beast Eater" once per turn. You cannot activate cards or effects during the turn you activate this effect, except of "D.D." cards and effects.

90000223.name: D.D. Eater of Souls
90000223.desc:
3 Level 1 "D.D." Monsters
Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways, except by the effect of a "D.D." card. When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card, then inflict 400 LP Damage to both Players. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Eater of Souls" once per turn. Each time a "D.D." monster you control inflicts battle or effect damage to your opponent, except "D.D. Eater of Souls", inflict 200 damage to them.

90000224.name: D.D. Power Hungry Beast
90000224.desc: When your opponent declares an attack (Quick Effect):  You can banish this card from your Hand, Field or GY; Negate the attack, then inflict 200 damage to both Players.

90000225.name: D.D.F. - Different Dimension Fusion
90000225.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fiend Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by using monsters from your hand or field as material. If Summoning a "D.D." Fusion Monster this way, you can also banish monsters from your GY as material. If you take effect damage while this card is in your GY: You can add this card from your GY to your hand , then inflict 200 damage to both Players. You can only use this effect of "D.D.F. - Different Dimension Fusion" once per turn.

90000226.name: D.D. Power Surging Beast
90000226.desc:
Cannot be destroyed by battle. If your opponent takes damage by a "D.D." card or effect: This card gains ATK equal to the damage they took. Inflict 100 damage to your opponent each time a face-up "D.D." monster you control is sent to the GY or is Banished. A "D.D." monster that was Fusion Summoned using this card as material gains these effects.
●For each Fusion Material Monster with different name used to Summon this card, it gains 1000 ATK/DEF.
●Cannot be destroyed by battle.

90000227.name: D.D. Demonic Beast
90000227.desc: When your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand, including drawing (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your Hand, Field, or GY; They must banish 1 of those cards, also inflict 200 damage to both players. You can only use this effect of "D.D. Demonic Beast" once per turn. You cannot activate cards or effects during the turn you activate this effect, except of "D.D." cards and effects.

53790570.name: Dark-Eyes Force Dragon
53790570.desc: This Legendary Wyrm is a Powerful destruction macine. It is literally unbeatable, only few have seen this fear inducing creature and have lived long enough to tell the tales. It is said that these wyrms are the natural predators of the "Blue-Eyes White Dragon".

53790571.name: Dark-Eyes Alternative Force Dragon
53790571.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by revealing "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" in your hand. This cards name becomes "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" while on the field or in the GY. If this card is Special Summoned: Target 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster in your GY, except "Dark-Eyes Alternative Force Dragon"; regardless, this card loses 1000 ATK, and if it does, Special Summon that target (if any). This ATK decrease last until the end of this turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. This card cannot attack the turn this effect is activated.

53790572.name: Dark-Eyes Ultimate Force Dragon
53790572.desc:
3 Level 8 "Dark-Eyes" monsters
You opponent cannot target or destroy this card with card effects. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. This card cannot attack directly the turn you activate this effect. During the Main Phase or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster, except "Dark-Eyes Ultimate Force Dragon" from your hand or GY. You can only use each effect of "Dark-Eyes Ultimate Force Dragon" once per turn.

53790573.name: Wyrm Spirit of Power
53790573.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Dark-Eyes" card.)
This card is treated as a Normal Monster while in the hand or GY. If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; banish it. If your opponent controls a monster (Quick Effect): You can tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" from your hand or Deck.

53790574.name: Dark-Eyes Force Spirit
53790574.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
Neither player can Special Summon 2 or more monsters at the same time. Once per turn, when an effect of a card in the GY is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this Synchro Summoned card; Special Summon 1 DARK Wyrm Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck in Defense Position, except "Dark-Eyes Force Spirit", but destroy it during the End Phase of this turn.

53790575.name: Dark-Eyes Shimmering Dragon
53790575.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: Until the end of the next turn, neither player can target Wyrm monsters you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by card effects. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can target 1 Wyrm monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

53790576.name: Dark-Eyes Elder
53790576.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 Level 1 DARK Tuner or 1 Level 1 Wyrm Tuner from your Deck to your hand, except "Dark-Eyes Elder". You can discard this card, then target 1 Effect Monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster from your Deck, except "Dark-Eyes Elder".

53790577.name: Dark-Eyes Blue Shimmer Force Dragon
53790577.desc:
"Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" + "Baby Dragon of Legends"
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when you opponent activated a Spell/Trap, or monster effect: You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If this face-up card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Dark-Eyes" monsters from your hand and/or Deck, ignoring their Summoning conditions.

53790578.name: Baby Dragon of Legends
53790578.desc: If you control a Level 8 or higher monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is sent to the GY: Add 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster from your Deck to your hand.

53790579.name: Dark-Eyes Fusion
53790579.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Wyrm Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monster from your hand or field as Fusion ´Material. If your opponent controls a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, you can also use monsters in your Deck as Fusion Material. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 1 Wyrm Tuner from your hand or GY. You can only activate this effect of "Dark-Eyes Fusion" once per turn

53790580.name: The Dark Stone of Ancients
53790580.desc: Once per turn, during the End Phase, If this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster from your Deck. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of The Dark Stone of Ancients" once per turn.

53790581.name: Dark-Eyes Dragon Nest
53790581.desc: When this card is activated: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck, then you can reveal 1 of them that is a "Dark-Eyes" monster or a card that mentions "Dark-Eyes" monster, and add it to your hand, also place the remaining cards on top of the Deck in any order. If a "Dark-Eyes" monster is Summoned to your field (except during tha Damage Step): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. You can only use each effect of "Dark-Eyes Dragon Nest" once per turn.

53790582.name: Dragon Magic
53790582.desc: Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" from your hand or GY, then Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower DARK Wyrm monster from your Deck. If you control a "Dark-Eyes" monster: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 face-up Spell/Trap your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.

53790583.name: The Hort of Higher Dragons
53790583.desc: Target 1 Level 7 or higher Wyrm monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If a Wyrm monster(s) you control would be destroyed, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

53790584.name: Call to Darkness
53790584.desc: Target 1 Wyrm Normal Monster in your GY; Special Summon it.

53790585.name: A Dragon Sweeping by
53790585.desc: Discard 1 Wyrm Tuner withe 2000 or less ATK; draw 2 cards. You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 Wyrm monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate this effect of "A Dragon Sweeping by" once per turn.

53790586.name: Wyrm Cave
53790586.desc: Discard 1 card; add up to 2 Wyrm monsters with 2000 or more ATK and 3000 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

53790587.name: Dark-Eyes Forceful Dragon
53790587.desc: You can send 1 Level 5 or higher Normal Monster from your hand or Deck to the GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, then increase its Level by 1. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Dark-Eyes Fusion" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark-Eyes Forceful Dragon" once per turn.

53790588.name: Dark-Eyes Force Ghost Dragon
53790588.desc: This card's name becomes "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" while on the field or in the GY. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Dark-Eyes" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Dark-Eyes Force Ghost Dragon". You can only use this effect of "Dark-Eyes Force Ghost Dragon" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Dark-Eyes Force Dragon" you control; inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK. You can only use this effect of "Dark-Eyes Force Ghost Dragon" once per Duel.

53790589.name: Dark-Eyes Galaxy-Wing Dragon
53790589.desc:
2 Level 8 Wyrm monsters
You can only use each of the following two effects of "Dark-Eyes Galaxy-Wing Dragon" once per turn. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls. When a Spell Card or effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, attach that card to this card as material. You can detach 1 material from this card; draw 1 card and reveal it, then if it was a monster, inflict 800 damage to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Dark-Eyes Galaxy-Wing Dragon" up to twice per turn.

27965043.name: Dark Angel - Demon's Core
27965043.desc: If you have exactly 4 DARK Fairy monsters in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: You can target 1 Fairy monster in your GY; Special Summon it as a DARK monster. You can only use each of the following effects of "Dark Angel - Demon's Core" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can discard 1 Fairy monster, then target 1 other DARK Fairy monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but negate its effects. If this card is banished: You can add 1 Ritual Monster or 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck or Banishment to your hand.

33767055.name: Zorc, Darkest Fiend
33767055.desc: Must first be Ritual Summoned with any "Underworld" Ritual Spell. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Underworld" Spell from your Deck to your hand, except a Ritual Spell. Once per turn: You can banish 1 Fiend monster from your GY, then target 1 Fiend monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If this card is banished from the GY: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

33767056.name: Pete, Darkest Fiend of the Legion
33767056.desc: Must first be Ritual Summoned with any "Underworld" Ritual Spell. If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can shuffle 1 Fiend monster from your GY into your Deck, and if you do, Draw 2 cards. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. You can only Special Summon 1 "Pete, Darkest Fiend of the Legion" per turn. If this card is banished from your GY: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand.

33767057.name: Necros, Darkest Fiend
33767057.desc: Must first be Ritual Summoned with any "Underworld" Ritual Spell. Once per turn: You can return 1 Fiend monster from your banishment to your GY, and if you do, target 1 monster your opponent controls; change it to face-down Defense Position. If this card is banished: return up to 3 Fiend monsters from your banishment to your GY, except "Necro, Darkest Fiend.

33767058.name: Bahamut, Dragon of the Darkest Underworld
33767058.desc: This card on the field or in the GY is also treated as a Fiend monster. Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or Banishment) by banishing 2 Fiend monsters from your GY, except "Bahamut, Dragon of the Darkest Fiend". Once per turn: You can banish 2 Fiend monsters from your GY, except "Bahamut, Dragon of the Darkest Underworld"; either add to your hand or send to the GY 1 banished Ritual Spell. If this card is banished from your GY: You can add 1 Level 4 Fiend monster with 1500 ATK from your Deck to your hand.

33767059.name: Shego, Necromancer of the Darkest Underworld
33767059.desc: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing, but its original ATK/DEF become halved. This card can be treated as a Level 4 monster for the Synchro Summon of a Fiend monster. If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Fiend monster from your Deck to the GY.

33767060.name: Witch from the Darkest Underworld
33767060.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by banishing 1 Fiend monster from your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as material for the Synchro Summon of a Fiend monster OR if this card is banished from the GY by the effect or the cost of a Field Spell: You can target 1 Synchro Monster you control; It cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. If this card is Tributed for a Ritual Summon of a Fiend monster, the Ritual Summoned monster cannot be destroyed by card effects.

33767061.name: Soul Reaper from the Darkest Underworld
33767061.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can reveal 1 "Underworld" Spell in your hand; Special Summon 1 Level 4 Fiend monster from your Deck, but it cannot be used as material for a Synchro, Xyz, Fusion, or Link Monster. If this card is banished from your GY: You can add 1 monster from your Banishment to your hand, except "Soul Reaper from the Darkest Underworld". You can only use each effect of "Soul Reaper from the Darkest Underworld" once per turn.

33767062.name: Time Demon from the Darkest Underworld
33767062.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When you Ritual Summon a "Darkest Fiend" monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. If you Ritual Summon exactly 1 "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster with a card effect that requires use of monsters, this card you control can be used as the entire Tribute. If this card is banished from your GY: You can add 1 "Underworld" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Time Demon from the Darkest Underworld". You can only use this effect of "Time Demon from the Darkest Underworld" once per turn.

33767063.name: Darkest Castle from the Underworld
33767063.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 Fiend Tuner Monster from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 monster from your hand and 1 or more monster from your GY, including a Tuner Monster; Special Summon 1 Fiend Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck with a Level equal to the combined Levels of the banished monsters. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.) All Fiend monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF. You can only activate 1 "Darkest Castle from the Underworld" per turn.

33767064.name: Underworld Ritual of Fear
33767064.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster. Tribute monsters from your hand or field, and/or banish Fiend monsters from your GY, then Ritual Summon 1 "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster from your hand whose Level exactly equals the total Levels of those monsters. You can banish this card and 1 Fiend monster from your GY; add 1 "Underworld" Ritual Spell or "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Underworld Ritual of Fear" once per turn.

33767065.name: Underworld Rule of Two
33767065.desc: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster. Tribute monsters from your hand or field, then Ritual Summon 1 "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster from your hand or GY whose Level exactly equals the total Levels of those monsters. You can only use this effect of "Underworld Rule of Two" once per turn. If you control no monsters: You can banish this card and 1 Fiend monster from your GY; add 1 "Underworld" Spell from your Deck to your hand.

33767066.name: Armageddon Temple
33767066.desc:
Add 1 "Underworld" Ritual Spell and 1 "Darkest Fiend" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Underworld" or "Darkest Fiend" monster from your Banishment. You can only use each effect of "Armageddon Temple" once per turn. 
(This card is always treated as a "Underworld" card.)

33767067.name: Eternal Punishment of the Underworld
33767067.desc:
Once per turn, If you control a Fiend Synchro or Ritual Monster: You can activate 1 of the following effects.
●Banish 1 card from your GY; destroy 1 card on the field.
●Special Summon 1 Ritual Monster from your GY, Ignoring its Summoning conditions.
While this card is face-up on the field, all Fiend monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can only control 1 "Eternal Punishment of the Underworld".

33767068.name: Dark Sorceress from the Darkest Underworld
33767068.desc:
1 Fiend Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add 1 "Underworld" Spell from your Banishment to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Underworld" Tuner in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Fiend Ritual Monster. If this card is banished from your GY: You can add 1 "Underworld" Tuner Monster from your Banishment to your hand.

33767069.name: Gorak, Beast from the Underworld
33767069.desc:
1 Fiend Tuner + 1+ Fiend non-Tuner Monster
Must first be Synchro Summoned. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. If this card is banished from your GY by the effect or the cost of the effect of a Ritual Monster: You can target up to 2 cards on the field; destroy them, and if you do, add 1 Ritual Spell and 1 Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only control 1 "Gorak, Beast from the Underworld".

33767070.name: Cerberus Guardian from the Underworld
33767070.desc:
2 Level 8 Fiend monster
Once per turn: You can detach 2 materials from this card; banish all monsters from both Player's GY. If this card is banished from your GY: You can add 1 Level 8 Fiend monster from your Deck to your hand.

61730200.name: Dice Dragon - White
61730200.desc: If you control a card with an effect that requires a die roll, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control; roll a six-sided die, then increase or reduce its Level by the result. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100

61730201.name: Dice Dragon - Water
61730201.desc: Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die twice. Special Summon 1 monster from your hand with a Level equal to the result. If you cannot, discard 1 card. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

61730202.name: Dice Dragon - Wind
61730202.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die twice. Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck with a Level equal to the result. If you cannot, banish 1 monster from your Deck face-down. You can only use this effect of "Dice Dragon - Wind" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

61730203.name: Dice Dragon - Light
61730203.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die twice. Special Summon 1 monster from your GY with a Level equal to the result. If you cannot, banish 1 monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Dice Dragon - Light" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

61730204.name: Dice Dragon - Darkness
61730204.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die twice. The Level of all monsters you currently control become equal to the result. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

61730205.name: Dice Dragon - Fire
61730205.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can roll a six-sided die twice. Fusion Summon 1 Fusion monster from your Extra Deck with a Level equal to the result and use monsters from your hand or field as material. "Dice Dragon" monster in your hand, field, or GY can be used as a substitute for any 1 Fusion Material whose name is mentioned on the Fusion Monster, but the other materials must be correct. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

61730206.name: Dice Dragon - Earth
61730206.desc: If this card is Summoned, while you control a Wyrm Tuner: You can roll a six-sided die twice. Special Summon up to 2 monster from your Deck with a combined Level equal to the result, but negate their effects. You can only use this effect of "Dice Dragon - Earth" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x100.

94898921.name: Dice Deity ONE - Wrath
94898921.desc:
1 monster with a monster effect that requires a die roll
You can roll a six-sided die twice. Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or GY in a zone this card points to with a Level equal or lower than the total result, also you cannot Link Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except a monster with a monster effect that requires a die roll. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: Roll a six-sided die. Your opponent takes damage equal to the result x200. You can only use each effect of "Dice Deity ONE - Wrath" once per turn.

94898922.name: Dice Deity THREE - Greed
94898922.desc: You can target any number of monsters with a monster effect that requires a die roll that have an equal Level to the last die roll; Special Summon this card, and if you do, attach the targets to this card. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then roll a six-sided die, and this card gains ATK equal to the result x 100. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: Roll a six-sided die, and your opponent takes damage equal to the result x 200.

94898923.name: Dice Deity TWO - Gluttony
94898923.desc:
2 monsters, including a monster with a monster effect that requires a die roll
If an effect is activated that involves rolling a die, except "Orgoth the Relentless": You can make the result of the die roll become 2. You can only use this effect of "Dice Deity TWO - Gluttony" once per turn. Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die; increase this card’s Level by the result until the end of this turn. This card gains 500 ATK x its Level. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: Roll a six-sided die, and your opponent takes damage equal to the result x 200.

94898924.name: Dice Deity FIVE - Sorrow
94898924.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters with an effect requires a die roll
You can roll a six-sided die twice. Destroy all monsters with a Level less than or equal to the result, except monsters with an effect that requires a die roll. You can only use this effect of "Dice Deity FIVE - Sorrow" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: Roll a six-sided die, and your opponent takes damage equal to the result x200

90000090.name: Digi-Agumon
