90000090.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Digi" monster from your hand, except "Digi-Agumon". If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Digi" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Digi-Agumon". You can only use each effect of "Digi-Agumon" once per turn.

90000091.name: Digi-Greymon
90000091.desc: If this attacking card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It can immediately make a second attack. If this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the GY: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the GY. If this card is Tributed: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Digi" monster from your hand or GY, except "Digi-Agumon". You can only use this effect of "Digi-Greymon" once per turn.

90000092.name: Digi-Metalgreymon
90000092.desc: If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards or monster effects until the end of the Damage Step. If this card is Tributed: You can draw 1 card.

90000093.name: Digi-Wargreymon
90000093.desc: Must be Special Summoned with a "Digivolve" card, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles a monster: Destroy all of your opponent's Attack Position monsters, then inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed by this effect.

90000094.name: Digi-Gabumon
90000094.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Digi" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 "Digi" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Digi-Gabumon". You can only use each effect of "Digi-Gabumon" once per turn.

90000095.name: Digi-Garurumon
90000095.desc: This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this card is Tributed: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Digi" monster from your hand or GY, except "Digi-Gabumon". You can only use this effect of "Digi-Garurumon" once per turn.

90000096.name: Digi-Weregarurumon
90000096.desc: At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards or monster effects until the end of the Damage Step. If this card is Tributed: You can target 1 card on the field; return it to the hand.

90000097.name: Digi-Metalgarurumon
90000097.desc: Must be Special Summoned with a "Digivolve" card, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. If this card declares an attack, destroy all Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed.

90000098.name: Digi-Koromon
90000098.desc: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 FIRE "Digi" monster, except "Digi-Koromon", from your hand. You cannot declare an attack the turn this effect was activated. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effects: You can add 1 non-FIRE "Digi" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Digi-Koromon" once per turn.

90000099.name: Digi-Tsunomon
90000099.desc: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 WATER "Digi" monster, except "Digi-Tsunomon" from your hand. You cannot declare an attack the turn this effect was activated. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effects: You can add 1 non-WATER "Digi" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Digi-Tsunomon" once per turn.

90000100.name: Digi-Omegamon
90000100.desc:
"Digi-Wargreymon" + "Digi-Metalgarurumon"
Must be Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control (in this case, the Spell Card "Polymerization" is not needed), and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's original ATK & DEF are always 10,000. Unaffected by your opponent's card effects. Cannot be Tributed. When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s) OR activate a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 monster from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the Special Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

90000101.name: Digivolve
90000101.desc: Tribute 1 face-up Level 3 or higher "Digi" monster; Special Summon from your hand or Graveyard 1 "Digi" monster with the same Attribute but 3 Levels higher. You can banish this card from your Graveyard and send 1 "Digi" monster from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Digivolve" once per turn.

90000102.name: Ultra Digivolve
90000102.desc: Tribute 1 face-up Level 3 or higher "Digi" monster; Special Summon from your Deck or GY 1 "Digi" monster with the same Attribute but 3 Levels higher, but negate its effects until the End Phase. You can only activate 1 "Ultra Digivolve" per turn.

90000103.name: Mega Digivolve
90000103.desc: Tribute 1 face-up Level 3 or higher "Digi" monster; Special Summon from your hand, Deck, or GY 1 "Digi" monster with the same Attribute but 3 Levels higher. If your opponent controls more monsters than you, you can activate this card from your hand.

53790190.name: Babyraptor
53790190.desc: If this card is destroyed by a card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or higher Dinosaur Type monster from your Deck. If this card is Normal Summoned:  You can Special Summon 1 Dinosaur Type monster from Your Hand or GY, Except "Babyraptor", but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is banished: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target. You can use each effect of "Babyraptor" only once per turn.

56435359.name: Divine Angel - Azeral
56435359.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435360.name: Divine Angel - Gwenir
56435360.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435361.name: Divine Angel - Elisria
56435361.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435362.name: Divine Angel - Joan
56435362.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435363.name: Divine Angel - Yasou
56435363.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435364.name: Divine Angel - Elder Siegberd
56435364.desc: One of many Divine Angels who has made it his mission to protect the world.

56435365.name: A Realm in the Sky
56435365.desc:
(This card is always treated as "The Sanctuary in the Sky").
Reduce the level of all DIVINE monsters in both players' hands and on the field by 1. All DIVINE monsters gain 200 ATK and DEF

56435366.name: Prayer of Sky
56435366.desc: Discard 1 card; add 2 "Divine Angel" Pendulum Monsters with different names from your Deck to your hand, also, "Divine Angel" cards in your Pendulum Zones cannot be destroyed by card effects until the end of your opponent's next turn after this card has been resolved. You can only activate 1 "Prayer of Sky" per turn. You cannot activate this card if you activated the Pendulum Effect of a "Divine Angel" monster this turn.

70000001.name: Ice Dragon Bedrock
70000001.desc: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher "Ice Dragon" monster from your hand or Deck. Monsters you control, except "Ice Dragon" monsters, cannot attack the turn you activated this effect. While this card is in the GY: You can shuffle 1 "Ice Dragon" monster you control into your Deck; add this card to your hand.

70000002.name: Ice Dragon Frost Meteor
70000002.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Ice Dragon" monster from your hand or Deck. Monsters you control, except "Ice Dragon" monsters, cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

70000003.name: Ice Dragon Crystal Seeker
70000003.desc: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Ice Dragon" monster from your Deck or GY. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 Level 5 or higher "Ice Dragon" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ice Dragon Crystal Seeker" once per turn.

70000004.name: Ice Dragon Giant Biter
70000004.desc: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Ice Dragon" monster: draw 1 card. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; this card gains 200 ATK for each Level 1 "Ice Dragon" monster in your GY.

70000005.name: Ice Dragon Icehorn
70000005.desc: When this card is Summoned: Special Summon 1 Level 1 "Ice Dragon" monster from your hand or Deck. Monsters you control, except "Ice Dragon" monsters, cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. This card gains 200 ATK for each Level 1 "Ice Dragon" monster in your GY.

70000006.name: Ice Dragon Frostwing
70000006.desc: When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of an "Ice Dragon" monster: This card gains 200 ATK for each Level 5 or higher "Ice Dragon" monster you control. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect: negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

70000007.name: Ice Dragon Permafrost
70000007.desc: Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack while you control the same number of "Ice Dragon" monsters as your opponent controls. During your Standby Phase: You can either Tribute 1 "Ice Dragon" monster you control, or Special Summon 1 "Ice Dragon Token" (Dragon/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 100). You can only activate this effect of "Ice Dragon Permafrost" once per turn.

70000008.name: Ice Dragon Shockfrost
70000008.desc: If you control 1 "Ice Dragon" monster: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; it cannot attack, also its effects are negated and it cannot be Tributed. During your opponent's Battle Phase, if 1 of your opponent's monsters declares an attack: You can banish this card from your GY; negate the attack and end the Battle Phase.

70000009.name: Search in the Snowstorm
70000009.desc: Add 1 "Ice Dragon" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard by your opponent's card effect: You can shuffle 1 "Ice Dragon" monster from your hand into your Deck; add this card to your hand. You can only activate one "Search in the Snowstorm" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

70000010.name: Ice Dragon Chills
70000010.desc: Target monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of "Ice Dragon" monsters you control; they cannot attack until the end of this turn, and their effects are negated. If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can activate this card from your hand.

70000011.name: Ice Dragon Token
70000011.desc: This card can be used as an "Ice Dragon Token".

957130008.name: Lightning Wolf

957130009.name: Emberspirit Ignition Dragon

957130010.name: Nightmare Raflesiasis Amaryllis

957130011.name: Darkness Shadow Gargoyle

957130012.name: Whirling Red-Eyed Blue Bird

957130013.name: Gigantic Jelly Fish

957130014.name: Tricky Pyromancy
957130014.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack on a FIRE monster you control: All monsters your opponent controls lose 500 ATK, also inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster they control. A FIRE Trick Monster that uses this card as material gains 200 ATK. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 monster you control; it gains 100 ATK.

957130015.name: Storm Summoning
957130015.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack on a WIND monster you control: Target the attacking monster; return it to the hand. If this card is used as material for the Trick Summon of a WIND Trick Monster: You can target 1 monster on each side of the field; return both to the hand. You can only use 1 "Storm Summoning" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957130016.name: Dark Tricks
957130016.desc: If your opponent targets a DARK monster you control for an attack: You can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower DARK monster from your GY, then change the attack target to that monster. During the End Phase, send the monster Special Summoned by this effect to the GY. If this card is used as material for the Trick Summon of a DARK Trick monster: You can send 1 DARK monster from your Deck to the GY.

957130029.name: Otherworldly Flame
957130029.desc:
Send 1 Trap from your Deck to the GY. If this card is used for a Trick Summon: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Pyro/DARK/Level 7/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) (this card is also still a Trap). While this card is an Effect Monster, it gains the following effects.
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Trick Monster you control; it gains 500 ATK, also it is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects until the End Phase.
● Your opponent cannot target this card for attacks, while you control a Trick Monster.
● This card gains 500 ATK for each different Attribute among your Trick monsters.
● You can declare 1 Attribute; this card's Attribute becomes the declared Attribute.
You can only use each effect of "Otherworldly Flame" once per turn.

957130030.name: Bursting Lights
957130030.desc: All LIGHT monsters gain 500 ATK, also all DARK monsters lose 200 ATK. Once per turn: You can Tribute 1 LIGHT monster; add 1 "Luminous Spark" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is used as material for the Summon of a LIGHT Trick monster: That monster gains 700 ATK until the end of this turn.

957130031.name: Wonders of the Ocean
957130031.desc:
Discard 1 Water Monster; Add 1 "Umiiruka" from your Deck to your hand, also, Set this card instead of sending it to the GY.
If this card is used as material for the Summon of a WATER Trick monster: That monster gains the following effects.
● Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed, you can discard 1 Water monster instead.

957130032.name: Quaking the Earth
957130032.desc:
Change all monsters in this column to face-down Defense Position (if any), also swap the ATK and DEF of all monsters until the End Phase of the next turn, also neither player takes battle damage this turn. If this card is used as material for the Summon of an EARTH Trick monster: That monster gains the following effect:
● If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.
● Each time a Trap Card is activated, this card gains 200 ATK until the End Phase of the fourth turn after this effect resolves (including this turn).

957130034.name: Trick Weapon
957130034.desc: Equip only to a Level 6 or lower Trick Monster. It gains 1500 ATK/DEF.

957130035.name: The Fiendish Demon Empress, Luciela

957130050.name: Devil's deceiver, Drayckula Fraud
957130050.desc:
4 Level 7 Trick monsters
Any battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent is halved. You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 Trap from your GY, and if you do, it can be activated this turn. If a Trap is activated: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. If this card is targeted by a card or effect: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate that effect, and if you do, both players draw 1 card. During your Standby Phase: You can attach 1 card from your hand and 1 card from your GY to this card as material. You can only use each effect of "Devil’s Deceiver, Drayckula Fraud" once per turn.

[ Artwork by: krysfun - https://www.deviantart.com/krysfun ]

23936837.name: Energy Overflow Endbringer of All Thoughts
23936837.desc:
1 Psychic Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
While your opponent has more LP than you do, this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can increase your opponent's LP by 5000; negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. During your Main Phase: You can increase your opponent's LP by 1000; Special Summon 1 "Energy Overflow" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Energy Overflow Endbringer of All Thoughts" once per turn. Any battle damage your opponent takes makes him gain that much LP, instead.

47754026.name: Energy Overflow Yggdrasil the World Tree
47754026.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Psychic monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can increase your opponent's LP by 1000, then if your opponent's LP are 11000 or more, draw 2 cards. (Quick Effect) You can discard 1 card; destroy 1 card your opponent controls, then increase your opponent's LP by 1000. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon up to 2 "Energy Overflow" non-Synchro Monsters from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Energy Overflow Yggdrasil the World Tree" once per turn.

48946404.name: Energy Overflow Chains of Memory
48946404.desc: Special Summon 1 Psychic monster from your GY or banishment. If this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 1 Psychic monster from your banishment into the Deck, and if you do, Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Energy Overflow Chains of Memory" once per turn. Once per turn, during the Standby Phase, while this card is banished: You can increase your opponent's LP by 500.

54465181.name: Energy Overflow Aetherion the Psionic Frame Controller
54465181.desc: If your opponent's LP are higher than yours: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can increase your opponent's LP by 1000; add 1 "Energy Overflow" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, then if you added "Life Energy Overflow!", discard 1 card. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; immediatly after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Psychic Synchro Monster using monsters you control. You can only use each effect of "Energy Overflow Aetherion the Psionic Frame Controller" once per turn.

59675458.name: Overflown Energy
59675458.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Energy Overflow" card.)
Destroy all monsters on the field, then double the LP of both players. You can only activate this card when you control a "Energy Overflow" monster. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Psychic monster from your GY, but its effects are negated until the end of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Overflown Energy" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Overflown Energy" per turn.

60117986.name: Energy Overflow Nova the Cosmic Astroknight
60117986.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster you control that has a level; your opponent gains LP equal to its Original Level x 500, then increase or decrease the Level of that monster by 1. You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 Psychic monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Energy Overflow Nova the Cosmic Astroknight". You can only use this effect of "Energy Overflow Nova the Cosmic Astroknight" once per turn.

61018071.name: Life Energy Overflow!
61018071.desc: When your opponent has 100.000 or more LP: You win the Duel. You can shuffle this card from your hand into the Deck, and if you do, your opponent gains 2000 LP, then draw 1 card.

61134999.name: Energy Overflow Vexon the Neon Blade
61134999.desc: You can target 1 monster on the field; your opponent gains LP equal to the ATK of that monster, then Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Psychic monster in your GY; your opponent gains LP equal to the Original ATK of the target, then Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Energy Overflow Vexon the Neon Blade" once per turn.

73908117.name: Energy Overflow Carion the Battle Borg
73908117.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by increasing your opponent's LP by 1000. If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Psychic monster from your Deck to the GY; your opponent gains LP equal to the Original ATK of the sent monster, then Special Summon 1 "Energy Overflow" monster from your hand, except "Energy Overflow Carion the Battle Borg". When your opponent declares an attack (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Negate the attack, then your opponent gains 2000 LP. You can only use each effect of "Energy Overflow Carion the Battle Borg" once per turn.

81494279.name: Energy Overflow Riez the Comander
81494279.desc: Each time your opponent gains LP, this card gains 500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn. (Quick Effect): You can increase your opponent's LP by 1000; add 1 "Energy Overflow" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Energy Overflow Riez the Comander". You can only use this effect of "Energy Overflow Riez the Comander" once per turn.

90910363.name: Energy Overflow Andra the Stack Overflow
90910363.desc:
1 Psychic Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monster
Once per turn: You can destroy as many other Special Summoned monsters on the field as possible with ATK less than or equal to this card's, then increase your opponent LP for each monster destroyed by 500. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; place it underneath this card. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card underneath this card to the GY; increase your opponent's LP by 3000, then send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the GY.

75458868.name: Evil HERO Sinister Reflect
75458868.desc:
(This card is also always treated as a Rock-type monster)
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Fiend monster. If Special Summoned this way: This card loses 1000 ATK. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. While this card is face-up on the field, "Dark Fusion" can be used as Quick-Play Spell during your opponent's turn, also it can be activated from your hand.

1955839.name: Return of the Evil Smith
1955839.desc: Special Summon 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your GY to either players field, and if you do, gain 1000 LP.

4970987.name: Evil Smith Master - Tomai
4970987.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. Must be Special Summoned (from your GY) by banishing 5 "Evil Smith" monsters you control and/or from your GY, except "Evil Smith Master - Tomai", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponents card effects. Once per turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. (Quick Effect): You can send this card you control to the GY; Special Summon up to 4 Level 6 or lower "Evil Smith" monsters from your GY, ignoring their Summoning Condition. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith Master - Tomai" once per turn.

7581560.name: Forge of Evil
7581560.desc: When this card is activated: Shuffle this card from the field into the Deck, then draw 1 card. While this card is in the GY, all "Evil Smith" monster that are Special Summoned from the GY gain 1000 ATK. If a "Evil Smith" monster(s) would be destroyed: You can banish this card from your GY instead. While this card is in your Banishment: You can return this card to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Forge of Evil" once per turn.

12894167.name: Evil Smith's Ritual
12894167.desc: Send 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Evil Smith" monster from your GY to either players field. You can banish this card from your GY; send 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith's Ritual" once per turn.

18629280.name: Evil Smith Master - Kayenn
18629280.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. Must be Special Summoned (from your GY) by banishing 1 "Evil Smith" monster you control that is Special Summoned from the GY, except "Evil Smith Master - Kayenn", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Evil Smith" monster in your GY; Special Summon it to either players field. If this card is Special Summoned: You can discard all monsters from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can target up to 2 cards on the field; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith Master - Kayenn" once per turn.

19348217.name: The First Evil Smith
19348217.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. You can discard this card; add 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "The First Evil Smith". When a Spell Card or effect you activate resolves, negate that effect, and if you do, or if it did not have an effect, destroy that card.

21863281.name: Evil Smith - Kotetsu
21863281.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. If this card is Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can discard 1 card; Add 1 "Evil Smith" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith - Kotetsu" once per turn.

37432309.name: Evil Smith - Kurutske
37432309.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. If this card is Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can discard 1 card; Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: Draw 2 cards. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith - Kurutske" once per turn.

41592380.name: Evil Smith's Iron Mine
41592380.desc: This cards name becomes "Forge of Evil" while in the GY. When this card resolves: You can send 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your Deck to the GY. All Level 4 or lower FIRE monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Special Summoned monster on the field. Once per turn: You can target 1 FIRE monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except from the GY.

46009231.name: Evil Smith's Blast Furnace
46009231.desc: If "Forge of Evil" is not in your GY: Send 1 "Forge of Evil" and 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your Deck to the GY. If "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it to either players field. You can only activate 1 "Evil Smith's Blast Furnace" per turn.

52972959.name: Evil Smith - Gamil
52972959.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. If this card is Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can discard 1 card; send 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can send 1 Spell Card from your Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith - Gamil" once per turn.

72492645.name: Evil Smith - Girikaku
72492645.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. If this card is Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can discard 1 card from your hand; Send 1 random card from your opponent hand to the GY. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can inflict 200 damage for each "Evil Smith" monster in your GY. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith - Girikaku" once per turn.

74765245.name: Evil Smith Master - Ganken
74765245.desc: Cannot be used as Material. Cannot be Tributed. Must be Special Summoned (from your GY) by banishing 3 "Evil Smith" monsters you control that are Special Summoned from the GY, except "Evil Smith Master - Ganken", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all monsters your opponent controls, and if you do, this card loses 1000 ATK until the End Phase. If this card is Special Summoned, while "Forge of Evil" is in your GY: You can Special Summon up to 3 Level 4 or lower "Evil Smith" monsters from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith Master - Ganken" once per turn.

85088658.name: Evil Smith's Anvil
85088658.desc: If a monster(s) is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Evil Smith" monster from your GY. If this card is destroyed: You can draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Evil Smith's Anvil" once per turn.

54835738.name: A New HERO Appears
54835738.desc: Special Summon 1 "HERO" monster from your Hand or Deck and if you do, you can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only activate 1 "A New HERO Appears" per turn.

90000001.name: Exiled HERO Darkshroud
90000001.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand; Banish 1 card your opponent Controls. If this card is banished from your hand: You can add 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your Deck or that is banished to your hand, except "Exiled HERO Darkshroud". If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Darkshroud" once per turn

90000002.name: Exiled HERO Flame Master
90000002.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand; Draw 2 cards. If this card is banished from your hand: You can target 1 "HERO" monster that is banished, except "Exiled HERO Flame Master" Special Summon that target. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Flame Master" once per turn.

90000003.name: Exiled HERO Aqualancer
90000003.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand; banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand. If this card is banished from your hand: You can target 1 banished "HERO" monster, except "Exiled HERO Aqualancer"; Shuffle that target into your Deck. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Aqualancer" once per turn.

90000004.name: Exiled HERO Glowing Storm
90000004.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand and target 1 card your opponent controls; Return that target to the hand. If this card is banished from your hand: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; Shuffle that target back into the Deck. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Glowing Storm" once per turn.

90000005.name: Exiled HERO Captain Galactus
90000005.desc: This card's name is treated as "Elemental HERO Neos" while face-up on the field. If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand, target 1 monster you control; that monster is unaffected by card effects this turn, except its own. If this card is banished from your hand: You can target 1 monster you control; it can attack your opponent directly this turn. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Captain Galactus" once per turn.

90000006.name: Exiled HERO Light Breaker
90000006.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand, target 1 of your banished Spell/Trap Cards; Add it to your hand. If this card is banished from your hand: Add 1 Spell/Trap Card that specifically lists a "HERO" monster in its card text to your hand. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Light Breaker" once per turn.

90000007.name: Exiled HERO Devil's Nightmare
90000007.desc: If this card is Summoned: you can banish 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your hand; Destroy all Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls. If this card is banished: You can target up to 3 cards in the Graveyards; banish them. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Devil's Nightmare" once per turn.

90000008.name: Exiled HERO Ultimate Inferno
90000008.desc:
1 "Exiled HERO Flame Master" + 2 "HERO" monsters
Must first be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can activate this effect; during the Standby Phase of the next turn, Special Summon 1 "HERO" monster that is banished. When a Spell/Trap Card, or another monster's effect, is activated (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 banished "Exiled HERO" monster into the Deck, negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Exiled HERO Ultimate Inferno" once per turn.

90000009.name: Exiled HERO Shadow Jumper
90000009.desc:
1 "Exiled HERO Darkshroud" + 1 "HERO" monster
Must first be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can banish 1 "HERO" monster from your hand, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of it, but it cannot attack or activate its effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Exile HERO Shadow Jumper" once per turn.

90000010.name: Sanctuary of the Exiled Heroes
90000010.desc: All "Exiled HERO" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn, if a "Exiled HERO" monster is banished from your hand: add 1 "HERO" monster from your Deck to your hand. if this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead. You can only activate 1 "Sanctuary of the Exiled Heroes" per turn.

90000012.name: Exiled HERO coming to the Rescue
90000012.desc: Banish 1 "HERO" monster from your hand; Special Summon 1 "Exiled HERO" monster from your Deck, then add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand. you can only Activate 1 "Exiled HERO coming to the Rescue" per turn. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead.

90000013.name: Forbidden Weapon of Heroes
90000013.desc:
Equip only 1 "HERO" monster with this card. The equipped monster gains 200 ATK/DEF for each of your banished "Exiled HERO" monsters and for each Spell/Trap Card that mentions "Exiled HERO" in its card text. If this card would be sent to the Graveyard, it is Banished instead.
(This card is never treated as a "Forbiddden" card.)

90000014.name: Xtra HERO Claw Lord
90000014.desc:
1 Warrior Monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Normal "HERO" Monster from your hand or Deck.  At the start of the Damage Step, if a "HERO" monster you control battles an opponent's monster: You can discard 1 "HERO" monster; your battling monster gains ATK equal to the discarded monster's ATK until the end of this turn. You can only use the 1st Effect of "Xtra HERO Claw Lord" once per turn.

90000036.name: The True HEROs
90000036.desc: Special Summon 4 Level 4 or lower Normal "Elemental HERO" monsters with different names from your hand, Deck or GY, also You cannot Special Summon monsters vom your Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except "HERO" monsters. You can only activate 1 "The True HEROs" per turn.

80000068.name: Ancient Fairy, Marry
80000068.desc: Once per turn: You can pay 800 LP, add 1 "Ancient" Field Spell Card from your Deck to your hand (except Ancient City - Rainbow Ruins). When this card is sent to the Graveyard, you gain 1000 LP.

80000069.name: Ancient Fairy, Joan
80000069.desc:
If you control 1 "Ancient Fairy" monster, "Ancient Fairy Dragon", or "Ancient Pixie Dragon". you can Special Summon both this and 1 "Ancient Fairy" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Fairy, Joan" once per turn. a LIGHT Synchro Monster that was summoned with this card as a material gains the following effect:
● Cannot be targeted by opponents card effects.

80000070.name: Ancient Fairy, Athena
80000070.desc: If there is a face-up "Ancient" Field Spell Card on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is Normal or Special Summoned, you gain 500 Life Points for each Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard. You can send 1 face-up “Ancient” Field Spell Card you control to the Graveyard to target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; send the targets to the graveyard.

80000071.name: Ancient Fairy, Tethys
80000071.desc: During either player's turn: You can discard this card, then target 1 "Ancient Fairy" monster in your Graveyard; you get LP equal to its ATK. As long as this card is in your Graveyard, if you have more LP than your opponent and you control an "Ancient Fairy" monster, "Ancient Fairy Dragon", or "Ancient Pixie Dragon": You can Special Summon this card, but banish it, when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Fairy, Tethys" once per turn. As long as 1 "Ancient" Field Spell Card is on the field, your opponent cannot activate any Field Spell Cards, and Field Spell Cards cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

80000072.name: Ancient Fairy, Freya
80000072.desc: An ancient fairy who can heal or kill everyone with her mighty magic.

80000073.name: Ancient fairy forest
80000073.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Ancient Fairy" monster from your Deck to your hand. As long as you have more LP than your opponent, Fairy-Type monsters you control gain 500 ATK and DEF. Twice per turn, if you gain LP: Draw 1 card. If this face-up card in the field zone is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Ancient Fairy" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Ancient Fairy Forest" once per turn.

80000074.name: Ancient Fairy Village
80000074.desc: Each time an "Ancient Fairy" monster is Normal or Special Summoned, you gain 500 LP. As long as you control "Ancient Fairy Dragon" or "Ancient Pixie Dragon", monsters your opponent controls cannot declare an attack. If this face-up card is sent from the field zone to the graveyard : Special summon 1 “Ancient Fairy” tokens (Fairy Type / LIGHT / Level 4 / ATK 1500 / DEF 1500) in Defense Position. These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon during the turn they are Special Summoned.

80000075.name: Ancient fairy spring
80000075.desc: "Ancient Fairy Dragon" and "Ancient Pixel Dragon" gain 500 ATK for each "Ancient Fairy" monster in your graveyard. If this face-up card in the field zone is sent to the Graveyard: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.

80000076.name: Ancient Fairy Token
80000076.desc:
Summoned by the effect of "Ancient Fairy Spring".

This monster cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon during the turn it is Special Summoned.

957000005.name: An Spirit Eater's Fiend Tome of Desire
957000005.desc:
Activate 1 of these effects;
● Pay 1000 LP; add 1 "Spirit Eater" or "Fiend Tome" card from your Deck to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn.
● Target 1 face-up monster you control; send 1 "Spirit Eater" monster from your Deck to the GY with a different Level, and if you do, the targeted monster becomes the Level of that sent monster in the GY, until the end of this turn.
● Target 1 "Spirit Eater" monster in your GY, then Tribute 1 monster you control; Special Summon that target.
You can only activate 1 "An Spirit Eater’s Fiend Tome of Desire" per turn.

957000006.name: Fiend Tome of Doom
957000006.desc: Reveal 1 Fiend monster or "Fiend Tome" card in your hand; Fiend monsters you currently control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects, until the end of this turn. Except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; target up to 2 of your banished Fiend monsters; return them to the GY.

957000007.name: An Summoner’s Fiend Tome of Creation
957000007.desc: Special Summon 1 "Fiend Tome Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 1700/DEF 1800). You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Fiend monster from your hand. You can only use 1 effect of "An Summoner’s Fiend Tome of Creation" per turn, and only once that turn.

4881189.name: Triplefire Blossom
4881189.desc: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a FIRE monster: You can target 1 Plant monster in your GY; inflict 400 damage for each card in your GY with the targeted cards Name. During the Main Phase: You can Tribute this face-up card; send 1 FIRE Plant monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate each effect of Tripplefire Blossom" once per turn.

4882880.name: Phoenixian Necroseed
4882880.desc:
(This cards Name becomes "Phoenixian Seed" while on the field or GY.)
If a face-up FIRE Plant Monster you control is destroyed and send to the GY: you can Special Summon this card from your GY. During your Main Phase: you can destroy this face-up card you control; Special Summon 1 FIRE Plant Monster with 0 DEF from your Banishment. You can activate each effect of "Phoenixian Necroseed only once per Turn.

4883476.name: Phoenixian Tree of Eternity
4883476.desc:
1 FIRE Tuner Monster + 1+ Plant non-Tuner Monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: inflict 800 damage to your opponent. If this card is send to the GY; you can target 1 FIRE Plant Monster in your Banishment, return it to your GY. If a face-up FIRE Monster you control is destroyed by a card effect; you can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Phoenixian Tree of Eternity" once per Turn.

4883623.name: Volcano Cactus
4883623.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy this face-up card you control, and if you do, Special Summon 1 FIRE Plant Monster from your GY. If this card is banished: You can send 1 FIRE Monster from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate each effect of "Volcano Cactus" once per turn

4884500.name: Ashes of the World Tree
4884500.desc: Destroy 1 face-up Plant monster you control; send a number of FIRE monsters from your Deck to the GY whose combined level are less than or equal to the level of the destroyed monster. You can only activate 1 "Ashes of the World Tree" per turn.

4884529.name: Pine Grenade
4884529.desc: During your opponent's Battle Phase: You can destroy 1 face-up FIRE monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand of GY in attack position. This card cannot be destroyed by battle, also any battle damage you take from attacks involving this card is halved.

4884532.name: Fractal Bloom Flare
4884532.desc: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each of your banished FIRE monsters, and if you do, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each of your banished Plant monsters. You can only activate 1 "Fractal Bloom Flare" per turn.

4884541.name: Martyr Rose
4884541.desc: If this card is send to the GY by a card effect: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower FIRE Plant monster from your GY, except "Martyr Rose". You can only activate this effect of "Martyr Rose" once per turn.

4884557.name: After the Fires
4884557.desc: Return all FIRE Plant monsters in your banishment to your GY, and if you do, gain 300 LP for each card returned this way. If a FIRE Plant monster you control is destroyed by a card effect: You can banish this card from your GY, draw 1 card. You can only activate each effect of "After the Fires" once per turn.

40406447.name: Grandborg, Silent Guardian of the Forest
40406447.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by a card effect. If a face-up Plant, Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Insect monster you control is destroyed and sent to the GY, while this card is in your hand or GY: You can pay half of your Life Points; Special Summon this card. While this card is face-up on the field, other Plant, Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Insect monster you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. Once per turn, if a monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can reduce this card's ATK by 500 instead. Once per turn, when a monster you control is destroyed by Battle or card effect: You can make this card gain 1000 ATK. You can only control 1 "Grandborg, Silent Guardian of the Forest"

53790732.name: Forest, Gaia the Friece Knight
53790732.desc: If this card is in your hand or Graveyard: You can target 1 Level 7 or higher "Gaia the Friece Knight" monster you control; reduce its Level by 3, and if you do, Special Summon this card. This card is treated as 2 tributs for the tribute summon of a "Gaia the Friece Knight" monster.

53790733.name: Photon, Gaia the Friece Knight
53790733.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is Normal or Special Summoned from the hand: You can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Synchro Material Monster, you can add 1 Spell Card from your Deck to your hand with "Polymerization" or "Fusion" in the card name, except "Diffusion Wave-Motion".

53790734.name: Gaia Knight, the Force of Darkness
53790734.desc:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner Monster.
(This card is always treated as "Gaia the Friece Knight" monster).
During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can target 1 Tuner monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Gaia Knight, the Force of Darkness" once per turn.

53790735.name: Black Galloping Gaia the Dragon Champion
53790735.desc:
1 "Gaia The Friece Knight" monster + 1  Level 7 or lower monster.
This card´s name become "Gaia the Dragon Champion" while it is on the field. If this card is Special summoned:  You can add 1 "Spiral Spear Strike" from your Deck or GY to your hand. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Gaia The Friece Knight" monster from your hand.

53790736.name: Gaia Shadow, the Black Charger
53790736.desc:
2 Level 6 Synchro monster.
At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can attach that monster to this card as a face-up Xyz Material. Once per turn: You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each Xyz Material attached to this card. If this card has "Gaia Knight, the Force of Earth" as an Xyz Material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn: You can detach any number of Xyz Materials from this card; inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each.

368522200.name: Zelves
368522200.desc: A soul, torn from it's previous existence, seeking it's other pieces to reach a new body.

368522201.name: Varulve
368522201.desc: A soul, torn from it's previous existence, seeking it's other pieces to reach a new body.

368522202.name: Xeoxe
368522202.desc: A soul, torn from it's previous existence, seeking it's other pieces to reach a new body.

368522203.name: Hypercosmic Explorer, Gaiez
368522203.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 non-Effect Tuner Monster from your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can tribute 3 non-Effect Tuner monster you control; Special Summon 1 DARK Level 10 Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon).

368522204.name: Gaiezeet, the Reborn Corruption
368522204.desc:
3 non-Effect Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
Must be Synchro Summoned. If this card attacks an opponent's monster, halve the ATK and DEF of all monsters your opponent controls, until the end of this turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect, or is tributed: You can pay half of your LP, also banish 3 non-Effect Tuner Monsters from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Gaiezetas, the Malicious Reality" from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon).

24445567.name: Chemicritter Phos Peacock
24445567.desc:
If you control no monsters or all monsters you control are Gemini Monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the Graveyard. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.
●Once per turn: You can target 1 other Gemini Monster you control; until the end of this turn, treat it as a Effect Monster, and let it gain it's effects, also it gains 500 ATK.

10825682.name: Pot of Poison
10825682.desc: Pay for each card in both player's hand 500 LP; Draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Pot of Poison" per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase, while this card is your GY: You take 500 damage.

15920609.name: Magical Doubling
15920609.desc: Target 1 monster that was Summoned this turn; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as the target from your Hand or GY. You can only activate 1 "Magical Doubling" per turn.

16604248.name: Cat Assassin
16604248.desc:
If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can Special Summon this card. A non-Effect monster that was Synchro Summoned using this card on the field as Material gains this effect.
●Once per turn: You can discard up to 2 cards, then target that many Spell/Traps on the field; destroy them.

20015223.name: Tribute to The Mighty
20015223.desc: Tribute 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, then Special Summon 1 Level 5 or 6 monster from your hand, and if you do, your opponent draws 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Tribute to The Mighty" per turn.

20845818.name: The Golden Cloak
20845818.desc: If you control no cards, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Deck to the GY, except "The Golden Cloak", and if you do, this card's name becomes the sent monster's, then if the sent monster was a Spellcaster, you can add 1 "Magical Doubling" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "The Golden Cloak" once per turn.

24020014.name: Berserk Bear
24020014.desc:
If a card(s) on the field is destroyed: You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when the card was destroyed) or hand (even if not). You can only use this effect of "Berserk Bear" once per turn. While this card is face-up on the field, non-Effect Synchro Monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle. This card gains 200 ATK for each non-Effect Synchro Monster on the field. If this card in your monster zone is destroyed: You can target 1 non-Effect Synchro Monster you control; equip this card to it. A monster equipped with this card gains following effect.
●If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower EARTH Beast monster from your Deck to your hand.

26766486.name: Disassembling Card
26766486.desc:
Target 1 monster on the field; activate following effects based on the Monster typ the target has.
●Xyz: Detach all materials from the target, and if you do, Special Summon as many of the detached monsters to their owners field as possible, then send the target to the GY.
●Synchro: Special Summon as many of the Synchro material monsters used for its Summon from its owners GY to its owners field, then send the target to the GY.
●Fusion: Special Summon as many of the Fusion material monsters used for its Summon from its owners GY to its owners field, then send the target to the GY.
●Link: Special Summon as many of the Link material monsters used for its Summon from its owners GY to its owners field, then send the target to the GY.
●Trick: Return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, set 1 Trap from its owners GY to its owners field.
●Other: Send it to the GY.
You can only activate 1 "Disassembling Card" per turn.

28810264.name: Golem Protector of the Tomb
28810264.desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 3 Level 5 or higher Rock monster from your GY. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can move this card you control to another of your Main Monster Zones. This card gains an effect based on your Main Monster Zone it is in.
●Leftmost: Unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.
●Rightmost: Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects.
●Center: If this card battles a monster with higher ATK than this card: This card gains 3000 ATK.
●Others: Once per turn: You can destroy all other cards on the field, except Rock monsters. You cannot declare an attack the turn you activated this effect.

29594757.name: Grimoire of Duels
29594757.desc: Discard 2 cards; place 1 Continuous Spell from your Deck face-up in your Spell/Trap Zone, but it cannot activate its effects this turn. If a Continuous Spell is destroyed, while this card is in your GY: You can both banish this card and 1 Spell/Trap from your GY; place 1 Continuous Spell from your Deck or GY face-up in your Spell/Trap Zone. You can only use this effect of "Grimoire of Duels" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Grimoire of Duels" per turn.

34372635.name: Lord of Yamimakai
34372635.desc:
1 non-Tuner - 1 Dark Tuner
If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. All monsters your opponent controls lose 300 DEF for each card in your opponent's hand. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; change its battle position.

34904906.name: Cascading Cards
34904906.desc: Both player can discard any number of cards from their hand (min. 1), then both player draw the same amount of cards they discarded, then both player discard all monster(s) drawn by this effect. You can only activate 1 "Cascading Cards" per turn.

50635792.name: Infinite Dark Storm
50635792.desc: You can activate this card when a monster is Summoned. Each time a monster is Normal or Special Summoned, except from the Extra Deck or from underneath this card: place that monster(s) underneath this card. Once per turn: The turn player can Special Summon 1 monster that is placed underneath this card to their side of the field. If this card in the field Zone is destroyed: banish all monsters that are placed underneath this card, and if you do, both player take damage equal to the banish cards x300.

54539906.name: Summoning Gate
54539906.desc: Discard 1 monster; Special Summon 1 monster with the same Level as the discarded card from your hand. You can only activate 1 "Summoning gate" per turn.

60724331.name: Chaos Archfiend Nehemoth
60724331.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can Special Summon this card (from your Pendulum Zone) by banishing 1 LIGHT and 1 DARK monster from your GY. If this card is Special Summoned from your Pendulum Zone it gains this effect.
●When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 card from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Chaos Archfiend Nehemoth" once per turn.
--------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 LIGHT Tuner + 1+ LIGHT non-Tuner OR 1 DARK non-Tuner - 1 Dark Tuner
(This card is also Level -8)
If this card is Synchro Summoned using a LIGHT monster as material it gains these effect.
●This card is treated as a LIGHT monster while face-up on the field.
●You can send 1 DARK monster from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 LIGHT monster from your hand or GY.
If this card is Synchro Summoned using a DARK monster as material it gains this effect.
●You can banish 1 LIGHT monster from your GY; add 1 DARK monster with the same Level from your Deck to your hand, then take 500 damage. You can only use the above effects of "Chaos Archfiend Nehemoth" once per turn. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.

61503231.name: Obsidian Veylthar the Shadowflame Dragon
61503231.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If you take damage from an attack involving this card, or from an opponent's card effect: This card gains ATK equal to the damage you took. You can only use each of the following effects of "Obsidian Veylthar the Shadowflame Dragon" once per turn. You can banish 1 Level 6 or lower Effect Monster from your GY; until the End Phase, this card's name becomes that monster's original name, and replace this effect with that monster's original effects. During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can return cards your opponent controls to the hand, up to the number of excavated monsters, also place the excavated cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. You can banish 1 FIRE and 1 DARK monster from your hand and/or GY; Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field.

63768614.name: Fluff Synchron
63768614.desc: If you control a Tuner Monster or a Synchro Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is used as a Synchro material, you can treat it as a non-Tuner. Once per turn: You can declare a Level from 1 to 7; this card becomes that Level until the end of this turn.

64596448.name: Protocol Knight
64596448.desc:
2 Link-3 Cyberse Link Monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 level 3 or lower Cyberse monster from your deck to your hand, then immediately after this effect resolves Link Summon 1 Cyberse Link Monster from your Extra Deck by using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 Cyberse monster from your hand or GY, then if the Summoned monster was a Link-3 Cyberse Link Monster, destroy 1 card your opponent controls. If this card with no materials is used as material for a Link Summon: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Protocol Knight" once per turn. While this card is face-up on the field, You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Cyberse monsters.

70341932.name: Grave Convergence
70341932.desc: Banish any number of cards from your GY (max. 5), then Special Summon up to that many monster(s) from your GY. You cannot Special Summon monster(s) from the GY the turn you activate this card, also you cannot conduct your Battle Phase this turn.

71140965.name: Empress of the Crimson Serpent

71951548.name: Purple Gadget
71951548.desc: If this card is Summoned: Add 1 "Gadget" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Purple Gadget". You can target 1 "Gadget", "Boot-Up" monster, or "Hole" Trap that is a monster you control; equip this card from your hand or field to that monster you control. If  this card was equipped to a monster by this card's effect: You can Special Summon this equipped card. You can only use this effect of "Purple Gadget" once per turn. The equipped monster gains 1000 ATK. If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, the opponent's monster's effect is negated during the Battle Phase only.

73332779.name: Zombified Drakwurm
73332779.desc: You can discard this card; send 1 Zombie or Fiend monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Zombified Drakwurm". If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can send up to 3 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY for the Synchro Summon of a Zombie or Fiend Synchro Monster: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie or Fiend monster from your GY, except "Zombified Drakwurm". You can only use each effect of "Zombified Drakwurm" once per turn.

75194211.name: Energy Absorption
75194211.desc: Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can place that monster underneath this card, and if you do, gain LP equal to its Level/Rank or Link Rating x 400. During the End Phase: Special Summon 1 monster that lays underneath this card, but negate its effects, also reduce its ATK and DEF to 0. You can only activate 1 "Energy Absorption" per turn.

80000210.name: Rank-Up-Magic Stellar Force
80000210.desc: Target 1 Xyz Monster you control; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Monster with the same Attribute as that Monster you control but up to 2 Ranks higher, by using it as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its material to the Summoned Monster.) You can only Activate 1 "Rank-Up-Magic Stellar Force" per turn.

83487977.name: Owlbear
83487977.desc:
If you control a Tuner Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). A non-Effect monster that was Synchro Summoned using this card on the field as Material gains this effect.
●Once per turn: You can send 1 EARTH Beast monster from your Deck to the GY; Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

84377469.name: God Maju Garzett
84377469.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoed (from your hand) by Tributing up to 5 monsters you control. This card's ATK becomes the combined original ATK of the tributed monsters. Unaffected by your opponent's Monster and Spell effects. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card and target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of that monster until the end of this turn. During the Standby Phase: Both player draw 1 card. At the start of your Main Phase 1: You can target 2 Fiend or Zombie monsters in your GY; Special Summon both of those targets. Immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster using those 2 monsters only. You can only use this effect of "God Maju Garzett" once per turn. Once per turn: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 200 damage for each card destroyed. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 Fiend or Zombie Tuner from your Deck or GY. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Ghost Fusion" from your Deck or GY. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon up to 3 Fiend or Zombie monsters from your hand or GY, but you cannot Special Summon Link Monsters for the rest of this turn, except Fiend or Zombie monsters.

84491563.name: Desert Dweller
84491563.desc:
If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 EARTH Beast monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Desert Dweller" once per turn. A non-Effect monster that was Synchro Summoned using this card on the field as Material gains this effect.
●Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects.

90568142.name: Savage Feral Imp
90568142.desc:
1 Normal Monster + 1 Trap
If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 Normal Monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, send 1 Normal Monster with a different Type and Attribute from your Deck to the GY. This card gains 200 ATK for each Normal Monster in your GY.

95019002.name: Wolfgang, Mercenary of the Last Hunt
95019002.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a Spell. If this card is Summoned: You can discard 1 EARTH monster; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as the discarded card from your Deck, but negate its effects until the end of this turn. When this card destroy a monster by battle: You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each effect of "Wolfgang, Mercenary of the Last Hunt" once per turn.

98995462.name: Pottery Archfiend
98995462.desc:
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Spell that includes an effect that adds a card(s) from the Deck to the hand. If Summoned this way: draw 1 card. This card gains 100 ATK for each card in your hand. If this card destroys a monster by battle: You can activate 1 of these effects;
●Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.
●Destroy up to 2 Spell/Traps your opponent controls.
●Banish up to 2 cards from your opponent's GY.
During the End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned this turn: Return this card to your hand, and if you do, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.

397746851.name: Vile Germs (CSTM)
397746851.desc: Equip only to a Plant-Type monster. Once per turn: You can send 2 cards from outside the Duel to the GY with the same original name as the equipped monster.

666725691.name: Dragon Zombie (CSTM)
666725691.desc: When this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card. This card gains 10% its Original ATK x the number of times it was Special Summoned by its own effect during this Duel.

957130024.name: D.D. Dhampir Duke
957130024.desc:
1 "Vampire" monster + 1+ Trap
(This card is always treated as a "Vampire" card.)
Once per turn, if a Zombie Link Monster(s) points to this card: You can pay 500 LP, then target 1 of those Link Monsters; it and all monsters it points to gain ATK equal to its Link Rating x 500 until the end of your opponent's turn. Twice per turn, if a Trap is activated: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect, and you used 2 or more Traps as material for its Trick Summon: You can Special Summon your banished Level 4 or lower "Vampire" monsters, up to the number of Traps used as material.

{/}

957130025.name: Despairia
957130025.desc:
1+ monsters + 2+ Traps
If you control no "Despairation Tokens": You can Special Summon up to 3 "Despairation Tokens" (Fiend/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1200/DEF 1000) in Attack Position. These Tokens cannot be used as material for a Special Summon that requires materials. You can only use this effect of "Despairia" once per turn. You can Tribute 3 monsters; Special Summon this card from your GY, and if you do, you can target 1 card your opponent controls and destroy it. This card gains effects based on the number of materials used for its Trick Summon:
● 4+: When this card is Trick Summoned: Halve the ATK of all other monsters on the field.
● 5+: If this card is destroyed by battle: Double the ATK of all monsters you control.
● 6+: This card is unaffected by your opponent’s card effects.

{/}

957130026.name: Despairation Token
957130026.desc:
This card can be used as a "Despairation Token".

if used for another Token apply thats Tokens Type/Attribute/Level/ATK/DEF.

957130027.name: Reproductive Virus
957130027.desc: During your opponent's Main Phase 1: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 500 ATK. Once per Chain, During your Main Phase 1: You can Set this card from your GY and 1 "Reproductive Virus" from your Deck, but banish this card when it leaves the field.

957130039.name: Attack Commander, Lodrian
957130039.desc:
1 Effect Monster + 1 Trap
If this card is Trick Summoned: You can move this card to another Main Monster Zone, then, Place 4 counters on it. When a monster declares an attack: You can remove 1 counter from this card; negate the attack, and if you do, increase this cards ATK by 300. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card as Xyz Material gains this effect:
● This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.

{/}

[ Artwork by: krysfun - https://www.deviantart.com/krysfun ]

957130044.name: Fiendish Blade
957130044.desc:
Target 1 face-up Fiend monster you control; while this card is face-up on the field, apply 1 of the following effects to that target:
● It gains 800 ATK.
● It can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
● It inflicts piercing battle damage.
Once per turn: You can Set this card.

957130054.name: Fiendish Recaller
957130054.desc:
1 Level 3 Fiend monster
You can target 1 other Fiend monster you control and this card; return both to the hand, and if you do, you can Normal Summon that targeted monster. You can only use this effect of "Fiendish Recaller" once per turn.

[ Artwork by: krysfun - https://www.deviantart.com/krysfun ]

957130057.name: Darkflame Magic Dragon
957130057.desc:
3+ Monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: Destroy all cards this card points to, and if you do, inflict 400 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed. Each time a Spell Card is activated: All monsters your opponent controls lose 400 ATK, then this card gains ATK equal to the total ATK lost. If this card is targeted by a card effect: You can have this card lose exactly 1500 ATK, and if you do, negate that effect.

[ Artwork by: krysfun - https://www.deviantart.com/krysfun ]

957130058.name: Rotting Soul Sourcerer
957130058.desc:
3 Zombie monsters
If a Zombie monster(s) is Special Summoned from the GY: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can banish 1 Zombie monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Zombie monster from your hand, and if you do, increase that monster’s ATK by half of the banished monster’s DEF until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of "Rotting Soul Sourcerer" once per turn.

957130060.name: Rainbowscale Dragon
957130060.desc:
If this card is in your hand or GY: You can Tribute 2 Normal Monsters; Special Summon this card, then you can add 1 "Polymerization" from your Deck to your hand. You can destroy 1 card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, this card gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase this turn. If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster with 2400 or less ATK from your hand or Deck. You can only use each effect of "Rainbowscale Dragon" once per turn.
[ Artwork by: Krysfun ]

957130061.name: Fiendish Phantasmia
957130061.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Fiendish Blade" from your Deck to your hand. If "Fiendish Blade" is activated: You can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each of the above effects of "Fiendish Phantasmia" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: Destroy 1 card you control.

957130063.name: Theiyra, The Demon Mistress of Hell
957130063.desc:
1 Level 6 or higher Fiend monster + 1 Trap
Must be either Trick Summoned, or Special Summoned by sending 2 face-up Monster Cards from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY. You can only control 1 "Theiyra". Gains 100 ATK for each monster in the Spell & Trap Zones. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Theiyra, The Demon Mistress of Hell" per turn, and only once that turn:
● Target 1 face-up monster on each side of the field; place them in their owners' Spell & Trap Zones as Continuous Spells.
● Target 1 face-up monster in the Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it to your field.
If this card is in your Spell & Trap Zone, all Fiend monsters you control gain 500 ATK. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can Tribute 1 Level 6 Fiend monster; Special Summon this card from your Spell & Trap Zone.
{/}

957130064.name: Magical Shining High Dragon
957130064.desc:
2 Normal Monsters
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can draw 1 card, reveal it, and if it is a Normal Monster, you can have your opponent reveal 2 cards from their hand. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your hand in Defense Position. You cannot activate this effect the turn this card was sent to the GY. You can target 1 Normal Monster you control; return this banished card to the Extra Deck, and if you do, that target gains 500 ATK. You cannot activate this effect the turn this card was banished.

957140000.name: Dream Wyrm
957140000.desc:
1 Wyrm monster + 1 Illusion monster
All monsters on the field lose ATK and DEF equal to their own Level/Rank × 300. If this card is Special Summoned: You can banish 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your GY; decrease this card’s Level by that monster’s Level.

957140011.name: Sakuretsu Force
957140011.desc:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Shuffle 3 monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck, then the attacking monster loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have "Sakuretsu Armor" in your Graveyard, you can destroy up to 2 Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

[Original Card: Sakuretsu Force]

957140013.name: Aromagmabear
957140013.desc:
Once per turn: You can send up to 2 cards from your hand to the GY; gain 300 LP for each card sent.

[Original Card: Aromagmabear]

957150000.name: Abyss Knight
957150000.desc: If you control a Level 4 DARK Warrior monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Abyss Knight" once per turn this way. Cannot be used as Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon. Cannot be destroyed by battle while in face-up Attack Position. During your Standby Phase: Increase the ATK of all DARK Warrior monsters you control by 300.

957150001.name: Dark Wanderer
957150001.desc: If this card is sent from the Deck to the GY: You can add 1 Level 4 DARK Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Dark Wanderer". You can only use this effect of "Dark Wanderer" once per turn. During your Standby Phase: Increase the ATK of all DARK Warrior monsters you control by 300.

957150002.name: Monster Cell Division
957150002.desc:
Tribute 1 Level 4 or lower monster; Special Summon 2 monsters with the same name as the Tributed monster from your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Monster Cell Division" per turn.

[ Artwork by: RikaCPPart - https://www.deviantart.com/rikacppart ]

957150003.name: Mind MilliSent
957150003.desc:
(Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by returning 1 monster you control to the hand, except "Mind MilliSent". If this card is Summoned: You can pay 1000 LP; shuffle 1 card from either GY into the Deck. You can only use each of the above effects of "Mind MilliSent" once per turn. If this card is used as Synchro Material: Banish the other materials.

[ Artwork by: krysfun - https://www.deviantart.com/krysfun ]

957300000.name: Destruction Eye
957300000.desc: Target 1 monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. Once per Chain, when your monster is destroyed by a card effect while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card as a Normal Monster (Psychic/DARK/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap.) If Summoned this way, banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is destroyed by a card effect while treated as a monster: You can target 1 monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use 1 "Destruction Eye" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957300001.name: Intriguing Malice
957300001.desc: After damage calculation, when this card battles an opponent's monster: You can destroy that monster, also destroy this card.

957300002.name: Floating Malice
957300002.desc: A floating eye that seeks destruction and rebirth, forming a chaotic reality of endless cycles.

38739816.name: Drexia, the Overpowered Being
38739816.desc: You can discard your entire hand, except this card (min. 1); Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when you activated this effect) or hand (even if not). this effect cannot be negated. If this card is Special Summoned: Destroy all other cards on the field. Unaffected by your opponent's card effects. Gains 1000 ATK and DEF for each Equip Card equipped to this card. Once per turn: you can add 1 Equip Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. Once per turm: you can discard 1 card; draw 1 card. If your opponen's monster attacks a monster you control, the attacking monster loses 1000 ATK during Damage Step only. When a Spel/Trap or monster effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can send 1 face-up Equip Card you control to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.  for each Equip Card equipped to this card, it gains 1 addational attack each Battle Phase. Each time this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 Warrior monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can send 1 Warrior monster from your Deck to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Power Tool" Synchro Monster or 1 Level 7 or 8 Dragon Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck (this is treated as a Synchro Summon.)

65439848.name: Anubis Lord of the Holy Land
65439848.desc: Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned. This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. Unaffected by Spell/Trap Cards and effects. Cannot be destroyed by Battle. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles: It gains 2000 ATK and DEF. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.

65439849.name: Divine Sprinter
65439849.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by revealing a Divine Beast type monster in your hand. You can only Special Summon "Divine Sprinter" once per turn this way. This card can be treted as 1 or 3 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a monster. if this card is sent to the gy: you can add 1 Divine Beast type monster from your Deck to your hand.

65439850.name: The Wicked Avatar - Evolved
65439850.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 3 Monsters, and if you do, it gains ATK equal to the combined original ATK of the Tributed monsters. If this card is Special Summoned: Your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the 2nd turn after this effect's activation. If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "The Wicked Avatar", "The Wicked Dreadroot" or "The Wicked Eraser" from your hand, Deck or GY ignoring its Summoning condition. You can only use each effect of "The Wicked Avatar - Evolved" once per turn.

65439851.name: Strange Fusion
65439851.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Material mentioned on it from your Deck face-down. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Fusion Monsters, the turn you activated this card. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your GY, but negate its Effect, also it cannot be used as Link Material. You can only use each effect of "Strange Fusion" once per turn.

87125958.name: Demonic Slime Avatar
87125958.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 "Metal Reflact Slime" or 1 card that lists either "Metal Reflact Slime" or "The Winged Dragon of Ra". Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is tributed: You can add 1 DIVINE monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. If this card is destroyed by an opponent's card effect: Special Summon this card, then both player draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Demonic Slime Avatar" once per turn.

89340525.name: Gorgonic Eye
89340525.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other DARK Rock monster you control; add 1 DARK Rock monster with the same level from your Deck to your hand, except "Gorgonic Eye". Cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 1500 or more ATK. If a DARK Rock monster you control battles an opponent's monster, after damage calculation: The opponent's monster's ATK become 0.

81234568.name: Gradius Squadron
81234568.desc: Discard 1 card from your hand; Special Summon 1 LIGHT Machine monster with 1200 ATK and 1000 or less DEF from your Deck. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; add 1 LIGHT Machine monster with 1200 ATK and 1000 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Gradius Squadron" once per turn.

4880777.name: Primordial Helios Distill
4880777.desc: Banish 1 "Helios Beast" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Helios Beast" monster from your hand or Deck with a different Attribute, and if you do, it can attack your opponent directly this turn. During your Standby Phase: You can discard 1 "Helios Beast" monster; add this card from your GY to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Primordial Helios Distill" once per turn.

4880779.name: Helios Beast - Aretos the Tin Talon
4880779.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damge to your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Helios" monster from your hand, and if you do, it can attack your opponent directly this turn. If this card is banished: You can target 1 Spell/Trap on the field: destroy that target. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Aretos the Tin Talon" once per turn.

4880788.name: Helios Beast - Salamandra the Steel Breath
4880788.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can send 1 "Helios" card from your Deck to the GY. If this card is banished: You can inflict 500 damage to your oppenent. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Salamandra the Steel Breath" once per turn.

4880801.name: Helios Beast - Ouroboros the Bronze Scale
