4880801.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can Draw 2 cards. If this card is banished: You can gain 1000 LP. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Ouroboros the Bronze Scale" once per turn.

4880889.name: Helios Beast - Leon the Lead Roar
4880889.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can change alle face-up "Helios" monster you control to Defense Position. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Leon the Lead Roar" once per turn.

4880903.name: Helios Beast - Moonface the Silver Servant
4880903.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can banish 1 "Helios" monster from your Deck. If this card is banished: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it until the End Phase of the next turn. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Moonface the Silver Servant" once per turn.

4880910.name: Helios Beast - Ekenas the Mercury Fin
4880910.desc: If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: You can add 1 "Helios" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is banished: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls: return that target to the hand. You can only activate each effect of "Helios Beast - Ekenas the Mercury Fin" once per turn.

4880989.name: Helios Beast - Homunculus the Golden Ray
4880989.desc: Gains 500 DEF for each of your banished cards. You can banish 1 "Helios Beast" monster you control or in your GY; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. You do not take Battle Damage from battles involving "Helios" monsters you control. While "Primordial Helios Distill" is in your GY, "Helios" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects, except this card.

4882850.name: Grandiose Helios Convergence
4882850.desc: banish 6 "Helios Beast" monsters with different Attributes from your Deck face-down; Special Summon 1 "Helios - The Primordial Sun" from your hand, Deck or GY, and if you do, it gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Grandiose Helios Convergence" per turn.

4882852.name: Macro Cosmos, Folded
4882852.desc:
Face-up "Macro Cosmos" you control are unaffected by your opponent's card effects. 
*The following effect is currently not scriptable
Cards your opponent owns are unaffected by "Macro Cosmos" you control.

34259423.name: Helios - The Primordial God

34259424.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Helios" card.)
If you control "Macro Cosmos", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). "Helios" monsters you control cannot be banished . You can use the following effect of "Primordial Sorcerer" only once per turn. You can tribute this card; Special Summon up to 2 "Helios" monster with different names, except "Primordial Sorcerer" from your hand or Deck.

34259425.name: The Primordial Sun
34259425.desc:
(This card on the field is treated as "Macro Cosmos")
You can activate this card from your hand. If this card is activated: You can add 1 "Helios" monster from your Deck to your Hand. All "Helios" monster you control gain 100 ATK for each banished card. If this card is sent to the GY or banished  as material for a Trick Summon: Each player banishes 3 cards from the top of their Deck (or their entire Deck, if less than 3).

34259426.name: The Primordial Angel
34259426.desc:
1 "Helios" Monster + 2 Traps
(This card is always treated as a "Helios" card.)
Must First be Trick Summoned. This cards ATK/DEF become the number of banished cards x 300. You can only use each of the following effects of "Helios - The Primordial Angel" once per turn. If this card is Trick Summoned: You can banish 1 monster your opponent controls. When a Spell/Trap Card, or another monster's effect, is activated (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 banished card into the Deck, negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. 

{/}

34259427.name: Helios - True Megistus

34259428.name: The Primordial Mother
34259428.desc: (This card is always treated as a "Helios" Card.) (This card is treated as "Helios - The Primordial Sun" while in the Hand, on the Field, or in the GY.) You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). This card cannot be used as Link material. You can tribute this card; take 1 "Macro Cosmos" from your Deck and either activate it or add it to your hand. If this card is send to the GY: you can banish 1 card from your GY; Special summon this card.

70000050.name: Witch's Secret - Fairy Princess
70000050.desc: If this card is Summoned: Send 1 card from the top of your opponent's Deck to the GY for each "Witch's Secret" monster you control. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Witch's Secret - Fairy Princess" once per turn.

70000051.name: Witch's Secret - Fox Girl
70000051.desc: You can destroy 1 monster you control, except "Witch's Secret - Fox Girl" to Special Summon this card (from your hand), and if you do, send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the GY. You can only Special Summon "Witch's Secret - Fox Girl" once per turn this way. If this card is sent to the GY: You can send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Witch's Secret - Fox Girl" once per turn.

70000052.name: Witch's Secret - Silent Nun
70000052.desc:
If you control a "Witch's Secret" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). a monster that was Link Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
●If this card is Link Summoned: You can send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the GY.
You can only use this effect of "Witch's Secret - Silent Nun" once per turn.

70000053.name: Witch's Secret - Seal
70000053.desc: If this card is activated: You can add 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster from your Deck to your hand. Each card send to the GY by the effect of a "Witch's Secret" is banished instead. You can only activate 1 "Witch's Secret - Seal" per turn.

70000054.name: Witch's Secret - Isabel the Great
70000054.desc:
1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Spellcaster monster

If this card leaves the field: Send the top 3 cards of your opponent's Deck to the GY.  If a monster this card points to destroyes a monster by battle: Send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Witch's Secret - Isabel the Great" once per turn.

70000055.name: Witch's Secret & Death Scythe
70000055.desc:
2 Spellcaster monster

You can only use the following effect of "Witch's Secret & Death Scythe" once per turn. You can add 1 "Witch's Secret" monster from your Deck to your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activated this effect.

70000056.name: Witch's Secret & Dark Seduction
70000056.desc:
2 "Witch's Secret" monster
This card gains these effects based on the number of monsters co-linked to this card.
●1+: If a monster co-linked to this card battles your opponent's monster: You can destroy your opponent's monster, and if you do, Send cards equal to the destroyed monsters Level from your opponent's Deck to the GY.
●2: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower LIGHT Spellcaster monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Witch's Secret & Dark Seduction" once per tun.

70000057.name: Witch's Secret - Twilight Queen
70000057.desc:
3+ LIGHT Spellcaster monster
If this card is Link Summoned: Send the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck to the GY. Once per turn, when a monster this card points to activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. Once per turn, When a Spell/Trap card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can destroy 1 monster this card points to, and if you do, negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card.

992278687.name: Hypercosmic Amalgam Dragon
992278687.desc:
Pendulum Effect
Once per turn: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up, and if you do, change this card's Pendulum Scale to the same as that Pendulum Monster's, until the end of this turn.
-------------------------------
Monster Effect
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Hypercosmic Amalgamation". Must either be Ritual Summoned or be Pendulum Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned: You can make your opponent send 1 card on their field to the GY (their choice). If this card declares a direct attack (before the damage calculation): Increase this card's ATK by the number of face-up Pendulum Monsters in your Extra Deck x200. If this card is face-up in your Extra Deck (Quick effect): You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Hypercosmic Amalgam Dragon" once per turn.

172767745.name: Hypercosmic Pathfinder
172767745.desc:
Pendulum Effect
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, until you activated the following effect. ● You can reveal 1 monster in your hand; until the end of this turn, you can Pendulum Summon monsters with the same name. You can only use this Pendulum Effect of "Hypercosmic Pathfinder" once per turn.
-------------------------------
The path to the Hypercosmos stands open... always.

735773360.name: Hypermatter
735773360.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Hypercosmic" Spell.)
Banish the top 3 cards from your Deck; Draw 1 card.

986475125.name: Hypercosmos
986475125.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Hypercosmic" Spell.)
You can only activate 1 "Hypercosmos" per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 "Hypermatter" from your GY; add 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to the hand. You can shuffle 1 "Hypermatter" from your banishment into the Deck; All "Hypercosmic" monsters you currently control gain 1000 ATK until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can only use this effect of "Hypercosmos" once per turn.

957110000.name: Illusory Shadow Ash
957110000.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned from the Deck. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If you take damage from battles involing this card: You can Special Summon 1 Illusion monster from your Deck with ATK less than or equal to the damage you took.

957110001.name: Spirit of Illussions
957110001.desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 Illussion monster from your GY. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. Gains 200 ATK for each Illussion monster you control. Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card.
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)

957110002.name: Illusory Shadow Queen
957110002.desc:
2 monsters, including an Illusion monster
You can only Special Summon "Illussory Shadow Queen(s)" once per turn. If this card battles a monster, neither monster can be destroyed by that battle. You can Tribute 1 Illusion monster this card points to; Special Summon 1 Illusion monster from your hand or GY with a lower Level in Attack Position. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters you control as material. You can target 1 non-Link Illusion monster you control; equip this card from your field or GY to that target as an Equip Spell that gives it 600 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Illusory Shadow Queen" once per turn.

957110003.name: Illusory Shadow Princess
957110003.desc: You can discard this card; Add to your hand 1"Illusory Shadow" monster except "Illusory Shadow Princess" to your Hand. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If a monster this this card battled was not destroyed by that battle reduce it's ATK by 600. Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card.

957110004.name: Illusory Shadow Dancer
957110004.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If this card battles a monster, neither monster can be destroyed by that battle. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Illusory" monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Illusory Shadow Dancer" once per turn.Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card.

957110005.name: Illusory Shadow Kingdom
957110005.desc: Once per turn, if a "Illusory Shadow" monster is destroyed by an monsters effect and sent to your GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Deck that has less ATK than that destroyed monster in the GY. Each time your "Illusory" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Gain the same amount of LP.

957110006.name: Illusory Shadow Executioner
957110006.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. At the end of the Damage Step, when your "Illusory" Monster battles an opponent's monster, but the opponent's monster was not destroyed by the battle: You can destroy that opponent's monster. If this card is in your GY: You can shuffle 1 other Illusory monster from your GY into the Deck/Extra Deck; Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Illusory Shadow Executioner" once per turn. During your End Phase, destroy this card.

957110007.name: Illusory Shadow Caster
957110007.desc: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Monster your opponent controls; Destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Illusory Shadow Caster" once per turn. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap card your opponent controls; Detroy it. During your End Phase: Destroy this card.

957110008.name: Illusory Anomaly
957110008.desc: Discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Deck or GY, but destroy it during the End Phase, also if you do, activate 1 "Illusory Shadow Kingdom" from your Deck or GY. If your opponent activates a monster effect while this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Illusion monster you control; destroy that monster, and if you do, negate the opponent's monster's effect, and if you do that, shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use 1 "Illusory Anomaly" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957110009.name: Illusory Shadow Necromancer
957110009.desc: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If this card is in your GY: You can shuffle this card into the Deck, then target 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster in your GY, except "Illusory Shadow Necromancer"; Special Summon that monster. You can only use this effect of "Illusory Shadow Necromancer" once per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card.

957110010.name: Prince of Illusory Shadows
957110010.desc: You can Special Summon this card by shuffling 2 "Illusory Shadow" monsters from your GY into the Deck. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can send 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn, during your End Phase, pay 500 LP or destroy this card.

957110012.name: Illusory Chaos Creation, Shining Shadow Seith
957110012.desc:
3 "Illusory Shadow" monsters, including a LIGHT and a DARK monster
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)
Must be either Fusion Summoned or Special Summoned by shuffling the above cards from your GY into the Deck. Cannot be used as Fusion Material. You can only Special Summon "Illusory Chaos Creation, Shining Shadow Seith" once per turn from your Extra Deck. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If this card was Fusion Summoned, it is unaffected by other card effects, except during your Draw Phase. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; shuffle 1 Special Summoned monster your opponent controls or 1 monster in their GY into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Illusory Chaos Creation, Shining Shadow Seith" once per turn. Once per turn, during your End Phase: Pay 500 LP, or destroy this card. If this Fusion Summoned card would be destroyed by an opponents card effect: You can place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell instead. Negate the effects of your opponent's cards in this card's column while this card is in your Spell & Trap Zone.

957110013.name: Illusory Fusion
957110013.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)
Fusion Summon 1 "Illusory Shadow" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling the listed Fusion Materials from your hand, field, and/or GY into the Deck, and if you do, it gains the following effect until the end of this turn.
● At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled an opponent's monster, and that monster was not destroyed by that battle: You can destroy that opponent's monster, and if you do, all monsters you control gain 500 ATK.
If this card is in your GY: You can banish it, then target 1 monster in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it. If this card is banished: You can shuffle it into the Deck, then target 1 "Illusory Shadow" Fusion Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, you can destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
You can only activate 1 "Illusory Fusion" per turn, and only once that turn.

957110014.name: Shadows in the Mist
957110014.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Pay 2000 LP and Target that attacking monster; banish it, and if you do, you can send 1 Level 5 or lower "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Deck to the GY, or, if you control an "Illusory Shadow" monster and no "Illusory Shadow Kingdom", you can activate 1 "Illusory Shadow Kingdom" from your Deck or GY instead. If this card is in your GY, and you control "Illusory Shadow Kingdom": You can shuffle 1 other "Illusory Shadow" monster from your GY into the Deck or Extra Deck; Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. While this card is banished: You can shuffle it into the Deck, then target 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster in your GY; place it on top of your Deck.
You can only use 1 "Shadows in the Mist" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957110015.name: Illusion Nightmare Creation
957110015.desc:
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)
Discard 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster; draw 2 cards, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY. While this card is in your GY: You can banish it and discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it, and if you do, Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. While this card is banished: You can shuffle it into the Deck, then target 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster in your GY; place it on top of your Deck.
You can only use 1 "Illusion Nightmare Creation" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957110016.name: Illusory Shadow Master
957110016.desc: If this card is in your hand or GY: You can then target 1 Level 7 or lower "Illusory Shadow" monster you control; you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Illussion Monsters, also,  Special Summon this card, and if you do, this card's Level is reduced by the Level of the targeted monster, also shuffle this card into the Deck if it leaves the field. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using this card you control and "Illusory Shadow" monsters you control as Fusion Materials. You can only use each effect of "Illusory Shadow Master" once per turn.

957110018.name: Heart of Illusions
957110018.desc:
1 "Illusory Shadow" monster
(This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.)

When a monster effect is activated on your opponent's field or in their hand (Quick Effect): Tribute this face-up card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster. You can target 1 non-Link Illusion monster you control; equip this card from your field or GY to that target as an Equip Spell that gives it 600 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Heart of Illusions" once per turn.

957110019.name: Illusory Shadow Night
957110019.desc:
Banish 1 "Illusory Shadow Kingdom" you control until the endphase; Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. If this card is in your GY, and you control "Illusory Shadow Kingdom": You can shuffle 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from you control into the Deck or Extra Deck; Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. While this card is banished: You can shuffle it into the Deck, then target 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster in your GY; place it on top of your Deck.
You can only use 1 "Illusory Shadow Night" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957110020.name: Shadow Dream Land
957110020.desc: (This card is always treated as an "Illusory Shadow" card.) If this card is activated: You can send 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from your hand. Your opponent cannot banish your cards. Each time a card is shuffled into your Deck, place 1 "Illusory Shadow Counter" on this card. All monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each "Illusory Shadow Counter" on the field. Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed: You can move 3 counters from this card to 1 "Illusory Shadow Kingdom" you control, instead.

957110021.name: Illusory Shadow Core
957110021.desc: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can banish this Normal Summoned card until the End Phase of your next turn; add 1 "Illusory Anomaly" from your Deck to your hand.

957110022.name: Illusory Shadow Moonlight Hunter

You can only Special Summon "Illusory Shadow Moonlight Hunter" once per turn this way. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Set 1 "Shadows in the Mist" from your Deck. If you activate an "Illusory Shadow" Trap Card: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then you can Special Summon 1 "Illusory Shadow" monster from your Spell & Trap Zone. During the End Phase, destroy this card.

53790700.name: Inuyasha
53790700.desc: You can special summon this card (from your hand). When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790701.name: Inu - Kagome
53790701.desc: If you controle a "Inu" monster other than "Inu - Kagome", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790702.name: Inu - Miroku
53790702.desc: If you controle a "Inu" monster other than "Inu - Miroku", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by spell/Trap effects. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790703.name: Inu - Sango

During your Main Phase 2, if this card attecked this turn: You can target 1 "Inu" monster in your GY: Special Summon it. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790704.name: Inu - Sesshomaru
53790704.desc: If you conrole a "Inu" monster other than "Inu - Sesshomaru": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Inu - Sesshomaru" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Inu - Sesshomaru" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monster the turn you activate either of this card´s effects, exept "Inu" monsters. When a "Inu" monster you control destroys a monster by Battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100

53790705.name: Inu - Shippou
53790705.desc: If you control a "Inuyasha" or "Inu - Kagome", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card was used as a Synchro Material for the Synchro Summon of a "Inu" monster: Draw 2 cards, then return this card from your GY to your Deck.

53790706.name: Inu - Kikyo

When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790707.name: Inu - Wolfsdemon Koga
53790707.desc:
1 "Inu" Tuner + 1 or more "Inu" none Tuner monster.
During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap Card on the field; that target has its effects negated, until the next Standby Phase. You can only use this effect of "Inu - Wolfsdemon Koga" once per turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Gain 1000 LP for each "Inu" card you control. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790708.name: Inu - Demonking Naraku
53790708.desc:
1 "Inu" Tuner + 1 or more "Inu" none Tuner monster.
Once per turn, during either player's turn, when another monster's effect is activated: You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster, and if you do that, this card gains ATK equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK until the end of this turn. If this card battles a Level 5 or higher monster your opponent controls, during damage calculation: This card gains ATK equal to the current ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling during that damage calculation only. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790709.name: Inu - Kagura of the Wind
53790709.desc:
1 "Inu" Tuner + 1 or more "Inu" none Tuner monster.
If a monster is Synchro Summoned: Draw 2 card. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790710.name: Inuyasha Red Tessaiga
53790710.desc:
1 "Inu" Tuner + 1 or more "Inu" none Tuner monster.
This card's name becomes "Inuyasha" while it is on the field or in the Graveyard. Once per turn: You can destroy as many Special Summoned Effect Monsters on the field as possible with ATK less than or equal to this card's (other than this card), then inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed. When a "Inu" monster you control destroyes a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 200.

53790711.name: Inu - Friendship
53790711.desc: If you control 2 or more "Inu" monsters: You can add 1 "Inu" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Inu - Friendship" once per turn. All Warrior-Type monsters you control gain 200 ATK.

53790712.name: Inu - Rescue
53790712.desc: Target 1 "Inu" monster you control; Special Summon 1 monster with the same name as that monster on the field from your hand or Deck in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Inu - Rescue" per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters during the turn you activate this card, except "Inu" monsters.

53790713.name: Inuyasha Demon Mode
53790713.desc:
2 Level 4 "Inu" monster.
This card's name becomes "Inuyasha" while it is on the field or in the Graveyard. When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster you opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 “Inu” monster from your hand. If this card destroys a monster by battle, it can make a second attack in a row. When a "Inu" monster you control destroys a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

53790714.name: Inu - Wolf demon Ayame
53790714.desc:
2 Level 2 "Inu" monster.
Once per turn, during the Standby Phase: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Inu" monster from your Deck. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect: You can send 1 Warrior-Type monster from your hand or face-up from your field to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, then you can Set it to your field. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 LIGHT monster in your Graveyard; add it to your hand. When a "Inu" monster you control destroys a monster by battle: This card gains ATK & DEF equal to the Level/Rank/Link Rating of the destroyed monster x 100.

60012003.name: Millennium Chain
60012003.desc:
(This card is never treated as a "Millennium" card.)
Send 1 "Iron Chain" monster from your Deck to the GY; Add 1 "Iron Chain" monster or "Poison Chain" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Millenium Chain" per turn.

67786887.name: Iron Chain Hound
67786887.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Iron Chain" monster from your hand, except "Iron Chain Hound", and if you do, send cards equal to the Level of the Summoned monster from the top of your opponents Deck to the GY. You can only use this Effect of "Iron Chain Hound" once per turn.

98574213.name: Iron Chain Minotaur
98574213.desc: If you control no monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand), and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Iron Chain" monster from your Deck, except "Iron Chain Minotaur", then send the top 2 Cards of your opponents Deck to the GY, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Synchro Monster.

38583593.name: Paper Plane of Rage
38583593.desc: You can target 1 face-up "Aitsu", "Soitsu", "Koitsu", or "Doitsu" you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. It gains 2500 ATK. If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, the opponent's monster's effect is negated during the Battle Phase only. You can only control 1 face-up "Paper Plane of Rage".

38583594.name: Paper Plane of Reason
38583594.desc: You can target 1 "Aitsu", "Soitsu", "Koitsu", or "Doitsu" you control; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. The equipped monster cannot be destroyed by battle. At the end of the Damage Step, when the equipped monster attacks an opponent's monster, but the opponent's monster was not destroyed by battle: You can make the ATK of your opponent's monster 0 (even after this card leaves the field or the monster is unaffected by card effects), and if you do, the equipped monster can immediately attack the same monster a second time.

38583595.name: Paper Plane of the Scholar
38583595.desc: You can target 1 face-up "Aitsu", "Doitsu", "Soitsu", or "Koitsu" you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. It gains 1800 ATK. When the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. You can only control 1 odd "Scholar's Paper Plane".

38583596.name: Fairy Storm
38583596.desc: Add 1 Fairy monster from your Deck to your hand.

38583597.name: Itsu Meeting
38583597.desc: Special Summon 1 Fairy-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard.

38583598.name: Paper Plane Assembly
38583598.desc: If "Aitsu", "Soitsu", "Koitsu", or "Doitsu" is on the field: Special Summon 1 "Aitsu", "Soitsu", "Koitsu", "Doitsu", "Paper Plane of Rage", "Paper Plane of Reason", or "Paper Plane of the Scholar" from your hand or Deck.

38583599.name: Holy Sword - Omni-Blade
38583599.desc: Equip only to a Fairy-Type monster. It gains 1200 ATK. While equipped to a monster, it cannot be destroyed by card effects.

93207337.name: Kagemane Thief - Jirokichi
93207337.desc: You can target 1 Spell/trap your opponent controls; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, Destroy that card, also you can set that card to your side of the field, regardless discard 1 card. If this card is discarded: you can add 1 random card from your opponent's hand to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Kagemane Thief - Jirokichi" once per turn.

93207338.name: Kagemane Deamon - Minetsuki
93207338.desc: If you control a "Kagemane" Monster: you can discard 1 other "Kagemane" Monster; Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is discarded: You can Special Summon this card, also discard 1 card. You can only Special Summon "Kagemane Deamon - Minetsuki" once per turn this way.

93207339.name: Kagemane Kunoichi - Kurenai
93207339.desc: You can discard 1 other card, Special Summon this card from your Hand, then if you have no cards in your Hand draw 1 card.  If this card is discarded: You can Destroy 1 card your opponent controls

93207340.name: Kagemane Dragnoid - Madoi
93207340.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "Kagemane" Monster you control, and declare a Level from 1 to 8; it becomes that Level. If this card is dicarded: add 1 "Kagemane" monster, except "Kagemane Dragnoid - Madoi" from your Deck to your Hand. You can only use this effect of "Kagemane Dragnoid - Madoi" once per turn.

93207341.name: Kagemane Shadow - Sakurafubuki
93207341.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Kuransain" card from your Deck to your Hand. You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Kagemane" monster from your GY to your Hand. You can only use each effect of "Kagemane Shadow - Sakurafubuki" once per turn.

93207342.name: Kagemane Kasai Yuza - Teruyoshi
93207342.desc: You can discard 1 card; Special Summon 1 "Kagemane" monster from your hand, except "Kagemane Kasai Yuza - Teruyoshi", then if you Special Summoned a non-FIRE monster, draw 1 card. If this card is discarded: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each monster you control. You can only use each effect of "Kagemane Kasai Yuza - Teruyoshi" once per turn.

93207343.name: Kagemane Chain - Aogita
93207343.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can discard 1 card; Draw 1 card, and if you do, show it, then you can Special Summon it if it is a "Kagemane" monster. If this card is discarded: You can target 1 "Kagemane" monster in your GY, except "Kagemane Chain - Aogita" Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Kagemane Chain - Aogitai" once per turn.

93207344.name: Kagemane Blade Master - Yorihira
93207344.desc:
1 Warrior Type monster + 1 Fiend Type Monster
At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles: it gains 100 ATK for each card in your Hand. If this card destroyes a monster by battle: you can discard 1 card; Special Summon the destroyed monster as a Level 2 Tuner Monster from the GY to your side of the field. You can only use this effect of "Kagemane Blade Master - Yorihira" once per turn. If this card is destroyed and send to the GY: Draw 1 card.

93207345.name: Kagemane Lord - Mujin
93207345.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Kagemane" Monsters
Cannot be destroyed by Monster effects. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card; destroy up to 2 cards on the field. If this Synchro Summoned card is send to the GY: During the End Phase, You can discard 1 card; Special summon this card from your GY then draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed: draw 1 card. You can only use each effect "Kagemane Lord - Mujin" once per turn.

93207346.name: Kagemane Chain Master - Utsuroi
93207346.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Kagemane" Monsters
Cannot be destroyed by Spell Cards and effects. Each time your opponent Special Summons a Monster(s), place 1 Chain Counter on this card. You can remove any number of Chain Counters from this card; Destroy all monster your opponent controls with al Level/Rank equal or lower than the removed Chain Counters. You can only use this effect of "Kagemane Chain Master - Utsuroi" once per turn. If this card is destroyed: draw 1 card.

93207347.name: Kagemane Asobu - Ichinose
93207347.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Kagemane" Monsters
Cannot be destroyed by Trap Cards and effects. If ths card is Special Summoned: shuffel all monster from both players GY into the Deck, then both player draw 1 card. If this card is destroyed: draw 1 card.

93207348.name: Kagemane Yokai Queen -Yaegaki
93207348.desc:
2+ Level 4 Monsters with different Type or Attribute
Once per turn: you can detach 1 material; add 1 "Kuransain" card from your GY to your Hand. If this card is destroyed: draw 1 card for each material it had on the field +1, then discard 2 cards from your Hand or your entire hand if its lower than 2.

93207349.name: Kagemane Ninja - Jiraiya
93207349.desc:
2 Level 7 Monsters with different Attribute
When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then both players discard 1 card (if possible). If this card has a "Ninja" Monster as material it gains following effect:
You can target 1 monster on the field; attach that card to this card as material.
You can only use each effect of "Kagemane Ninja - Jiraiya" once per turn.

93207350.name: Kagemane Mage King - Ooboshi
93207350.desc:
3 Level 8 Monster with different Attribute
Unaffected by other card effects. While this card has material, it can attack a number of times each Battle Phase, up to the number of materials attached to it. When the effect of a discarded monster resolved: you can attach that monster to this card as a material. You can detach all materials from this card; destroy all other cards on the field. You can only use this effect of "Kagemane Mage King - Ooboshi" once per turn.

93207351.name: Kuransain of Power
93207351.desc: Each time a card is discarded place 1 Power Counter on this card. All "Kagemane" monster you control gain 100 ATK for each Power Counter on this card. If this card is destroyed by the effect of your opponent: Draw 1 card for each 2 Power Counter on this card, also your opponent draws the same amount of cards -1. You can only control 1 "Kuransain of Power"

93207352.name: Kuransain of Weakness
93207352.desc: Each time a card is discarded place 1 Weak Counter on this card. All monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK for each Weak Counter on this card. As long as this card is on the field, your opponent can only Special Summon monsters trice per turn. If you control no "Kagemane" monster, destroy this card then both Player draw 1 card. You can only control one "Kuransain of Weakness"

93207353.name: Kuransain of Darkness
93207353.desc: If you control a DARK "Kagemane" monster, Banish 1 card your Opponent controls. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 DARK "Kagemane" monster from your hand or GY, but negate it's effects. You can only use each effect of "Kuransain of Darkness" once per turn.

93207354.name: Kuransain of Storm
93207354.desc: Target Spell/Trap cards your opponent controls up to the number of "Kagemane" monsters with different types you control; destroy them. You can banish this card from your GY; both Players draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Kuransain of Storm" once per turn.

93207355.name: Kuransain Bond of the Clans
93207355.desc: When this card is activated: You can Special Summon 2 "Kagemane" Monster from Your Deck (1 on each side). Once per turn: You can target up to 2 monsters you control, and declare a Level from 1 to 8; their Level become that Level until the End Phase. you can only activate 1 "Kuransain Bond of the Clans" per turn.

93207356.name: Kagemane Ninja of the Wind - Torasada
93207356.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: you can draw 1 card then, immediatly after this effect resolves, you can discard 1 card. If this card is discarded: You can add 1 "Kagemane", "Ninja" or "Ninjitsu" card from your Deck or GY to your Hand. You can banish this card, except the turn it was sent to the GY; Draw 1 card.

93207357.name: Kuransain of Rage
93207357.desc: Destroy all cards in your Spell & Trap Zone; Draw 2 cards. You can banish this card from your GY; both player discard 1 card then, both Player draw 2 cards. You can only use 1 "Kuransain of Rage" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

93207358.name: Cursed Clan Weapon
93207358.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Kuransain" card.)
Fuison Summon 1 Warrior Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. If your opponent controls a monster that was Special Summond from the Extra Deck, You can discard 1 card; you can also use monster(s) from your Deck as material.

51684400.name: Carrotman
51684400.desc: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are EARTH monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 Effect Monster with 800 ATK and 750 DEF or 750 ATK and 800 DEF from your Deck or GY to your hand, except "Carrotman". If this card is sent from the field to the GY to activate a Spell/Trap Card or effect: You can Special Summon 1 Effect Monster with 800 ATK and 750 DEF or 750 ATK and 800 DEF from your GY, except "Carrotman" You can only use each effect of "Carrotman" once per turn.

51684401.name: Potatoman
51684401.desc: If you control a Beast monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Preparation Art" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY to activate a Spell/Trap Card or effect: Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect "Potatoman" once per turn.

51684402.name: Onionman
51684402.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Effect Monster with 800 ATK and 750 DEF or 750 ATK and 800 DEF from your hand or GY, except "Onionman". If this card is sent to the GY to activate a Spell/Trap Card or effect: You can target 1 monster you control; it gains 800 ATK and 750 DEF. You can only use each effect "Onionman" once per turn.

51684403.name: Preparation Art Boiling
51684403.desc: Reveal 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that must be Special Summoned with "Preparation Art Boiling", then Tribute monster(s) you control that are listed in the revealed monsters text; Special Summon the revealed monster. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Fusion Monster you control; it gains 200 ATK for each Effect Monster in your GY. You can only activate this effect of "Preparation Art Boiling" once per turn.

51684404.name: Curry Fiend Roo
51684404.desc: Must first be Special Summoned with "Preparation Art Boiling" by Tributing "Carrotman", "Potatoman", and "Onionman". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can tribute 1 Effect Monster with 800 original ATK and 750 original DEF or 750 original ATK and 800 original DEF you control; this card gains ATK equal to the Tribute monster's ATK, until the end of your next turn. When your opponent activates a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Effect Monster from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card. You can only use this effect of "Curry Fiend Roo" once per turn.

41672374.name: Chaos Kuriboh
41672374.desc: Cannot be used as Link material, except for the Link Summon of a "Kuriboh" monster. While face-up on the field or in your GY, this card is also DARK-Attribute. When you would take damage (by battle or effect): You can discard this card; You take no damage. When an attack is declared: You can banish this card from your field or GY; Special Summon 1 "Kuriboh" monster from your GY or Banishment, except "Chaos Kuriboh". You can only use this effect of "Chaos Kuriboh" once per turn.

25335337.name: Higher Level!
25335337.desc: Target 1 "LV" monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 monster from your Deck that is listed in the sent monster's text, ignoring its Summoning conditions. If you control a "LV" monster: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls and 1 "LV" monster in your GY; shuffle them into the Deck.

70000030.name: Desire Devil LV1
70000030.desc: If this card is destroyed: You can Special summon up to 2 "Desire Devil LV1" from your Hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Desire Devil LV1" once per turn. This Special Summoned card cannot by destroyed by battle. During your Standby Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Desire Devil LV3" from your hand, Deck or GY.

70000031.name: Desire Devil LV3
70000031.desc: If this card is destroyed: Send 1 card your opponent controls to the GY. This Special Summoned card cannot by destroyed by battle. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Desire Devil LV1": Your opponent draws 1 card, then shuffles 1 card from his/her hand into the Deck. During your Standby Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Desire Devil LV5" from your hand, Deck or GY.

70000032.name: Desire Devil LV5
70000032.desc: This Special Summoned card cannot by destroyed by battle. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Desire Devil LV3": Your opponent draws 1 card, then shuffles 2 cards from his hand into the Deck (or his entire hand, if he does not have enough cards). You can discard 1 card, then Send 1 "LV" monster you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand, Deck or GY that is listed in the sent monster's text, ignoring its Summoning conditions and treated it as if it is Summoned through the effect of the sent monster. You can only use each effect of "Desire Devil LV5" once per turn.

70000033.name: Silent Horror LV2
70000033.desc: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "LV" monster, except "Silent Horror LV2" from your Deck to your Hand. During your End Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Silent Horror LV4" from your hand, Deck or GY.

70000034.name: Silent Horror LV4
70000034.desc: If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special summon this card (from your hand). During your End Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Silent Horror LV8" from your hand, Deck or GY. You can only use each of the following effect of "Silent Horror LV4" once per turn. Detach 1 material from a "RANK" Xyz monster you control, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; destroy it. If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of "Silent Horror LV2": You can add 1 Spell/Trap card that mentions "LV" or "RANK" in their card text from your Deck to your hand.

70000035.name: Silent Horror LV8
70000035.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Silent Horror LV4". Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Silent Horror LV8" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can destroy all other cards on the field, except "LV" or "RANK" monsters. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can add 1 "LV" monster or Spell/Trap card that mentions "LV" or "RANK" in their card text from your Deck or GY to your hand.

70000036.name: Armed Warrior LV4
70000036.desc: If a card(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only use the following effect of "Armed Warrior LV4" once per turn. If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "LV" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. During the End Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Armed Warrior LV6" from your hand, Deck or GY.

70000037.name: Armed Warrior LV6
70000037.desc: You can only use the following effect of "Armed Warrior LV6" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can target 1  "LV" monster in your GY, except "Armed Warrior LV6"; Special Summon it. During the End Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Armed Warrior LV8" from your hand, Deck or GY.

70000038.name: Armed Warrior LV8
70000038.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Armed Warrior LV6". You can only use the following effects of "Armed Warrior LV8" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can target 1  "LV" or "RANK" monster in your GY, except "Armed Warrior LV8"; Special Summon it.  (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "RANK" Xyz monster you control, attach 1 "LV" monster from your GY to that monster as material.

80000046.name: Lyrilusc- Topaz Pigeon
80000046.desc: When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 1 monster in your Graveyard, except "Lyrilusc - Topaz Pidgeon"; Special Summon it. If this card is detached from an Xyz Monster as Xyz Material to activate that monster's effect: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.

80000047.name: Lyrilusc - Copper Eagle
80000047.desc: If you control a Winged Beast-Type monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). When this card is Special Summoned, while you control another "Lyrilusc" monster, except "Lyrilusc - Copper Eagle": draw 1 card.

80000048.name: Nest of Beginnings
80000048.desc: During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Level 1 monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Normal Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn). Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 monster from your Graveyard. You can only activate 1 "Nest of Beginnings" per turn.

80000225.name: MAGMA Koy Koy
80000225.desc: If this Card is Summoned: add 1 "MAGMA" Monster from your Deck to your hand. You can use this Effect of "MAGMA Koy Koy" only once per turn. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon this card. You can use this effect of "MAGMA Koy Koy" only twice per turn

80000226.name: MAGMA Bahamut
80000226.desc: If you control a "MAGMA" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position. If this card is banished: You can target 1 of your banished Fish monster, except this card; Special Summon it. You can use each effect of "MAGMA Bahamut" only once per turn.

80000227.name: MAGMA Flying Fire Fish
80000227.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your Hand) by banishing 1 Fish monster from you GY. You can banish this card from you GY; Special Summon 1 "MAGMA" monster from your Hand or Deck, except "MAGMA Flying Fire Fish".You can only use this effect of "MAGMA Flying Fire Fish" once per turn.

80000228.name: MAGMA Heat Whale
80000228.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your Hand) by discarding 1 other Fish monster. Once per turn: You can send 1 FIRE monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, this card's Level becomes the Level of the monster sent to the GY by this effect. If a Fish monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

80000229.name: MAGMA Burning Serpent
80000229.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Fish monster in your GY, except "MAGMA Burning Serpent"; Special Summon that monster, also monsters you control cannot attack for the rest of this turn, except Fish monsters. You can use this effect of "MAGMA Burning Serpent" only once per turn.

80000230.name: MAGMA Obidian Shark
80000230.desc:
1 FIRE Fish Tuner-Monster + 1+ Non-Tuner-Monster
Once per turn: You can shuffle 1 FIRE Fish type monster that is banished into your Deck; Destroy 1 Card on the Field. When an effect resolves that was activated by an Effect Monster that was on your opponent's side of the field, they must discard 1 card or the effect is negated (their choice).

80000231.name: MAGMA Megalodon
80000231.desc:
1 FIRE Fish Tuner-Monster + 1+ Non-Tuner-Monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned you can acticate 1 or both of these effects:
- You can Destroy all other cards on the field. 
- You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can add 1 excavated FIRE Fish type monster to your hand, also banish the remaining cards. 
You can banish 1 FIRE and 1 Fish type monster from your hand and/or GY, except this card; Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can use each effect of "MAGMA Megalodon" only once per turn.

80000232.name: MAGMA Destroyer
80000232.desc:
1 FIRE Fish Tuner-Monster + 1+ Non-Tuner-Monster
Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. This card's Maximum number of attacks per Battle Phase equals the number of Fish Type none-Tuner monsters used as its Synchro Material. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated: You can negate the activation. and if you do, destroy it. when this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "MAGMA Megalodon" from your Extra Deck.

53790611.name: Mechasect - Fire Scarab
53790611.desc: If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Upgrade" Quick-Play Spell from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Mechasect" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Mechasect - Fire Scarab". You can only use 1 effect of "Mechasect - Fire Scarab" per turn, and only once that turn.

53790612.name: Mechasect - Water Spider
53790612.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower machine monster from your GY, except "Mechasect - Water Spider". If this card is sent from the field to the GY by a Spell/Trap effect: You can target 1 "Mechasect" monster in your GY, except "Mechasect - Water Spider"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Mechasect - Water Spider" once per turn.

53790613.name: Mechasect - Electric Bee
53790613.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Mechasect" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Mechasect - Electric Bee". If you control a "Mechasect" monster, while this card is in the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY in Defense Position. You cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activated this effect, except "Mechasect" or "Upgrade" cards and effects. You can only use 1 effect of "Mechasect - Electric Bee" per turn, and only once that turn.

53790614.name: Mechasect - Poisen Beetle
53790614.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower machine monster from your hand, except "Mechasect - Poisen Beetle". If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Mechasect" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Mechasect - Poisen Beetle". You can only activate this effect of "Mechasect - Poisen Beetle" once per turn.

53790615.name: Mechasect - Wind Mantis
53790615.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Mechasect" monster you control or in your GY, except "Mechasect - Wind Mantis"; this cards name becomes the name of the target until the end of this turn. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles: You can shuffle this card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Mechasect" monster from your Deck, except "Mechasect - Wind Mantis", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters.

53790616.name: Upgrade
53790616.desc: Send 1 face-up "Mechasect" monster you control to the GY, Special Summon 1 "Mechasect" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that mentions the sent monster.

53790617.name: Mechasect - Inferno Scarab
53790617.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Fire Scarab", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Any card sent to your opponent's GY is banished instead. Once per turn, if your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand (except during the Draw Phase or the Damage Step): You can banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

53790618.name: Mechasect - Tsunami Spider
53790618.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Water Spider", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Special Summoned: Destroy all Spell/Traps your opponent controls, and if you do, all monsters they control lose 400 ATK. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 Spell/Trap in either player's GY; set it to your field. You can only use this effect of "Mechasect - Tsunami Spider" once per turn.

53790619.name: Mechasect - Thunder Bee
53790619.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Electric Bee", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card gains 300 ATK for each Special Summoned monster your opponent controls. Each face-up monster your opponent controls loses 100 ATK/DEF x its own Level/Rank/Link Raiting.

53790620.name: Mechasect - Acid Beetle
53790620.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Poison Beetle", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If a "Mechasect" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict double piercing battle damage. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

53790621.name: Mechasect - Storm Mantis
53790621.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Wind Mantis", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Your opponent can attack with only 1 monster during each Battle Phase. Once per turn: You can place 1 Spell from your GY on either the top or bottom of the Deck; 1 face-up monster your opponent controls loses 2000 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's next turn, then if you placed "Upgrade", you can draw 1 card.

53790622.name: Mechasect - Toxic Beetle
53790622.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Acid Beetle", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish that target, and if it was face-up, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK it had on the field. You can only use the following effects of "Mechasect - Toxic Beetle" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Deck, then place them on the top of the Deck in any order. If this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Mechasect - Acid Beetle" from your GY, ignoring it's Summoning condition, then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

53790623.name: Mechasect - Hurrican Mantis
53790623.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect Storm Mantis", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. When a monster(s) you control is targeted for an attack or by an opponent's card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. If this card leaves the field: You can set 1 "Upgrade" Spell from your Deck, and if it is a Quick-Play Spell, it can be activated this turn. You can only use this effect of "Mechasect - Hurrican Mantis" once per turn.

53790624.name: Upgrade Recycling!
53790624.desc: Target 1 "Mechasect" monster and 1 "Upgrade" Quick-Play Spell in your GY; add them to your hand.

53790625.name: Mechasect - Helper Spider
53790625.desc: You can target 1 "Mechasect" monster you control; equip this monster from your hand or your side of the field to that target. It gains 1000 ATK. When this card you control is sent to your GY because the equipped monster was destroyed by your opponent's card (either by battle or card effect): You can target 1 "Mechasect" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target.

53790626.name: Mechasect - Dragonfly Gettling
53790626.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can discard 1 card; either add to your Hand or Special Summon 1 "Mechasect" monster from your Deck, except "Mechasect - Dragonfly Gattling", also you cannot Special Summon Monsters for the rest of the Turn, except Machine Monster. You can use this effect of "Mechasect - Dragonfly Gattling" only once per turn. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Mechasect" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

53790627.name: Mechasect - Air Rider Dragonfly
53790627.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Upgrade" by sending "Mechasect - Dragonfly Gettling", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK. Neither player can Special Summon monsters, except Machine monsters.

53790628.name: Mechasect - Scrapyard
53790628.desc:
(This card is not treated as a "Scrap" card)
Special Summon 1 "Mechasect" monster from your Deck. Once per turn, you can shuffle 1 "Upgrade" Spell from your GY into you Deck, then Draw 1 card. You can activate "Mechasect - Scrapyard" only once per turn.

53790629.name: Mechasect Magma Scarab
53790629.desc:
2+ Monster with diffirent Attribute
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower Machine monster from your GY, ignoring it's Summoning condition. When a Spell/Trap Card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Machine monster this card points to; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

68540060.name: Metal Beaver Warrior
68540060.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Hand or Deck) by Tributing "Beaver Warrior" equipped with a "Metalmorph" card OR with "Enhanced Metalmorph" activated by Tributing a Level 4 or higher Beast-Warrior monster. You can discard this card; Add 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck to your hand. Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Metal Beaver Warrior" once per turn.

68540061.name: Metalzera the Mant
68540061.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Hand or Deck) by Tributing "Zera the Mant" equipped with a "Metalmorph" card OR with "Enhanced Metalmorph" activated by Tributing a Level 8 or higher Fiend monster. You can reveal this card in your Hand; Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck.You can only use this effect of "Metalzera the Mant" once per turn. Up to twice per turn, when your opponent activates a Spell Card or effect, or monster effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Spell/Trap they control; destroy it.

68540062.name: Blue-Eyes Metal Dragon
68540062.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Hand or Deck) by Tributing "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" equipped with a "Metalmorph" card OR with "Enhanced Metalmorph" activated by Tributing a Level 8 or higher Dragon monster. You can reveal this card in your Hand; Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck.You can only use this effect of "Blue-Eyes Metal Dragon" once per turn. You opponent cannot target Spells/Traps you control with card effects, also they cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

68540063.name: Gerafried the Metal Knight
68540063.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Enhanced Metalmorph" activated by Tributing a Level 5 or higher Warrior monster. You can reveal this card in your Hand; Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck.You can only use this effect of "Gerafried the Matel Knight" once per turn. Once per turn: You can activate this effect; Special Summon 1 level 5 or higher Dragon or Fiend monster from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the extra Deck for the rest of this turn.

68540064.name: Metal Gandora the Dragon of Annihilation
68540064.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Hand or Deck) by Tributing "Gandora the Dragon of Destruction" equipped with a "Metalmorph" card OR with "Enhanced Metalmorph" activated by Tributing a Level 8 or higher Dragon monster. You can reveal this card in your Hand; Set 1 "Metalmorph" Trap from your Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can pay 1000 LP; destroyed as many other cards on the field as possible, and if you do, banish them. This card gains 500 ATK for each card destroyed this way. You can only use each effect of "Metal Gandora the Dragon of Annihilation" once per turn.

80000300.name: Noble Hero Master Solomon
80000300.desc:
2 tuner + 1+ non-tuner-monster
When this card declares an attack, if your opponent's LP is 4000 or less: You can make this card gain ATK equal to your opponent's LP, until the end of this turn. Cannot be destroyed by battle, also you take no damage from battles involving this card.
You can Tribute 1 other monster; apply 1 of these effects until the end of this turn. 
● This card can attack directly. 
● Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in the Spell & Trap Zones. 
● Your opponent cannot activate card effects in their hand or GY.
While "Noble Phatasm" is face-up on the field, you can destroy this card, and if you do, destroy all cards your opponent controls.

80000301.name: Noble Hero Herakles
80000301.desc: If you control 2 or more "Noble Hero" monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Noble Hero Herakles" once per turn this way. Once per turn, while "Noble Phantasm" is on the field, this card cannot be destroyed by battle.

80000302.name: Noble Hero Cú
80000302.desc: Once per turn: You can increase or decrease the level of this card by 1. While "Noble Phantasm" is face up on the field, If a "Noble Hero" monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict Piercing Battle Damage to your opponent.

80000303.name: Noble Hero Alter Artoria
80000303.desc:
2+ Level 5 monsters
If this card has "Noble Hero Arthur" as material, this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. While "Noble Phantasm" is face-up on the field, this card gains 500 ATK for each material attached to it.

80000304.name: Noble Hero Arthur
80000304.desc: While "Noble Phantasm" is face-up on the field, this card gains 500 ATK. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Noble Hero" monster from your hand, except "Noble Hero Arthur".

80000305.name: Noble Hero Emiya
80000305.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. During the Main Phase: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls, or, if "Noble Phantasm" is in a Field Zone, you can destroy 1 card instead. You can only use this effect of "Noble Hero Emiya" once per turn.

80000306.name: Noble Hero Shirou
80000306.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned using "Noble Hero Emiya" as material, it gains 500 ATK/DEF. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Chloe Apprentice of the Noble Hero" from your banishment or GY.

80000307.name: Noble Hero Scáthach
80000307.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Noble Hero Cú" from your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them.

80000308.name: Gilgamesh King of Noble Hero
80000308.desc:
"Noble Hero Sage Gilgamesh" + 2 Level 5 or higher monsters
Must be be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"), and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects, also it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. When this card destroys a monster by battle: You can target up to 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them. If this card is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "Noble Hero Sage Gilgamesh" from your GY.

80000309.name: Noble Hero Jeanne
80000309.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned/Set . This card must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 2 "Noble Hero" monsters from your side of the field, and cannot be Special Summoned by other way. When this card is targeted as an attack target, it gains ATK equal to the attacking monster's ATK until the end of this turn. This card cannot be destroyed by battle. In addition, you take no Battle Damage from battles this card is involved in. When this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon up to 2 "Noble Hero" monsters from your Graveyard.

80000310.name: Noble Hero Sage Gilgamesh
80000310.desc:
1 "Noble Hero" Tuner 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can destroy all cards in the Spell & Trap Zones. While "Noble Phantasm" is face-up on the field: You can target 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Noble Hero Sage Gilgamesh" once per turn.

80000311.name: Illya Magician of Nobel Hero
80000311.desc: If you control no monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can banish this card and 1 or more monster with a Level from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Noble Hero" Synchro Monster with the same Level as the combined Level of the banished monsters from your GY (This is treated as a Synchro Summon). You can only use this effect of "Illya Magician of Nobel Hero" once per turn.

80000312.name: Miyu Magician of Nobel Hero
80000312.desc: If you control a "Illya Magician of Nobel Hero", you can Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 excavated Level 4 or lower monster, also place the rest on the bottom of your Deck in any order. You can only use this effect of "Miyu Magician of Nobel Hero" once per turn.

80000313.name: Chloe Apprentice of the Nobel Hero
80000313.desc: You can target 1 "Noble Hero" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, also its ATK/DEF becomes 0, also negate its effects until the end of this turn. If this card is Special Summoned: Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Chloe Apprentice of the Nobel Hero" once per turn.

80000314.name: Noble Hero Trace
80000314.desc: Add 1 "Noble Hero" Monster from your Deck to your Hand. You can only Activate 1 "Noble Hero Trace" per turn

80000315.name: Noble Phantasm
80000315.desc: When his card is activated: Draw 1 card. All "Noble Hero" monsters gain 100 ATK for each "Noble Hero" monster in your GY. While this card is in the GY: You can discard 1 card; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Noble Phantasm" once per turn.

80000316.name: Noble Arms Chain of Heaven
80000316.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Noble Hero" card)
You can only Equip a "Nobel Hero" monster with this card. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK. While the equipped monster battles, your opponent cannot activate any cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. While this card is equipped to "Noble Hero Sage Gilgamesh", "Gilgamesh King of Noble Hero", or "Noble Hero Enkidu", the equipped monster gains 500 ATK.

80000317.name: Noble Arms Sword of Promised Victory Excalibur
80000317.desc:
(This card is treated as a Noble Hero card)
You can only control 1 "Noble Arms Sword of Promised Victory Excalibur". Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 1500 ATK. If this face-up card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 Warrior-Type "Noble Hero" monster you control; equip this card to that target. You can only use this effect of "Noble Arms Sword of Promised Victory Excalibur" once per turn.

80000318.name: Noble Hero Enkidu
80000318.desc:
1 "Noble Hero" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monsters
If this card destroys a monster with 0 ATK by battle: You can place it underneath this card. You can only use the following effects of "Noble Hero Enkidu" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can traget 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; change its ATK and DEF to 0. During your Main Phase: You can send 1 card underneath this card to the GY; destroy as many other monsters on the field as possible with ATK less than or equal to this card's, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed.

80000319.name: Noble Hero Muramasa
80000319.desc:
1 "Noble Hero" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monsters
if this card is Synchro Summoned: You can target 1 banished Tuner; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but negate its effects. You can reveal 3 Equip Spell Cards from your Deck, then your opponent randomly adds 1 of them to your hand, and if you do, shuffle the rest back into your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Noble Hero Muramasa" once per turn.

19851467.name: Forest Dragoons of Draconia
19851467.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can return this card to your hand; place 1 Normal Pendulum Monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zone, except "Forest Dragoons of Draconia", and if you do, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase this turn. You can only use this effect of "Forest Dragoons of Draconia" once per turn.
-----------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Silent stealth troops equipped with the most basic of weapons. these troops of the Draconia Empire use their skills to suprise any opponent that try to Invade the densest forests of the Draconia Empire.

22773046.name: Wielder of the Celestial Lance
22773046.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once while face-up on the field: You can target 1 of your Monster Zones and 1 of your opponent's Monster Zones; the targeted Zones are treated as Linked Zones. Once per turn: You can add 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Normal Pendulum Monsters. This effect cannot be negated.
--------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Astrid is a fine and Remarkeable Woman that trained hard for her entire Life. Once her Training was completed she was anounced as the Wielder of the Celestial Lance. Together with her sister the Maiden of War, she fight against the Evil in the world.

89736088.name: Maiden of War
89736088.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once while face-up on the field: You can target 1 of your Monster Zones and 1 of your opponent's Monster Zones; the targeted Zones are treated as Linked Zones All Normal Pendulum Monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Normal Monster on the field or in the GYs. You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except if there is a Normal Pendulum Monster in the other Pendulum Zone. This effect cannot be negated.
-----------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
Once per battle, If this card battles, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): All monsters you control gain 100 ATK. If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 Normal Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up, and if you do, you gain 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "Maiden of War" once per turn.

72731508.name: A Legendary Portal to Atlantis
72731508.desc: You can only activate this card while "Umi" is on the field. Special Summon up to 2 Level 5 or lower WATER Aqua, Fish, or Sea Serpent monster(s) from your Deck, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters. You can banish this card and 1 WATER monster from your GY; Add 1 Level 8 or lower WATER monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "A Legendary Portal to Atlantis" once per turn.

80000028.name: Kiira, Ocean Ruler of the South
80000028.desc: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). After this card is Special Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters. If this card is Tributed for the Tribute Summon of an "Ocean Ruler" monster and sent to the Graveyard while "Umi" is face-up on the field: You can Special Summon this card as a Level 8 monster. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. This card cannot be used as a Material for an Xyz Summon, except for the Xyz Summon of a WATER Sea Serpent monster.

80000029.name: Zerra, Ocean Ruler of the North
80000029.desc: While "Umi" is face-up on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). After this card is Special Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters. This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a Sea Serpent monster. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.This card cannot be used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, except for the Xyz Summon of a WATER Sea Serpent monster.

80000030.name: Minna, Ocean Ruler of the East
80000030.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Ocean Ruler" monster from your hand, then change this card to Defense Position. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack monsters, except this one. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. This card cannot be used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, except for the Xyz Summon of a WATER Sea Serpent monster.

80000031.name: Jelly, Ocean Ruler of the West
80000031.desc: If your opponent controls 2 or more monsters and you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 Level 4 "Ocean Ruler" monster in your Graveyard, except "Jelly, Ocean Ruler of the West"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Jelly, Ocean Ruler of the West" once per turn. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. This card cannot be used as an Xyz Material for an Xyz Summon, except for the Xyz Summon of a WATER Sea Serpent monster.

80000032.name: Twinnkis, Ocean Ruler of the Oracle
80000032.desc: If this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster in your GY, except "Twinnkis, Ocean Ruler of the Oracle"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Twinnkis, Ocean Ruler of The Oracle" once per turn. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.

80000033.name: Possaido, Ocean Ruler of Atlantis
80000033.desc: During damage calculation, if one of your Defense Position monsters battles an opponent's monster, while "Umi" is face-up on the field (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, target 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster you control except the battling monster; the battling monster you control gains DEF equal to the DEF of the selected monster, only during damage calculation. When your opponent's monster declares a direct attack: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.

80000034.name: Levvia, Ocean Ruler of the Deep Sea
