80000034.desc: Cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can change its battle position. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use their DEF for the damage calculation.

80000035.name: Holy Ruin of the Ocean Rulers
80000035.desc:
(This card's name is always treated as "Umi".)
All WATER monsters gain 400 DEF. Once per turn, if an "Ocean Ruler" monster is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster with a Level is less than or equal to that "Ocean Ruler" monster in the GY.

80000036.name: Revival of the Ocean Ruler
80000036.desc: Target 1 Sea Serpent Xyz Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, attach this card to it as Material.

80000037.name: Attack of the Ocean Ruler
80000037.desc: Target 1 Level 8 or lower Sea Serpent monster in your GY; Special Summon it in face-up Defense Position.

80000038.name: Mirria, Mighty Ocean Ruler of the Old Ruins
80000038.desc:
2 Level 4 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. If this card is Xyz Summoned while "Umi" is face-up on the field: You can destroy all Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card and then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; halve its ATK, also negate its effects. If this face-up card on the field would be destroyed, you can detach all of its Xyz Materials instead. If you do, all Battle Damage you take this turn is halved.

80000039.name: Daedalus, Mighty Ocean Ruler of the seas
80000039.desc:
3 Level 4 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can activate 1 "Umi" directly from your Deck. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Banish 1 card your opponent controls.
● Banish 1 random card from your opponent's hand.
● Banish 1 card from your opponent's graveyard.
● Banish the top card of your opponent's deck face up.

80000040.name: Dragoolong, Mighty Ocean Ruler of the Deep Seas
80000040.desc:
2 Level 4 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use their DEF for the damage calculation. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster in your GY; Special Summon it. This card gains 500 DEF for each other Sea Serpent monster you control. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card; add 1 Level 8 or lower WATER Sea Serpent monster from your Deck to your hand.

80000041.name: Serrina, Mighty Ocean Ruler of the Kraken
80000041.desc:
4 Level 4 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can banish up to 1 card from your opponent's hand, from his side of the field, and from your opponent's GY. (The card in the hand is chosen at random.) This card gains DEF equal to the combined rank of all Xyz monsters you control x 200. As long as this card has Xyz Material, every time your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card, inflict 600 damage immediately after it is resolved. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls and with DEF is less than or equal to this card's.

80000042.name: Morralis, Mighty Ocean Ruler of the Leviathans
80000042.desc:
4 "Ocean Ruler" monsters
Must either be Fusion Summoned or Special Summoned by Tributing the cards you control listed above (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"), and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Special Summoned: Destroy all cards your opponent controls. Cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 "Ocean Ruler" monster from your Deck. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.

80000044.name: Levviana, Ocean Ruler of the Deep Sea
80000044.desc: You can Tribute Summon this card by Tributing 1 Sea Serpent monster. You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the GY; destroy all other cards on the field, except "Ocean Ruler" cards. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.

80000045.name: Poseidon, Ocean Ruler of the World's Seas
80000045.desc:
2 Level 8 Sea Serpent monsters
Once per turn, when a Spell Card or effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, attach that card to this card as material. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can detach 1 material from this card; change the attack target to this card and perform damage calculation. Once per turn, while "Umi" is face-up on the field: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, and if you do, place 1 Ocean Counter on this card. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. When 3 Ocean Counters are on this card, you win the Duel. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for the damage calculation.

80000049.name: Allice, Mighty Ocean Ruler of Neptune
80000049.desc:
2 WATER monsters, including a Sea Serpent monster
While this card is on the field, this card's name becomes "Umi". You can target 1 WATER Xyz Monster you control; until the end of your opponent's turn, this card gains ATK equal to the Rank of the Xyz Monster x 500. When a monster effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Sea Serpent monster from your hand; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. If this card on the field is destroyed: You can add up to 2 Sea Serpent monster(s) with different names from your GY to your hand, except "Allice, Mighty Ocean Ruler of Neptune". You can only use each effect of "Allice, Mighty Ocean Ruler of Neptune" once per turn.

957160000.name: Outer Entity Chrohel
957160000.desc:
3 Level 3 or higher monster with the same Level
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; negate the effects of all other face-up monsters currently on the field until the end of the next turn. Unaffected by Spell/Trap effects that are activated in the same column as this card. Each time exactly 1 monster is Normal or Special Summoned to your opponent’s field: Move this card to the adjacent Main Monster Zone closer to that opponent’s monster, then attach all other monsters in this card’s column to this card.
[ Artwork by: Storm Wraith - https://www.deviantart.com/morkardfc ]
[ Expanded to 1:1 aspect ratio with AI - https://www.pixelcut.ai/uncrop ]

306778361.name: Palor, Adventurer of the Scarred World
306778361.desc: Once per turn (Quick effect): You can change this face-up card's battle position. Once per turn (Quick effect): You can discard 1 Spell; this card gains 200 ATK/DEF for each face-up Spell you control, until the end of this turn. If this card is in your GY: You can banish 2 Spells from your GY; add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Palor, Adventurer of the Scarred World" once per turn.

10040708.name: Jester Archfiend
10040708.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You can destroy this card 1 face-up card you control; place up to 2 "Pandel" or "Archfiend" Pendulum Monster from your Deck in your Pendulum Zone, except "Jester Archfiend". You can only use this effect of "Jester Archfiend" once per turn.
-----------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 "Archfiend" monster from your Deck to the GY and takeing damage equal to the ATK of the sent monster. (this cost is treated as an effect.) If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower DARK "Archfiend" monster from your Deck, also You cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Fiend monsters. When the effect of a "Archfiend" monster is activated that includes a Dice roll, you can choose the die result.

88000100.name: Pandelmonic Prince
88000100.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once per turn: pay 800 Life Points, add 1 "Pandel" Pendulum Monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Pandelmonic Prinz".

[Monster Effect]
(This Card is always treated as "Archfiend" Monster)
You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Pandemonium",  "Archfiend" card or 1 card that specifically lists the card "Pandemonium"  in its text, from your Deck to your hand. You can use this effect of "Pandelmonic Prince" only once per turn.

88000101.name: Tyrant Skull Archfiend
88000101.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon Monsters, except "Archfiend" Monsters. If a "Archfiend" Monster you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.

[Monster Effect]
(This Card is always treated as "Pandel" Monster)
When your Opponent targets an "Archfiend" Card with a card effect (Quick Effect): You can roll a Six-sided die. If the result is 1, 2 or 3, negate the activation and destroy that card.

88000102.name: Hell Skull Archfiend
88000102.desc:
[Pendelum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Archfiend" monsters. all "Archfiend" monster you control gain 300 ATK, when "Pandemonium" is in your Field Zone; all monster you conrtol gain 600 ATK and DEF instead.

[Monster Effect]
(This Card is always treated as "Pandel" Monster)
If you have 2 "Pandel" Pendulum Monster in your pendulum zone: you can special summon this card from your hand. you can special summon "Hell Skull Archfiend" only once per turn this way. You can roll a six sided die. If the result is 2, 3 or 4, destroy 1 Monster your opponent controls, if the result is 1 or 5, destroy 1 Spell or Trap card your opponent controls, if the result is 6, destroy all Monster your opponent controlls. You can use this Effect of "Hell Skull Archfiend" only once per turn. The controller of this card pays 900 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phase (this is not optional) or this card is destroyed.

88000103.name: Pandelmonic Hell Fire Archfiend
88000103.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Archfiend" monsters. If you Synchro Summon a "Archfiend" Synchro Monster: You can target 1 monster in your GY used as its material; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Pandelmonic Hell Fire Archfiend" once per turn.

[Monster Effect]
The controller of this card pays 300 Life Points during each of his/her Standby Phase (this is not optional) or this card is destroyed. If this card is Special Summoned while you control "Pandemonium": you can discard 1 "Pandel" card from your hand; Special summon 1 "Archfiend" monster, except "Pandelmonic Hell Fire Archfiend" that is face-up in you Extra Deck or in your GY in Defense Position, also you cannot Special Summon monster for the rest of this turn, except "Archfiend" monsters.

88000104.name: Pandelmonic Double Blade Archfiend
88000104.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Archfiend" monsters. Once per turn: you can target 1 "Archfiend" monster you control; this turn, that monster can substitute for any 1  Fusion Matererial for an "Archfiend" Fusion monster. If you do, the other Fusion Material(s) must be the correct one(s).

[Monster Effect]
3 "Archfiend" monster, including 1 Pendulum monster.
Must be Fusion or Pendulum Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this card was Fusion Summoned with 3 Pendulum monster: all Pendulum monster you control can make a second attack during each Battle Phase. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in the Pendulum zone

88000105.name: Pandelmonic Satanic Doom
88000105.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Banish all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls. If you control a Xyz, Synchro, Fusion or Link "Archfiend" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. you can banish this card from you GY; Set 1 "Archfiend" Trap card directly from your Deck.

88000106.name: Pandelmonic Archfiend Marluxia
88000106.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Any effect that would inflict damage to you makes you gain that much LP, instead.

[Monster Effect]
1 Tuner + 1+ non-tuner "Archfiend" Monster
When your opponent would Special Summon a monster(s), OR activates a Spell/Trap Card, or a monster effect (Quick Effect): You can send 1 "Archfiend" monster from your hand to the GY; negate the Special Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in the Pedulum zone.

88000107.name: Pandelmonic Dragon Archfiend
88000107.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum summon monsters, except "Archfiend" monsters. Each time your "Archfiend" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Gain the same amount of LP. 

[Monster Effect]
3 Level 6 "Archfiend" Monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: The ATK of all monsters your opponent currently controls become 0. You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it. During the Standby Phase: You can detach 1 material from this card; Special Summon 1 "Archfiend" monster from your Deck. You can use each effect of "Pandelmonic Dragon Archfiend" only once per turn. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in the Pedulum zone.

88000108.name: Pandelmonic Queen of Archfiend
88000108.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon monster, except "Archfiend" monster. Monster in your opponent's possesion cannot activate their effects during the Battle Phase.

[Monster Effect]
2+ Fiend monsters, including a "Archfiend" monster
If you can Pendulum Summon Level 3, you can Pendulum Summon this face-up card in your Extra Deck. Neither player can target this card with card effects. You can target 1 "Archfiend" card in your Pendulum Zone; Special Summon it. You can discard 1 "Archfiend" monster; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Pandelmonic Queen of Archfiend" once per turn. Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in the Pedulum zone.

88000109.name: Pandelmonium
88000109.desc:
(This card is alway treated as "Pandemonium")
Each time you would pay Life Points for of an "Archfiend" card gain 500 Life Points instead. Once per turn, when you have no cards in your Pendulum Zone: you can Special Summon 1 "Pandel" Pendulum monster from your hand. if this card is send from the Field Zone to the GY: you can Special Summon 1 "Pandel" Pendulum monster from your Deck, but you cannot Special Summon other monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Archfiend" monsters. You can use this effect of "Pandelmonium - Temple of Archfiend" only once per turn.

88000110.name: Archfiends Sword of Zera
88000110.desc: You can only equip an "Archfiend" monster you control with this card, the equipped monster gains 1000 ATK. If the equiped Monster is a Pendulum monster it gains 1200 ATK instead. You can use the following effect of "Archfiends Sword of Zera" only once per turn. Once per turn, if "Pandemonium" is faceup on the field: you can Special Summon 1 "Archfiend" monster from your Deck, but it cannot attack, also destroy it during the End Phase.

80000420.name: Performapal Jestarcher
80000420.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You never take damage if its amounts are less than or equal to 2300. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Performapal" monster; its Level becomes 1 and it is treated as a Tuner until the end of this turn.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
2+ Level 4 "Performapal" monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): when a card or effect is activated while you have a "Performapal" card(s) in your Pendulum Zone, you can detach 1 material; Negate the activation or effect, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card is destroyed: You can destroy a card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, place this card in the Pendulum Zone.

80000421.name: Performapal Fungician
80000421.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once per turn (Quick Effect), If you would take damage: You can Special Summon 1 monster with ATK less than or equal to the damage you would take. Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or your side of the field as Fusion Materials.

-------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Performapal" monsters
Other "Performapal" monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's Spell Cards and effects. Once per turn: You can target 2 monsters you control; the level of the second target chosen becomes equal to the level of the first target. If this card is destroyed: You can destroy a card in your Pendulum Zone, and if you do, place this card in the Pendulum Zone.

27263681.name: Phantom Beast Gryphon
27263681.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 "Phantom Beast" monster , Beast, Illusion, or Level 5 Fiend monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Phantom Beast Gryphon". If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Phantom Beast" monster from your hand, GY, or Banishment, except "Phantom Beast Gryphon". While this card is your GY, all Beast-Warrior monsters you control, in your hand, GY, or Banishment, become Beast monster, also all monster gain 300 ATK/DEF.

53790720.name: Phantom Beast Fusion Shrine
53790720.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand as Fusion Materials. If Summoning an "Phantom Beast" Fusion Monster this way, you can also banish monsters from your field and/or either player's Graveyard as Fusion Materials. If this card is in your Graveyard: You can target 1 of your banished "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast"; shuffle this card into the Deck, and if you do, add that card to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Phantom Beast Fusion Shrine" once per turn.

53790721.name: Phantom Beast Enchanted Temple
53790721.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast" from your Deck to your hand. The activation of your cards and effects that include an effect that Fusion Summons a Fusion Monster cannot be negated, also your opponent's cards and effects cannot activate when a monster is Fusion Summoned this way. You can only activate 1 "Phantom Beast Enchanted Temple" per turn.

53790722.name: Phantom Beast Hyper-Tiger
53790722.desc: (This card is Treated as "Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast as long it is on the Field, Hand or GY). During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Phantom Beast" or "Berfomet" monster from your hand, except "Phantom Beast Hyper-Tiger". This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. If this card is sent to the Graveyard as a Fusion Material for a Fusion Summon of a "Phantom Beast" Fusion Monster: You can draw 2 cards. You can only use this effect of "Phantom Beast Hyper-Tiger" once per turn.

53790723.name: Phantom Beast Necro-Tiger
53790723.desc: (This card is always treated as "Berfomet" while on the field, hand or, GY). When this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Phantom Beast"  or "Berfomet" monster in your Graveyard, except "Phantom Beast Necro-Tiger"; add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Phantom Beast Necro-Tiger" once per turn. Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Phantom Beast" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as Fusion Materials, including this card.

53790724.name: Phantom Beast Suprem-Chimera
53790724.desc:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast" + 1 "Phantom Beast"- monster.
You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "Phantom Beast" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck with ATK less than or equal to that monster's ATK. You can only use this effect of "Phantom Beast Suprem-Chimera" once per turn. Once per turn, during the End Phase: You can target 1 other "Phantom Beast" monster in your Main Monster Zone; return that target to the hand, and if you do, move this card to that Monster Zone.

53790725.name: Dark Chimera Lord of the Pantom Beasts
53790725.desc:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast" + 1 "Phantom Beast"- monster.
Must first be Fusion Summoned. Neither player can Special Summon monsters from the hand or Graveyard with Spell/Trap effects. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Phantom Beast" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

53790726.name: Magnificent Chimera Mythical Phantom Beast
53790726.desc:
"Gazelle the King of Mythical Beast" + 2 "Phantom Beast"- monster.
During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can select 1 face-up monster on the field, except a Beast-Warrior-Type monster, and equip it to this card. While equipped by this effect, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

53790727.name: Phantom Beast Chimera of the Forest
53790727.desc:
"Berfomet" + 1 "Phantom Beast"- monster.
Must first be Fusion Summoned. During either player's turn, when a monster that was Special Summoned activates its effect, if you have a "Phantom Beast" card in your hand: You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then send 1 "Phantom Beast" card from your hand to the Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Phantom Beast Chimera of the Forest" once per turn. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Phantom Beast" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard; add it to your hand.

53790728.name: Phantom Beast Chimera Elegent Tiger
53790728.desc:
"Berfomet" + 2 "Phantom Beast"- monster.
Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: You can send the same type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap) from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, banish that card.

53790729.name: Phantom Beast Temple of Fusion
53790729.desc: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters you control as Fusion Materials, and if you do, it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn. Only "Phantom Beast" or "Berfomet" monsters can be used as Fusion Materials for a Fusion Summon using this card's effect.

19962015.name: PM Zekrom
19962015.desc: If you control no monsters, or if you control "PM Reshiram" or "PM Kyurem", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). After this card was Special Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "PM" monsters. If this card is Tributed for the Special Summon of a "PM" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "PM Zekrom" once per turn.

19962016.name: PM Reshiram
19962016.desc: If you control no monsters, or if you control "PM Zekrom" or "PM Kyurem", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). After this card was Special Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "PM" monsters. If this card is Tributed for the Special Summon of a "PM" monster: You can take 1 of your "PM" cards in your GY, except "PM Reshiram", and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it in Defense Position, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "PM Reshiram" once per turn.

19962017.name: PM Kyurem
19962017.desc: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except "PM" monsters. Once per turn: You can target 1 "PM Zekrom" or "PM Reshiram" you control or in your GY; equip it to this card. Gains ATK equal to the combined original ATK of the monsters equipped to it by this effect.

35777553.name: PM Mega Rayquaza
35777553.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Dragon Ascent". Must be Ritual Summoned. "PM" monsters you control are unaffected by the activated effects of your opponent's Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, Link, and Trick Monsters. This card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase. Each time your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), inflict 200 damage to them.

38597064.name: PM Dragon Ascent
38597064.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "PM Mega Rayquaza". You must also Tribute "PM Rayquaza" from your hand or field. While you control a "PM Rayquaza", "PM Mega Rayquaza" or a Dragon monster: You can discard this card from your hand; all monsters you control gain 1000 ATK and lose 1000 DEF. You can only use this effect of "Dragon Acsent" once per turn.

41092585.name: PM Rayquaza
41092585.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster you control. Once per turn: You can make this card lose 1000 ATK until the end of this turn, and if you do, this card can attack your opponent directly this turn. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand. If this card is Tributed: You can target 1 "PM" monster you control; it can attack your opponent directly this turn.

42658544.name: PM Dialga
42658544.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster you control. Once per turn (Quick Effect) You can Special Summon 1 Legendary monster from your GY, except "PM Dialga", ignoring its Summoning conditions. If this card is destroyed; You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "PM Dialga" once per turn.

60185124.name: PM Palkia
60185124.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster you control. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster on the field; banish it until the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "PM Palkia" once per turn. If this card destroys a monster by battle, banish it instead.

60185125.name: PM Giratina
60185125.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster you control. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card you control until the End Phase, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your hand or GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. If this card is destroyed: You can add all "PM" Normal Monsters in your Banishment to your hand. You can only use each effect of "PM Giratina" once per turn.

60185126.name: PM Arceus
60185126.desc:
1 "PM Dialga" + 1 "PM Palkia" + 1 "PM Giratina"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing the above cards you control. Once per turn, You can activate 1 of the following effects.
●Special Summon 1 non-Fusion Legendary monster from your hand, Deck or GY, ignoring it's Summoning condition.
●Destroy 1 card on the field
●(Quick Effect): Target 1 face-up card on the field; negate it's effects until the End Phase.
You can only use this effect of "PM Arceus" once per turn. If this card leaves the field: Destroy all cards on the field, also halve the LP of both Players. You can only control 1 "PM Arceus".

63369371.name: PM Groudon
63369371.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Spell. While you control a Field Spell: You can reveal 1 "PM" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, add 1 of the Fusion Materials whose name is specifically listed on that card from your Deck to your hand, then you can add 1 Spell from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "PM Groudon" once per turn.

79283153.name: PM Kyogre
79283153.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Spell. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 "PM" monster from your Deck to the GY. While you control a Field Spell: You can discard 1 "PM" card; Special Summon 1 Legendary monster from your hand or Deck, except "PM Kyogre", but negate it's effects. You can only use each effect of "PM Kyogre" once per turn.

94033810.name: PM Mew
94033810.desc: You can discard this card; Add 1 "PM" monster, except "PM Mew" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 Legendary monster, except "PM Mew" from your Deck or GY to your hand. If a Legendary monster is destroyed, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "PM Mew" once per turn.

19962000.name: PM Pikachu
19962000.desc: It is in its nature to constantly store electricity. The forests where Pikachu live are always at risk of lightning storms.

19962001.name: PM Pidgeot
19962001.desc: It spreads its bewitching wings to intimidate the enemy. Its flight speed is Mach 2.

19962002.name: PM Gengar
19962002.desc: If you suddenly feel a chill run down your spine, you have been chosen as Gengar's next victim. Resistance is futile.

19962003.name: PM Empoleon
19962003.desc: If someone were to violate its honor, it would attack with wings that could cut through ice. It avoids unnecessary fights. However, if the safety of the group is in danger, EMPOLEON is relentless.

19962004.name: PM Lopunny
19962004.desc: A very cautious Pokemon that tries to avoid fights. It delivers powerful kicks with its graceful legs.

19962005.name: PM Charizard
19962005.desc: Charizard flies through the air to track down strong opponents. Its hot fire breath melts everything. But it never directs its fire breath at weaker opponents.

19962006.name: PM Mega Charizard X
19962006.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Charizardite X". If this card is Ritual Summoned: Your opponent skips their next Main Phase 1. Negate the effects of face-up Fusion, Synchro, and Xyz Monsters while they are on the field. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "PM" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Mega Charizard X". Your opponent must pay 500 LP to activate card effects.

19962007.name: PM Charizardite X
19962007.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "PM Mega Charizard X". You must also Tribute "PM Charizard" from your hand or field whose total Level equal exactly 7. During the Standby Phase, if you control a "PM" Ritual Monster: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 non-Ritual "PM" monster from your Deck in Defense Position.

19962008.name: PM Thunderbolt
19962008.desc: If you control a face-up "PM Pikachu": Destroy all monsters your opponent control, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each monster destroyed.

19962009.name: PM Surf
19962009.desc: If you control a face-up "PM Pikachu" or WATER "PM" monster: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each card destroyed.

19962010.name: PM Flamethrower
19962010.desc: If you control a face-up FIRE "PM" monster: Inflict 1500 damage to your opponent.

19962011.name: PM Arena
19962011.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1: You can add 1 "PM" Spell/Trap card from your deck to your hand, except "PM Arena". Once per turn: You can Special summon 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your hand or GY.

19962013.name: PM Mega Charizard Y
19962013.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
Once per turn, if you have no Ritual Monster in your hand: You can reveal 1 "PM" Ritual Spell in your hand; Add 1 monster that is listed on the revealed card from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card. If this card in your Pendulum Zone is destroyed: You can add this card to your hand, then if you control no Field Spell, Add 1 "PM Arena" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "PM Mega Charizard Y" once per turn.

[Monster Effect]
You can Ritual Summon this card with "PM Charizardite Y". Must Be Ritual Summoned, and can then be Pendulum Summoned. When a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 Spell from your GY; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. If this card in your Monster Zone is destroyed: You can Special Summon 1 "PM Charizard" from your hand or GY, and if you do, add 1 "PM Mega Charizard X" or "PM Charizardite X" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "PM Mega Charizard Y" once per tur

19962014.name: PM Charizardite Y
19962014.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "PM Mega Charizard Y" from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. You must also Tribute "PM Charizard" from your hand or field whose total Level equal exactly 7. You can only use each of the following effects of "PM Charizardite Y" once per turn. You can shuffle this card from your hand into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. If this card is banished: You can add this card to your hand.

19962030.name: PM Mystery Garden
19962030.desc: If this card is added from your Deck to your hand: Discard this card, then send 1 "PM" card from your Deck to the GY, except "PM Mystery Garden". Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "PM" monster from your Deck to your hand, then if the added card was a Ritual Monster, add 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if you control no monsters: You can Special Summon 1 Legendary monster from your hand, but it cannot declare an attack this turn. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your Deck in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "PM Mystery Garden" per turn.

19962031.name: PM Pokéball
19962031.desc:
When this card is activated: Place 1 "PM" monster from your Deck underneath this card, except a Ritual Monster. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 monster that lays underneath this card.
● Place 1 monster Special Summoned by this cards effect underneath this card.
If the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect is destroyed, destroy this card. If this card leaves the field, shuffle the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect or that lays underneath this card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "PM Pokéball" per turn.

80000086.name: PM Taillow
80000086.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your Deck. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can Special Summon 1 "PM" Normal Monster from your Deck or GY.

80000087.name: PM Mega Lopunny
80000087.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "PM Lopunnite". If this card is Ritual summoned: Destroy 1 face-up monster on the field. If this card is sent to the GY: you can target 1 Ritual monster you control; while it is on the field, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of your Ritual Monsters' Effects. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "PM" card from your Deck to your hand, except "PM Mega Lopunny". You can only use this effect of "PM Mega Lopunny" once per turn.

80000088.name: PM Lopunnite
80000088.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "PM Mega Lopunny". You must also Tribute "PM Lopunny" from your hand or field. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "PM" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand.

80000130.name: PM Necrozma
80000130.desc: You can target 1 "PM Solgaleo" or "PM Lunala" you control; equip this monster from your hand or field to that target. It gains 1000 ATK/DEF. If you have no Spell/Trap Cards in your GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). After this card is Special Summoned this way, you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "PM" monsters.

80000131.name: PM Solgaleo
80000131.desc: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while in the hand or GY. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster. When this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "PM" Ritual Monster or 1 "PM" Ritual Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

80000132.name: PM Lunala
80000132.desc: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while in the hand or GY. You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "PM" monster. When this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "PM" Ritual Monster or 1 "PM" Ritual Spell Card from your GY to your hand.

80000133.name: PM Ultra Necrozma
80000133.desc:
"PM Nekrozma" + "PM Solgaleo" or "PM Lunala"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control. ("Polymerization" is not used.) Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY. During your Main Phase: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card. During your Main Phase: You can destroy as many Equip Cards you control as possible, then draw cards equal to the number of cards destroyed by this effect. You can only use each effect of "PM Ultra Necrozma" once per turn.

199620311.name: PM Ultra Ball
199620311.desc:
(This card is always treated as "PM Pokéball".)
When this card is activated: Place 1 "PM" monster from your Deck underneath this card, except a Ritual Monster. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 monster that lays underneath this card.
● Place 1 monster Special Summoned by this cards effect underneath this card.
If the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect is destroyed, destroy this card. If this card leaves the field, shuffle the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect or that lays underneath this card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "PM Ultra Ball" per turn.

199620312.name: PM Cherish Ball
199620312.desc:
(This card is always treated as "PM Pokéball".)
When this card is activated: Place 1 "PM" monster from your Deck underneath this card, except a Ritual Monster. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● Special Summon 1 monster that lays underneath this card.
● Place 1 monster Special Summoned by this cards effect underneath this card.
If the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect is destroyed, destroy this card. If this card leaves the field, shuffle the monster Special Summoned by this cards effect or that lays underneath this card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "PM Cherish Ball" per turn.

80000082.name: Red-Eyes B. Ash-Dragon
80000082.desc: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while in the hand or Graveyard. If you control no Monster or all monster you control are "Red-Eyes"-monster or Fusionmonster that list a "Red-Eyes" as its Fusiomaterials, you can Special summon this card from your hand. If You control no monster, you can special summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Red-Eyes B. Ash-Dragon" once per turn this way.

80000083.name: Red-Eyes Black Thousand Dragon
80000083.desc:
1 "Red-Eyes" Monster + 1 "Time Wizard"
If your "Red-Eyes" monster attacks, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card, then target 2 "Red-Eyes" non-Fusion Monsters with different names in your GY; Special Summon them. They cannot be destroyed by battle this turn. You can only use this effect of "Red-Eyes Black Thousand Dragon" once per turn.

80000084.name: Red-Eyes Chaos Dragon
80000084.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Chaos Form". You can reveal this card in your hand; add 1 "Red-Eyes" Monster, except "Red-Eyes Chaos Dragon", from your Deck to your hand, then place 1 card from your hand on top of the Deck. You can send 1 "Red-Eyes" Monster from your Deck to the GY; inflict 2400 Damage to your opponent. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can add 1 "Chaos" Ritual Monster, "Chaos Form", "Polymerization", or "Fusion" Spell from your Deck to your hand,  except "Red-Eyes Chaos Dragon" You can only use each effect of "Red-Eyes Chaos Dragon" once per turn.

80000085.name: Red-Eyes Blaster Dragon
80000085.desc:
1 Level 7 or higher "Red-Eyes" Monster + 1 Dragon Effect Monster
This card is unaffected by your opponent's monster effects. You can target 1 "Red-Eyes" Monster in your GY, except "Red-Eyes Blaster Dragon"; inflict Damage to your opponent equal to its ATK, then shuffle it into the Deck or Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Red-Eyes Blaster Dragon" once per turn. Once per turn: You can send up to 2 Dark Dragon monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, for each monster sent to the GY, this card gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase.

14378254.name: Empress of the Abyss
14378254.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
You cannot Pendulum Summon. During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Reptile monster from your hand, except "Empress of the Abyss". If a Reptile monster you control is destroyed by battle, except "Empress of the Abyss": You can discard 1 card; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Empress of the Abyss" once per turn.
------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Pendulum Summoned. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY, then target 1 card on the field; shuffle it into the Deck. If this card you control is destroyed: You can target 1 Level 4 Reptile monster in your GY; Special Summon it, and if you do, place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Empress of the Abyss" once per turn.

18334120.name: Reptilianne Tuchulcha
18334120.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If either Player controls a monster with 0 ATK, You can Special Summon this card (from your GY). You can only Special Summon "Reptilianne Tuchulcha" once per turn this way. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Reptilianne" monster from your GY, except "Reptilianne Tuchulcha". You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; change it's ATK to 0. You can only use each effect of "Reptilianne Tuchulcha" once per turn.

64058920.name: Cute Snake of Terror
64058920.desc:
1 non-Link Reptile monster
If this card is Link Summoned: You can send 1 Reptile monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Reptile monster from your GY. Level 3 or lower Reptile monster(s) this card points to gain 1800 ATK. If this card is Tributed: You can add 1 Reptile monster from GY to your hand, except "Cute Snake of Terror". You can only use each effect of "Cute Snake of Terror".

26674983.name: Alexandrite, the Dragon of Gemstones
26674983.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 Dragon monster. If this card destroyes a monster by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower Normal Dragon monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Alexandrite, the Dragon of Gemstones" once per turn.

957120000.name: Silver Fang, the Howling Wolf
957120000.desc: If you control a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. All Beast monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Beast monster from your GY, except "Silver Fang, the Howling Wolf". You can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Silver Fang" from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Silver Fang, the Howling Wolf" once per turn.

957120001.name: Darkworld Thorns, The Nightmare Flower
957120001.desc: If you control a Level 3 or lower Normal Monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. All Plant monsters you control gain 400 ATK. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Plant monster from your GY, except "Darkworld Thorns, The Nightmare Flower". You can shuffle this card from your GY into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Darkworld Thorns, The Nightmare Flower" from your Deck or GY. You can only use each effect of "Darkworld Thorns, The Nightmare Flower" once per turn.

957120002.name: Growing Flower Wolf
957120002.desc:
"Flower Wolf" + 1 Beast or Plant monster
Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by shuffling the above cards from your field into the Deck/Extra Deck. Cannot be destroyed by battle. All monsters you control gain 1000 ATK. If this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: You can add 1 Level 3 or lower EARTH Normal Monster from your Deck to your hand.

957120005.name: Dark Blade Commander
957120005.desc:
(This card is always treated as "Dark Blade" while on the field or in the GY.)
If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 Dragon monster in either GY; equip that target to this card. This card's ATK becomes the original ATK of the monster equipped to it by this effect. Once per turn:  You can send 1 monster equipped to this card by this card's effect to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Pitch-Dark Dragon" or "Kiryu" from your hand or Deck.

957120007.name: Proud Mystical Sheep
957120007.desc:
(This card is always treated as "Mystical Sheep #2" while on the field or in the GY.)
Once per turn: You can change a number of monsters your opponent controls to Defense Position, up to the number of non-Effect Monsters you control. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Mystical Sheep #2" from your Deck. While this card is in your GY, it is treated as a Normal Monster.

957120008.name: Brightfull Angel
957120008.desc:
(This card is always treated as "Petit Angel" while on the field or in the GY.)
Once per turn, if this card is targeted for an attack: You can move this card to another adjecent (horizontal) unoccupied Monster Zone, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Petit Angel" from your Deck, and if you do, negate that attack. While this card is in your GY, it is treated as a Normal Monster.

957120009.name: Dischanting Mermaid
957120009.desc:
(This card is always treated as "Enchanting Mermaid" while on the field or in the GY.)
When your opponent activates a Normal Spell Card (Quick Effect): You can send this card to the GY; negate the activation, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Enchanting Mermaid" from your Deck.
While this card is in your GY, it is treated as a Normal Monster.

957120010.name: Black Cat Fusionist
957120010.desc:
1 Level 3 or lower EARTH Beast Monster + 1 Level 3 or lower LIGHT Fairy Monster
(This card is always treated as "Fusionist" while on the field or in the GY.)
Once per turn: You can Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster, using this card and other monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material.
You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Fusionist" from your Extra Deck.
You can only use each effect of "Black Cat Fusionist" once per turn.

957120011.name: Super Rare Fish
957120011.desc:
1 EARTH Beast Fusion Monster + 1 WATER Fish Monster
(This card's name is also as "Rare Fish" while on the field or in the GY.)
Double the ATK of all "Rare Fish" and "Fusionist" you control while there are 3 or more non-Effect Monsters in your GY.
Once per turn, if another monster you control would be destroyed by a card effect: You can banish 1 non-Effect Monster from your GY instead.
You can only control 1 "Super Rare Fish".

957130000.name: Armardares The Dark Knight
957130000.desc: This gruesome warrior has fallen into darkness. He comes and kills on the nights when the moon shines on his sword and shows the blood that tarnishes it.

957130004.name: Darkness Stormdragon
957130004.desc: This dragon seeks the eyes of storms, drawn to their chaos and power. It follows the swirling tempests, feeding on the fury of the winds and the crackle of lightning. Wherever the storms rage, the dragon is never far behind, a shadow in the maelstrom, waiting to unleash its own wrath upon the land.

957900001.name: Disposal of the Weak Twin
957900001.desc:
Send 1 Normal Monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, add 1 Effect Monster from your Deck to your hand with the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, and DEF as the sent monster.
You can only activate 1 "Disposal of the Weak Twin" per turn.

65278.name: Pure Chaos
65278.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 LIGHT or DARK monster that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set or 1 "Chaos Soul" card from your Deck to your hand. (Quick Effect): You can Ritual Summon 1 "Chaos" Ritual Monster or "Black Luster Soldier" Ritual Monster from your hand, by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose Levels equal or exceed its Level. If a LIGHT or DARK monster is banished: you can send 1 LIGHT or DARK monster from your Deck to the GY. If a monster is flipped face-up, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Special Summon 1 LIGHT or DARK Synchro Monster, by banishing LIGHT or DARK monsters, including a tuner from your GY. (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon.) You can only use each effect of "Pure Chaos" once per turn.

957100000.name: Wicked Calling
957100000.desc: Special Summon 1 "Souls of the Forgotten" from your Deck. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Souls of the Forgotten" from your GY. You can only use 1 "Wicked Calling" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957100001.name: Forgotten One
957100001.desc: The original ATK of this card is the combined number of banished "Forgotten One", "Wicked Calling" and "Souls of the Forgotten" x 900. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can banish 1 other "Forgotten One", "Wicked Calling" or 1 "Souls of the Forgotten" from your GY; Special Summon this card.

957100002.name: Chaos Soul Tiger
957100002.desc: You can Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT Beast and 1 DARK Beast monster from your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; banish that target. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

957100003.name: Chaos Soul Wolf
957100003.desc:
FLIP: Apply these effects (simultaneously).
●You can destroy 1 card on the field.
●Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
If this card is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 LIGHT Beast monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

957100004.name: Chaos Soul Leo
957100004.desc:
FLIP: Target 1 of your banished LIGHT or DARK Beast monsters; add it to your hand.
If this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: For the rest of this turn, you take no battle damage.

957100005.name: Dark Nightmare Chaos Soul
957100005.desc: You can Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT Beast and 1 DARK Beast monster from your GY. This card's ATK become the number of your banished cards x 300. Each face-up monster your opponent controls loses 100 ATK x the number of your banished cards. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; banish that target. This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect.

957100006.name: Chaos Devouress, Chaos Soul from a Different Dimension
957100006.desc:
1 Level 8 "Chaos Soul" LIGHT Monster + 1 Level 8 "Chaos Soul" DARK monster
This card gains 500 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to it. You can detach 2 materials from this card; Special Summon 1 "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck or hand. You can target 1 card your opponent controls and banish it. You can use each effect of "Chaos Devouress, Chaos Soul from a Different Dimension" only once per turn.

957100007.name: Mharththrish, Terror Dancer of the Chaos Soul
957100007.desc:
1 Level 2 DARK Beast Monster + 1 Level 2 LIGHT Beast Monster
You can target 1 Level 2 Beast monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position. Your opponent cannot target face-up monsters you control for attacks as long as you control face-down Defense Position monsters. You can detach 1 material from this card; banish 1 "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck. You can use each effect of "Mharththrish, Terror Dancer of the Chaos Soul" only once per turn.

957100008.name: Chaos Soul Whirler
957100008.desc:
FLIP: Special Summon 1 Level 2 "Chaos Soul" monster, except "Chaos Soul Whirler" from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.
This card is also treated as a Beast-Type monster while on the field or in the GY. Cannot be used as a Link Material. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card from your GY to your opponent's side of the field. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; change its battle position. You can only use each effect of "Chaos Soul Whirler" once per turn.

957100009.name: Wicked Dance of Chaos Souls
957100009.desc: When this card is activated: You can target 1 monster in face-down Defense Position; change it to face-up Defense Position. All DARK and LIGHT Beast monsters you control gain 300 ATK. You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower "Chaos Soul" monster from your hand in face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Wicked Dance of Chaos Souls" once per turn. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your banished "Chaos Soul" monsters; shuffle it into your Deck.

957100010.name: Chaos Soul Dance Cycle
957100010.desc:
Activate 1 of the following effects:
● Banish 1 LIGHT Beast and 1 DARK Beast monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 8 "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck 
● Discard 1 "Chaos Soul" monster; draw 2 cards.

957100011.name: Bearing Chaos Soul Rat
957100011.desc:
FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Chaos Soul Rat Child Token" (Beast/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 1650/DEF 1850) in Defense Position, and if you do, all monsters your opponent controls lose 400 ATK.
This card cannot be destroyed by battle with a monster that has 1600 or more ATK. If this face-up card leaves the field: You can target 1 monster you control; it cannot be detroyed by battle until the Endphase. You can target 1 face-up monster you control and banish this card from your GY; that monster is treated as a Tuner until the End Phase.

957100012.name: Chaos Soul Rat Child Token
957100012.desc: Special Summoned with the effect of "Bearing Chaos Soul Rat".

957100014.name: Lumentress, Chaos Soul Dancer Between Stars
957100014.desc:
1 LIGHT or DARK Beast Tuner + 1 LIGHT or DARK non-Tuner
If this card is Synchro Summoned: All monsters your opponent controls lose 400 ATK. Once per turn: You can reduce this card's Level by 2. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 of your banished non-Synchro "Chaos Soul" monsters; shuffle it into your Deck.

957100016.name: Call of the Chaos Soul
957100016.desc:
Activate 1 of the following effects based on the current turn player.
● Your Turn: Add 1 "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck to your hand.
● Your Opponent's Turn: Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower "Chaos Soul" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

100000710.name: Ocean Soldier's Shield
100000710.desc: After this card's activation, when your opponent's monster declares an attack: You can banish 2 "Ocean Soldier" monsters from your Graveyard; negate that attack. When this card is destroyed: Target up to 3 of your banished "Ocean Soldier" monsters; shuffle them into the Deck.

100000711.name: Ancient Mystical Pyramid
100000711.desc:
During the Standby Phase: You can shuffle 1 "Ancient Mystical" card from your Graveyard into your Deck; shuffle 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls into the Deck. If this card is destroyed, shuffle it into your Deck, instead of sending it to your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Ancient Mystical" monster you control; then activate 1 of these effects:
● Increase its Level by 1.
● Reduce its Level by 1.

100000712.name: True Nature of the Magical Forest
100000712.desc: Remove 2 Magical Forest Counters from your side of the field; banish 1 card on the field.

100000713.name: Wolf of the Magical Forest
100000713.desc:
1 Level 7, 8 or 10 "Magical Forest" monster
This card gains 50 ATK and DEF for each Magical Forest Counter on the field. Once per turn you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Place 1 Magical Forest Counter on each face-up card you control that you can place a Magical Counter on. If this card is sent to your Graveyard: You can remove 3 Magical Forest Counters from your side of the field; add 1 "Magical Forest" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100000714.name: Path of Death
100000714.desc: Shuffle 1 of your banished "Death" cards into the Deck; add 1 "The Seven Sins of Death" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. Once per Duel: You can banish this card from your Graveyard: Place 1 Death Counter on 1 face-up "The Seven Sins of Death" you control.

100000715.name: Supporter #1 of the Sky Army
100000715.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: Change this card to Defense Position. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Fortress of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 DEF immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000716.name: Leader of the Sky Army
100000716.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by revealing 3 "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Cards in your hand with different names, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Sky Army" monster from your hand or Deck. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. Once per turn, during your turn, if a face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control returns to your hand: You can target 1 card on the field; return that target to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000717.name: Fortress of the Sky Army
100000717.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 "Sky Army" card in your Graveyard; shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card. Each time a face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control returns to your hand, place 1 Sky Army Counter on this card. All "Sky Army" monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF for each Sky Army Counter on this card.

100000718.name: Shield #5 of the Sky Army
100000718.desc: If you control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Your opponent can attack with only 1 monster during each Battle Phase. If you do not control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, send this card to the Graveyard.

100000719.name: Shield #4 of the Sky Army
100000719.desc: If you control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Your opponent cannot Summon/Set more than once per turn. (Negated Summons count toward this limit. Negated cards/effects that would Summon/Set do not count.) If you do not control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, send this card to the Graveyard.

100000720.name: Shield #3 of the Sky Army
100000720.desc: If you control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. If your opponent's monster effect attempts to activate, none of your opponent's monsters can activate their effects for the rest of this turn while this card is face-up on the field. If you do not control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, send this card to the Graveyard.

100000721.name: Shield #2 of the Sky Army
100000721.desc: If you control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Your opponent can only activate 1 Spell/Trap Card each turn and only Set 1 Spell/Trap Card from their hand per turn. If you do not control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, send this card to the Graveyard.

100000722.name: Shield #1 of the Sky Army
100000722.desc: If you control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. During your opponent's End Phase: Your opponent shuffles 1 card from their hand into the Deck. If you do not control a face-up "Sky Army" monster, send this card to the Graveyard.

100000723.name: Soldier #5 of the Sky Army
100000723.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Shield #5 of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000724.name: Soldier #4 of the Sky Army
100000724.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Shield #4 of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000725.name: Soldier #3 of the Sky Army
100000725.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Shield #3 of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000726.name: Soldier #2 of the Sky Army
100000726.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Shield #2 of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000727.name: Soldier #1 of the Sky Army
100000727.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Shield #1 of the Sky Army" from your Deck to your hand. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 ATK immediately after it resolves. During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100000728.name: Bond Between the Phoenix and the Dragon
100000728.desc: Send 1 "Phoenix Dragon" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck to the Graveyard. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Phoenix Dragon" monster from your Graveyard, but its effects are negated, also it cannot be used as a Link, Synchro or Xyz Material.

100000729.name: Holy Golden Fortress
100000729.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Holy Golden" monster and at least 1 card is banished: Shuffle all banished cards into the Deck(s), then gain 100 LP for each card shuffled into the Deck(s) by this effect. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Holy Golden Tokgel Token" (Fairy/Light/Level 3/500 ATK/1000 DEF). This Token cannot be used as a Link or Synchro Material, except for the Summon of a "Holy Golden" monster. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to the activation of "Holy Golden" cards and effects.

100000730.name: Gate to the Other Side
100000730.desc: Once per turn, if your opponent controls at least 1 face-down card: Special Summon 1 "The Other Side" monster from your hand or Graveyard, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn.

100000731.name: Ultimate Battle of Egyptian Divinities
100000731.desc: If your LP are 5000 or less: Target 1 "Egyptian Divinity" Xyz Monster in your Extra Deck and any number of "Egyptian Divinity" monsters in your Graveyard equal to the number of Xyz Materials listed on that Xyz Monster; Special Summon that monster, ignoring its Summoning conditions, and if you do, attach the targeted "Egyptian Divinity" monsters to it as Xyz Material. Your opponent takes no further damage this turn. You can only activate 1 "Ultimate Battle of Egyptian Divinities" per turn.

100000732.name: Hell Creature's Life Absorbing Cocoon
100000732.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Hell Creature" monster. When this card is activated: Banish cards from the top of your opponent's Deck face-down, up to the number of "Hell Creature" monsters you control. All face-up monsters your opponent controls lose 200 ATK for each face-up "Hell Creature" monster you control.

100000733.name: Ghost Pirate's Crew Captain's Lost Brother
100000733.desc:
2 or more (max. 5) Level 1 "Ghost Pirate" monsters
This card gains 250 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to a monster you control. Once per turn, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls lose 500 ATK and DEF. If this card is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "Ghost Pirate's Crew Captain" in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, and if you do, attach this card to it as Xyz Material.

100000734.name: Ghost Pirate's Ship
100000734.desc: Special Summon 1 "Ghost Pirate" monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use this effect of "Ghost Pirate's Ship" once per turn.

100000735.name: Narcissistic Ghost Pirate
100000735.desc:
2 or more (max. 5) Level 1 "Ghost Pirate" monsters
This card gains 500 DEF for each Xyz Material attached to it. Once per turn: You can inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each Xyz Material attached to this card. Once per turn, you can detach 3 Xyz Materials from this card; draw 1 card.

100000736.name: The Seven Sins of Death
100000736.desc: If a "Deadly Sin" monster is Summoned: Place 1 Death Counter on this card. All "Deadly Sin" monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF for each Death Counter on this card. If you have 7 or more "Deadly Sin" monsters with different names in your Graveyard: You can remove 7 Death Counters from this card to inflict 7000 damage to your opponent.

100000737.name: The Approaching Death
100000737.desc: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Deadly Sin" monster in your Graveyard; this card's name becomes that target's original name, and replace this effect with that target's original effects. You can banish this card from your Graveyard to target up to 7 of your banished "Deadly Sin Ritual" card(s); shuffle them into your Deck.

100000738.name: War Machine Dragon's Transporter
100000738.desc: Banish 1 "War Machine Dragon XN-1000" and 1 "War Machine Dragon XT-1000" from your Graveyard: Special Summon 2 "War Machine Dragon" monsters from your Deck or Graveyard, except  "War Machine Dragon XN-1000", "War Machine Dragon XT-1000" or "War Machine Dragon" Synchro Monsters.

100000739.name: Mad Ghost Pirate
100000739.desc:
2 "Ghost Pirate" monsters
This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card can only be Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by sending the above cards you control to your Graveyard. (You do not use "Polymerization".) This card gains 100 ATK for each "Ghost Pirate" monster in your Graveyard. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. Cannot attack directly.

100000740.name: War Machine Dragons on the Frontline
100000740.desc: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon it, and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 "War Machine Dragon" Synchro Monster using only monsters you control as Materials, including the Summoned monster.

100000741.name: War Machine Dragon S-2000-2
100000741.desc:
1 "War Machine Dragon" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "War Machine Dragon" monsters
This monster gains 100 ATK and DEF for each non-Tuner "War Machine Dragon" monster in your Graveyard. Other "War Machine Dragon" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.

100000742.name: War Machine Dragon S-2000-1
100000742.desc:
1 "War Machine Dragon" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "War Machine Dragon" monsters
This monster gains 100 ATK and DEF for each Tuner "War Machine Dragon" monster in your Graveyard. Other "War Machine Dragon" monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects.

100000743.name: Dream Spirit of Force
100000743.desc: You can banish 1 "Dream Spirit" monster from your hand or Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to have this card's Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, DEF and name become equal to the selected monster's Level, Type, Attribute, original ATK, original DEF and name. If this card is banished by a "Dream Spirit" card's effect: Look at your opponent's Deck or Extra Deck and send 1 of those cards to the Graveyard.

100000744.name: Peaceful Heaven of Angels
100000744.desc: During the Standby Phase, while at least 1 of your "Angel" monsters is banished: Banish the top card of your opponent's Deck, face-down.

100000745.name: Master Spell of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000745.desc: Target 1 "Dark Forbidden Magic" monster you control; return it to the Deck or Extra Deck, then Special Summon from your Deck or Extra Deck, 1 "Dark Forbidden Magic" monster with the same Level as that monster's original Level, but with a different name, ignoring its Summoning conditions. It cannot attack this turn.

100000746.name: Book of Dark Forbidden Magic Support
100000746.desc: Equip only to a "Dark Forbidden Magic" monster. It gains 500 ATK and DEF for each "Forbidden Magic" Equip Spell Card in your Graveyard.

100000747.name: Power of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000747.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Forbidden Magic" Equip Spell Card. Negate the activation and effect of a card and if you do, banish that card, face-down.

100000748.name: Book Collection of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000748.desc: Send 1 "Forbidden Magic" card, except "Book Collection of Dark Forbidden Magic", you control or from your hand to the Graveyard; draw 2 cards. You can activate only 1 "Book Collection of Dark Forbidden Magic" per turn.

100000749.name: Angel of Enlightenment
100000749.desc:
2 Level 8 "Angel" monsters
This card gains 200 ATK and DEF for each of your banished "Angel" monster(s) and each "Angel" monster(s) in your Graveyard. During either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated: You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. If you activate this effect: Your opponent takes no further damage this turn. If this card is destroyed: You can banish this card. If this card is banished by an "Angel" card's effect: You can add 1 "Wrath of Angels" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.  You can only activate 1 "Angel of Enlightenment" effect once per turn (the banishing through destroying doesn't count) and only control 1 "Angel of Enlightenment". During each of your Standby Phases: You take 800 damage.

100000750.name: Steampunk Journey
100000750.desc: Send 1 "Steampunk" monster from your hand to the Graveyard. If a "Steampunk" Synchro Monster you control leaves the field while this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard and pay 2000 LP; target 1 of those Synchro Monsters and Special Summon 1 "Steampunk" Synchro Monster with a different name from your Extra Deck.

100000751.name: Steampunk Airship
100000751.desc:
1 "Steampunk" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Steampunk" monsters
As long as "Steampunk City" remains face-up on the field, this card can attack your opponent's LP directly, but when it does so using this effect, the battle damage inflicted to your opponent is halved. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card. If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Damage Step.

100000752.name: Steampunk Baby Dragon
100000752.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Steampunk Baby Dragon" once per turn.

100000753.name: Ghost Pirate's Cursed Treasure
100000753.desc: When this card is activated: You can target 1 "Ghost Pirate" Spell/Trap Card in your Graveyard, except "Ghost Pirate's Cursed Treasure"; add it to your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Ghost Pirate" Xyz Monster you control, attach 1 "Ghost Pirate" monster from your Graveyard to that monster as Xyz Material.

100000754.name: Sword of the Legendary Lightning
100000754.desc: Equip only to a "Lightning Dragon" monster you control. It gains 500 ATK. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1  "Lightning Dragon - The Legend" from your hand or Deck, and if you do, equip this card to it. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

100000755.name: Angel's Path to Heaven
100000755.desc: Activate only while "Paradise of Angels" is on the field. You take no effect damage. Once per turn, when a face-up "Angel" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can negate the attack.

100000756.name: Angel of Heaven's Gate
100000756.desc: You can increase this card's Level by 4 until the End Phase. If you activate this effect: Your opponent takes no further damage this turn. If this card is destroyed: You can banish this card. If this card is banished by an "Angel" card's effect: You can banish 1 "God of Angels" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard. You can only activate 1 "Angel of Heaven's Gate" effect once per turn (the banishing through destroying doesn't count) and only control 1 "Angel of Heaven's Gate". During each of your Standby Phases: You take 800 damage.

100000757.name: Insidious Ghost Pirate
100000757.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch. If you Summon a "Ghost Pirate" Xyz Monster: You can attach this card from your Deck to a "Ghost Pirate" Xyz Monster as a Xyz Material. You can only use this effect of "Insidious Ghost Pirate" once per turn.

100000758.name: Wannabe Ghost Pirate Crew Captain
100000758.desc:
2 "Ghost Pirate" monsters
This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card can only be Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by sending the above cards you control to your Graveyard. (You do not use "Polymerization".) If a "Ghost Pirate" monster is Summoned: This card gains 100 ATK. This card can attack your opponent directly, but when it uses this effect, any battle damage it inflicts to your opponent is halved.

100000759.name: Plundering Ghost Pirates
100000759.desc: Reveal any number of "Ghost Pirate" monsters from your hand and shuffle them into the Deck, then add 1 "Ghost Pirate" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck to your hand.

100000760.name: Ghost Pirate's Defensive
100000760.desc: Shuffle all "Ghost Pirate" monsters from your Graveyard into your Deck, then gain 100 LP for each "Ghost Pirate" monster shuffled into your Deck by this effect.

100000761.name: True Form of Ghost Pirate's Ship
100000761.desc: The first time each "Ghost Pirate" monster you control would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. You take no battle damage from battles involving "Ghost Pirate" monsters you control.

100000762.name: Messy Ghost Pirate
100000762.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons a monster, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Cruel Ghost Pirates" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000763.name: Alone Rowing Ghost Pirate
100000763.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent Sets a card, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Alone Rowing Ghost Pirate" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000764.name: Super Motivated Ghost Pirate
100000764.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent Special Summons a monster, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Super Motivated Ghost Pirate" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000765.name: Cannon Ghost Pirate
100000765.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent activates a Trap Card, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Cannon Ghost Pirate" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000766.name: Ghost Pirate's Watcher
100000766.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent activates the effect of a monster, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Ghost Pirate's Watcher" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000767.name: Hungry Ghost Pirate
100000767.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. When your opponent activates a Spell Card, Special Summon this card from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Hungry Ghost Pirate" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000768.name: Ghost Pirate's Crew Captain
100000768.desc:
2 or more (max. 5) Level 1 "Ghost Pirate" monsters
This card gains 500 ATK for each Xyz Material attached to it. You can only use 1 "Ghost Pirate's Crew Captain" effect per turn, and only once per turn, depending on the number of Xyz Materials you detach to activate this effect:
● 2: Target 1 card your opponent's controls and return it to the hand, then detach all other Xyz Materials from this card.
● 3: Target 1 card your opponent's controls and destroy it, then detach all other Xyz Materials from this card.
● 4: Shuffle 1 card your opponent's controls into the Deck, then detach all other Xyz Materials from this card.
● 5: Banish 1 card your opponent's controls, face-down, then detach all other Xyz Materials from this card.

100000769.name: Ghost Dragon of Total Despair
