100000769.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Unsealing of Infinite Darkness" and cannot be Summoned by other ways. If this card is Summoned: Send all other cards on your side of the field to the Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned: Look at your opponent's hand; select 1 card from their hand and discard it to the Graveyard. If this card is banished: You can shuffle 1 "Ghost Dragon" card from your Graveyard into your Deck.

100000770.name: Ghost Dragon of the Beginning End
100000770.desc: If this card is sent to your Graveyard by a "Ghost Dragon" card's effect: Draw 1 card.

100000771.name: Ghost Dragon's Rage
100000771.desc: Add 1 "Ghost Dragon" Field Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

100000772.name: Sealing the Curse of the Ghost Dragons
100000772.desc: Add 1 of your banished "Ghost Dragon" monsters to your hand.

100000773.name: Triumph of Angels
100000773.desc: Banish 1 "Angel" monster from your side of the field; draw 2 cards. During your Main Phase 1: You can banish this card from your Graveyard to inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each "Angel" monster you control. If you activate this effect: Your opponent takes no further damage this turn. You can only use 1 "Triumph of Angels" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

100000774.name: Ocean Soldier Florence
100000774.desc:
2 Level 3 "Ocean Soldier" monsters
During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your Graveyard to gain 100 LP for each "Ocean Soldier" card in your Graveyard, otherwise take 100 LP damage  for each "Ocean Soldier" card in your Graveyard. You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from this card, then activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: All "Ocean Soldier" monsters you currently control gain 250 ATK and DEF.
● 5000 LP or less: All "Ocean Soldier" monsters you currently control gain 500 ATK and DEF.
● 2000 LP or less: All "Ocean Soldier" monsters you currently control gain 750 ATK and DEF.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Florence" once per turn.

100000775.name: Ocean Soldier's Final Attack
100000775.desc:
Activate only if you control a face-up "Ocean Soldier" monster. You can activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Negate the Normal Summon or Flip Summon of a monster and destroy it.
● 5000 LP or less: Negate the Special Summon of a monster(s) and destroy it.
● 2000 LP or less: Negate the activation of an effect and destroy the card.
You can only use the effect of "Ocean Soldier's Final Attack" once per turn.

100000776.name: Ocean Soldier's Merciless Strike
100000776.desc:
You can activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Special Summon 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your hand.
● 5000 LP or less: Special Summon 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Graveyard.
● 2000 LP or less: Special Summon 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Deck.
You can only use the effect of "Ocean Soldier's Merciless Strike" once per turn.

100000777.name: Ocean Soldier Oscar
100000777.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Send 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard.
● 5000 LP or less: Add 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Graveyard to your hand.
● 2000 LP or less: Add 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Deck to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Oscar" once per turn.

100000778.name: Ocean Soldier James
100000778.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard, then your opponent draws 1 card.
● 5000 LP or less: Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.
● 2000 LP or less: Send 2 random cards from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier James" once per turn.

100000779.name: Ocean Soldier John
100000779.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Draw 1 card.
● 5000 LP or less: Draw 2 cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck.
● 2000 LP or less: Draw 3 cards, then shuffle 2 cards from your hand into the Deck.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier John" once per turn.

100000780.name: Ocean Soldier Axel
100000780.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Banish 1 card from your opponent's Graveyard.
● 5000 LP or less: Banish 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard.
● 2000 LP or less: Banish 3 cards from your opponent's Graveyard.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Axel" once per turn.

100000781.name: Ocean Soldier's Harbor
100000781.desc: You can pay 1000 LP to add 1 "Ocean Soldier" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, except "Ocean Soldier's Harbor". You can only use the effect of "Ocean Soldier's Harbor" once per turn.

100000782.name: Ocean Soldier Arthur
100000782.desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 3 "Ocean Soldier" monsters from your hand, field or Graveyard, except "Ocean Soldier Arthur". During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Ocean Soldier Arthur" per turn, and only once that turn:
● Your LP become 7000.
● Your LP become 5000.
● Your LP become 2000.

100000783.name: Ocean Soldier Simon
100000783.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy it.
● 5000 LP or less: Target 2 Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls; destroy them.
● 2000 LP or less: Target 3 Spell/Trap Cards your opponent controls; destroy them.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Simon" once per turn.

100000784.name: Ocean Soldier Max
100000784.desc:
During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. Reveal 1 "Ocean Soldier" card from your hand to activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.
● 5000 LP or less: Target 2 monsters your opponent controls; destroy them.
● 2000 LP or less: Target 3 monsters your opponent controls; destroy them.
You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Max" once per turn.

100000785.name: Assistant #2 for Dark Forbidden Magic
100000785.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Library of Dark Forbidden Magic" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "Hidden Notes of Forbidden Magic" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100000786.name: Dark Forbidden Magic Study
100000786.desc: Add or return 1 "Dark Forbidden Magic" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand or Extra Deck, except a Normal Monster.

100000787.name: Assistant #1 for Dark Forbidden Magic
100000787.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Dark Forbidden Magic" Normal Monster from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

100000788.name: Library of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000788.desc: Once per turn: You can add 1 "Forbidden Magic" Equip Spell Card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. All "Dark Forbidden Magic" monsters you control gain 500 ATK and DEF for each face-up "Forbidden Magic" Equip Spell Card on your side of the field.

100000789.name: Legendary Magician of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000789.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Hidden Notes of Dark Forbidden Magic" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Summoned: You can banish up to 3 cards from your opponent's Deck and/or Extra Deck.

100000790.name: Hidden Notes of Dark Forbidden Magic
100000790.desc: Shuffle 1 "Forbidden Magic Vol. 1 - Dark Knowledge", 1 "Forbidden Magic Vol. 2 - Dark Practice" and 1 "Forbidden Magic Vol. 3 - Dark Secrets" from your hand, field or Graveyard to your Deck to Special Summon 1 "Legendary Magician of Dark Forbidden Magic" from your Extra Deck.

100000791.name: Magician of Dark Forbidden Magic Knowledge
100000791.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Forbidden Magic Vol. 1 - Dark Knowledge" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Summoned: Shuffle 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck.

100000792.name: Magician of Dark Forbidden Magic Secrets
100000792.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Forbidden Magic Vol. 3 - Dark Secrets" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Summoned: Shuffle 1 monster from your opponent's side of the field into the Deck.

100000793.name: Forbidden Magic Vol. 1 - Dark Knowledge
100000793.desc: Equip only to "Apprentice of Dark Forbidden Magic Knowledge". If this face-up card is sent to the Graveyard: Banish 1 Spell/Trap Card from your opponent's Graveyard. If you control the equipped monster and this card: You can send both to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Magician of Dark Forbidden Magic Knowledge" from your Extra Deck.

100000794.name: Forbidden Magic Vol. 3 - Dark Secrets

● 3: Each player discards the top 3 cards from their Decks to the Graveyard. Then each player swaps their Graveyard with the cards in their Deck. After that each player shuffles their hand into their Deck and draws 1 card. 
● 5: Shuffle all cards on the field into the Decks.

● 1: Target 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field. As long as it is on the field it cannot change its battle position or attack.
● 2: As long as this card is face-up on the field: Your opponent can only activate 1 Spell/Trap Card per turn.

100000907.name: Deadly Sin Gluttony
100000907.desc:
You can discard this card from your hand to add up to 2 “Deadly Sin” cards from your Deck to your hand. If you activate this effect, you cannot add cards from your Deck to your hand, until the end of this turn. This card cannot be used as a Xyz Material. Increase this card's ATK and DEF by 100 points for each Deadly Sin Counter on the field. If a "Deadly Sin" monster is Summoned: Place 1 Deadly Sin Counter on this card. You can activate each of these effects once per turn, depending on the Deadly Sin Counters you remove from this card: 
● 1: Inflict 700 damage to your opponent. Then target 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field; reduce its ATK and DEF by 700 points.
● 2: This turn, this card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each.

100000908.name: The Death
100000908.desc: You can discard this card from your hand to add  1 "Ritual of Death" from your Deck to your hand. You can use this effect of "The Death" only once per turn. This card cannot be used as a Xyz Material. The ATK and DEF is the combined number of Deadly Sin Counters on the field x 700. If a "Deadly Sin" monster is Summoned: Place 1 Deadly Sin Counter on this card. Once per turn: You can place 1 Deadly Sin Counter on each of your face-up "Deadly Sin" monsters. If you control a "Deadly Sin" monster: This card is unaffected by all other card's effects. You can only control 1 "The Death".

100000909.name: Ritual of Death
100000909.desc: You can discard this card from your hand to add  1 "The Death" from your Deck to your hand. You can use this effect of "Ritual of Death" only once per turn. This card is used to Ritual Summon "The Death" from your hand or Graveyard. Send "Deadly Sin" monster(s) from your Deck to your Graveyard whose total Levels are equal exactly 7. You can banish this card from your Graveyard to target up to 7 "Deadly Sin" monsters in your Graveyard and to shuffle them into your Deck.

100000910.name: Lightning Dragon - The Hyper Beam
100000910.desc: If you control a "Lightning Dragon" monster: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). During your turn, if this card is in your Graveyard, you can activate the following effect: Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck. When your opponent draws this card, it is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field in face-up Defense Position. All monsters, except "Lightning Dragon" monsters, on the field of this card's controller, that were Summoned from the hand, cannot activate their effects, their effects are negated and they cannot declare an attack as long as this card remains face-up on the field. Cannot be used as a Link, Fusion, Synchro or Xyz Material. Cannot be Tributed. If a "Lightning Dragon" monster is Summoned: This card gains 500 ATK. Once per turn: You can reduce this card's ATK by 750 points, then if its ATK has been reduced to 0 as a result, send this card to the Graveyard. Control of this card cannot switch.

100000921.desc:

This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card can only be Summoned as a Special Summon from your Extra Deck by sending the above cards from your side of the field and/or Extra Deck to your Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon as many "Crystal Beast" cards as possible from your Spell & Trap Card Zone. Once per turn: You can reveal 3 "Crystal Beast" monsters from your Deck, then your opponent randomly adds 1 of them to your hand and you shuffle the rest back into the deck. If this card would be destroyed, you can send 1"Crystal Beast" from your Spell & Trap Card Zone to the Graveyard instead. If this face-up card is destroyed while it is in a Monster Card Zone, you can place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Card Zone as a Continuous Spell Card, instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

100000922.name: Ancient Mystical Mountain

This card can only be Special Summoned from your hand, if you control at least 1 "Ancient Mystical" monster and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During your opponent's turn: You can shuffle this card from your Graveyard into your Deck to Special Summon 1 "Ancient Mystical Object" monster from your Main or Extra Deck.

If this card is banished by a "Dream Spirit" card's effect: You can add 1 monster from your opponent's Graveyard to your hand or to your Extra Deck if it can't be added to your hand.

You can Special Summon this card from your hand by Tributing up to 4 "Magical Forest" monsters. This card gains 750 ATK and DEF for each of those Tributed monsters. You can discard this card to the Graveyard to add 1 "Magical Forest" card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, except "Guardian of the Magical Forest". If this card is Tributed by a "Magical Forest" card's effect: Negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls, until the End Phase of your opponent's turn.

100000964.name: Accelerated Growth of the Magical Forest
100000964.desc: Special Summon 1 "Magical Forest" monster from your Deck or Graveyard. That monster cannot be used for a Link, Fusion, Synchro or Xyz Summon. You can activate only 1 "Accelerated Growth of the Magical Forest" per turn.

100000965.name: Shining Stone of the Magical Forest
100000965.desc: Each time a "Magical Forest" monster is Special Summoned, place 1 Magical Forest Counter on this card. If a face-up "Magical Forest" monster(s), you control, would be destroyed by battle or a card effect, you can remove 1 Magical Forest Counter from your side of the field for each of those "Magical Forest" monster(s) instead.

100000966.name: Night Flower of the Magical Forest
100000966.desc: During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Magical Forest" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. This effect can only be used once per turn. Each time a "Magical Forest" monster is Special Summoned, place 1 Magical Forest Counter on this card. Once per turn: You can remove 3 Magical Forest Counters from this card; draw 1 card.

100000967.name: Magical Forest
100000967.desc: Each time a "Magical Forest" monster is Special Summoned, place 1 Magical Forest Counter on this card. All "Magical Forest" monsters you control gain 100 ATK and DEF for each Magical Forest Counter on the field. Once per turn: You can remove 1 Magical Forest Counter from this card: Target 1 card on the field; destroy it.

100000968.name: Tree of Hope of the Magical Forest.
100000968.desc: Shuffle 3 "Magical Forest" monsters from your Graveyard into your Deck, then draw 2 cards. You can only activate 1 "Tree of Hope of the Magical Forest" per turn.

100000969.name: Specsphinx
100000969.desc: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard by banishing 1 Rock-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard. Once per turn: You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Rock-Type "Sphinx" monster from your hand, Deck or Graveyard. If this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 banished Rock-Type monster to your hand.

100000970.name: Swisphinx
100000970.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 1
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can switch the ATK and DEF of all face-up Rock-Type monsters on your side of the field.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When this card is Normal Summoned: Add 1 "Sphinx" monster from your Main Deck, Extra Deck or Graveyard to your hand. Once per turn: You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Exxod, Master of the Guard" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100000971.name: Fadosphinx
100000971.desc:
Pendulum Scale = 7
[ Pendulum Effect ]
Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can change any number of Rock-Type monsters on your side of the field into face-down Defense Position. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters on your side of the field, then return them in face-down Defense Position. If a Rock-Type monster in Defense Position is attacked, double any battle damage to the controller of the attacking monster.
----------------------------------------
[ Monster Effect ]
When this card is Normal Summoned: Add 1 "Sphinx" monster from your Main Deck, Extra Deck or Graveyard to your hand. Once per turn: You can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Exxod, Master of the Guard" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100000972.name: Earth Mirror Orb
100000972.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Sandstorm Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000973.name: Water Mirror Orb
100000973.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Drowning Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000974.name: Fire Mirror Orb
100000974.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Blazing Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000975.name: Wind Mirror Orb
100000975.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Storming Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000976.name: Light Mirror Orb
100000976.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Radiant Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000977.name: Dark Mirror Orb
100000977.desc: FLIP: Select 1 "Dark Mirror Force" or 1 "Mirror Force" from your Deck and add it to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly.

100000978.name: Lord of Mirrors
100000978.desc:
2 Level 1 "Mirror Orb" monsters
When this card is Summoned: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz material to add 1 "Mirror Force" Normal Trap Card from your Graveyard to your hand. This monster can attack your opponent's LP directly. You can activate "Mirror Force" Normal Trap Cards from your hand.

100000979.name: Wadda Hell?!
100000979.desc: During either player's Draw Phase: Banish this card from your Deck, hand or Graveyard. The activation of this card cannot be negated. Unaffected by other cards' effects. During your Draw Phase, while this card is banished: Add 1 random card from your opponent's Deck to your hand. Then skip your next Draw Phase. During your opponent's Draw Phase, while this card is banished: Your opponent adds 1 random card from your Deck to their hand. Then skip your opponent's next Draw Phase.

100000980.name: Steampunk Horse
100000980.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy that target.

100000981.name: Steampunk Bat
100000981.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can target 1 face-down card on the field; destroy that target.

100000982.name: Steampunk Wolf
100000982.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

100000983.name: Steampunk Hawk
100000983.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.

100000984.name: Steampunk Fighter
100000984.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can add 1 "Steampunk" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Steampunk Fighter" once per turn.

100000985.name: Steampunk Mechanic
100000985.desc: Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. If this card is sent from your hand to your Graveyard by a "Steampunk" card's effect: You can Special Summon it from the Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Steampunk Mechanic" once per turn.

100000986.name: Steampunk Wizard
100000986.desc:
1 "Steampunk" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Steampunk" monsters
Once per turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card. Add 1 "Steampunk" card from your Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Steampunk Wizard" once per turn.

100000987.name: Steampunk Time Machine
100000987.desc: Target 1 Level 4 "Steampunk" monster in your Graveyard, then send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

100000988.name: Steampunk Library
100000988.desc: When you activate this card, draw 1 card. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then gain 1000 LP.

100000989.name: Steampunk City
100000989.desc: All "Steampunk" monsters on your side of the field gain 50 ATK and DEF for each "Steampunk" monster in your Graveyard. Each time a "Steampunk" card is sent from your hand to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Steampunk" card: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

100000990.name: Summoner of Restriction
100000990.desc: This card's name becomes "Thousand-Eyes Idol" while it is on the field, hand or Graveyard. You can reveal this card until the End Phase to add 1 "Relinquished" and 1 "Relinquished Fusion" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Summoner of Restriction" once per turn.

100000991.name: Summoner of Black Illusion
100000991.desc: You can reveal this card until the End Phase to add 1 "Relinquished" and 1 "Black Illusion Ritual" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Summoner of Black Illusion" once per turn. You can banish this card from your Graveyard to shuffle all your banished "Call of Millenium-Eyes" cards into the Deck.

100000992.name: Call of Millennium-Eyes
100000992.desc: Add 1 monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, that specifically lists the card "Relinquished" in its text. You can banish this card from your Graveyard to shuffle each banished "Relinquished" and each card that specifically lists the card "Relinquished" in its text into your Deck, except "Call of Millennium-Eyes".

100000993.name: Millennium-Eyes of Infinite Bonds
100000993.desc:
"Relinquished" + "Thousand-Eyes Restrict" + "Millennium-Eyes Restrict"
Must be Fusion Summoned with the above Fusion Materials and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. This card's name becomes "Thousand-Eyes Restrict" while it is in your Extra Deck. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls or in their Graveyard; equip that target to this card. Gains ATK and DEF equal to the combined ATK and DEF of the monsters equipped to it by this effect. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Your opponent takes all battle damage that you would have taken from battle involving this card. When another monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can change the attack target to this card.

100000994.name: Ultimate Judgment Dragon
100000994.desc:
This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by having 7 or more "Lightsworn" monsters and 3 "Judgment Dragon" in your Graveyard. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 5 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. You can pay 2000 LP to activate 1 of these effects: 
● Banish all cards from your opponent's side of the field. 
● Banish all cards from your opponent's hand. 
● Banish all cards from your opponent's Graveyard.

100000995.name: Lightsworn Unity
100000995.desc: Add 1 Spell/Trap Card from your Graveyard to your hand, that specifically lists "Lightsworn" and/or "Judgment Dragon" monster(s) in its text, except "Lightsworn Unity". You can only use this effect of "Lightsworn Unity" once per turn. If this card is sent from your Deck to your Graveyard: You can add it to your hand.

100000996.name: Urna, Lightsworn Blessing
100000996.desc: As long as this card is on the field or in your Graveyard: Cards cannot be banished. If this card is banished or in your Graveyard: You can discard 1 card from your hand, except "Urna, Lightsworn Blessing", to add this card to your hand. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

100000997.name: Aches, Lightsworn Knight
100000997.desc: When this card is Summoned: You gain 1000 LP. If this card is sent to your Graveyard: You can return it to your Deck. Once per turn, if you have a face-up "Lightsworn" monster: You can discard this card from your hand to destroy a face-up card on the field. During each of your End Phases: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.

100000998.name: Lury, Lightsworn Messenger
100000998.desc: If this card is sent to your Graveyard: Add 1 "Judgment Dragon" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Lury, Lightsworn Messenger" once per turn.

100000999.name: Ghost Dragon of the Approaching End
100000999.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Unsealing of Infinite Darkness" or its own effect and cannot be Summoned by other ways. If this card is Summoned: Send all other cards on your side of the field to your Graveyard. You can send 1 card from your opponent's side of the field to the Graveyard. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field. If this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish 3 "Ghost Dragon" monsters from your Graveyard; Special Summon this card from your Graveyard.

100001100.name: Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)
100001100.desc: If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Kaio" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001101.name: Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ1
100001101.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Teleportation" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ2" from your hand or Deck.

100001102.name: Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ2
100001102.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Kamehameha" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned:  You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ3" from your hand or Deck.

100001103.name: Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ3
100001103.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Dragon Fist" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. Once per turn: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's: Potara Earring" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001104.name: Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)
100001104.desc: If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's It's Over 9000!!!" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001105.name: Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1
100001105.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Big Bang Attack" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2" from your hand or Deck.

100001106.name: Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2
100001106.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Final Flash" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)" from your hand or Deck.

100001107.name: Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)
100001107.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Self-destruction" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001108.name: Z Fighter Kid Trunks (Normal)
100001108.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goten" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Fusion Dance" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Kid Trunks SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001109.name: Z Fighter Son Goten (Normal)
100001109.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Kid Trunks" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Fusion Dance" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goten SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001110.name: Z Fighter Son Goten SSJ1
100001110.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Kid Trunks" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter Kid Trunks (Normal)" from your Deck to your hand.

100001111.name: Z Fighter Kid Trunks SSJ1
100001111.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goten" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.  If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter Son Goten (Normal)" from your Deck to your hand.

100001112.name: Z Fighter Kuririn
100001112.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Taiyo-ken" or 1 "Z Fighter's Destructo Disk" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Z Fighter" monster from your Deck or hand, except "Z Fighter Kuririn".

100001113.name: Z Fighter Piccolo
100001113.desc: If you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Gohan" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Special Beam Cannon" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. When a face-up "Z Fighter Son Gohan" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can change the attack target to this card. If this card is attacked and destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon this card.

100001114.name: Z Fighter Son Gohan (Normal)
100001114.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)" from your Deck or hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001115.name: Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ1
100001115.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Piccolo" from your Deck to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned:  You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ2" from your hand or Deck.

100001116.name: Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ2
100001116.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Final Kamehameha" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001117.name: Z Fighter Future Trunks (Normal)
100001117.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)" from your Deck or hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Future Trunks SSJ1" from your hand or Deck.

100001118.name: Z Fighter Future Trunks SSJ1
100001118.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Time Machine" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand. During your Standby Phase, except the turn this card was Summoned: You can shuffle this face-up card into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Future Trunks USSJ" from your hand or Deck.

100001119.name: Z Fighter Future Trunks USJ
100001119.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Z Fighter's Bulma" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001120.name: Z Fighter Vegito (Normal)
100001120.desc:
"Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)" + "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)"
Must be Special Summoned with "Z Fighter's Potara Earring" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card destroys a monster by battle: It gains 250 ATK. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this face-up card is returned from the field to your Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)" and 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)" from your Deck or hand.

100001121.name: Z Fighter Vegito SSJ1
100001121.desc:
"Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ1" + "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1"
Must be Special Summoned with "Z Fighter's Potara Earring" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card destroys a monster by battle: It gains 500 ATK. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this face-up card is returned from the field to your Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)" and 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)" from your Deck or hand.

100001122.name: Z Fighter Gogeta
100001122.desc:
"Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ2" + "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2"
Must be Special Summoned with "Z Fighter's Fusion Dance" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by other cards' effects. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish that opponent's monster, face-down. During your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)" and 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)" from your Deck or hand.

100001123.name: Z Fighter Gotenks (Normal)
100001123.desc:
"Z Fighter Kid Trunks (Normal)" + "Z Fighter Son Goten (Normal)"
Must be Special Summoned with "Z Fighter's Fusion Dance" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter's Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack Token" (Warrior-Type/Earth/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 0). When the "Z Fighter's Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack Token" is destroyed by battle, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. During your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goten (Normal)" and 1 "Z Fighter Kid Trunks (Normal)" from your Deck or hand.

100001124.name: Z Figther Gotenks SSJ3
100001124.desc:
"Z Fighter Kid Trunks SSJ1" + "Z Fighter Son Goten SSJ1"
Must be Special Summoned with "Z Fighter's Fusion Dance" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can Special Summon any number of "Z Fighter's Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack Token" (Warrior-Type/Earth/Level 1/ATK 500/DEF 0). When the "Z Fighter's Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack Token" is destroyed by battle, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. During your Standby Phase: Shuffle this card into the Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter Son Goten (Normal)" and 1 "Z Fighter Kid Trunks (Normal)" from your Deck or hand.

100001125.name: Z Fighter's Kaio-ken
100001125.desc: Target 1 face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster you control; It gains 1000 ATK and DEF until the End Phase.

100001126.name: Z Fighter's Teleportation
100001126.desc: Target 1 face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster you control; banish it. During either player's turn: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 of your banished "Z Fighter Son Goku" monsters.

100001127.name: Z Fighter's Kamehameha
100001127.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku", "Z Fighter Son Gohan", "Z Fighter Son Goten", "Z Fighter Kuririn", "Z Fighter Vegito", "Z Fighter Gotenks" or "Z Fighter Gogeta" monster. Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it.

100001128.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Fist
100001128.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ3". Banish 1 card on the field.

100001129.name: Z Fighter's It's Over 9000!!!
100001129.desc: Target 1 face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster you control; its ATK becomes 9001 until the end of your opponent's turn, but your opponent takes no battle damage from attacks involving it.

100001130.name: Z Fighter's Big Bang Attack
100001130.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1",  "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2" or  "Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)". Target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it.

100001131.name: Z Fighter's Final Flash
100001131.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2" or  "Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)". Target 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them.

100001132.name: Z Fighter's Self-destruction
100001132.desc: Tribute 1 "Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)" you control. Destroy all cards on the field. For the rest of this turn, you cannot Summon/Set monsters.

100001133.name: Z Fighter's Genkidama
100001133.desc: If you do not control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster, destroy this card. During your Standby Phase: Send this card to the Graveyard; destroy all cards your opponent controls.

100001134.name: Z Fighter's Taiyo-ken
100001134.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Kuririn" or "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster. Draw 1 card, also skip your opponent's next Battle Phase.

100001135.name: Z Fighter's Destructo Disk
100001135.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Kuririn". Target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy it.

100001136.name: Z Fighter's Special Beam Cannon
100001136.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Piccolo". Target 1 Card your opponent controls in the same column as this activated card; destroy it.

100001137.name: Z Fighter's Final Kamehameha
100001137.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ2" and a "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster is in your Graveyard: Destroy up to 3 cards your opponent controls.

100001138.name: Z Fighter's Time Machine
100001138.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Future Trunks" monster. Target up to 2 "Z Fighter" monster(s) in your Graveyard; add them to your hand.

100001139.name: Z Fighter's Bulma
100001139.desc: Add 1 "Z Fighter's Time Machine" or 1 "Z Fighter's Dragon Radar" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001140.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Radar
100001140.desc:
Activate 1 of the following effects:
● Add 1 "Z Fighter's Shenlong" from your Deck to your hand.
● Send up to 7 "Z Fighter's Dragon Ball" cards from your hand or Deck to your Graveyard.

100001141.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #1
100001141.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001142.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #2
100001142.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001143.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #3
100001143.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001144.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #4
100001144.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001145.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #5
100001145.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001146.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #6
100001146.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001147.name: Z Fighter's Dragon Ball #7
100001147.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter" monster. Draw 1 card.

100001148.name: Z Fighter's Senzu Beans
100001148.desc: Each time a "Z Fighter" monster(s) is Summoned place 1 Senzu Bean Counter on this card. If a "Z Fighter" monster you control would be destroyed by battle, you can remove 1 Senzu Bean Counter from this card instead.

100001149.name: Z Fighter's Hyperbolic Time Chamber
100001149.desc:
You can shuffle 1 face-up "Z Fighter" monster you control into your Deck to Special Summon 1 "Z Fighter" monster from your hand or Deck, depending on the monster you shuffled into your Deck:
● "Z Fighter Son Goku (Normal)": "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ1" 
● "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ1": "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ2" 
● "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ2": "Z Fighter Son Goku SSJ3" 
● "Z Fighter Vegeta (Normal)": "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1" 
● "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ1": "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2" 
● "Z Fighter Vegeta SSJ2": "Z Fighter Vegeta (Majin)"
● "Z Fighter Son Gohan (Normal)": "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ1" 
● "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ1": "Z Fighter Son Gohan SSJ2" 
● "Z Fighter Future Trunks": "Z Fighter Future Trunks SSJ1" 
● "Z Fighter Future Trunks SSJ1": "Z Fighter Future Trunks USSJ" 
● "Z Fighter Kid Trunks": "Z Fighter Kid Trunks SSJ1" 
● "Z Fighter Son Goten": "Z Fighter Son Goten SSJ1" 
You can only use the effect of "Z Fighter's Hyperbolic Time Chamber" once per turn.

100001150.name: Z Fighter's Fusion Dance
100001150.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Z Fighter" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling Fusion Materials listed on it from your side of the field into your Deck.

100001151.name: Z Fighter's Potara Earring
100001151.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Z Fighter" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling Fusion Materials listed on it from your side of the field into your Deck, and equip it with this card. If this card leaves the field; shuffle the equipped monster into your Extra Deck.

100001152.name: Z Fighter's Shenlong
100001152.desc: Shuffle 7 "Z Fighter's Dragon Ball" cards with different names from your Graveyard into your Deck, then add 1 "Z Fighter" card, except "Z Fighter's Shenlong" or "Z Fighter's Dragon Ball" cards, from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, then gain 7777 LP.

100001153.name: Z Fighter's Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack
100001153.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

100001154.name: Z Fighter's Kaio
100001154.desc:
Activate only if you control a face-up "Z Fighter Son Goku" monster. Apply 1 of the following effects:
● Add 1 "Z Fighter's Kaio-ken" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.
● Add 1 "Z Fighter's Genkidama" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, but you cannot activate cards, or the effects of cards, with that name for the rest of this turn.

100001155.name: Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods
100001155.desc: During the Standby Phase, if this card is in your hand, Deck or Graveyard or if this card is banished: Activate this card directly from there. The activation of this card cannot be negated. Unaffected by other cards' effects. You cannot Set/Summon monsters or activate cards or effects, except for "Almighty God" cards.

100001156.name: The Power of an Almighty God
100001156.desc: All face-up "Almighty God" monsters you currently control are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's cards this turn.

100001157.name: Annihilated by an Almighty God
100001157.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods": Negate the effects of all face-up cards currently on the field, except the effects of "Almighty God" cards until the End Phase.

100001158.name: An Almighty God Appears
100001158.desc: Add 1 "Almighty God" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001159.name: Punishment from an Almighty God
100001159.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods" and a monster(s) would be Summoned or a card or effect would be activated: Negate the Summon and/or activation and if you do, banish that card, face-down.

100001160.name: Almighty Gods of any Existence
100001160.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by sending 3 "Almighty God" monsters you control to the Graveyard, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's Deck, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001161.name: Almighty God Ristoras
100001161.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's Monster Zone, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001162.name: Almighty God Wijindu
100001162.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001163.name: Almighty God Krephort
100001163.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's Graveyard, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001164.name: Almighty God Hamirsch
100001164.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's hand, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001165.name: Almighty God Xyluphus
100001165.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Banish all cards from your opponent's Extra Deck, face-down. If this card leaves the field, shuffle all banished cards from your opponent into their Deck.

100001166.name: Almighty God Famlir
100001166.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Halve your opponent's LP. If this card leaves the field, double your opponent's LP.

100001167.name: Almighty God Emtina
100001167.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Double your LP. If this card leaves the field, halve your LP.

100001168.name: Almighty God Harphes
100001168.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. This card gains ATK and DEF equal to the difference between your LP and your opponent's LP. The battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent's LP is halved.

100001169.name: Almighty God's Wrath
100001169.desc: Negate all "Almighty God" monster effects activated in the Graveyard. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, Tribute 1 monster or destroy this card.

100001170.name: Almighty God Serpheon
100001170.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) while you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot attack the turn it is Summoned. This card gains 500 ATK and DEF for each of your opponent's face-down banished cards. The battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent's LP is halved. When a face-up "Almighty God" monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can change the attack target to this card.

100001171.name: Ancient Mystical Crystal
100001171.desc:
If a "Ancient Mystical" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by a card effect while this card is in your Graveyard, you can shuffle this card into your Deck instead. When this card is activated: Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Rock-Type/WIND/Level 1/? ATK/? DEF), and if you do, it gains this effect. (This card is NOT treated as a Trap Card.) 
● The ATK and DEF of this card is the combined Levels and Ranks of all face-up monsters on the field x 150.

100001172.name: Holy Golden Retgon
100001172.desc:
1 "Holy Golden" Tuner + 1 or more "Holy Golden" non-Tuner monster
Cannot be used as a Link or Xyz Material. If this card is Summoned: Draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Holy Golden Retgon" once per turn. If this card is returned to your Extra Deck by the effect of "Holy Golden Allgel": You can Special Summon 1 "Holy Golden Allgel" from your Extra Deck. The battle damage this card inflicts to your opponent's LP is halved. You can only control 1 "Holy Golden Retgon".

100001173.name: Cruel Ghost Pirates
100001173.desc: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Ghost Pirate" monsters. You cannot Tribute monsters. Control of this card cannot switch. When this card is Normal Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Ghost Pirate" monster from your Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You cannot Special Summon monsters from your hand, Deck or Graveyard for the rest of this turn.

100001174.name: Dream Spirit of Destiny
100001174.desc: You can banish 1 "Dream Spirit" monster from your hand or Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard to have this card's Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, DEF and name become equal to the selected monster's Level, Type, Attribute, original ATK, original DEF and name. If this card is banished by a "Dream Spirit" card's effect: Target 1 banished card, except "Dream Spirit of Destiny", and return it to the Graveyard.

100001175.name: Supporter #2 of the Sky Army
100001175.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Sky Army" card. If this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: Change this card to Defense Position. Each time a "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card is activated, this card gains 100 DEF immediately after it resolves. Up to twice per turn, during either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control; return it to the hand. If this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: You can add 1 Level 3 "Sky Army" monster from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase: Send all face-up cards you control, except "Sky Army" cards, to the Graveyard.

100001176.name: Millennium Draw
100001176.desc: During either player's Draw Phase: Banish this card from your Deck, hand or Graveyard. The activation of this card cannot be negated. Unaffected by other cards' effects. During either player's turn, while this card is banished: You can declare 1 card name; let that card appear in your hand.

100001177.name: Reborn Phoenix Dragon
100001177.desc: Target 1 "Phoenix Dragon" monster that was destroyed and sent to your Graveyard this turn; Special Summon it. When this face-down card is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Phoenix Dragon" monster from your Deck.

100001178.name: Hell Creature's Attack
100001178.desc: Send 1 "Hell Creatue" monster from your hand or you control to the Graveyard, draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Hell Creature's Attack" once per turn. You can discard 1 "Hell Creature" card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the top of the Deck. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

100001179.name: Steampunk Big Dragon
100001179.desc:
1 "Steampunk" Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner "Steampunk" monsters
When a "Steampunk" card is sent from your hand to the Graveyard by the effect of a "Steampunk" card: Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Steampunk Big Dragon" once per turn. If this card is destroyed: You can send 1 "Steampunk" card from your hand to the Graveyard.

100001180.name: Almighty God's Final Judgment
100001180.desc: Activate only if you control a face-up "Dimension Gate of the Almighty Gods". Pay LP so that you only have 100 left; shuffle into the Decks, all cards from each players' hand, field, Graveyard and all banished cards. You take no further damage until the end of your opponent's next turn. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated. You can only activate "Almighty God's Final Judgment" once per Duel.

100001181.name: Warning From an Almighty God
100001181.desc: Target 1 "Almighty God" monster you control; inflict damage to your opponent equal to half its ATK. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this effect. You can only use this effect of "Warning From an Almighty God" once per turn.

100001182.name: Energy Source of the Sky Army
100001182.desc: Each time a face-up "Sky Army" Continuous Trap Card you control returns to your hand, inflict 300 damage to your opponent, then gain 300 LP. If a "Sky Army" monster(s) you control would be destroyed, you can send this card to the Graveyard instead.

100001183.name: Neo Egyptian God Slifer
100001183.desc:
(This card in your Hand is treated as "Slifer the Sky Dragon")
Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, other cards and effects cannot be activated. This card gains 500 ATK and DEF for each card on the field and in both players' hands. Once per turn, during either player's turn: You can shuffle 1 card on the field into the Deck. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation. If this card leaves the field: You can add 1 of the following cards from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand:
● "Slifer the Sky Dragon"
● "Holactie the Creator of Light"

100001184.name: Neo Creator God Holactie
100001184.desc: Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by Tributing 3 monsters whose original names are "Neo Egyptian God Slifer", "Neo Egyptian God Obelisk" and "Neo Egyptian God Ra", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by other cards' effects while it is in your Extra Deck. The Special Summon of this card cannot be negated. The player that Special Summons this card wins the Duel.

100001185.name: Neo Egyptian God Ra
100001185.desc:
(This card in your Hand is treated as "The Winged Dragon of Ra")
Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, other cards and effects cannot be activated. This card's ATK becomes the combined original ATK of the Tributed monsters, also this card's DEF becomes the combined original DEF of the Tributed monsters. Once per turn: You can declare 1 card name; your opponent cannot use cards with that name and their effects, until the end phase of their next turn. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation. If this card leaves the field: You can add 1 of the following cards from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand:
● "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Sphere Mode"
● "The Winged Dragon of Ra"
● "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Immortal Phoenix"
● "Holactie the Creator of Light"

100001186.name: Neo Egyptian God Obelisk
100001186.desc:
(This card in your Hand is treated as "Obelisk the Tormentor")
Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 3 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, other cards and effects cannot be activated. Once per turn, during either player's turn, when a card or effect is activated: You can negate the effect and banish that card, face-down. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation. If this card leaves the field: You can add 1 of the following cards from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand:
● "Obelisk the Tormentor"
● "Holactie the Creator of Light"

100001187.name: Egyptian God's Ruler's Wish
100001187.desc:
Reveal 1 "Holactie the Creator of Light", "The Winged Dragon of Ra", "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Sphere Mode", "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Immortal Phoenix", "Obelisk the Tormentor", "Slifer the Sky Dragon" or "Neo Egyptian God" monster in your hand; activate 1 of the following effects:
● Special Summon 3 "Egyptian God's Ruler's Wish Tokens" (Spellcaster-Type/LIGHT/Level 4/ATK 1500/DEF 1500). These Tokens cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, unless it is for a "Neo Egyptian God" monster.
● Special Summon 1 "Ra's Disciple" from your hand or Deck.

100001188.name: Egyptian God's Ruler's Wish Token
100001188.desc: This Token cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon, unless it is for a "Neo Egyptian God" monster.

100001189.name: Guardian of the Egyptian Gods
100001189.desc:
Activate 1 of these effects:
● Discard 1 "Holactie the Creator of Light", "The Winged Dragon of Ra", "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Sphere Mode", "The Winged Dragon of Ra - Immortal Phoenix", "Obelisk the Tormentor", "Slifer the Sky Dragon" or "Neo Egyptian God" monster; draw 2 cards.
● Look at the top 5 cards of your Deck, then return them to the top of the Deck in any order.
● Shuffle all "Ra's Disciple" monster(s) from your Graveyard into your Deck.

100001190.name: Egyptian God's Ruler's Final Move
100001190.desc:
You can add 1 of the following cards from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand:
● "Egyptian God's Ruler's Wish"
● "Guardian of the Egyptian Gods"
● "The True Name"
● "Mound of the Bound Creator"
You can only use the effect of "Egyptian God's Ruler's Final Move" once per turn. When this card on the field is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "Neo Egyptian God" monster from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

100001191.name: War Machine Dragons Preparing for Counterattack
100001191.desc: All face-up "War Machine Dragon" Synchro Monsters you currently control are unaffected by the effects of your opponent's cards this turn. You can banish this card and 1 "War Machine Dragon XNT-2000" from your Graveyard; add 1 "War Machine Dragon" Spell/Trap Card from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand, except "War Machine Dragons Preparing for Counterattack" or "War Machine Dragon's Moving Fortress".

100001192.name: Ocean Soldier Noah
100001192.desc: During your turn, when you take effect damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You can only Special Summon "Ocean Soldier Noah" once per turn this way. During your Main Phase: You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand. During each of your Standby Phases, if this card is in your Graveyard: Gain 300 LP, otherwise take 300 damage. If this card is banished by an "Ocean Soldier" card's effect, while your LP are at least 4000 lower than your opponent's: You can halve your opponent's LP. You can only use this effect of "Ocean Soldier Noah" once per duel.

100001193.name: Linking Phoenix
100001193.desc: Must be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) without Link Materials and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Unaffected by other cards' effects while it is in your Extra Deck, field, Graveyard or banished. The Special Summon of this card cannot be negated. Cannot attack. Cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly. Cannot be used as a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz or Link Material for a Summon. Cannot be Tributed. During your Main Phase: While this card is on the field, Graveyard or banished: You can return it to the Extra Deck. Cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this effect's activation. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except for "Rising Phoenix Custom Cards".

100001194.name: Lightning Dragon - The Fire Rain
100001194.desc: If you control a "Lightning Dragon" monster: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If a "Lightning Dragon" monster is Summoned: This card gains 500 ATK. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can send 1 "Lightning Dragon" Spell/Trap Card you control to the Graveyard; draw 1 card. If a "Lightning Dragon" monster is Summoned, you can activate this  effect: Your opponent draws 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Lightning Dragon - The Fire Rain" once per turn.

100001195.name: Ocean Soldier's Discovery
100001195.desc:
You can activate 1 of these effects, depending on how many LP you have: 
● 7000 LP or less: Target 1 banished "Ocean Soldier", and either add it to your hand or return it to the Graveyard.
● 5000 LP or less: Banish 1 "Ocean Soldier" monster from your Graveyard; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
● 2000 LP or less: Special Summon 1 banished "Ocean Soldier" monster.
You can only use the effect of "Ocean Soldier's Discovery" once per turn.

100001221.name: Divine Armored Lord Knight Parshath
100001221.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Rebirth of Parshath" and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent while you control a face-up "The Sanctuary in the Sky": You can pay half your LP; draw 1 card for each "Parshath" monster you control with different name, except "Divine Armored Lord Knight Parshath". You can only use this effect of "Divine Armored Lord Knight Parshath" once per turn. During either player's turn when a card or effect is activated or when your opponent Summons a monster: You can banish 3 other LIGHT Fairy monsters from your hand, field and/or Graveyard; negate the Summon or activation and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use this effect of "Divine Armored Knight Lord Parshath" once per turn.

100001222.name: Celestial Tower of Parshath
100001222.desc: This card's name becomes "The Sanctuary in the Sky" while on the field. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set.  (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) Once per turn, you can excavate the top 3 cards of your Deck, add 1 excavated LIGHT Fairy-Type monster or 1 excavated Counter Trap Card to your hand, also shuffle the rest back into your Deck. While "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is in your Graveyard, you take no battle damage from battles involving LIGHT Fairy-Type monsters you control and no effect damage from your opponent's card effects, also all Level 4 or lower  LIGHT Fairy-Type monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effects.

100001223.name: Birth of Parshath
100001223.desc: Shuffle 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster or 1 Counter Trap Card from your hand into your Deck; draw 2 cards. You can banish this card and 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster from your Graveyard; Special Summon 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster from your hand or Graveyard. You can only use 1 "Birth of Parshath" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

100001224.name: Parshath, the Sage
100001224.desc: Once per turn: You can banish 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster from your Graveyard; send 1 card your opponent controls to the Graveyard. Once per turn: You can target 2 of your banished LIGHT Fairy-Type monsters; shuffle them both into the Deck, then draw 1 card. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing damage.

100001225.name: Brave Knight Parshath
100001225.desc: If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). "The Sanctuary in the Sky" in the Field Zone cannot be destroyed by card effects, also neither player can target it with card effects. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing damage. Each time your "Parshath" monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Gain the same amount of LP.

80000059.name: Ritual Witchkid
80000059.desc:
2 Monster, exept Tokens
When this card is Linked Summoned: You can add 1 Ritualmonster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your GY to your zone this card points to. You can only use this effect of “Ritual Witchkid” once per turn.  Each time a ritualmonster(s) is Special Summoned to your zone this card points to: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field, and if you do, draw 1 card.

4911484.name: Silent Striker Aircatia
4911484.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can add 1 Level 7 or lower "Silent Striker" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 face-up "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the scale of the targeted monster x100. You can only use each effect of Silent Striker Aircatia" once per turn.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Oh! I have slipped the surly bonds of Earth and danced the skies on laughter-silvered wings.

4911530.name: Silent Striker Bamboing
4911530.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: you can add 1 "Rapid Updraft" or 1 "Silent Striker" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Silent Striker Bamboing" once per turn. While this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone, "Rapid Updraft" you control cannot be targeted or destroyed by card effects.

-------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Sunward I've climbed, and joined the tumbling mirth of sun-split clouds, --and done a hundred things

4911555.name: Silent Striker Bircord
4911555.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
While this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone, "Silent Striker" Monsters you control gain 100 ATK x the Pendulum Scale of your other card in your Pendulum Zone. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can destroy 1 "Silent Striker" card you control, target 1 face-up "Silent Striker" Monster you control; the targeted card can attack twice during each Battle Phase this turn.

------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
You have not dreamed of -- wheeled and soared and swung
High in the sunlit silence. Hov'ring there,

4911576.name: Silent Striker Mahoon
4911576.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can add 1 "Silent Striker" card from your GY to your hand. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can discard 1 card; place 1 "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster from your Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only activate each effect of "Silent Striker Mahoon" once per turn.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
I've chased the shouting wind along, and flung My eager craft through footless halls of air....

4911591.name: Divinity He: Silent Striker Hindrasil
4911591.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can destroy 3 monsters on the field, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone in Defense Position. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can destroy 3 Spell/Traps on the field, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone in Defense Position.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Cannot be Special Summoned, except by Pendulum Summon while you have 2 "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monsters in your Pendulum Zone or by its own effect. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can target 1 "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster in your Pendulum Zone; Special Summon it, and if you do, apply 1 of the following effects based on the Pendulum Zone that monster was Summoned from.
●Left: This card gains 100 ATK x the Pendulum Scale of the Summoned monster.
●Right: monsters your opponent control lose 100 ATK x the Pendulum Scale of the Summoned monster.

4913244.name: Silent Striker Pineclone
4913244.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 "Silent Striker" monster you control; this turn, if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 face-up Attack Position monster your opponent controls; change it to Defense Position. You can only activate each effect of "Silent Striker Pineclone" once per turn.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Up, up the long, delirious, burning blue
I've topped the wind-swept heights with easy grace.

4913250.name: Silent Striker Cherricane
4913250.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 other "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster in your Pendulum Zone; Special Summon it. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 face-up "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster you control; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone, then place the target in your Pendulum Zone. You can only activate each effect of "Silent Striker Cherricane" once per turn.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
Where never lark, or even eagle flew --
And, while with silent, lifting mind I've trod

4916267.name: Silent Striker Spruzzard
4916267.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is in your Left Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 "Silent Striker" monster you control; it cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects until the end of this turn. If this card is in your Right Pendulum Zone: You can target 1 "Silent Striker" monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects until the end of this turn. You can only activate each effect of "Silent Striker Spruzzard" once per turn.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Lore]
The high untrespassed sanctity of space,
-- Put out my hand, and touched the face of God."

4916584.name: Rapid Updraft
4916584.desc:
If all cards in your Pendulum Zone are "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monsters: You can return all cards in your Pendulum Zone to your hand; place 2 "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monsters from your hand into your Pendulum Zones, and if you do, place 2 Counters on this card. You can remove Counters from this card to activate these effects.
●2 Counters: "Silent Striker" monsters you control gain 300 ATK until the end of this turn.
●4 Counters: Draw 1 card.
●6 Counters: Target 1 "Silent Striker" Pendulum Monster in your Pendulum Zone; change its Pendulum Scale to 13 until the end of this turn.
You can only activate each effect of "Rapid Updraft" once per turn.

5069117.name: Silent Armada
5069117.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Silent Striker" card.)
Special Summon 3 WIND Normal Monsters with different Names from your Deck, also return them to the hand during the End Phase. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck.

5069126.name: Silent Roll
5069126.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Silent Striker" card.)
Return all WIND Normal Monster you control to your hand, also your opponent's monsters cannot attack directly this turn.

5069131.name: Silent Circus
5069131.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Silent Striker" card.)
Activate only if you control a face-up "Silent Striker" monster. Special Summon as many "Silent Striker Mirage Token" (Plant/WIND/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) as possible in Defense Position. Your opponent cannot target non-Token WIND Normal Monsters you control for attacks or with card effects while you control a "Silent Striker Mirage Token".

14582570.name: Spell Circle of Spell Counter
14582570.desc: Target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on; place 3 Spell Counter on that target, then you can add 1 "Spell Power Grasp" from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spell Circle of Spell Counter" per turn.

14582571.name: Mage of the Spell Circle
14582571.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 2 Spell Counters on this card when that Spell Card resolves. This card gains 500 ATK for each Spell Counter on the field. Once per turn: remove 3 Spell Counter from this card add 1 Spell card from your deck or GY to your hand.

14582572.name: Arcanite Power ball
14582572.desc: Remove all Spell counter From your side of the field: your opponent takes damage equal to the removed Spell Counter x200

80000750.name: Spirisoul Blood Orb
80000750.desc: Send 1 Zombie type Spirit Monster from your Deck to the GY; Add 1 Spellcaster type "Spirisoul" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Spirisoul Blood Orb" per turn.

80000751.name: Spirisoul's Calling
80000751.desc: If this card is activated: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie Type "Spirisoul" monster from your GY. If a Level 4 or lower Spirit Monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY, Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position as a Zombie Type and increase its ATK by 100, ignoring its Summoning Condition. You can only control 1 "Spirisoul's Calling".

80000752.name: Gimmick Puppet's Spirisoul
80000752.desc:
(this card is never treated as a "Gimmick Puppet" card.)
You can only activate this card if you control a Spellcaster Type "Spirisoul" monster. Special Summon 1 Zombie Type "Spirisoul" monster from your hand or GY, and if you do, send the top card of your Deck to the GY.

80000753.name: Spirisoul Mansion
80000753.desc: While a Zombie Type "Spirisoul" monster is in your Monster Zone, monsters your opponent controls can only target Zombie Type "Spirisoul" monsters for attacks. Once per turn, if a "Spirisoul" monster you control returns to the hand (except during the Damage Step): You can send 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your Deck to the GY. "Spirisoul" Spirit Monster do not have to activate their effects during the End Phase that returns them to the hand or Extra Deck.

80000754.name: Tree of Eternal Life
80000754.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Spirisoul" card.)
Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Spirisoul" monster from your hand or GY. if you Special Summon a "Spirisoul" Monster, You can activate 1 of the following effects depending from where it was Summoned:
● Hand: Draw 1 Card.
● GY: Send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
You can only use this effect of "Tree of Eternal Life" once per turn.

80000755.name: Spirisoul Vampire, Defender
80000755.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can change it to face-up Defense Position. Once per turn: You can change this card from face-up Defense Position to face-up Attack Position, and if you do, Declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell or Trap); your opponent sends 1 card of that type from their Deck to the GY. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. If this card leaves the field: You can Special Summon 1 "Spirisoul" monster or "Vampire" monster, except "Spirisoul Vampire, Defender" from your Hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Spirisoul Vampire, Defender" once per turn.

80000756.name: Spirisoul Vampire, Spirit Hunter
80000756.desc:
1 Zombie Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Spirisoul" and/or "Vampire" Monster
Each time a Spirit Monster is returned to the hand, You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. Once per turn, If a Spirit Monster you control is targeted for an attack: You can destroy that Spirit Monster; Draw 1 card.

80000757.name: Spirisoul Vampire, Princess
80000757.desc:
2 Level 4 Zombie monster
If you use a monster(s), with a Level, that is owned by your opponent for the Xyz Summon of this card, treat it as Level 4. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in either player's GY; Special Summon that target as a Level 5 Zombie type monster, also treat it as a "Spirisoul" monster while face-up on the field. Once per turn: You can Detach 1 material from this card; Add 1 "Spirisoul" card or "Vampire" card from your Deck to your hand.
