80000758.name: Spirisoul Vampire, Alucard
80000758.desc:
2 Level 5 Zombie monster
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 4 or lower Zombie Type Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) You can only use the two following effects of "Spirisoul Vampire, Alucard" once per turn. If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 monster on the field and 1 monster in your GY; Destroy the first target, and if you do, Special Summon the second target. If this card is returned to the Extra Deck: You can Special Summon 1 Link-2 or lower "Spirisoul" Link Monster or "Vampire" Link Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) Once per turn, During the End Phase, If this card was Special Summoned this turn: Return this card to the Extra Deck.

80000759.name: Spirisoul's Revitalizing Spirit
80000759.desc: During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 Spirit Monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) Once per turn, If a Spirit Monster is Return to the hand or Extra Deck: Gain LP equal to the original ATK of the returned monster.

80000760.name: Spirisoul Summoner, Yosei
80000760.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie type "Spirisoul" monster from your hand. If a "Spirisoul" monster is Special Summoned: You can return this card to your hand; add 1 "Spirisoul" card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Spirisoul Summoner, Yosei" once per turn.

80000761.name: Spirisoul Summoner, Tamashi
80000761.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 level 4 or lower "Spirisoul" Spirit Monster from your Deck. If a "Spirisoul" monster, except "Spirisoul Summoner, Tamashi" is Special Summoned: You can return this card to your hand and target 1 "Spirisoul" monster you control; it gains 1500 ATK until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Spirisoul Summoner, Tamashi" once per turn.

80000762.name: Spirisoul, Bone Scarecrow
80000762.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Spirisoul" card. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Spirisoul, Bone Scarecrow" Twice per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can return 1 monster on the field to its owner's hand. If this card is returned to the hand: You can send 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your Deck to the GY.

80000763.name: Spirisoul, Death Reaper
80000763.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Spirisoul" card. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Spirisoul, Death Reaper" Twice per turn. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. If this card is returned to the hand: You can add 1 "Spirisoul" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.

80000764.name: Spirisoul, Elexir of Life
80000764.desc: Target 1 "Spirisoul" monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but return it to the hand during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; Add 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Spirisoul, Elexier of Life" once per turn.

80000765.name: Spirisoul Summoner, Sonzai
80000765.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Zombie type "Spirisoul" monster from your GY. If a "Spirisoul" monster is Special Summoned: You can return this card to your hand; Send 1 Zombie type "Spirisoul" monster from your Deck to the GY or Special Summon 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Spirisoul Summoner, Sonzai" once per turn.

80000766.name: Spirisoul, Headless Scythe
80000766.desc: Cannot be Special Summoned, except by the effect of a "Spirisoul" card. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Spirisoul, Headless Scythe" once per turn. If this card is Normal or Speical Summoned: You can destroy 1 non-Zombie type monster on the field. If this card is returned to the hand: You can Special Summon 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your hand, and if you do, destroy 1 non-Zombie type monster on the field.

80000767.name: Spirisoul Doll, Canzai
80000767.desc: If you control a Spellcaster type "Spirisoul" monster, You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's field, by tributing 1 monster they control. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. If this card is returned from your opponent's field to your hand: Your opponent draws 2 card. If this card is returned from your field to your hand: Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower Zombie Tuner Monster, except "Spirisoul Doll, Canzai" from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Spirisoul Doll, Canzai" once per turn

80000768.name: Spirisoul Doll, Conzai
80000768.desc: If you control a Spellcaster type "Spirisoul" monster, You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) to your opponent's field, by tributing 1 monster they control. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if this card was Summoned this turn: Return this card to the hand. If this card is returned from your opponent's field to your hand: Your opponent gains 3000 LP. If this card is returned from your field to your hand: You can discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand. You can only use this effect of "Spirisoul Doll, Conzai" once per turn.

80000769.name: Spirisoul Doom Summoner
80000769.desc:
1 "Spirisoul" monster
During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Spirisoul" monster from your GY. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets this card, and/or a "Spirisoul" monster this card points to (Quick Effect): You can move 1 monster this card points to to another of your Main Monster Zones; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Spirisoul Doom Summoner" once per turn.

80000770.name: Spirisoul Anima Beast
80000770.desc:
3 "Spirisoul" Monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: You can send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY. All other "Spirisoul" monsters you control gain 30% their ATK. Once per turn: You can Target 2 face-up monsters this card points to; equip one to the other. If it would be destroyed, destroy the monster equipped to it instead.  Your opponent cannot target "Spirisoul" monster this card points to with card effects.

957000000.name: Little Spirit Eater Shadow
957000000.desc: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Spirit Eater" card from your Deck to the GY. All Fiend and Zombie-Type monster you control gain 400 ATK.

957000001.name: Spirit Eater King
957000001.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase 1, if this card was Tribute Summoned by Tributing a Fiend monster: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; equip that target to this card (max. 2). This card cannot attack the turn you activate this effect. This card gains 300 ATK for each card equipped to it. If this card is Special Summoned from your Deck, it gains 500 ATK. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: Banish this card. If this card is removed by its own Effect: target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

957000002.name: Spirit Eater Doom Quenn
957000002.desc: If this card was Tribute Summoned by Tributing a Fiend monster: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; Banish that target. If this card is Special Summoned from your Deck; You can Add 1 Level 3 or higher “Spirit Eater” monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Spirit Eater Doom Queen" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: Banish this card. If this card is removed by its own Effect: target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy that target. You can Tribute this card; Target 1 of your banished "Spirit Eater" Monsters; add it to your hand.

957000003.name: Spirit Eater Howler
957000003.desc: If this card is added from your banished cards to your hand; You can Special Summon it. If one of your "Spirit Eater" monsters attacks an opponents monster or is attacked(Quickeffekt): You can discard this card; Increase the ATK of your monster by 800 until the Endphase. You can Banish 1 Level 3 or higher Fiend monster, except "Spirit Eater Howler",  and this card from your hand; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Spirit Eater monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use 1 "Spirit Eater Howler" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

957000004.name: Spirit Eater Zombie Dragon
957000004.desc: This rotting dragon monstrosity was once a powerful Fiend. Driven by pure madness, he absorbed many dragons and zombies to gain their strength. He even surpasses the strongest dragons with his magic abilities.

957000010.name: Bone Collecting Spirit Eater
957000010.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can discard 1 card; this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. If a "Spirit Eater" monster you control, except "Bone Collecting Spirit Eater", is destroyed by battle, while this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card. During your Main Phase or your opponent's Battle Phase  (Quick Effect): You can pay 500 LP; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 "Spirit Eater" monster. You can only use this effect of "Bone Collecting Spirit Eater" once per turn.

957130059.name: Dilemma Soul Devil
957130059.desc:
3+ Fiend and or Zombie monsters, including a "Spirit Eater" monster
(This card is always treated as a "Spirit Eater" card.)
Monsters this card points to gain 1500 ATK. This card cannot be destroyed by monsters it points to (by battle or card effects). Twice per turn, if your opponent Summons a monster(s) to a zone this card points to: Draw 1 card for each of those monsters, then, if you drew more than 1 card, discard cards equal to the number of cards you drew minus 1. Once per turn: You can target 1 Special Summoned monster this card does not point to; destroy it. This is a Quick Effect if you control a Fiend or Zombie monster other than this card.

80000700.name: Star Fleet - Phoenix
80000700.desc: If you control 1 "Star Fleet" monster, You can Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard. When this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Star Fleet" monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Star Fleet" monster from your hand or Graveyard. You can only use each effect of "Star Fleet - Phoenix" once per turn.

80000701.name: Star Fleet - Akira Class
80000701.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned or Special Summoned by the effect of a "Star Fleet" monster: You can add 1 "Star Fleet" card from your hand's Deck to your hand, and if you do, you can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

80000702.name: Star Fleet - Defiant Class
80000702.desc: If you control 1 "Star Fleet" card, you can Special Summon this card from your Graveyard, and If you do, you can add 1 "Star Fleet" card from your Graveyard to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Star Fleet - Defiant Class" once per turn.

80000703.name: Star Fleet - Excalibur Class
80000703.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "Star Fleet" monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster you control; that target cannot be destroyed by battle or card effect until the end of this turn. You can target 1 other "Star Fleet" monster you control; that target gains 1000 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Star Fleet - Excalibur Class" once per turn.

80000704.name: Star Fleet - Galaxy Class
80000704.desc: You can Ritual Summon this card with a "Star Fleet" card. You can discard this card; Ritual Summon 1 "Star Fleet" Ritual Monster from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard by Tributing monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels are greater than or equal to its Level. When this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 card from your Graveyard to your hand. When one of your monsters would be destroyed: You can destroy a card on your opponent's side of the field instead. You can only use each effect of "Star Fleet - Galaxy Class" once per turn.

80000705.name: Star Fleet - Odyssey Class
80000705.desc:
2 Level 8 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this monster with 3 Level 4 monsters, in which case this card's Rank becomes 4 and its original ATK becomes 2500. When this card battles an opponent's monster, any battle damage your opponent would take from this battle is doubled. Once per turn (Quick Effect): This card gains ATK equal to its Rank X 200. You can detach a material from this card and target 1 monster you control; it is unaffected by other card effects this turn. You can only use this effect of "Star Fleet - Odyssey Class" once per turn.

80000706.name: Star Fleet - Intrepid Class
80000706.desc: If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Star Fleet" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.When this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "Star Fleet" monster from your Graveyard or Deck to your hand.

80000707.name: Star Fleet - Nova Class Scout
80000707.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can add 1 "Star Fleet" card from the Graveyard to your hand. You can banish this card from the Graveyard, then target 1 monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

80000708.name: Star Fleet - Saber Class
80000708.desc: You can discard this card; add 1 "Star Fleet" monster, except " Star Fleet - Saber Class" from your Graveyard to your hand, and if you do, add 1 "Star Fleet" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Star Fleet - Saber Class" once per Duel. Once per turn, When this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish this card; add 1 "Star Fleet" monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

80000709.name: Star Fleet - Freedom Class
80000709.desc: Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can discard this card and target 1 face-up "Star Fleet" monster on the field; That target gains 800 ATK. You can banish this card from your Graveyard and target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

80000710.name: Star Fleet - Eclips Class
80000710.desc:
2+ "Star Fleet" Monsters
Must either be Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned by Tributing the above cards you control (in this case, "Polymerization" is not used). This card gains 400 DEF x the number of materials used for its Special Summon. This card can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If it does, use its DEF for damage calculation.

80000711.name: Star Fleet - Utopia Planicia
80000711.desc: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Star Fleet" monster from your hand or Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Star Fleet - Utopia Planicia" once per turn. Each time a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Both players draw 1 card.

80000712.name: Star Fleet - Sol Space Station
80000712.desc: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Star Fleet" card from your Deck to your hand. All "Star Fleet" monsters on the field gain 500 ATK. Banish all monsters destroyed by battle with a "Star Fleet" monster you control.

80000713.name: Star Fleet - Deep Space 9
80000713.desc: Each time a "Star Fleet" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 1 Starship Counter on this card. Once per turn, if a "Star Fleet" monster(s) on the field would be destroyed, you can remove 1 Starship Counter from your side of the field for each of those monsters instead. During the End Phase, if this card has no Starship Counters: Destroy this card.

80000714.name: Star Fleet - Count Casualties
80000714.desc: At the end of the Battle Phase, if a "Star Fleet" monster(s) you control was destroyed this turn: You can Special Summon these monsters, but their effects are negated. If you control no "Star Fleet" monsters: You can activate this card from your hand. If a "Star Fleet" monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your Graveyard instead. You can only use each effect of "Star Fleet - Count Casualties" once per turn.

80000715.name: Star Fleet - Fleet Formation
80000715.desc: If you control a "Star Fleet" monster(s): You can Special Summon 1 "Star Fleet" monster from your Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Star Fleet - Fleet Formation" once per turn. If you control two or more "Star Fleet" monsters: You can activate this card from your hand.

80000716.name: Star Fleet - Formations Attack
80000716.desc: If you control three or more monsters, you can activate this card from your hand. If you control two or more "Star Fleet" monsters: You can banish 1 card from the field. When 1 of your opponent's monsters is destroyed by battle or card effect, and this card is in your Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; add 1 card from your Graveyard to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Star Fleet - Formation Attack" once per turn.

80000717.name: Star Fleet - Formations Fire
80000717.desc: During the Battle Phase, when you control one or more "Star Fleet" monsters: You can target monsters your opponent controls, up to the number of "Star Fleet" monsters you control; destroy those targets, and if you do, your opponent takes damage equal to the number of monsters destroyed x 400. When you control two or more "Star Fleet" monsters: You can activate this card from your hand.

80000718.name: Star Fleet - Prometheus Class

80000719.name: Star Fleet - Sovereign Class
80000719.desc:
2+ "Star Fleet" monsters
Once per turn, before damage calculation, if your monster this card points to battles an opponent's monster with higher ATK: You can make that monster unable to be destroyed by battle, also you take no battle damage from the battle. After damage calculation, have this card or 1 monster it points to gain ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster that battled, until the end of this turn.

88000001.name: SW - Republic Tropper #1
88000001.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "SW -" monster from your hand, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 1". You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 1" once per turn. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 1" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 1" once per turn.

88000002.name: SW - Republic Tropper #2
88000002.desc: If this card is Summoned: You can target 1 "SW -" monster in your Graveyard, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 2"; Special Summon that monster in Defense Position, in addition, monsters you control cannot attack for the rest of this turn, except "SW -" monsters. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 2" once per turn. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 2" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 2" once per turn.

88000003.name: SW - Republic Tropper #3
88000003.desc: You can discard 1 LIGHT monster to Special Summon this card from your hand. When this card is Summoned, you can Target 1 Level 4 LIGHT Warrior-Type monster from your Deck or your side of the field and send it to the Graveyard. Once per turn, you can return 1 monster you control to your hand to Normal Summon 1 "SW -" monster, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 3", in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 3" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 3" once per turn.

88000004.name: SW - Republic Tropper #4
88000004.desc: When this card is Summoned: You can send 1 "SW -" card from your Deck to the Graveyard. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 4" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 4" once per turn.

88000005.name: SW - Republic Tropper #5
88000005.desc: When this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon up to 2 "SW -" monsters, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 5", from your hand and/or Deck. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Tropper # 5" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Tropper # 5" once per turn.

88000006.name: SW - Republic Venator
88000006.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 5 "SW -" monsters from your Graveyard or your side of the field. When this card is Special Summoned: You can banish all monsters your opponent controls, also, this card cannot attack this turn. This card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects, and it is unaffected by spell/trap effects. Once per turn: You can return as many of your opponent's banished cards as possible to their graveyard, and if you do, the first battle or effect damage your opponent takes this turn is doubled. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic Venator" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic Venator" once per turn.

88000007.name: SW - Republic X-Wing
88000007.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 2 "SW -" monsters from your Graveyard. Once per turn, during either player's Main Phase: You can destroy 1 monster in your hand or on your side of the field, and if you do, change all face-up monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a Defense Position monster: You can inflict 1000 damage to your opponent, and if you do, send the Defense Position monster to the Graveyard. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "SW -" card, except "SW - Republic X-Wing" from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "SW - Republic X-Wing" once per turn.

88000008.name: SW - Jedi Ahsoka
88000008.desc:
2 Level 4 "SW" monsters
When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy it. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card; Send 1 card from your opponent’s hand to the Graveyard, then if it was a Spell/Trap Card, draw 1 card. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "SW -" card in your Graveyard; shuffel it in to your deck.

88000009.name: SW - Jedi Luke Skywalker
88000009.desc:
2 Level 4 "SW" monsters
During either player's turn, if monsters were Normal or Special Summoned OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: You can detach 2 Xyz Materials from this card; negate the Summon or Activation, and if you do, destroy the card. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "SW -" card in your Graveyard; shuffel it in to your deck.

88000010.name: SW - Sith Darth Vader
88000010.desc:
3 Level 4 "SW" monsters
When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; for the rest of this Duel, your opponent cannot activate cards with that name, or their effects. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, destroy all cards with that name from your opponent’s hand, deck or extra deck. If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 "SW -" card in your Graveyard; shuffel it in to your deck.

88000011.name: SW - Jedi Master Obi Wan
88000011.desc:
2+ effect monsters, including a  "SW -" monster
This Link Summoned card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Each time one or more "SW -" Xyz Monsters with a different name than the cards you control are Special Summoned from the Extra Deck in one or more zone(s) this card points to: Draw 1 card. If one or more face-up Xyz Monsters, this card points to, are destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "SW -" monster with the same Original Attribute as 1 of the destroyed Xyz Monsters from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "SW - Jedi Master Obi Wan" once per turn.

89000001.name: SW - Jedi Force Ghost
89000001.desc: Target 2 "SW" monsters in your Graveyard; Special Summon both targets. Immediately after this effect is resolved, Xyz Summon 1 Xyz Monster with only those 2 monsters.

89000002.name: SW - Hyper-V Gun
89000002.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it.

89000003.name: SW - Force Punch
89000003.desc: If you control a face-up "SW - Jedi" monster: Destroy all Cards your opponent control, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each Cards destroyed.

89000004.name: SW - Kuat Shipyard
89000004.desc: Once per turn: you can Special Summon 1 "SW -" Machine-Type monster from your hand or your Graveyard to your side of the field, regardless of its summoning conditions.

89000005.name: SW - Coruscant
89000005.desc: All "SW" monsters you control gain 500 ATK. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 "SW -" monster from your hand.

89000006.name: SW - Use of the Pride of the Core
89000006.desc: Destroy all cards your opponent controls.

80000320.name: Steam Machine - Knight
80000320.desc: This Mechanical Knight, Powered by Steam does what he has to, to Protect the City.

80000321.name: Steam Machine - Soldier
80000321.desc:
(Cannot be used as Xyz material, except for the Xyz summon of a Pyro type Monster or WATER Monster.)
When you draw this card this card: You can reveal it; Special Summon it from your Hand, then if you control a Rank 1 Xyz monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 5 or lower WATER Pyro Monster from your Deck.

80000322.name: Steam Machine - Superdreadnought
80000322.desc: if you control no monsters: You can Reveal this card in your hand, then target 1 "Steam Machine" Monster in your GY; Special Summon this card from your Hand, then, Special Summon the target, but it loses 500 ATK. You can only use this effect of "Steam Machine - Superdreadnought" once per turn. When this card is Special Summoned: You can make all WATER monster you currently control become Level 1.

80000323.name: Steam Machine - Gear Guardian
80000323.desc:
(Cannot be used as Xyz material, except for the Xyz summon of a Pyro type Monster or WATER Monster.)
If you control both WATER and Pyro-Type Monster(s), you can Special Summon this card (from your Hand). When you do: You can declear a Level from 1 to 10; the Levels of all monsters you currently control become the decleared Level. If you activate this effect, monster you control cannot activate their effects for the rest of this turn, except WATER monsters.

80000324.name: Steam Machine - Gold Golem
80000324.desc:
(Cannot be used as Xyz material, except for the Xyz summon of a Pyro type Monster or WATER Monster.)
You can only use each of the following effects of "Steam Machine - Gold Golem" once per turn.
●You can discard up to 2 cards; Special Summon Level 1 "Steam Machine" monster(s) from your hand, Deck, and/or GY, equal to the number discarded, also for the rest of this turn, you cannot Normal or Special Summon other monsters, except "Steam Machine" monsters.
●If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 Pyro monster from your Deck to your hand.

80000325.name: Steam Machine - Prime
80000325.desc:
4 Level 1 Pyro Monster
Must first be Xyz Summoned with the above Xyz Materials. If this card is Xyz Summoned by using a "Steam Machine" monster as material: You can destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls. Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects in response to this effect's activation. Unaffected by other cards' effects. You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; for the rest of this turn, all monsters your opponent controls will lose 1000 ATK, also your opponent's cards and effects cannot be activated.

80000326.name: Steam Machine - Night Star Dragon
80000326.desc:
2 Level 1 Pyro or Machine monster
Must first be Xyz Summoned with the above Xyz Materials. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can attach that monster to this card as material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Steam Machine - Night Star Dragon" once per turn.
● You can detach any number of materials from this card, then target that many cards on the field; destroy them.
●If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 level 1  monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: You can return 1 Rank 10 or lower Pyro or Machine Xyz Monster from your GY to the Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon that monster from your Extra Deck, by using this card you control as material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer this card's materials to the Summoned monster.)

80000327.name: Steam Machine - Repair Station
80000327.desc: Special Summon 1 "Steam Machine" monster from your GY as a Level 1 monster, then add 1 "Steam Machine" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Steam Machine - Repair Station", also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck, except Xyz Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Steam Machine - Repair Station" per turn.

80000328.name: Steam City
80000328.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Steam Machine" card)
Once per turn: You can discard 1 card, then activate 1 of these effects;
•Add 1 "Steam Machine" monster from yourDeck to your hand.
•Send 1 Pyro monster or Machine monster from your Deck to the GY.
You can target 1 Pyro monster or Machine monster you control; all monsters you currently control become that monster's Level until the end of this turn (even if this card leaves the field). You can only use this effect of "Steam City" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Steam City"per turn.

80000329.name: Steam Machine - Golem
80000329.desc: If this card is shuffled into the Deck, Draw 1 card. If an Pyro or Machine monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but its original ATK/DEF become halved. You can only use this effect of "Steam Machine - Golem" once per turn. If this card is detached from an Xyz Monster and sent to the GY to activate that monster's effect: You can target 1 card your opponent controlls; return it to the hand.

80000330.name: Steam Machine - Synchronized Golem
80000330.desc:
1 Pyro Tuner + 1+ None-Tuner-Monster
If this card is Special Summoned: Your opponent can discard 1 card to negate this effect, otherwise you can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the GY: You can Special Summon that monster to your field as a Level 1 Pyro type monster in Defense Position. A "Steam Machine" monster that was Xyz Summoned using this card on the field as material gains following effect.
● Once per turn, during the turn this card was Special Summoned, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect.
You can only use each effect of "Steam Machine - Synchronized Golem" once per turn.

80000331.name: Steam Machine - Poison Pyromane
80000331.desc:
2 level 1 Pyro monster
Banish any monster destroyed by battle with this card. Once per turn, when a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's side of the field (except during the Damage Step): You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; destroy that Special Summoned monster(s).

957130006.name: Darkstorm Lightning Dragon
957130006.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by having 5 or more Dragon Normal monsters in your Graveyard. Once per turn: You can banish 1 Dragon Normal monster from your Graveyard to target 1 Dragon Normal monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

957130007.name: Raging Dragons
957130007.desc:
Send up to 3 Dragon Normal Monsters from your hand, Deck, or field to the GY. If you sent 3 monsters to the GY this way, you can activate 1 of the following effects, depending on the number of Dragon Normal Monsters in your GY:
●3+: Draw 1 card.
●5+: Target 1 Dragon Normal Monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but it cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon this turn.
●7+: Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.
●10+: Add 1 monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for every card on the field.
●Exactly 20: You win the Duel.

957130017.name: Cursed Storm Gem
957130017.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 Normal Monster from your Deck to the GY, then, if this card is in Attack Position, change it to Defense Position. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 Dragon monster with 2700 ATK from your Deck, GY or banishment to your hand. If your Dragon monster with 2700 or less ATK declares an attack or is attacked: You can banish this card from your GY; that monster gains 1800 ATK until the end of the next turn. You can only use each effect of 'Storm Gem' once per turn.

66057033.name: Summoning-Cyclone
66057033.desc: Target 1 Spell/Trap you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your hand. You can banish this card from your GY and target 1 Spell/Trap you control; destroy it, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 4 monster from your GY. You can only use 1 Effect of "Summoning-Cyclone" per turn, and only once that turn.

21239445.name: Superheavy Samurai Giant Daidarabotchi
21239445.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If you have no Spell/Traps in your GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Superheavy Samurai" monster from your GY. You can Tribute 2 Machine monsters you control; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Superheavy Samurai Giant Daidarabochi" once per turn.
----------------------------------------------------
[Mosnter Effect]
1 Machine Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner Monsters
"Superheavy Samurai" monsters you control can attack while in face-up Defense Position. If they do, apply their DEF for damage calculation. Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect, while you have no Spell/Traps in your GY (Quick Effect): You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

90000015.name: Supreme HERO Divine Sprinter
90000015.desc: (This card is also always treated as a "Elemental HERO", "Destiny HERO", "Evil HERO", "Exiled HERO", "Masked HERO" and Vison HERO" card.) This card is also treated as a Fiend-Type monster. If your opponent controls more monsters than you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "HERO" monster, except "Supreme HERO Divine Sprinter" from your Deck, then, add 1 "Poymerization" Spell Card or "Fusion" Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

90000016.name: Supreme HERO Darkest Day
90000016.desc: (This card is also always treated as a "Elemental HERO", "Destiny HERO", "Evil HERO", "Exiled HERO", "Masked HERO" and Vison HERO" card.) This card is also treated as a Fiend-Type monster. You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material, but the other Fusion Material(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Materials on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding "HERO" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, Ignoring its Summoning condition. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.)

90000017.name: Supreme HERO Heartsbane
90000017.desc: (This card is also always treated as a "Elemental HERO", "Destiny HERO", "Evil HERO", "Exiled HERO", "Masked HERO" and Vison HERO" card.) This card is also treated as a Fiend-Type monster. If this card is banished: You can Special Summon 1 "HERO" monster from your hand, Deck, GY or banishment, except "Supreme HERO Heartsbane. You can discard this card; Take 1 Level 5 or higher "HERO" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or send it to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY, or banished, as material for the Fusion Summon of a "HERO" monster: You can activate this effect; until the end of the next turn, "HERO" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by batlle or card effects. You can only use each effect of "Supreme HERO Heartsbane" once per turn.

18071998.name: DERZimmermann
18071998.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Hypercosmic" card.)
Requires 5 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. While 7 "Hypercosmic" cards are banished and if a card(s) is destroyed by battle or card effect this turn and if a card(s) is banished this turn and if a card(s) have been drawn this turn, except during the Draw Phase and if a monster was Summoned from the Extra Deck this turn and if a player took damage this turn: You can pay half your LP and banish the top 13 cards of your Deck; Special Summon this card from your hand or banishment. This card's Summon cannot be negated. When Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Unaffected by other cards effects. You can only control 1 "DERZimmermann". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 monster with 3000 or more ATK from your hand, Deck, Extra Deck, banishment, or GY , ignoring its Summoning conditions. While you control a monster with 3000 or more original ATK, this card gains ATK equal to the total ATK of all other monsters you control, also it cannot be tributed or used as material. If this card declares an attack: Make your opponent send as many cards they control to the GY up to the number of monsters with 3000 or more ATK you control.

19072002.name: Creasycat
19072002.desc: Requires 5 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned. This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Unaffected by other cards effects. You can only control 1 "Creasycat". During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Dragon, Aqua or, Warrior monster from your Hand, Deck, or GY. Once per turn: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls and inflict 800 damage to your opponent. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can send 1  Normal Trap that meets its activation conditions from your Deck to the GY; this effect becomes that Trap Card's effect when that card is activated.

25072001.name: Lolkokikx
25072001.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If a card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster or Dragon monster from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of Lolkokikx" once per turn. 

----------------------------------------------------------

[Monster Effect]
Requires 5 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned. This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Unaffected by other cards effects. You can only control 1 "Lolkokikx". During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Spellcaster monster from your Hand, Deck, or GY. During your Main Phase: You can destroy 1 card in your hand or field, and if you do, add 1 Spellcaster, Dragon or Fairy monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Lolkokikx". Each time a card(s) is added to your opponent's hand, inflict 200 damage to them for each.

27121998.name: Lord Coroln
27121998.desc: Requires 5 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned. This card's Normal Summon cannot be negated. When Normal Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Unaffected by other cards effects. You can only control 1 "Lord Coroln". During the Draw Phase: Draw 2 cards. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card on the field; negate its effects until the End Phase. During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your Hand, Deck, or GY. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards and monster effects until the end of the Damage Step. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card attacked: You can destroy 1 card on the field. Once per turn: You can return 1 banished monster to the GY; send 1 card from your Deck to the GY. each time your opponent activates a card or effect, inflict 200 damage to your opponent immediately after it resolves. Each time your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), inflict 200 damage to your opponent.

30012003.name: Rika
30012003.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Chaos" card and as a "Illusory Shadow" card.)
Requires 5 Tributes to Normal Summon (cannot be Normal Set). Cannot be Special Summoned, except by its own effect. You can Special Summon this card (from your GY) by banishing 5 LIGHT and/or DARK monsters from your GY. This card's Summon cannot be negated. When Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. Unaffected by other cards effects. You can only control 1 "Rika". Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 LIGHT or DARK monster from your Banishment into the Deck; Special Summon 1 "Illusory Shadow" or "Chaos" monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. Each time a Illusion monster is destroyed, except "Rika": you can send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY. Once per turn: You can banish 1 LIGHT or DARK monster from your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it. If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. Once per turn, before damage calculation, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can destroy all cards your opponent controls. If this card is destroyed: You can send up to 4 "Illusory Shadow"  or "Chaos" monster from your Deck or Banishment to the GY.

[ Artwork by: Rika ]

80000200.name: TimeGear Gearfried
80000200.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 monster from your Extra Deck, face-down. Once per turn: You can banish 1 "TimeGear" card from your Deck, face-down; during the End Phase add that banished card to your hand.

80000201.name: TimeGear Paragon the Powerful
80000201.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 other "TimeGear" card from your hand. Once per turn: You can add 1 face-down banished card to your hand.

80000202.name: TimeGear Mechanical Dragoon
80000202.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 DARK monster from your GY. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; banish it, face-down.

80000203.name: TimeGear Tactical Turbo Warrior
80000203.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ "TimeGear" non-Tuner monsters
Gains 500 ATK for each face-down banished card. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle: You can target 1 card in your opponent's GY; banish it, face-down. If a card your opponent owns and possesses is banished face-down while you control this card (except during the Damage Step): You can banish cards from the top of your opponen's Deck, face-down, equal to their face-down banished cards.

80000204.name: TimeGear Chaos the True Dracoslayer
80000204.desc:
2 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 banished monster (including face-down banished); Special Summon it ignoring its Summoning condition. You can only use each of the following effects of "TimeGear Chaos the True Dracoslayer" once per turn. When a "TimeGear", "Dracoslayer", "True King", "Chaos", or "True Draco" monster declares an attack: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it, face-down. If this Xyz Summoned card is send to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "TimeGear", "Chaos", or "Dracoslayer" monster from your Extra Deck, except "TimeGear Chaos the True Dracoslayer"

80000205.name: TimeGear Mysteryflare Dragon
80000205.desc: If a card(s) is banished face-down (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your hand, face-down; Special Summon 1 Tuner monster that cannot be Normal Summoned/Set from your Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

9977018.name: Dark Seeress
9977018.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by its own effect. After applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right, you can: Tribute 1 "Dark Magician Girl"; Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 Spell from your GY to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Dark Seeress" once per turn.

41564202.name: Harpie Lady Elders
41564202.desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned by its own effect. After applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right, you can: Tribute 1 "Harpie Lady"; Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck. This card's name becomes "Harpie Lady" while on the field or in the GY.  During your Main Phase: You can discard 1 card; return 1 monster on the field or GY to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Harpie Lady Elders" once per turn.

97668459.name: Time Roulette Go!
97668459.desc: Special Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck that list the card "Time Wizard" as Fusion Material (This is treated as Fusion Summon.) This card's activation is treated as right calling of the coin toss by the effect of "Time Wizard". You can activate "Time Roulette Go!" only once per turn.

90000300.name: Express Train Quick Trolly
90000300.desc: If you control a EARTH Machine monster, except "Express Train Quick Trolly", You can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per tun (Quick Effect): You can target 1 other EARTH Machine monster, that has a Level, you control; this cards Level become equal to the Level of the targeted card. If thiis card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card (from your GY) in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Express Train Quick Trolly" once per turn.

90000301.name: Future Tech Train X Æ A-12
90000301.desc:
If a EARTH Machine monster is sent from the field to the GY: You can special summon this card from your hand in face-up Defense Position. If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 EARTH Machine monster from your GY to your hand, except "Future Tech Train X Æ A-12". An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
●This card gains 1000 ATK/DEF.

90000302.name: Regional Express
90000302.desc:
You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. An Xyz Monster that was Summoned using this card on the field as material gains this effect.
●This card can attack directly

90000303.name: Passanger Trolly
90000303.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 10 EARTH Machine monster from your hand or GY. If this card is Summoned while you control a Level 10 EARTH Machine monster: You can make this card become Level 10. You can only use each effect of "Passanger Trolly" once per turn.

14853899.name: Crimson Dragon - Tzolkin
14853899.desc:
2+ Dragon monsters
Must first be Link Summoned or Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by sending 2 Level 5 or higher monsters you control with the same Level to the GY (1 Tuner and 1 non-Tuner). (This Special Summon is treated as a Synchro Summon). If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Power Tool" Synchro Monster or 1 Level 7 or 8 Dragon Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck (This is treated as a Synchro Summon). If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 Dragon Tuner from your hand or Deck. Once per turn: You can target 1 Tuner monster you control; its name becomes "Majestic Dragon", until the End Phase. While you control another Synchro Monster, this card you control cannot be destroyed by batlle or card effects.

80000400.name: Undercroft Seeker
80000400.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned: add 1 "Undercroft" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Undercroft Seeker" once per turn. During your Main Phase, you can Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

80000401.name: Undercroft Illusionist
80000401.desc: You can only use each of the following effects of "Undercroft Illusionist" once per turn. During your Main Phase, if you Normal or Special Summon a DARK monster(s): You can reveal this card in your hand; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Undercroft" monster from your Deck to the Graveyard; add 1 "Undercroft" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.

80000402.name: Undercroft Lady Ling
80000402.desc: If this card is Normal Summoned, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster from your hand, except "Undercroft Lady Ling". If you control another "Undercroft" monster: You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return it to the hand. This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

80000403.name: Undercroft Darksword
80000403.desc:
You can only use each effect of "Undercroft Darksword" once per turn. While this card is in the Graveyard, if it was sent there this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster with 1 less Tribute. You can banish 1 "Undercroft" monster from your Graveyard, then target 1 "Undercroft" monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand and this card gains the following effect.
●This turn: You can activate this effect; Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster.

80000404.name: Undercroft Chainmaster
80000404.desc: If this card is sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Torment Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 3/ATK 1000/DEF 1000). You can only use this effect of "Undercroft Chainmaster" once per turn. You can banish this card from your Graveyard; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Undercroft" monster from your hand.

80000405.name: Dark Tuner Undercroft Soul Reaper
80000405.desc: If this card is Tribute Summoned: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand, then, if it was a monster card, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original Level x 100. Monsters destroyed by this card as a result of battle are removed from play.

80000406.name: Dark Tuner Undercroft Sleeper
80000406.desc: If this card is Tribute Summoned: You can banish 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard; add 1 card with the same name as the banished Spell Card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in the Graveyard and you control no monsters: You can Special Summon both this card and 1 Level 4 or lower Warrior monster or Spellcaster monster from your hand in Defense Position, but banish this card when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Dark Tuner Undercroft Sleeper" once per turn.

80000407.name: Undercroft Blood Prince
80000407.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
If this card was Synchro Summoned: You can activate 1 "Undercroft" Field Spell Card directly from your Deck. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the Graveyard.

80000408.name: Undercroft Entrence
80000408.desc: Add 1 "Undercroft" monster from your Graveyard to your hand. If you control an "Undercroft" Dark Synchro Monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Earthbound Immortal" monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning condition. You can only use each effect of "Undercroft Entrence" once per turn. Both players can Normal Summon Dark Tuner monsters with one less Tribute.

80000409.name: Undercroft King Schwarz of the Dark World
80000409.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
Once per turn, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card. When an "Undercroft" monster declares an attack: You can target 1 "Undercroft" monster in your Graveyard; equip it to this card as an Equip Spell by this effect.
● The equipped monster gains 100 ATK.
If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon as many monsters that were equipped to this card from your Graveyard as possible.

80000410.name: Undercroft Dark Lucius LV-5
80000410.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
Once per turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can negate the Summon, and if you do, destroy that monster. If this card is Tributed to Summon an "Earthbound Immortal" monster: Draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Undercroft Dark Lucius LV-5" once per turn.

80000411.name: Undercroft Dark Lucius LV-6
80000411.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; banish that target. Banish your opponent's monsters destroyed by battle with this card, also negate their effects.

80000412.name: Undercroft Angel of Battle
80000412.desc:
2 "Undercroft" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Dark Tuner monster from your Graveyard. If this Link Summoned card you control is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 "Undercroft" Dark Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Dark Synchro Summon.) You can only use each effect of "Undercroft Angel of Battle" once per turn.

80000413.name: Undercroft Twin-Attack
80000413.desc: If you control 2 or more "Undercroft" monsters: You can add 1 Dark Tuner monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed: add 1 "Undercroft" monster from your Graveyard to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Undercroft Twin-Attack" once per turn.

80000414.name: Undercroft Burial
80000414.desc: Each time you Summon 1 or more "Undercroft" monsters: Send the top card of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard. You can only control 1 "Undercroft Burial".

80000415.name: Undercroft Dragon of Anubis
80000415.desc:
1 non-Tuner monster - 1 Dark Tuner monster
Other "Undercroft" cards you control cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. Your opponent cannot target other "Undercroft" monster you control with an attack.

87108787.name: Spark Glove
87108787.desc: At the start of the Damage Steps, if the equipped monster battles a face-up Special Summoned monster: You can discard 1 Union Monster; Destroy that monster. During your Main Phase, if this card is equipped to a Union Monster or Normal Monster: You can equip 1 Union Monster from your hand or GY to the equipped monster, also you cannot Special Summon monsters with that Equip Card's name for the rest of this turn. You can only use this effect of "Spark Glove" once per turn.

80000051.name: Invincible Insect Praying Mantis
80000051.desc: You can Normal Summon this card without Tributing, but its original ATK and DEF becomes 0. You can Special Summon this card (form your hand) by banishing 3 Insect monsters from your GY. If this card is Summoned: You can send 1 Insect monster from your Deck to the GY. If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Invincible Insect" monster in your GY, except "Invincible Insect Prying Mantis"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Invincible Insect Praying Mantis" once per turn.

80000052.name: Invincible Insect Wasp Queen
80000052.desc: You can Special Summon this card (form your hand) by banishing 3 Insect monsters from your GY. If this card is Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 12 or lower Insect monster from your hand, except "Invincible Insect Wasp Queen", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except EARTH Insect monsters. If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 "Invincible Insect" monster in your GY, except "Invincible Insect Wasp Queen"; Special Summon it in Defense Position". You can only use this effect of "Invincible Insect Wasp Queen" once per turn.

80000053.name: Invincible Insect Master Beetle
80000053.desc: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 2 Insect monsters. If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 Insect monster from your banishment to your hand. You can discard 1 Insect monster, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, except an Insect monster; return it to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Invincible Insect Master Beetle" once per turn.

80000054.name: Invincible Insect Dark Insect King
80000054.desc: You can Special Summon this card (form your hand) by banishing 3 Insect monsters from your GY. During your Main Phase: You can add 1 Level 12 or Level 4 or lower Insect monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is destroyed: You can banish 1 other Insect monster from your GY; send 2 Insect monster from your Deck to the GY, then Special Summon this card from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Invincible Insect Dark Insect King" once per turn.

80000055.name: Invincible Insect, The Legendary Hero
80000055.desc: Target 1 Insect monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If a Insect monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

80000056.name: Invincible Insect Master Beetle: Golden Form
80000056.desc:
2 Level 12 Insect monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; take control of the targeted monster until the End Phase, but while this effect is applied, it has its effects negated, its Level becomes 12, also it becomes an Insect monster. If this card has "Invincible Insect Master Beetle" as Material, it gains this effect.
●When this card declares an attack on a face-up monster your opponent controls: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; until the end of this turn, negate that opponent's face-up monster's effects, also this card gains ATK equal to half that opponent's monster's ATK.

80000057.name: Invincible Insect Mosquito Dragon
80000057.desc:
2+ Insect monsters with 2000 or more ATK
If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Invincible Insect" monster in your GY or in your Banishment; Special Summon it to a zone this card points to. Each time an Insect monster is Special Summoned to a zone of yours, inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each other Insect monster you control, and if you do, gain LP equal to the damage inflicted. Once per turn, during the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field this card points to; negate its effects until the end of this turn, and if you do, that monster's owner can add 1 monster with less ATK than that target from their Deck to their hand.

80000058.name: Invincible Insect Beetle Tyrant
80000058.desc:
3 Level 12 Insect monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 10 or 11 Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) If Summoned this way, the following effect cannot be activated this turn. Once per turn: You can detach 2 materials from this card; banish as many Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls as possible, then attach 1 of those banished monsters to this card as material. If an "Invincible Insect" monster you control attacks, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step, in addition, the effects of monsters owned by your opponent cannot be activated.

800000551.name: Invincible Insect, The Legendary Hero
800000551.desc: Target 1 Insect monster in your GY; Special Summon it. If a Insect monster(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.

957130023.name: Bloddy Vampire ElizaBath
957130023.desc:
If you draw this card: You can reveal it, then target 1 "Vampire" monster you control; it gains 500 ATK until the end of the next turn. If you Special Summon a "Vampire" the GY while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. Once per turn: You can banish 1 card from your Hand, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes half its current ATK, and if it does, this card gains that lost ATK until the end of the next turn.
[ Artwork by: LunatiqBaka ]
[ Expanded to 1:1 aspect ratio with AI - https://www.pixelcut.ai/uncrop]

91144836.name: Voyager Supplier
91144836.desc: You can discard this card; add 1 "Voyager" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is used as Material for the Link summon of a Galaxy Link Monster: You can Special Summon this card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Voyager" monster from your hand, except "Voyager Supplier". You can only use each effect of "Voyager Supplier" once per turn.

91144837.name: Voyager XJ-03T
91144837.desc: If you control a Galaxy monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. While this card is equipped to a monster: You can target 1 "Voyager" monster you control; equip 1 "Voyager" Union Monster from your hand or GY to the target, then if the target was a Link Monster, you can Special Summon 1 Galaxy monster from your GY, except "Voyager XJ-03T". You can only use this effect of "Voyager XJ-03T" once per turn.

91144838.name: Voyager ET1701
91144838.desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. The qeuipped monster gains 500 ATK. If this card is sent to the GY because the equipped monster leaved the field: You can target 1 "Voyager" monster you control; equip this card to that target, then if the target was a Link Monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Voyager" monster from your Deck, except "Voyager ET1701", but negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Voyager ET1701" once per turn.

91144839.name: Voyager Attack Squad T101
91144839.desc: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; either destroy it or, if it is a Union Monster you control that is equipped to a monster, you can Special Summon it. If this card is used for the Link Summon of a "Voyager" Link Monster: All Link Monsters you control gain 800 ATK, then You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls. You can only use each effect of "Voyager Attack Squad T101" once per turn.

91144840.name: Voyager B.E.S. Assault Core
91144840.desc:
(This card is also always treated as a Machine monster.)
If your opponent controls more monsters then you do, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Summoned: Place 3 counters on this card. Each time a "Voyager" card(s) or "B.E.S." monster(s) on the field would be destroyed, you can remove 1 counter from this card instead. If this card is used for the Link Summon of a "Voyager" Link Monster: You can draw 1 card for each counter it had on the field. You can only use this effect of "Voyager B.E.S. Assault Core" once per turn.

91144841.name: Voyager Freighter
91144841.desc: A freighter that flies through the Galaxy to supply the colonies of the Great Imperium lolkokikx. It is one of best freighters there is, even the Emperor uses sometimes to get all of his supplys because it is one of the fastest.

91144842.name: Voyager ET74656
91144842.desc:
1 Galaxy monster
Once per turn, if you equip a Union Monster(s) to this card: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it until your opponent's End Phase. During your Main Phase, you can either: While this card is in your GY, target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: While equipped, unequip this card and Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Voyager ET74656" once per turn. The equipped monster gains 500 ATK, also it can attack your opponent directly, but halve the damage your opponent takes from that battle.

91144843.name: Voyager Etoile
91144843.desc:
2 Galaxy monster
Once per turn, if you equip a Union Monster(s) to this card: You can shuffle 1 random card from your opponent's hand into the Deck. Each time a monster this card points to is equipped, you can draw 1 card and show it, then if it is not a "Voyager" card, discard it. You can only control 1 "Voyager Etoile". if this card leaves the field while equipped with a Union monster: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Voyager Etoile" once per turn.

91144844.name: Voyager Flagship NCC
91144844.desc:
2+ Galaxy monsters
Each time this card is equipped with a Union Monster, inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can only use the following effects of "Voyager Flagship NCC" once per turn. (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Union Monster that is equipped to this card to the GY and target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; that target has its effects negated, until the next Standby Phase. During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed and sent to the GY this turn, while equipped with a Union Monster: You can banish 1 other "Voyager" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card. If Summoned this way: You can draw 1 card.

91144845.name: Voyager Heavy Support Unit
91144845.desc: If you control a Galaxy or Machine Link Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 face-up monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead. The equipped monster gains 700 ATK, also banish any monster destroyed by battle with the equipped monster. If this card in the Spell/Trap Zone is sent to the GY or banished: You can add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Voyager Heavy Support Unit" twice per turn.

91144846.name: Voyager No. 7 U.F.O
91144846.desc:
2+ Effect monsters
If this card is Link Summoned using a LIGHT Reptile Link Monster as material: You can treat this card as an "Alien" card while on the field, also place 1 A-Counter on each monster your opponent controls. You can target 1 face-up monster this card points to; equip it to 1 LIGHT monster you control as a Union monster with following effects.
●The equipped monster gains 500 ATK.
●Once per turn: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in Attack Position as a Galxy monster.
You can only use each effect of "Voyager No. 7 U.F.O" once per turn.

91144847.name: Voyager Assault Barrage
91144847.desc: You can only activate this card while there is a "Voyager" Link Monster on your side of the field. Discard 1 card; destroy up to 3 monsters your opponent controls with 2000 or less ATK, then equip 1 Union Monster from your GY to 1 Link Monster you control. You can only activate 1 "Voyager Assault Barrage"

91144848.name: Voyager Backup Fleet
91144848.desc:
Each time a Effect Monster(s) is Summoned, place 1 Starship Counter on this card. During your Main Phase, you can activate 1 of the following effects.
●Remove any number of Starship Counters from this card; equip 1 Union Monster from your hand or Deck with a Level equal to the removed Starship Counters to 1 monster you control, but it cannot be Special Summoned from your Spell/Trap Zone this turn.
●Remove all Starship Counters from this card (min. 4); Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Voyager" monster from your hand, Deck or GY.
You can only use this effect of "Voyager Backup Fleet" once per turn.

44815030.name: Windwitch - Avalanche Bell
44815030.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
(Quick Effect): You can destroy this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 WIND Spellcaster monster from your GY. You can only use this effect of "Windwitch - Avalanche Bell" once per turn.
------------------------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Windwitch" Tuner from your Deck or GY, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If this card is destroyed: You can add 1 WIND Spellcaster monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. While this card is face-up in your Extra Deck: You can shuffle 1 "Windwitch" monster from your GY into your Deck; place this card in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Windwitch - Avalanche Bell" once per turn.

79776218.name: Wizard Prodigy
79776218.desc:
[Pendulum Effect]
If this card is activated: You can draw 1 card and reveal it, then if it was a Spell, Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone. During your Main Phase: You can discard 1 Spell card; place 1 "Greed" from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone. You can only use each effect of "Wizard Prodigy" once per turn.
------------------------------------------
[Monster Effect]
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 2 cards. You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 2 Level 5 Spellcaster monster from your Deck, except "Wizard Prodigy", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Rank 5 Xyz Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Wizard Prodigy" once per turn.

80000063.name: Worm Regtress
80000063.desc: FLIP: Target 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target in face-down Defense Position, except "Worm Regtress". When this card is sent from the Deck to the Graveyard: target 1 monster you control; change that target's battle position to face-down Defense Position or face-up Attack Position.

80000064.name: FullWorm
80000064.desc: When this card is activated: Special Summon 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position. Face-down "Worm" monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; draw 1 card and reveal it, then, if it is a Reptile-Type "Worm" monster, you can Special Summon 1 monster from your hand. Otherwise, discard the card you drew.

80000065.name: Worm Fusion
80000065.desc: Fusion Summon 1 "Worm" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck by banishing the Fusion Material listed on it from your field or Graveyard.

80000066.name: Worm MAX
80000066.desc:
2 Reptile-Type "Worm" monsters
Once per turn, during your End Phase: You can Special Summon 1 Flip monster from your hand or Graveyard in face-down Defense Position. You can only use 1 of the following "Worm MAX" effects per turn, and only once that turn.
●During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-down monster on the field; change it to face-up Attack Position.
●During either player's turn: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; change it to face-up Defense Position.

80000067.name: Worm Surprise
80000067.desc:
Once per turn, during the Battle Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects.
●Target 1 Reptile-Type "Worm" monster you control; change that target to face-down Defense Position, and if you do, change 1 face-down Defense Position monster your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position.
●Target 1 face-down Defense Position monster you control; change that target to face-up Attack Position, and if it is a Reptile-Type "Worm" monster, change 1 face-up monster your opponent controls to face-up Defense Position.

80000224.name: Worm Beta
80000224.desc:
3+ Level 4 Reptile-Type monsters
Once per turn: You can change this card to Face-down Defense Position. FLIP: You can target cards on the field equal to the number of Reptile-Type "Worm" monsters you control; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Worm Beta" once per turn. This card gains effects based on the number of materials attached to it.
●3+: Once per turn, when a card or effect on the field is activated (Quick Effect): You can negate the effect, and if you do, attach the card to this card as material.
●4+: Cannot be destroyed by battle.
●6+: Once per an opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 of your Reptile-Type "Worm" monsters that is banished or in your Graveyard; Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.

957132000.name: XYZ-Destroyer Thief
957132000.desc: You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster on the field; this card gains the Level of the detached monster, and it gains ATK and DEF equal to 55% of that monster’s original ATK and DEF (rounded down to the nearest hundred). You can only use this effect of "XYZ-Destroyer" once per turn.

957132001.name: XYZ-Destroyer Parry
957132001.desc: If one of your Warrior monsters is attacked: You can detach 1 material from an XYZ Monster on the field; the attacked monster gains the ATK, DEF, and Level of the detached monster, and if you do, you can XYZ Summon 1 monster from your Extra Deck using monsters you control. You can only activate 1 "XYZ-Destroyer Parry" per turn.

957132002.name: XYZ-Destroyer Breaking
957132002.desc: You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster on the field; Special Summon 1 "XYZ-Destroyer" monster from your Deck, then you can increase or decrease the ATK of that Xyz Monster by 500.

957132003.name: XYZ-Destroyer Slasher
957132003.desc: During the turn this card was Normal Summoned, you can Normal Summon 1 level 4 Warrior monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from an Xyz Monster on the field; this card gains 800 ATK until the end of your next turn. You can only use this effect of "XYZ-Destroyer Slasher" once per turn.

957132005.name: Xyz-Destroyer Turbo Striker
957132005.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "XYZ-Destroyer" monster from your hand. While this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY; Xyz Summon 1 "XYZ-Destroyer" monster. You can only use this effect of "Xyz-Destroyer Turbo Striker" once per turn.

957140001.name: Chon Chon the Bitterfly
957140001.desc:
(Quick Effect): You can banish this card until your next Standby Phase. After damage calculation, if this card battled an opponent’s monster: You can banish that monster, also banish this card. You can only use 1 “Chon Chon the Bitterfly” effect per turn, and only once that turn.
{Yokai}

957140002.name: Scylla
957140002.desc:
If only your opponent controls a monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). This card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase.
{Yokai}

957140003.name: Malphas, The King of Crows

957140004.name: Frozen Shade
957140004.desc:
You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 Yokai monster. If this card battles a monster: After damage calculation, negate that monster’s effects, including its effects in the Graveyard. You can only use each of the following effects of "Frozen Shade" once per turn.
● You can inflict 300 damage to your opponent, and if you do, increase this card’s ATK by 100.
● If this card on the field is destroyed: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; that monster cannot attack until the end of your opponent’s turn.
{Yokai}

957140005.name: Yobigami – The Summoner of low Yokais
957140005.desc:
You can discard 1 Trap; Special Summon 1 Level 3 Yokai monster from your Deck, but that monster cannot attack this turn. You can only use this effect of "Yobigami – The Summoner of low Yokais" once per turn.
{Yokai}

957140006.name: Mythical Night
957140006.desc:
Add 1 Level 5 or lower Yokai monster with 1600 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.
{Yokai}

957140007.name: Snake Maiden Koharu & Ghost Hebi
957140007.desc:
If your opponent Sets a monster (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; look at that monster, and if it is a Flip monster or its ATK and/or DEF is higher than 1800, destroy it. When Tribute Summoning a Yokai monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.
{Yokai}

957140010.name: Yokai Strike
957140010.desc:
Shuffle 2 Yokai monsters from your GY into the Deck, then target 1 face-up Level 8 or lower monster your opponent controls; it loses ATK equal to the number of Spell/Trap Cards in their GY × 300 until the end of this turn. Then, if your opponent has 5 or more Spell Cards in their GY, you can destroy 1 face-up monster they control with 1600 or less DEF.

[Original Card: Yokai Tiger Orient Strike]

957140012.name: Tengu Magician
957140012.desc:
This card is also treated as a Spellcaster-Type monster. If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Spell Counter on it (max. 1). Gains 400 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 1 Spell Counter from this card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.
{Yokai}
